content.value:
Base e-text: Muneo Tokunaga et al., Kyoto University. Base edn: R.P. Kangle. Editing
          and conversion to TEI markup: Richard Mahoney, Indica et Buddhica.

The variant readings given in Kangle's edition were not digitized, but a note with the
        abbreviation "ś" was added to indicate that variant readings can be found in Kangle's
        editions.
SARIT: Search and Retrieval of Indic Texts

is a corpus of Indic texts marked
          up according to the guidelines of the Text Encoding Initiative (TEI).

The book from which this e-text was transcribed was printed in the Devanāgarī script. The
          electronic text below is in a lossless transliteration using the Latin alphabet. The
          transliteration scheme used is the IAST (
The International Alphabet of Sanskrit Transliteration

). IAST differs in small
          ways from ISO 15919, but is preferred by most working Sanskrit scholars. Conversion of
          this file to ISO 15919 can be achieved by performing the following replacements throughout
          the file:

Orthography follows general transliteration principles in roman script, thus words are
          separated whenever possible such as "tac ca", "ity eva".
Members of a compound are separated by periods.

Vowel merging has been reverted and vowels are separated by hyphens, e.g. "asya-eva",
          "ca-iti", "śabda-artha"
Prose sections are subdivided by a,b,c, etc..
Quoted sentences and phrases within the text are marked with quotation marks (" ")

Double quotes that have no opening or closing counterpart were enclosed in
          an unclear-element.

When a paragraph is divided into sub-sections, such as KAZ01.1.03a-3b, "-" is added
          before the closing tag except the final section.
The text was originally input by

at the Institute for
            Research in Humanities, Kyoto University) in March 1993:

description_content.value:
Transliteration of anusvāra improved and
        documented.

Put notes into
        footnotes. All verses numbered within body. Minor corrections.
Cleaned header so it conforms to current tei p5.

Updated the TEI header's copyright statement
        and encodingDesc.

Updated the TEI header's copyright
        statement.

Updated Editorial Declaration according to the
        transliteration of the text.

Marked unclear elements such as unclosed
        quotation marks and questions marks (?).

Updated Encoding Description and Reference
        Declaration.

Added @ed to pb's; minor changes in the
        header.

Replaced ref-elements at the beginning of a p
        with label-elements and corrected two typos in the abbreviations: "KA" and "KAK" to
        "KAZ".

children.text: Book 1: Concerning the Topic of Training
Chapter 1: Enumeration of Sections and Books

pṛthivyā lābhe pālane ca yāvanty artha.śāstrāṇi
            pūrva.ācāryaiḥ prasthāpitāni prāyaśas tāni saṃhṛtya-ekam idam artha.śāstraṃ kṛtam | 1
            |

vidyā.samuddeśaḥ, vṛddha.samuddeśaḥ, indriya.jayaḥ,
            amātya.utpattiḥ, mantri.purohita.utpattiḥ, upadhābhiḥ śauca.aśauca.jñānam amātyānām,
            -

mantra.adhikāraḥ, dūta.praṇidhiḥ, rāja.putra.rakṣaṇam,
            aparuddha.vṛttam, aparuddhe vṛttiḥ, rāja.praṇidhiḥ, niśānta.praṇidhiḥ, ātma.rakṣitakam -
            iti vinaya.adhikārikaṃ prathamam adhikaraṇam | 3 |

janapada.niveśaḥ, bhūmic.chidra.apidhānam, durga.vidhānam,
            durga.niveśaḥ, samnidhātṛ.nicaya.karma, samāhartṛ.samudaya.prasthāpanam, akṣa.paṭale
            gāṇanikya.adhikāraḥ, -

samudayasya yukta.apahṛtasya pratyānayanam,
            upayukta.parīkṣā, śāsana.adhikāraḥ, kośa.praveśya.ratna.parīkṣā,
            ākara.karma.anta.pravartanam, akṣa.śālāyāṃ suvarṇa.adhyakṣaḥ -

viśikhāyāṃ sauvarṇika.pracāraḥ, koṣṭha.āgāra.adhyakṣaḥ,
            paṇya.adhyakṣaḥ, kupya.adhyakṣaḥ, āyudha.adhyakṣaḥ, tulā.māna.pautavam, -

deśa.kāla.mānam, śulka.adhyakṣaḥ, sūtra.adhyakṣaḥ,
            sīta.adhyakṣaḥ, surā.adhyakṣaḥ, sūna.adhyakṣaḥ, gaṇikā.adhyakṣaḥ, -

nāv.adhyakṣaḥ, go.adhyakṣaḥ, aśva.adhyakṣaḥ,
            hasty.adhyakṣaḥ, ratha.adhyakṣaḥ, patty.adhyakṣaḥ, senā.pati.pracāraḥ, mudrā.adhyakṣaḥ,
            vivīta.adhyakṣaḥ, samāhartṛ.pracāraḥ, -

gṛha.patika.vaidehaka.tāpasa.vyañjanāḥ praṇidhayaḥ,
            nāgarika.praṇidhiḥ - ity adhyakṣa.pracāro dvitīyam adhikaraṇam | 4 |

vyavahāra.sthāpanā, vivāda.pada.nibandhaḥ, vivāha.samyuktam,
            dāya.vibhāgaḥ, vāstukam, samayasya anapākarma, ṛṇa.adānam, aupanidhikam,
            dāsa.karma.kara.kalpaḥ, -

sambhūya samutthānam, vikrīta.krīta.anuśayaḥ, dattasya
            anapākarma, asvāmi.vikrayaḥ, sva.svāmi.sambandhaḥ, sāhasam, vāk.pāruṣyam,
            daṇḍa.pāruṣyam, dyūta.samāhvayam, prakīrṇakam - iti, dharma.sthīyaṃ tṛtīyam adhikaraṇam
            | 5 |

kāru.kara.kṣaṇam, vaidehaka.rakṣaṇam, upanipāta.pratīkāraḥ,
            gūḍha.ājīvināṃ rakṣā, siddha.vyañjanair māṇava.prakāśanam, śaṅkā.rūpa.karma.abhigrahaḥ,
            -

eka.aṅga.vadha.niṣkrayaḥ, śuddhaś citraś ca daṇḍa kalpaḥ,
            kanyā.prakarma, aticāra.daṇḍāḥ - iti kaṇṭaka.śodhanaṃ caturtham adhikaraṇam | 6 |

dāṇḍakarmikam, kośa.abhisaṃharaṇam, bhṛtya.bharaṇīyam,
            anujīvi.vṛttam, samaya.ācārikam, rājya.pratisandhānam, eka.aiśvaryam - iti yoga.vṛttaṃ
            pañcamam adhikaraṇam | 7 |

prakṛti.sampadaḥ, śama.vyāyāmikam - iti maṇḍala.yoniḥ ṣaṣṭham
            adhikaraṇam | 8 |

ṣāḍguṇya.samuddeśaḥ, kṣaya.sthāna.vṛddhi.niścayaḥ,
            saṃśraya.vṛttiḥ, samahīna.jyāyasāṃ guṇa.abhiniveśaḥ, hīna.sandhayaḥ, vigṛhya āsanam,
            sandhāya āsanam, vigṛhya yānam, sandhāya yānam, -

sambhūya prayāṇam, yātavya.amitrayor abhigraha.cintā,
            kṣaya.lobha.virāga.hetavaḥ prakṛtīnām, sāmavāyika.viparimarśaḥ, -

saṃhita prayāṇikam, paripaṇita.aparipaṇita.apasṛtāḥ
            sandhayaḥ, dvaidhī.bhāvikāḥ sandhi.vikramāḥ, yātavya.vṛttiḥ, anugrāhya.mitra.viśeṣāḥ,
            -

mitra.hiraṇya.bhūmi.karma.sandhayaḥ, pārṣṇi.grāha.cintā,
            hīna.śakti.pūraṇam, balavatā vigṛhya uparodha.hetavaḥ, daṇḍa.upanata.vṛttam, -

daṇḍa.upanāyi.vṛttam, sandhi.karma, samādhi.mokṣaḥ,
            madhyama.caritam, udāsīna.caritam, maṇḍala.caritam - iti ṣāḍguṇyaṃ saptamam adhikaraṇam
            | 9 |

prakṛti.vyasana.vargaḥ, rāja.rājyayor vyasana.cintā,
            puruṣa.vyasana.vargaḥ, pīḍana.vargaḥ, stambha.vargaḥ, kośa.saṅga.vargaḥ,
            mitra.vyasana.vargaḥ - iti vyasana.ādhikārikam aṣṭamam adhikaraṇam | 10 |

śakti.deśa.kāla.bala.abala.jñānam, yātrā.kālāḥ,
            bala.upādāna.kālāḥ, samnāha.guṇāḥ, pratibala.karma, paścāt kopa.cintā,
            bāhya.ābhyantara.prakṛti.kopa.pratīkārāḥ -

viparimarśaḥ,
            bāhya.ābhyantarāś ca-āpadaḥ, duṣya.śatru.samyuktāḥ, artha.anartha.saṃśaya.yuktāḥ, tāsām
            upāya.vikalpajāḥ siddhayaḥ - ity abhiyāsyat karma navamam adhikaraṇam | 11 |

skandha.āvāra.niveśaḥ, skandha.āvāra.prayāṇam,
            bala.vyasana.avaskanda.kāla.rakṣaṇam, kūṭa.yuddha.vikalpāḥ, sva.sainya.utsāhanam,
            sva.bala.anya.bala.vyāyogaḥ, yuddha.bhūmayaḥ, patty.aśva.ratha.hasti.karmāṇi,
            pakṣa.kakṣa.urasyānāṃ bala.agrato vyūha.vibhāgaḥ, sāra.phalgu.bala.vibhāgaḥ,
            patty.aśva.ratha.hasti.yuddhāni, daṇḍa.bhoga.maṇḍala.asaṃhata.vyūha.vyūhanam, tasya
            prativyūha.sthāpanam - iti sāṅgrāmikaṃ daśamam adhikaraṇam | 12 |

bheda.upādānāni, upāṃśu.daṇḍāḥ - iti saṅgha.vṛttam ekādaśam
            adhikaraṇam | 13 |

dūta.karma, mantra.yuddham, senā.mukhya.vadhaḥ,
            maṇḍala.protsāhanam, śastra.agni.rasa.praṇidhayaḥ, vīvadha.āsāra.prasāra.vadhaḥ,
            yoga.atisandhānam, daṇḍa.atisandhānam, eka.vijayaḥ - ity ābalīyasaṃ dvādaśam adhikaraṇam
            | 14 |

upajāpaḥ, yoga.vāmanam, apasarpa.praṇidhiḥ,
            paryupāsana.karma, avamardaḥ, labdha.praśamanam - iti durga.lambha.upāyas trayodaśam
            adhikaraṇam | 15 |

para.bala.ghāta.prayogaḥ, pralambhanam,
            sva.bala.upaghāta.pratīkāraḥ - ity aupaniṣadikaṃ caturdaśam adhikaraṇam | 16 |
ānvīkṣikī trayī vārttā daṇḍa.nītiś ca-iti vidyāḥ | 1 |
trayī vārttā daṇḍa nītiś ca-iti mānavāḥ | 2 |

tābhir dharma.arthau yad vidyāt tad vidyānāṃ vidyātvam | 9
            |

dharma.adharmau trayyām artha.anarthau vārttāyāṃ naya.anayau
            daṇḍa.nītyāṃ bala.abale ca etāsāṃ hetubhir anvīkṣamāṇā lokasya upakaroti vyasane
            'bhyudaye ca buddhim avasthāpayati prajñā.vākya.kriyā.vaiśāradyaṃ ca karoti | 11 |

śikṣā kalpo vyākaraṇaṃ niruktaṃ chando.vicitir jyotiṣam iti
            ca-aṅgāni | 3 |

eṣa trayī.dharmaś caturṇāṃ varṇānām āśramāṇāṃ ca
            sva.dharma.sthāpanād aupakārikaḥ | 4 |

svadharmo brāhmaṇasya adhyayanam adhyāpanaṃ yajanaṃ yājanaṃ
            dānaṃ pratigrahaś ca | 5 |

kṣatriyasya-adhyayanaṃ yajanaṃ dānaṃ śastra.ājīvo
            bhūta.rakṣaṇaṃ ca | 6 |

vaiśyasya-adhyayanaṃ yajanaṃ dānaṃ kṛṣi.pāśupālye vaṇijyā ca
            | 7 |

gṛhasthasya svadharma.ājīvas tulyair asamāna.ṛṣibhir
            vaivāhyam ṛtu.gāmitvaṃ deva.pitr.atithi.pūjā bhṛtyeṣu tyāgaḥ śeṣa.bhojanaṃ ca | 9 |

brahma.cāriṇaḥ svādhyāyo agni.kārya.abhiṣekau
            bhaikṣa.vratitvam ācārye prāṇa.antikī vṛttis tad.abhāve guru.putre sa-brahma.cāriṇi vā |
            10 |

vānaprasthasya brahmacaryaṃ bhūmau śayyā jaṭā.ajina.dhāraṇam
            agni.hotra.abhiṣekau devatā.pitr.atithi.pūjā vanyaś ca-āhāraḥ | 11 |

parivrājakasya jita.indriyatvam anārambho niṣkiñcanatvaṃ
            saṅga.tyāgo bhaikṣavratam anekatra-araṇye ca vāso bāhya.ābhyantaraṃ ca śaucam | 12 |

sarveṣām ahiṃsā satyaṃ śaucam anasūya ānṛśaṃsyaṃ kṣamā ca |
            13 |
tasmāt svadharmaṃ bhūtānāṃ rājā na vyabhicārayet |

svadharmaṃ sandadhāno hi pretya ca-iha ca nandati || 16
              ||

kṛṣi.pāśupālye vaṇijyā ca vārtā,
            dhānya.paśu.hiraṇya.kupya.viṣṭi.pradānād aupakārikī | 1 |

tayā sva.pakṣaṃ para.pakṣaṃ ca vaśī.karoti kośa.daṇḍābhyām |
            2 |

ānvīkṣikī trayī vārttānāṃ yoga.kṣema.sādhano daṇḍaḥ, tasya
            nītir daṇḍa nītiḥ, alabdha.lābha.arthā labdha.parirakṣaṇī rakṣita.vivardhanī vṛddhasya
            tīrthe pratipādanī ca | 3 |

na hy evaṃvidhaṃ vaśa.upanayanam asti bhūtānāṃ yathā daṇḍaḥ
            |" ity ācāryāḥ | 6 |

suvijñāta.praṇīto hi daṇḍaḥ prajā dharma.artha.kāmair
            yojayati | 11 |

duṣpraṇītaḥ kāma.krodhābhyām avajñānād vā
            vānaprastha.parivrājakān api kopayati, kiṃ.aṅga punar gṛhasthān | 12 |

vidyānāṃ tu yathāsvam ācārya.prāmāṇyād vinayo niyamaś ca | 6
            |

vṛtta.upanayanas trayīm ānvīkṣikīṃ ca śiṣṭebhyo vārttām
            adhyakṣebhyo daṇḍa.nītiṃ vaktṛ.prayoktṛbhyaḥ | 8 |

nityaś ca vidyā.vṛddha.samyogo vinaya.vṛddhy.artham,
            tan.mūlatvād vinayasya | 11 |

purāṇam itivṛttam ākhyāyika.udāharaṇaṃ dharma.śāstram
            artha.śāstraṃ ca-iti-itihāsaḥ | 14 |

śeṣam ahorātra.bhāgam apūrva.grahaṇaṃ gṛhīta.paricayaṃ ca
            kuryāt, agṛhītānām ābhīkṣṇya.śravaṇaṃ ca | 15 |

śrutādd hi prajñā-upajāyate prajñāyā yogo yogād ātmavattā-iti
            vidyānāṃ sāmarthyam | 16 |
vidyā.vinīto rājā hi prajānāṃ vinaye rataḥ |

karṇa.tvag.akṣi.jihvā.ghrāṇa.indriyāṇāṃ
            śabda.sparśa.rūpa.rasa.gandheṣv avipratipattir indriya.jayaḥ, śāstra.anuṣṭhānaṃ vā | 2
            |

tad viruddha.vṛttir avaśya.indriyaś cāturanto api rājā sadyo
            vinaśyati | 4 |

yathā dāṇḍakyo nāma bhojaḥ kāmād brāhmaṇa.kanyām
            abhimanyamānaḥ sa-bandhu.rāṣṭro vinanāśa, karālaś ca vaidehaḥ | 5 |

kopāj janamejayo brāhmaṇeṣu vikrāntaḥ, tāla.jaṅghaś ca
            bhṛguṣu | 6 |

lobhād ailaś cāturvarṇyam atyāhārayamāṇaḥ, sauvīraś
            ca-ajabinduḥ | 7 |

harṣād vātāpir agastyam atyāsādayan, vṛṣṇi.saṅghaś ca
            dvaipāyanam iti | 10 |
ete ca-anye ca bahavaḥ śatru.ṣaḍ.vargam āśritāḥ |
ambarīṣaś ca nābhāgo bubhujāte ciraṃ mahīm || 12 ||

tasmād ari.ṣaḍ.varga.tyāgena-indriya.jayaṃ kurvīta,
            vṛddha.samyogena prajñām, cāreṇa cakṣuḥ, utthānena yoga.kṣema.sādhanam,
            kārya.anuśāsanena svadharma.sthāpanam, vinayaṃ vidyā.upadeśena, loka.priyatvam
            artha.samyogena, hitena vṛttim | 1 |

evaṃ vaśya.indriyaḥ para.strī.dravya.hiṃsāś ca varjayet,
            svapnaṃ laulyam anṛtam uddhata.veṣatvam anarthya.samyogam adharma.samyuktam
            anartha.samyuktaṃ ca vyavahāram | 2 |

dharma.artha.avirodhena kāmaṃ seveta, na nihsukhaḥ syāt | 3
            |

eko hy atyāsevito dharma.artha.kāmānām ātmānam itarau ca
            pīḍayati | 5 |

maryādāṃ sthāpayed ācāryān amātyān vā, ya-enam apāya
            sthānebhyo vārayeyuḥ, chāyā.nālikā.pratodena vā rahasi pramādyantam abhitudeyuḥ | 8
            |
sahāya.sādhyaṃ rājatvaṃ cakram ekaṃ na vartate |

kurvīta sacivāṃs tasmāt teṣāṃ ca śṛṇuyān matam || 9
              ||

ye hy asya guhya.sadharmāṇas tān amātyān kurvīta,
            samāna.śīla.vyasanatvāt | 5 |
te hy asya marmajña.bhayān na-aparādhyanti" iti | 6 |
avaśaḥ karmaṇā tena vaśyo bhavati tāvatām || 9 ||

ya-enam āpatsu prāṇa.ābādha.yuktāsv anugṛhṇīyus tān amātyān
            kurvīta, dṛṣṭa.anurāgatvāt" iti | 10 |

saṅkhyāta.artheṣu karmasu niyuktā ye yathā.ādiṣṭam arthaṃ
            saviśeṣaṃ vā kuryus tān amātyān kurvīta, dṛṣṭa.guṇatvāt" iti | 13 |

te hy enam apacarantam api na tyajanti, sagandhatvāt | 17
            |

gāvo hy asagandhaṃ go.gaṇam atikramya sagandheṣv
            eva-avatiṣṭhante" iti | 19 |
"te hy asya sarvam avagṛhya svāmivat pracaranti | 21 |

navās tu yama.sthāne daṇḍa.dharaṃ manyamānā na-aparādhyanti"
            iti | 23 |

kārya.sāmarthyādd hi puruṣa.sāmarthyaṃ kalpyate | 28 |
            sāmarthyaś ca --

amātyāḥ sarva eva-ete kāryāḥ syur na tu mantriṇaḥ || 29
              ||
Chapter 9 (Section 5): Appointment of Counsellors and Chaplain

jānapado abhijātaḥ svavagrahaḥ kṛta.śilpaś cakṣuṣmān prājño
            dhārayiṣṇur dakṣo vāgmī pragalbhaḥ pratipattimān utsāha.prabhāva.yuktaḥ kleśa.sahaḥ
            śucir maitro dṛḍha.bhaktiḥ śīla.bala.ārogya.sattva.yuktaḥ stambha.cāpala.hīnaḥ sampriyo
            vairāṇām akartā-ity amātya.sampat | 1 |

teṣāṃ janapad.abhijanam avagrahaṃ ca-āptataḥ parīkṣeta,
            samāna.vidyebhyaḥ śilpaṃ śāstra.cakṣuṣmattāṃ ca, karma.ārambheṣu prajñāṃ dhārayiṣṇutāṃ
            dākṣyaṃ ca, kathā.yogeṣu vāgmitvaṃ prāgalbhyaṃ pratibhānavattvaṃ ca, saṃvāsibhyaḥ
            śīla.bala.ārogya.sattva.yogam astambham acāpalaṃ ca, pratyakṣataḥ sampriyatvam
            avairatvaṃ ca | 3 |

yaugapadyāt tu karmaṇām anekatvād anekasthatvāc ca
            deśa.kāla.atyayo mā bhūd iti parokṣam amātyaiḥ kārayet | 8 | ity amātya.karma |

purohitam udita.udita.kula.śīlaṃ sa-aṅge vede daive nimitte
            daṇḍa.nītyāṃ ca-abhivinītam āpadāṃ daiva.mānuṣīṇām atharvabhir upāyaiś ca pratikartāraṃ
            kurvīta | 9 |

tam ācāryaṃ śiṣyaḥ pitaraṃ putro bhṛtyaḥ svāminam iva
            ca-anuvarteta | 10 |

Chapter 10 (Section 6): Ascertainment of the Integrity of Ministers by
            Means of Secret Tests

mantri.purohita.sakhaḥ sāmānyeṣv adhikaraṇeṣu
            sthāpayitvā-amātyān upadhābhiḥ śodhayet | 1 |

sa sattribhiḥ śapatha.pūrvam ekaikam amātyam upajāpayet -
            "adhārmiko ayaṃ rājā, sādhu dhārmikam anyam asya tat.kulīnam aparuddhaṃ kulyam
            eka.pragrahaṃ sāmantam āṭavikam aupapādikaṃ vā pratipādayāmaḥ, sarveṣām etad rocate,
            kathaṃ vā tava" iti | 3 |

senā.patir asat.pragraheṇa-avakṣiptaḥ sattribhir ekaikam
            amātyam upajāpayet lobhanīyena-arthena rāja.vināśāya, "sarveṣām etad rocate, kathaṃ vā
            tava" iti | 5 |

parivrājikā labdha.viśvāsā-antaḥpure kṛta.satkārā
            mahā.mātram ekaikam upajapet - "rāja.mahiṣī tvāṃ kāmayate kṛta.samāgama.upāyā, mahān
            arthaś ca te bhaviṣyati" iti | 7 |

prahavaṇa.nimittam eko amātyaḥ sarvān amātyān āvāhayet | 9
            |

kāpaṭikaś ca-atra pūrva.avaruddhas teṣām
            artha.māna.avakṣiptam ekaikam amātyam upajapet - "asat pravṛtto ayaṃ rājā, sādhv enaṃ
            hatvā-anyaṃ pratipādayāmaḥ, sarveṣām etad rocate, kathaṃ vā tava" iti | 11 |

tatra dharma.upadhā.śuddhān dharma.sthīya.kaṇṭaka.śodhaneṣu
            karmasu sthāpayet, artha.upadhā.śuddhān samāhartṛ.samnidhātṛ.nicaya.karmasu, kāma.upadhā
            śuddhān bāhya.ābhyantara.vihāra.rakṣāsu, bhaya.upadhā.śuddhān āsanna.kāryeṣu rājñaḥ | 13
            |

adhikuryād yathā śaucam ity ācāryā vyavasthitāḥ || 16
              ||
na tv eva kuryād ātmānaṃ devīṃ vā lakṣyam īśvaraḥ |
tasmād bāhyam adhiṣṭhānaṃ kṛtvā kārye caturvidhe |

Chapter 11 (Section 7): Appointment of Persons in Secret
            Service

upadhābhiḥ śuddha.amātya.vargo gūḍha.puruṣān utpādayet
            kāpaṭika.udāsthita.gṛha.patika.vaidehaka.tāpasa.vyañjanān sattri.tīṣkṇa.rasada.bhikṣukīś
            ca | 1 |

tam artha.mānābhyāṃ protsāhya mantrī brūyāt - "rājānaṃ māṃ
            ca pramāṇaṃ kṛtvā yasya yad akuśalaṃ paśyasi tat tadānīm eva pratyādiśa" iti | 3 |

sa vārttā.karma.pradiṣṭāyāṃ bhūmau prabhūta.hiraṇya.antevāsī
            karma kārayet | 5 |

vṛtti.kāmāṃś ca-upajapet - "etena-eva veṣeṇa rāja.arthaś
            caritavyo bhakta.vetana.kāle ca-upasthātavyam" iti | 7 |

sarva.pravrajitāś ca svaṃ svaṃ vargam evam upajapeyuḥ | 8
            |

sa kṛṣi.karma.pradiṣṭāyāṃ bhūmau - iti samānaṃ pūrveṇa | 10
            |

sa vaṇik.karma.pradiṣṭāyāṃ bhūmau - iti samānaṃ pūrveṇa | 12
            |

sa nagara.abhyāśe prabhūta.muṇḍa.jaṭila.antevāsī śākaṃ
            yava.muṣṭiṃ vā māsa.dvimāsa.antaraṃ prakāśam aśnīyāt, gūḍham iṣṭam āhāram | 14 |

samedha.āśāstibhiś ca-abhigatānām aṅga.vidyayā
            śiṣya.sañjñābhiś ca karmāṇy abhijane avasitāny ādiśet - alpa.lābham agni.dāhaṃ
            cora.bhayaṃ dūṣya.vadhaṃ tuṣṭi.dānaṃ videśa.pravṛtti.jñānam, "idam adya śvo vā
            bhaviṣyati, idaṃ vā rājā kariṣyati" iti | 17 |
tad asya gūḍhāḥ sattriṇaś ca sampādayeyuḥ | 18 |

sattva.prajñā.vākya.śakti.sampannānāṃ rāja.bhāgyam
            anuvyāharet, mantri.samyogaṃ ca brūyāt | 19 |

ye ca kāraṇād abhikruddhās tān artha.mānābhyāṃ śamayet,
            akāraṇa.kruddhāṃs tūṣṇīṃ daṇḍena, rāja.dviṣṭa.kāriṇaś ca | 21 |

jānīyuḥ śaucam ity etāḥ pañca.saṃsthāḥ prakīrtitāḥ || 22
              ||

Chapter 12 (Sections 7; 8): Appointment of Persons in Secret Service
            (cont.); Rules for Secret Servants

ye ca-apy asmabandhino avaśya.bhartavyās te lakṣaṇam
            aṅga.vidyāṃ jambhaka.vidyāṃ māyā.gatam āśrama.dharmaṃ nimittam antara.cakram ity
            adhīyānāḥ sattriṇaḥ, saṃsarga.vidyāṃ ca | 1 |

ye janapade śūrās tyakta.ātmāno hastinaṃ vyālaṃ vā
            dravya.hetoḥ pratiyodhayeyus te tīkṣṇāḥ | 2 |
ye bandhuṣu nihsnehāḥ krūrā alasāś ca te rasadāḥ | 3 |

parivrājikā vṛtti.kāmā daridrā vidhavā pragalbhā brāhmaṇy
            antaḥpure kṛta.satkārā mahā.mātra.kulāny abhigacchet | 4 |
etayā muṇḍā vṛṣalyo vyākhyātāḥ | 5 | iti sañcārāḥ |

tān rājā sva.viṣaye
            mantri.purohita.senā.pati.yuva.rāja.dauvārika.antarvaṃśika.praśāstṛ.-
            samāhartṛ.samnidhātṛ.pradeṣṭṛ.nāyaka.paura.vyāvahārika.kārmāntika.-
            mantri.pariṣad.adhyakṣa.daṇḍa.durga.antapāla.āṭavikeṣu
            śraddheya.deśa.veṣa.śilpa.bhāṣā.abhijana.apadeśān bhaktitaḥ sāmarthya.yogāc
            ca-apasarpayet | 6 |

sūda.ārālika.snāpaka.saṃvāhaka.āstaraka.kalpaka.prasādhaka.udaka.- paricārakā
            rasadāḥ kubja.vāmana.kirāta.mūka.badhira.jaḍa.andhac.chadmāno
            naṭa.nartaka.gāyana.vādaka.vāg.jīvana.kuśīlavāḥ striyaś ca-ābhyantaraṃ cāraṃ vidyuḥ | 9
            |
na ca-anyonyaṃ saṃsthās te vā vidyuḥ | 12 |

bhikṣukī.pratiṣedhe dvāhstha.paramparā mātā.pitṛ.vyañjanāḥ
            śilpa.kārikāḥ kuśīlavā dāsyo vā gīta.pāṭhya.vādya.bhāṇḍa.gūḍha.lekhya.sañjñābhir vā
            cāraṃ nirhareyuḥ.| 13 |

kaṇṭaka.śodhana.uktāś ca-apasarpāḥ pareṣu kṛta.vetanā
            vaseyur asampātinaś cāra.artham | 17 |

tāṃś ca-ari.prahitān vidyāt teṣāṃ śaucaṃ ca tadvidhaiḥ
              || 19 ||
evaṃ śatrau ca mitre ca madhyame ca-āvapec carān |
udāsīne ca teṣāṃ ca tīrtheṣv aṣṭādaśasv api || 20 ||

śilpavatyaḥ striyo mūkāś citrāś ca mleccha.jātayaḥ || 21
              ||
parasya ca-ete boddhavyās tādṛśair eva tādṛśāḥ |

Chapter 13 (Section 9): Keeping a Watch over One's Seducible and
            Non-seducible Parties

"sarva.guṇa.sampannaś ca-ayaṃ rājā śrūyate, na ca-asya
            kaścid guṇo dṛśyate yaḥ paura.jānapadān daṇḍa.karābhyāṃ pīḍayati" iti | 3 |

tatra ye 'nupraśaṃseyus tān itaras taṃ ca pratiṣedhayet | 4
            |
mātsya.nyāya.abhibhūtāḥ prajā manuṃ vaivasvataṃ rājānaṃ cakrire | 5 |

dhānya.ṣaḍ.bhāgaṃ paṇya.daśa.bhāgaṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca-asya
            bhāga.dheyaṃ prakalpayām-āsuḥ | 6 |

teṣāṃ kilbiṣam adaṇḍa.karā haranty ayoga.kṣema.āvahāś ca
            prajānām | 8 |

tasmād uñcha.ṣaḍ.bhāgam āraṇyakā-api nirvapanti -
            "tasya-etad bhāga.dheyaṃ yo 'smān gopāyati" iti | 9 |

ye ca-asya dhānya.paśu.hiraṇyāny ājīvanti, tair upakurvanti
            vyasane 'bhyudaye vā, kupitaṃ bandhuṃ rāṣṭraṃ vā vyāvartayanti, amitram āṭavikaṃ vā
            pratiṣedhayanti, teṣāṃ muṇḍa.jaṭila.vyañjanās tuṣṭa.atuṣṭatvaṃ vidyuḥ | 15 |
atuṣṭāṃs tuṣṭi.hetos tyāgena sāmnā ca prasādayet | 17 |

parasparād vā bhedayed enān,
            sāmanta.āṭavika.tat.kulīna.aparuddhebhyaś ca | 18 |

gupta.putra.dārān ākara.karma.anteṣu vā vāsayet pareṣām
            āspada.bhayāt | 21 |
evaṃ sva.viṣaye kṛtyān akṛtyāṃś ca vicakṣaṇaḥ |

Chapter 14 (Section 10): Winning over the Enemy's Seducible and
            Non-seducible Parties

saṃśrutya-arthān vipralabdhaḥ, tulya.kāriṇoḥ śilpe
            vā-upakāre vā vimānitaḥ, vallabha.avaruddhaḥ, samāhūya parājitaḥ, pravāsa.upataptaḥ,
            kṛtvā vyayam alabdha.kāryaḥ, svadharmād dāyādyād vā-uparuddhaḥ, māna.adhikārābhyāṃ
            bhraṣṭaḥ, kulyair antarhitaḥ, prasabha.abhimṛṣṭa.strīkaḥ, kāra.abhinyastaḥ,
            para.ukta.daṇḍitaḥ, mithyā.ācāra.vāritaḥ, sarva.svam āhāritaḥ, bandhana.parikliṣṭaḥ,
            pravāsita.bandhuḥ - iti kruddha.vargaḥ | 2 |

svayam upahataḥ, viprakṛtaḥ, pāpa.karma.abhikhyātaḥ,
            tulya.doṣa.daṇḍena-udvignaḥ, paryātta.bhūmiḥ, daṇḍena-upanataḥ, sarva.adhikaraṇasthaḥ,
            sahasā.upacita.arthaḥ, tat.kulīna.upāśaṃsuḥ, pradviṣṭo rājñā, rāja.dveṣī ca - iti
            bhīta.vargaḥ | 3 |

parikṣīṇaḥ, anya.ātta.svaḥ, kadaryaḥ, vyasanī,
            atyāhita.vyavahāraś ca - iti lubdha.vargaḥ | 4 |

ātma.sambhāvitaḥ, māna.kāmaḥ, śatru.pūjā.amarṣitaḥ, nīcair
            upahitaḥ, tīkṣṇaḥ, sāhasikaḥ, bhogena-asantuṣṭaḥ - iti māni.vargaḥ | 5 |

teṣāṃ muṇḍa.jaṭila.vyañjanair yo yad.bhaktiḥ kṛtya.pakṣīyas
            taṃ tena-upajāpayet | 6 |

"yathā mada.andho hastī mattena-adhiṣṭhito yad yad āsādayati
            tat sarvaṃ pramṛdnāti, evam ayam aśāstra.cakṣur andho rājā
            paura.jānapada.vadhāya-abhyutthitaḥ, śakyam asya pratihasti.protsāhanena-apakartum,
            amarṣaḥ kriyatām" iti kruddha.vargam upajāpayet | 7 |

"yathā līnaḥ sarpo yasmād bhayaṃ paśyati tatra viṣam
            utsṛjati, evam ayaṃ rājā jāta.doṣa.āśaṅkas tvayi purā krodha.viṣam utsṛjati, anyatra
            gamyatām" iti bhīta.vargaṃ.upajāpayet | 8 |

"yathā śva.gaṇināṃ dhenuḥ śvabhyo duhyate na brāhmaṇebhyaḥ,
            evam ayaṃ rājā sattva.prajñā.vākya.śakti.hīnebhyo duhyate na-ātma.guṇa.sampannebhyaḥ,
            asau rājā puruṣa.viśeṣajñaḥ, tatra gamyatām" iti lubdha.vargaṃ.upajāpayet | 9 |

"yathā caṇḍāla.uda.pānaś caṇḍālānām eva-upabhogyo
            na-anyeṣām, evam ayaṃ rājā nīco nīcānām eva-upabhogyo na tvadvidhānām āryāṇām, asau rājā
            puruṣa.viśeṣajñaḥ, tatra gamyatām" iti māni.vargam upajāpayet | 10 |

tad.uddeśaḥ saṃvṛtaḥ kathānām anihśrāvī pakṣibhir apy
            anālokyaḥ syāt | 3 |

śrūyate hi śuka.sārikābhir mantro bhinnaḥ, śvabhir apy
            anyaiś ca

teṣāṃ hi pramāda.mada.supta.pralāpāḥ, kāma.ādir utsekaḥ,
            pracchanno 'vamato vā mantraṃ bhinatti | 11 |
tasmād guhyam eko mantrayeta" iti bhāradvājaḥ | 14 |
mantriṇām api hi mantriṇo bhavanti, teṣām apy anye | 15 |

"tasmān na-asya pare vidyuḥ karma kiñcic cikīrṣitam
              |
ārabdhāras tu jānīyur ārabdhaṃ kṛtam eva vā || 17 ||

anupalabdhasya jñānam upalabdhasya niścita.bala.ādhānam
            artha.dvaidhasya saṃśayac.chedanam eka.deśa.dṛṣṭasya śeṣa.upalabdhir iti mantri.sādhyam
            etat | 20 |

yad
            asya kāryam abhipretaṃ tat.pratirūpakaṃ mantriṇaḥ pṛcchet - "kāryam idam evam āsīt, evaṃ
            vā yadi bhavet, tat kathaṃ kartavyam" iti | 24 |

"mantriṇo hi vyavahitam arthaṃ vṛttam avṛttaṃ vā pṛṣṭā
            anādareṇa bruvanti prakāśayanti vā | 28 |

tasmāt karmasu ye yeṣv abhipretās taiḥ saha mantrayeta | 30
            |

tair mantrayamāṇo hi mantra.siddhiṃ guptiṃ ca labhate" iti |
            31 |
mantribhis tribhiś caturbhir vā saha mantrayeta | 34 |
ekaś ca mantrī yathā.iṣṭam anavagrahaś carati | 36 |

dvābhyāṃ mantrayamāṇo dvābhyāṃ saṃhatābhyām avagṛhyate,
            vigṛhītābhyāṃ vināśyate | 37 |

tataḥ pareṣu kṛcchreṇa-artha.niścayo gamyate, mantro vā
            rakṣyate | 40 |

deśa.kāla.kārya.vaśena tv ekena saha dvābhyām eko vā
            yathā.sāmarthyaṃ mantrayeta | 41 |

karmaṇām ārambha.upāyaḥ puruṣa.dravya.sampad
            deśa.kāla.vibhāgo vinipāta.pratīkāraḥ kārya.siddhir iti pañca.aṅgo mantraḥ | 42 |

na dīrgha.kālaṃ mantrayeta, na teṣāṃ pakṣīyair yeṣām
            apakuryāt | 46 |
te hy asya sva.pakṣaṃ para.pakṣaṃ ca cintayeyuḥ | 51 |

akṛta.ārambham ārabdha.anuṣṭhānam anuṣṭhita.viśeṣaṃ
            niyoga.sampadaṃ ca karmaṇāṃ kuryuḥ | 52 |

ātyayike kārye mantriṇo mantri.pariṣadaṃ ca-āhūya brūyāt |
            58 |

tatra yad.bhūyiṣṭhā brūyuḥ kārya.siddhi.karaṃ vā tat kuryāt
            | 59 |

na-asya guhyaṃ pare vidyuś chidraṃ vidyāt parasya ca
              |

gūhet kūrma-iva-aṅgāni yat syād vivṛtam ātmanaḥ || 60
              ||

yathā hy aśrotriyaḥ śrāddhaṃ na satāṃ bhoktum arhati
              |

evam aśruta.śāstra.artho na mantraṃ śrotum arhati || 61
              ||

śāsanam evaṃ vācyaḥ paraḥ, sa vakṣyaty evam, tasya-idaṃ
            prativākyam, evam atisandhātavyam, ity adhīyāno gacchet | 6 |

śāsanaṃ ca yathā.uktaṃ brūyāt, prāṇa.ābādhe 'pi dṛṣṭe | 11
            |

parasya vāci vaktre dṛṣṭyāṃ ca prasādaṃ vākya.pūjanam
            iṣṭa.paripraśnaṃ guṇa.kathā.saṅgam āsannam āsanaṃ satkāram iṣṭeṣu smaraṇaṃ
            viśvāsa.gamanaṃ ca lakṣayet tuṣṭasya, viparītam atuṣṭasya | 12 |

taṃ brūyāt - "dūta.mukhā hi rājānaḥ, tvaṃ ca-anye ca | 13
            |

teṣām anta.avasāyino 'py avadhyāḥ, kim aṅga punar brāhmaṇāḥ
            | 15 |

kṛtya.pakṣa.upajāpam akṛtya.pakṣe gūḍha.praṇidhānaṃ
            rāga.aparāgau bhartari randhraṃ ca prakṛtīnāṃ tāpasa.vaidehaka.vyañjanābhyām upalabheta,
            tayor antevāsibhiś cikitsaka.pāṣaṇḍa.vyañjana.ubhaya.vetanair vā | 24 |

teṣām asambhāṣāyāṃ yācaka.matta.unmatta.supta.pralāpaiḥ
            puṇya.sthāna.deva.gṛha.citra.lekhya.sañjñābhir vā cāram upalabheta | 25 |

pareṇa ca-uktaḥ svāsāṃ prakṛtīnāṃ pramāṇaṃ na-ācakṣīta | 27
            |

"sarvaṃ veda bhavān" iti brūyāt, kārya.siddhi.karaṃ vā | 28
            |

kāryasya-asiddhāv uparudhyamānas tarkayet - "kiṃ bhartur me
            vyasanam āsannaṃ paśyan, svaṃ vā vyasanaṃ pratikartu.kāmaḥ, pārṣṇi.grāham āsāram
            antaḥ.kopam āṭavikaṃ vā samutthāpayitu.kāmaḥ, mitram ākrandaṃ vā vyāghātayitu.kāmaḥ,
            svaṃ vā parato vigraham antaḥ.kopam āṭavikaṃ vā pratikartu.kāmaḥ, saṃsiddhaṃ vā me
            bhartur yātrā.kālam abhihantu.kāmaḥ, sasya.paṇya.kupya.saṅgrahaṃ durga.karma
            bala.samuddānaṃ vā kartu.kāmaḥ, sva.sainyānāṃ vā vyāyāmasya deśa.kālāv ākāṅkṣamāṇaḥ,
            paribhava.pramādābhyāṃ vā, saṃsarga.anubandha.arthī vā, mām uparuṇaddhi" iti | 29 |

śāsanam aniṣṭam uktvā bandha.vadha.bhayād avisṛṣṭo 'py
            apagacchet, anyathā niyamyeta | 32 |
sva.dūtaiḥ kārayed etat para.dūtāṃś ca rakṣayet |

rakṣito rājā rājyaṃ rakṣaty āsannebhyaḥ parebhyaś ca, pūrvaṃ
            dārebhyaḥ putrebhyaś ca | 1 |

teṣām ajāta.snehe pitary upāṃśu.daṇḍaḥ śreyān" iti
            bhāradvājaḥ | 6 |

kumāro
            hi "vikrama.bhayān māṃ pitā-avaruṇaddhi" iti jñātvā tam eva-aṅke kuryāt | 10 |

"pratyāpatter hi tad eva kāraṇaṃ jñātvā-anta.pāla.sakhaḥ
            syāt | 13 |

tasmāt sva.viṣayād apakṛṣṭe sāmanta.durge vāsaḥ śreyān" iti
            | 14 |

"vatsena-iva hi dhenuṃ pitaram asya sāmanto duhyāt | 16
            |

tena hi
            dhvajena-aditi.kauśikavad asya mātṛ.bāndhavā bhikṣeran | 19 |

sukha.uparuddhā hi putrāḥ pitaraṃ na-abhidruhyanti" iti | 21
            |

kāṣṭham iva ghuṇa.jagdhaṃ rāja.kulam avinīta.putram
            abhiyukta.mātraṃ bhajyeta | 23 |

tasmād ṛtumatyāṃ mahiṣyām ṛtvijaś carum
              aindrābārhaspatyaṃ

āpanna.sattvāyāḥ kaumāra.bhṛtyo garbha.bharmaṇi prasave ca
            viyateta | 25 |

sattriṇām ekaś ca-enaṃ mṛgayā.dyūta.madya.strībhiḥ pralobhayet "pitari
            vikramya rājyaṃ gṛhāṇa" iti | 28 |

navaṃ hi dravyaṃ yena yena-artha.jātena-upadihyate tat tad
            ācūṣati | 31 |

evam ayaṃ nava.buddhir yad yad ucyate tat
            tat.śāstra.upadeśam iva-abhijānāti | 32 |

tasmād dharmyam arthyaṃ ca-asya-upadiśen na-adharmyam
            anarthyaṃ ca | 33 |

sattriṇas tv enaṃ "tava smaḥ" iti vadantaḥ pālayeyuḥ | 34
            |

yauvana.utsekāt para.strīṣu manaḥ kurvāṇam āryā.vyañjanābhiḥ
            strībhir amedhyābhiḥ śūnya.āgāreṣu rātrāv udvejayeyuḥ | 35 |

pitari vikrama.buddhiṃ "tathā" ity anupraviśya bhedayeyuḥ -
            "aprārthanīyo rājā, vipanne ghātaḥ, sampanne naraka.pātaḥ, saṅkrośaḥ, prajābhir
            eka.loṣṭa.vadhaś ca" iti | 39 |

bahu.putraḥ pratyantam anya.viṣayaṃ vā preṣayed yatra
            garbhaḥ paṇyaṃ ḍimbo vā na bhavet | 42 |

śiṣyamāṇo dharma.arthāv upalabhate ca-anutiṣṭhati ca
            buddhimān | 45 |
sa yady eka.putraḥ putra.utpattāv asya prayateta | 48 |

vṛddhas tu vyādhito vā rājā
            mātṛ.bandhu.kulya.guṇavat.sāmantānām anyatamena kṣetre bījam utpādayet | 50 |
kulasya vā bhaved rājyaṃ kula.saṅgho hi durjayaḥ |

Chapter 18 (Sections 14; 15): Conduct of the Prince in Disfavour;
            Behaviour towards a Prince in Disfavour

vinīto rāja.putraḥ kṛcchra.vṛttir asadṛśe karmaṇi niyuktaḥ
            pitaram anuvarteta, anyatra prāṇa.ābādhaka.prakṛti.kopaka.pātakebhyaḥ | 1 |
puṇye karmaṇi niyuktaḥ puruṣam adhiṣṭhātāraṃ yācet | 2 |

abhirūpaṃ ca karma.phalam aupāyanikaṃ ca lābhaṃ pitur
            upanāyayet | 4 |

tathā-apy atuṣyantam anyasmin putre dāreṣu vā snihyantam
            araṇyāya-āpṛccheta | 5 |

bandha.vadha.bhayād vā yaḥ sāmanto nyāya.vṛttir dhārmikaḥ
            satya.vāg.avisaṃvādakaḥ pratigrahītā mānayitā ca-abhipannānāṃ tam āśrayeta | 6 |

tatrasthaḥ kośa.daṇḍa.sampannaḥ
            pravīra.puruṣa.kanyā.sambandham aṭavī.sambandhaṃ kṛtya.pakṣa.upagrahaṃ ca kuryāt | 7
            |

pāṣaṇḍa.saṅgha.dravyam aśrotriya.upabhogyaṃ vā deva.dravyam
            āḍhya.vidhavā.dravyaṃ vā gūḍham anupraviśya sārtha.yāna.pātrāṇi ca
            madana.rasa.yogena-atisandhāya-apaharet | 9 |

kāru.śilpi.kuśīlava.cikitsaka.vāg.jīvana.pāṣaṇḍac.chadmabhir
            vā naṣṭa.rūpas tad.vyañjana.sakhaś.chidreṣu praviśya rājñaḥ śastra.rasābhyāṃ prahṛtya
            brūyāt - "aham asau kumāraḥ, saha.bhogyam idaṃ rājyam, eko na-arhati bhoktum, ye
            kāmayante māṃ bhartuṃ tān ahaṃ dviguṇena bhakta.vetanena-upasthāsyāmi" iti | 12 | ity
            aparuddha.vṛttam |

aparuddhaṃ tu mukhya.putra.apasarpāḥ pratipādya-ānayeyuḥ,
            mātā vā pratigṛhītā | 13 |

atyaktaṃ tulya.śīlābhiḥ strībhiḥ pānena mṛgayayā vā
            prasañjayitvā rātrāv upagṛhya-ānayeyuḥ | 15 |
upasthitaṃ ca rājyena mad.ūrdhvam iti sāntvayet |

ekastham atha samrundhyāt putravāṃs tu pravāsayet || 16
              ||

nālikābhir ahar aṣṭadhā rātriṃ ca vibhajet, chāyā.pramāṇena
            vā | 6 |

tripauruṣī pauruṣī catur.aṅgulā naṣṭac.chāyo madhya.ahna-iti
            catvāraḥ pūrve divasasya-aṣṭa.bhāgāḥ | 7 |

tatra pūrve divasasya-aṣṭa.bhāge rakṣā.vidhānam āya.vyayau
            ca śṛṇuyāt | 9 |

tṛtīye snāna.bhojanaṃ seveta, svādhyāyaṃ ca kurvīta | 11
            |

pañcame mantri.pariṣadā pattra.sampreṣaṇena mantrayeta,
            cāra.guhya.bodhanīyāni ca budhyeta | 13 |

ṣaṣṭhe tūrya.ghoṣeṇa pratibuddhaḥ śāstram itikartavyatāṃ ca
            cintayet | 21 |

saptame mantram adhyāsīta, gūḍha.puruṣāṃś ca preṣayet | 22
            |

aṣṭame ṛtvig.ācārya.purohita.svastyayanāni pratigṛhṇīyāt,
            cikitsaka.māhānasika.mauhūrtikāṃś ca paśyet | 23 |

savastāṃ dhenuṃ vṛṣabhaṃ ca pradakṣiṇī.kṛtya-upasthānaṃ
            gacchet | 24 |

ātma.bala.ānukūlyena vā niśā.ahar.bhāgān pravibhajya kāryāṇi
            seveta | 25 |

durdarśo hi rājā kārya.akārya.viparyāsam āsannaiḥ kāryate |
            27 |

tasmād devatā.āśrama.pāṣaṇḍa.śrotriya.paśu.puṇya.sthānānāṃ
            bāla.vṛddha.vyādhita.vyasany.anāthānāṃ strīṇāṃ ca krameṇa kāryāṇi paśyet, kārya.gauravād
            ātyayika.vaśena vā | 29 |
tapasvināṃ tu kāryāṇi traividyaiḥ saha kārayet |
rājño hi vratam utthānaṃ yajñaḥ kārya.anuśāsanam |
prajā.sukhe sukhaṃ rājñaḥ prajānāṃ ca hite hitam |

na-ātma.priyaṃ hitaṃ rājñaḥ prajānāṃ tu priyaṃ hitam ||
              34 ||
Chapter 20 (Section 17): Regulations for the Royal Residence

vāstuka.praśaste deśe saprākāra.parikhā.dvāram
            aneka.kakṣyā.parigatam antaḥpuraṃ kārayet | 1 |

kośagṛha.vidhānena madhye vāsa.gṛham, gūḍha.bhitti.sañcāraṃ
            mohana.gṛhaṃ tan.madhye vā vāsa.gṛham, bhūmi.gṛhaṃ
            vā-āsanna.caitya.kāṣṭha.devatā.apidhāna.dvāram aneka.suruṅgā.sañcāraṃ tasya-upari
            prāsādaṃ gūḍha.bhitti.sopānaṃ suṣira.stambha.praveśa.apasāraṃ vā vāsa.gṛhaṃ
            yantra.baddha.tala.avapātaṃ kārayet, āpat.pratīkāra.artham āpadi vā | 2 |

mānuṣeṇa-agninā trir apasavyaṃ parigatam antaḥpuram agnir
            anyo na dahati, na ca-atra-anyo 'gnir jvalati, vaidyutena bhasmanā mṛt.samyuktena
            karaka.vāriṇā-avaliptaṃ ca | 4 |

jīvantī.śvetā.muṣkaka.puṣpa.vandākābhir akṣīve
            jātasya-aśvatthasya pratānena guptaṃ sarpā viṣāṇi vā na prabhavanti | 5 |

śukaḥ sārikā bhṛṅga.rājo vā sarpa.viṣa.śaṅkāyāṃ krośati | 7
            |

krauñco viṣa.abhyāśe mādyati, glāyati jīvaṃ.jīvakaḥ, mriyate
            matta.kokilaḥ, cakorasya-akṣiṇī virajyete | 8 |

pṛṣṭhataḥ kakṣyā.vibhāge strī.niveśo garbha.vyādhi.saṃsthā
            vṛkṣa.udaka.sthānaṃ ca | 10 |

purastād alaṅkāra.bhūmir mantra.bhūmir upasthānaṃ
            kumāra.adhyakṣa.sthānaṃ ca | 12 |

devī.gṛhe līno hi bhrātā bhadrasenaṃ jaghāna, mātuḥ
            śayyā.antargataś ca putraḥ kārūṣam | 15 |

lājān madhunā-iti viṣeṇa paryasya devī kāśi.rājam,
            viṣa.digdhena nūpreṇa vairantyam, mekhalā.maṇinā

sauvīram,
            jālūtham ādarśena, veṇyāṃ gūḍhaṃ śastraṃ kṛtvā devī vidūrathaṃ jaghāna | 16 |

na ca-enāḥ kulyāḥ paśyeyuḥ, anyatra
            garbha.vyādhi.saṃsthābhyaḥ | 19 |

aśītikāḥ puruṣāḥ pañcāśatkāḥ striyo vā mātā.pitṛ.vyañjanāḥ
            sthavira.varṣadhara.abhyāgārikāś ca-avarodhānāṃ śauca.āśaucaṃ vidyuḥ, sthāpayeyuś ca
            svāmi.hite, | 21 |
sva.bhūmau ca vaset sarvaḥ para.bhūmau na sañcaret |

na ca bāhyena saṃsargaṃ kaścid ābhyantaro vrajet || 22
              ||
Chapter 21 (Section 18): Protection of the King's Person

śayanād utthitaḥ strī.gaṇair dhanvibhiḥ parigṛhyate,
            dvitīyasyāṃ kakṣyāyāṃ kañcuka.uṣṇīṣibhir varṣa.dhara.abhyāgārikaiḥ, tṛtīyasyāṃ
            kubja.vāmana.kirātaiḥ, caturthyāṃ mantribhiḥ sambandhibhir dauvārikaiś ca prāsa.pāṇibhiḥ
            | 1 |

pitṛ.paitāmahaṃ sambandha.anubaddhaṃ śikṣitam anuraktaṃ
            kṛta.karmāṇaṃ ca janam āsannaṃ kurvīta, na-anyato.deśīyam akṛta.artha.mānaṃ sva.deśīyaṃ
            vā-apy apakṛtya-upagṛhītam | 2 |

gupte deśe māhānasikaḥ sarvam āsvāda.bāhulyena karma kārayet
            | 4 |

tad rajā tathaiva pratibhuñjīta pūrvam agnaye vayobhyaś ca
            baliṃ kṛtvā | 5 |

agner jvālā.dhūma.nīlatā śabda.sphoṭanaṃ ca viṣa.yuktasya,
            vayasāṃ vipattiś ca | 6 |

annasya ūṣmā mayūra.grīva.ābhaḥ śaityam āśu kliṣṭasya-iva
            vaivarṇyaṃ sa-udakatvam aklinnatvaṃ ca -

vyañjanānām āśu śuṣkatvaṃ ca
            kvātha.dhyāma.phena.paṭala.vicchinna.bhāvo gandha.sparśa.rasa.vadhaś ca -

rasasya madhye nīlā rājī, payasas tāmrā, madya.toyayoḥ
            kālī, dadhnaḥ śyāmā, madhunaḥ śvetā, dravyāṇām ārdrāṇām āśu pramlānatvam utpakva.bhāvaḥ
            kvātha.nīla.śyāvatā ca -

kaṭhinānāṃ mṛdutvaṃ mṛdūnāṃ ca kaṭhinatvam, tad.abhyāśe
            kṣudra.sattva.vadhaś ca, -

loha.maṇimayānāṃ paṅkama.lopadehatā
            sneha.rāga.gaurava.prabhāva.varṇa.sparśavadhaś ca - iti viṣayuktasya liṅgāni | 7 |

viṣa.pradasya tu śuṣka.śyāva.vaktratā vāk.saṅgaḥ svedo
            vijṛmbhaṇaṃ ca-atimātraṃ vepathuḥ praskhalanaṃ vākya.viprekṣaṇam āvegaḥ karmaṇi
            sva.bhūmau ca-anavasthānam iti | 8 |
tasmād asya jāṅgulīvido bhiṣajaś ca-āsannāḥ syuḥ | 9 |

bhiṣag.bhaiṣajya.agārād āsvāda.viśuddham auṣadhaṃ gṛhītvā
            pācaka.peṣakābhyām ātmanā ca pratisvādya rājñe prayacchet | 10 |

kalpaka.prasādhakāḥ snāna.śuddha.vastra.hastāḥ samudram
            upakaraṇam antarvaṃśika.hastād ādāya paricareyuḥ | 12 |

snāpaka.saṃvāhaka.āstaraka.rajaka.mālā.kāra.karma dāsyaḥ
            prasiddha.śaucāḥ kuryuḥ, tābhir adhiṣṭhitā vā śilpinaḥ | 13 |

ātma.cakṣuṣi niveśya vastra.mālyaṃ dadyuḥ,
            snāna.anulepana.pragharṣa.cūrṇa.vāsa.snānīyāni ca sva.vakṣo.bāhuṣu ca | 14 |

ātodyāni ca-eṣām antas tiṣṭheyuḥ, aśva.ratha.dvipa.alaṅkārāś
            ca | 17 |

āpta.śastra.grāha.adhiṣṭhitaḥ siddha.tāpasaṃ paśyet,
            mantri.pariṣadā saha sāmanta.dūtam | 24 |

samnaddho 'śvaṃ hastinaṃ vā-ārūḍhaḥ samnaddham anīkaṃ paśyet
            | 25 |

niryāṇe 'bhiyāne ca rāja.mārgam ubhayataḥ kṛta.ārakṣaṃ
            śastribhir daṇḍibhiś ca-apāsta.śastra.hasta.pravrajita.vyaṅgaṃ gacchet | 26 |
Book 2: The Activity of the Heads of Departments

bhūta.pūrvam abhūta.pūrvaṃ vā jana.padaṃ
            para.deśa.apavāhanena sva.deśa.abhiṣyanda.vamanena vā niveśayet | 1 |

śūdra.karṣaka.prāyaṃ kula.śata.avaraṃ pañca.kula.śata.paraṃ
            grāmaṃ krośad.vikrośa.sīmānam anyonya.ārakṣaṃ niveśayet | 2 |

aṣṭaśata.grāmyā madhye sthānīyam, catuhśata.grāmyā
            droṇa.mukham, dviśata.grāmyāḥ kārvaṭikam, daśa.grāmī.saṅgraheṇa saṅgrahaṃ sthāpayet | 4
            |

anugraha.parihārau ca-etebbhyaḥ kośa.vṛddhi.karau dadyāt,
            kośa.upaghātakau varjayet | 15 |
alpa.kośo hi rājā paura.jānapadān eva grasate | 16 |

anyeṣāṃ vā badhnatāṃ bhūmi.mārga.vṛkṣa.upakaraṇa.anugrahaṃ
            kuryāt, puṇya.sthāna.ārāmāṇāṃ ca | 21 |
vyayakarmaṇi ca bhāgī syāt, na ca-aṃśaṃ labheta | 23 |

bāla.vṛddha.vyasany.anāthāṃś ca rājā bibhṛyāt, striyam
            aprajātāṃ prajātāyaś ca putrān | 26 |

bāla.dravyaṃ grāma.vṛddhā vardhayeyur ā vyavahāra.prāpaṇāt,
            deva.dravyaṃ ca | 27 |

apatya.dāraṃ mātā.pitarau bhrātṝn aprāpta.vyavahārān
            bhaginīḥ kanyā vidhavāś ca-abibhrataḥ śaktimato dvādaśa.paṇo daṇḍaḥ, anyatra
            patitebhyaḥ, anyatra mātuḥ | 28 |

putra.dāram apratividhāya pravrajataḥ pūrvaḥ sāhasa.daṇḍaḥ,
            striyaṃ ca pravrājayataḥ | 29 |

vānaprasthād anyaḥ pravrajita.bhāvaḥ, sajātād anyaḥ saṅghaḥ,
            sāmutthāyikād anyaḥ samaya.anubandho vā na-asya jana.padam upaniviśeta | 32 |
na ca tatra-ārāmā vihāra.arthā vā śālāḥ syuḥ | 33 |

nirāśrayatvād grāmāṇāṃ kṣetra.abhiratatvāc ca puruṣāṇāṃ
            kośa.viṣṭi.dravya.dhānya.rasa.vṛddhir bhavati | 35 |
deśaṃ parihared rājā vyaya.krīḍāś ca vārayet || 36 ||
vallabhaiḥ kārmikaiḥ stenair anta.pālaiś ca pīḍitam |

pradiṣṭa.abhaya.sthāvara.jaṅgamāni ca brahma.soma.araṇyāni
            tapasvibhyo go.ruta.parāṇi prayacchet | 2 |

tāvan.mātram eka.dvāraṃ khāta.guptaṃ
            svādu.phala.gulma.guccham akaṇṭaki.drumam uttāna.toya.āśayaṃ dānta.mṛga.catuṣpadaṃ
            bhagna.nakha.daṃṣṭra.vyālaṃ mārgayuka.hasti.hastinīka.labhaṃ mṛga.vanaṃ vihāra.arthaṃ
            rājñaḥ kārayet | 3 |

sarva.atithi.mṛgaṃ pratyante ca-anyan.mṛga.vanaṃ bhūmi.vaśena
            vā niveśayet | 4 |

kupya.pradiṣṭānāṃ ca dravyāṇām eka.ekaśo vanāni niveśayet,
            dravya.vana.karma.antān aṭavīś ca dravya.vana.apāśrayāḥ | 5 |

nāga.vana.adhyakṣaḥ pārvataṃ na-ādeyaṃ sāra.sama.anūpaṃ ca
            nāga.vanaṃ vidita.paryanta.praveśa.niṣkāsaṃ nāga.vana.pālaiḥ pālayet | 7 |

nāga.vana.pālā
            hastipaka.pāda.pāśika.saimika.vana.caraka.pārikarmika.sakhā
            hasti.mūtra.purīṣac.channa.gandhā bhallātakī.śākhā.pracchannāḥ pañcabhiḥ saptabhir vā
            hasti.bandhakībhiḥ saha carantaḥ śayyā.sthāna.padyā.leṇḍa.kūla.ghāta.uddeśena
            hasti.kula.paryagraṃ vidyuḥ | 10 |

yūtha.caram eka.caraṃ niryūthaṃ yūtha.patiṃ hastinaṃ vyālaṃ
            mattaṃ potaṃ bandha.muktaṃ ca nibandhena vidyuḥ | 11 |

dāśārṇāś ca-apara.antāś ca dvipānāṃ madhyamā matāḥ || 15
              ||
sarveṣāṃ karmaṇā vīryaṃ javas tejaś ca vardhate || 16 ||

caturdiśaṃ jana.pada.ante sāmparāyikaṃ daiva.kṛtaṃ durgaṃ
            kārayet, antar.dvīpaṃ sthalaṃ vā nimna.avaruddham audakam, prāstaraṃ guhāṃ vā pārvatam,
            nirudaka.stambam iriṇaṃ vā dhānvanam,

teṣāṃ nadī.parvata.durgaṃ jana.pada.ārakṣa.sthānam,
            dhānvana.vana.durgam aṭavī.sthānam āpady apasāro vā | 2 |

jana.pada.madhye samudaya.sthānaṃ sthānīyaṃ niveśayet,
            vāstuka.praśaste deśe nadī.saṅgame hradasya-aviśoṣasya-aṅke sarasas taṭākasya vā, vṛttaṃ
            dīrghaṃ catur.aśraṃ vā vāstu.vaśena vā pradakṣiṇa.udakaṃ paṇya.puṭa.bhedanam
            aṃsapatha.vāri.pathābhyām upetam | 3 |

tasya parikhās tisro daṇḍa.antarāḥ kārayet caturdaśa dvādaśa
            daśa-iti daṇḍān vistīrṇāḥ, vistārād avagāḍhāḥ pāda.ūnam ardhaṃ vā, tribhāga.mūlāḥ,
            mūla.catur.aśrā vā, pāṣāṇa.upahitāḥ pāṣāṇa.iṣṭakā.baddha.pārśvā vā, toya.antikīr
            āgantu.toya.pūrṇā vā saparivāhāḥ padma.grāhavatīś ca | 4 |

caturdaṇḍa.apakṛṣṭaṃ parikhāyāḥ ṣaḍdaṇḍa.ucchritam avaruddhaṃ
            tad.dviguṇa.viṣkambhaṃ khātād vapraṃ kārayed ūrdhva.cayaṃ mañca.pṛṣṭhaṃ kumbha.kukṣikaṃ
            vā hastibhir gobhiś ca kṣuṇṇaṃ kaṇṭaki.gulma.viṣa.vallī.pratānavantam | 5 |

vaprasya-upari prākāraṃ viṣkambha.dviguṇa.utsedham aiṣṭakaṃ
            dvādaśa.hastād ūrdhvam ojaṃ yugmaṃ vā ā caturviṃśati.hastād iti kārayet -

pṛthu.śilā.saṃhataṃ vā śailaṃ kārayet, na tv eva kāṣṭamayam |
            8 |

viṣkambha.catur.aśram aṭṭālakam utsedha.sama.avakṣepa.sopānaṃ
            kārayet triṃśad.daṇḍa.antaraṃ ca | 10 |

dvayor aṭṭālakayor madhye saharmya.dvi.talām
            adhyardhāya.āyāmāṃ pratolīṃ kārayet | 11 |

antareṣu dvihasta.viṣkambhaṃ pārśve catur.guṇa.āyāmaṃ
            deva.pathaṃ kārayet | 13 |

daṇḍa.antarā dvi.daṇḍa.antarā vā caryāḥ kārayet, agrāhye deśe
            pradhāvanikāṃ niṣkira.dvāraṃ ca | 14 |

prākāram ubhayato meṇḍhakam adhyardha.daṇḍaṃ kṛtvā
            pratolī.ṣaṭ.tulā.antaraṃ dvāraṃ niveśayet pañca.daṇḍād eka.uttaram ā.aṣṭa.daṇḍād iti
            catur.aśraṃ ṣaḍ.bhāgam āyāmād.adhikam aṣṭa.bhāgaṃ vā | 16 |

stambhasya parikṣepaḥ ṣaḍ.āyāmo, dviguṇo nikhātaḥ, cūlikāyāś
            catur.bhāgaḥ | 18 |
ādi.talasya pañca.bhāgāḥ śālā vāpī sīmā.gṛhaṃ ca | 19 |

daśa.bhāgikau dvau pratimañcau, antaram āṇī.harmyaṃ ca | 20
            |

ardha.vāstukam uttama.agāram, tribhāga.antaraṃ vā,
            iṣṭakā.avabaddha.pārśvam, vāmataḥ pradakṣiṇa.sopānaṃ gūḍha.bhitti.sopānam itarataḥ | 22
            |

mukha.samaḥ saṅkramaḥ saṃhāryo bhūmimayo vā nirudake | 30
            |

prākāra.samaṃ mukham avasthāpya tri.bhāga.godhā.mukhaṃ
            gopuraṃ kārayet | 31 |

prākāra.madhye vāpīṃ kṛtvā puṣkariṇī.dvāram, catuḥ.śālam
            adhyardha.antaraṃ sāṇikaṃ kumārī.puram, muṇḍa.harmya.dvi.talaṃ muṇḍaka.dvāram,
            bhūmi.dravya.vaśena vā niveśayet | 32 |
kāryāḥ kārmārikāḥ śūlā vedhana.agrāś ca veṇavaḥ |
Chapter 4 (Section 22): Lay-out of the Fortified City

trayaḥ prācīnā rāja.mārgās traya udīcīnā iti vāstu.vibhāgaḥ |
            1 |

catur.daṇḍaḥ setu.vana.pathaḥ, dvi.daṇḍo hasti.kṣetra.pathaḥ,
            pañca.aratnayo ratha.pathaḥ, catvāraḥ paśu.pathaḥ, dvau kṣudra.paśu.manuṣya.pathaḥ | 5
            |

vāstu.hṛdayād uttare nava.bhāge yathā.ukta.vidhānam
            antaḥpuraṃ prān.mukham udan.mukhaṃ vā kārayet | 7 |

tasya pūrva.uttaraṃ bhāgam ācārya.purohita.ijyā.toya.sthānaṃ
            mantriṇaś ca-āvaseyuḥ, pūrva.dakṣiṇaṃ bhāgm mahānasaṃ hasti.śālā koṣṭha.agāraṃ ca | 8
            |

tataḥ paraṃ gandha.mālya.rasa.paṇyāḥ prasādhana.kāravaḥ
            kṣatriyāś ca pūrvāṃ diśam adhivaseyuḥ | 9 |

dakṣiṇa.pūrvaṃ bhāgaṃ bhāṇḍa.agāram akṣa.paṭalaṃ
            karma.niṣadyāś ca, dakṣiṇa.paścimaṃ bhāgaṃ kupya.gṛham āyudha.agāraṃ ca | 10 |

tataḥ paraṃ
            nagara.dhānya.vyāvahārika.kārmāntika.bala.adhyakṣāḥ pakva.anna.surā.māṃsa.paṇyā
            rūpājīvās tālāvacarā vaiśyāś ca dakṣiṇāṃ diśam adhivaseyuḥ | 11 |

paścima.dakṣiṇaṃ bhāgaṃ khara.uṣṭra.gupti.sthānaṃ karma.gṛhaṃ
            ca, paścima.uttaraṃ bhāgaṃ yāna.ratha.śālāḥ | 12 |

tataḥ param
            ūrṇā.sūtra.veṇu.carma.varma.śastra.āvaraṇa.kāravaḥ śūdrāś ca paścimāṃ diśam adhivaseyuḥ
            | 13 |

uttara.paścimaṃ bhāgaṃ paṇya.bhaiṣajya.gṛham, uttara.pūrvaṃ
            bhāgaṃ kośo gava.aśvaṃ ca | 14 |

tataḥ paraṃ nagara.rāja.devatā.loha.maṇi.kāravo brāhmaṇāś
            ca-uttarāṃ diśam adhivaseyuḥ | 15 |

bahiḥ parikhāyā dhanuḥ.śata.apakṛṣṭāś
            caitya.puṇya.sthāna.vana.setu.bandhāḥ kāryāḥ, yathā.diśaṃ ca dig.devatāḥ | 20 |

uttaraḥ pūrvo vā śmaśāna.bhāgo varṇa.uttamānām, dakṣiṇena
            śmaśānaṃ varṇa.avarāṇām | 21 |
na ca bāhirikān kuryāt pure rāṣṭra.upaghātakān |
kṣipej jana.pade ca-etān sarvān vā dāpayet karān || 32 ||
Chapter 5 (Section 23): Duties of the Director of Stores

samnidhātā kośa.gṛhaṃ paṇya.gṛhaṃ koṣṭha.agāraṃ kupya.gṛham
            āyudha.agāraṃ bandhana.agāraṃ ca kārayet | 1 |

catur.aśrāṃ vāpīm an-udaka.upasnehāṃ khānayitvā
            pṛthu.śilābhir ubhayataḥ pārśvaṃ mūlaṃ ca pracitya sāra.dāru.pañjaraṃ bhūmi.samaṃ
            tri.talam aneka.vidhānaṃ kuṭṭima.deśa.sthāna.talam eka.dvāraṃ yantra.yukta.sopānaṃ
            bhūmi.gṛhaṃ kārayet | 2 |

tasya-upari-ubhayato.niṣedhaṃ sa-pragrīvam aiṣṭakaṃ
            bhāṇḍa.vāhinī.parikṣiptaṃ kośa.gṛhaṃ kārayet, prāsādaṃ vā | 3 |

pakva.iṣṭakā.stambhaṃ catuḥ.śālam eka.dvāram
            aneka.sthāna.talaṃ vivṛta.stambha.apasāram ubhayataḥ paṇya.gṛhaṃ koṣṭha.agāraṃ ca -

dīrgha.bahu.śālaṃ kakṣya.āvṛta.kuḍyam antaḥ kupya.gṛham, tad
            eva bhūmi.gṛha.yuktam āyudha.agāraṃ -

pṛthag.dharma.sthīyaṃ mahā.mātrīyaṃ
            vibhakta.strī.puruṣa.sthānam apasārataḥ sugupta.kakṣyaṃ bandhana.agāraṃ kārayet | 5
            |

tat.jāta.karaṇa.adhiṣṭhitaḥ purāṇaṃ navaṃ ca ratnaṃ sāraṃ
            phalgu kupyaṃ vā pratigṛhṇīyāt | 8 |

tatra ratna.upadhāv uttamo daṇḍaḥ kartuḥ kārayituś ca
            sāra.upadhau madhyamaḥ, phalgu.kupya.upadhau tat-ca tāvat-ca daṇḍaḥ | 9 |
śuddhaṃ pūrṇam abhinavaṃ ca dhānyaṃ pratigṛhṇīyāt | 13 |
tena paṇyaṃ kupyam āyudhaṃ ca vyākhyātam | 15 |
bāhyam abhyantaraṃ cāyaṃ vidyād varṣa.śatād api |
yathā pṛṣṭo na sajjeta vyaye śeṣe ca sañcaye || 22 ||

Chapter 6 (Section 24): The Setting up of Revenue by the
            Administrator

samāhartā durgaṃ rāṣṭraṃ khaniṃ setuṃ vanaṃ vrajaṃ
            vaṇik.pathaṃ ca-avekṣeta | 1 |

śulkaṃ daṇḍaḥ pautavaṃ nāgariko lakṣaṇa.adhyakṣo
            mudrā.adhyakṣaḥ surā sūnā sūtraṃ tailaṃ ghṛtaṃ kṣāraḥ sauvarṇikaḥ paṇya.saṃsthā veśyā
            dyūtaṃ vāstukaṃ kāru.śilpi.gaṇo devatā.adhyakṣo dvāra.bahirikā.ādeyaṃ ca durgam | 2
            |

sītā bhāgo baliḥ karo vaṇik nadī.pālas taro nāvaḥ pattanaṃ
            vivicitaṃ vartanī rajjuś cora.rajjuś ca rāṣṭram | 3 |

go.mahiṣam aja.avikaṃ khara.uṣtram aśva.aśvataraṃ ca vrajaḥ |
            7 |

mūlyaṃ bhāgo vyājī parighaḥ klṛptaṃ rūpikam atyayaś
            ca-āya.mukham | 10 |

deva.pitṛ.pūjā.dāna.artham, svasti.vācanam, antaḥpuram,
            mahānasam, dūta.prāvartimam, koṣṭha.agāram, āyudha.agāram, paṇya.gṛham, kupya.gṛham,
            karma.anto, viṣṭiḥ, patti.aśva.ratha.dvipa.parigraho, go.maṇḍalam,
            paśu.mṛga.pakṣi.vyāla.vāṭāḥ, kāṣṭha.tṛṇa.vāṭāś ca-iti vyaya.śarīram | 11 |

rāja.varṣaṃ māsaḥ pakṣo divasaś ca vyuṣṭam,
            varṣā.hemanta.grīṣmāṇāṃ tṛtīya.saptamā divasa.ūnāḥ pakṣāḥ śeṣāḥ pūrṇāḥ,
            pṛthag.adhimāsakaḥ, iti kālaḥ | 12 |
karaṇīyaṃ siddhaṃ śeṣam āya.vyayau nīvī ca | 13 |

saṃsthānaṃ pracāraḥ śarīra.avasthāpanam ādānaṃ
            sarva.samudaya.piṇḍaḥ sañjātaṃ - etat karaṇīyam | 14 |

kośa.arpitaṃ rāja.hāraḥ pura.vyayaś ca praviṣṭaṃ
            parama.saṃvatsara.anuvṛttaṃ śāsana.muktaṃ mukha.ājñaptaṃ ca-apātanīyaṃ - etat siddham |
            15 |

siddhi.karma.yogaḥ daṇḍa.śeṣam āharaṇīyaṃ
            balāt.kṛta.pratiṣṭabdham avamṛṣṭaṃ ca praśodhyaṃ - etat-śeṣam, asāram alpa.sāraṃ ca | 16
            |

naṣṭa.prasmṛtam āyukta.daṇḍaḥ pārśvaṃ pārihīṇikam aupāyanikaṃ
            ḍamara.gataka.svam aputrakaṃ nidhiś ca-anya.jātaḥ | 20 |

vikriye paṇyānām argha.vṛddhir upajā, māna.unmāna.viśeṣo
            vyājī, kraya.saṅgharṣe vārdha.vṛddhiḥ - ity āyaḥ | 22 |

nityo nitya.utpādiko lābho lābha.utpādika iti vyayaḥ | 23
            |

tayor utpanno nitya.utpādiko lābha.utpādika iti vyayaḥ | 26
            |

sañjātād āya.vyaya.viśuddhā nīvī, prāptā ca-anuvṛttā ca | 27
            |
evaṃ kuryāt samudayaṃ vṛddhiṃ ca-āyasya darśayet |

hrāsaṃ vyayasya ca prājñaḥ sādhayec ca viparyayam || 28
              ||
Chapter 7 (Section 25): Records and Accounts and Audit Office

akṣa.paṭalam adhyakṣaḥ prān.mukham udan.mukhaṃ vā
            vibhakta.upasthānaṃ nibandha.pustaka.sthānaṃ kārayet | 1 |

tatra-adhikaraṇānāṃ saṅkhyā.pracāra.sañjāta.agram,
            karma.antānāṃ dravya.prayoga.vṛddhi.kṣaya.vyaya.prayāma.vyājī.yoga.sthāna.vetana.-
            viṣṭi.pramāṇam, ratna.sāra.phalgu.kupyānām
            argha.prativarṇaka.māna.pratimāna.unmāna.avamāna.bhāṇḍam, deśa.grāma.jāti.kula.saṅghānāṃ
            dharma.vyavahāra.caritra.saṃsthānam, rāja.upajīvināṃ
            pragraha.pradeśa.bhoga.parihāra.bhakta.vetana.lābham, rājñaś ca patnī.putrāṇāṃ
            ratna.bhūmi.lābhaṃ nirdeśa.utpātika.pratīkāra.lābham, mitra.amitrāṇāṃ ca
            sandhi.vigraha.pradāna.ādānaṃ nibandha.pustakasthaṃ kārayet | 2 |

tataḥ sarva.adhikaraṇānāṃ karaṇīyaṃ siddhaṃ śeṣam āya.vyayau
            nīvīm upasthānaṃ pracāraṃ caritraṃ saṃsthānaṃ ca nibandhena prayacchet | 3 |

uttama.madhyama.avareṣu ca karmasu taj.jātikam adhyakṣaṃ
            kuryāt, sāmudayikeṣv avaklṛptikaṃ yam upahatya rājā na-anutapyeta | 4 |

sahagrāhiṇaḥ pratibhuvaḥ karma.upajīvinaḥ putrā bhrātaro
            bhāryā duhitaro bhṛtyāś ca-asya karmac.chedaṃ vaheyuḥ | 5 |
tam āṣāḍhī.paryavasānam ūnaṃ pūrṇaṃ vā dadyāt | 7 |

pracāra.caritra.saṃsthānāny anupalabhamāno hi prakṛtaḥ
            samudayam ajñānena parihāpayati, utthāna.kleśa.asahatvād ālasyena, śabdādiṣv
            indriya.artheṣu prasaktaḥ pramādena, saṅkrośa.adharma.anartha.bhīru.bhāyena,
            kārya.arthiṣv anugraha.buddhiḥ kāmena, hiṃsā.buddhiḥ kopena,
            vidyā.dravya.vallabha.apāśrayād darpeṇa, tulā.māna.tarka.gaṇita.antara.upadhānāt-lobhena
            | 10 |

"teṣām ānupūrvyā yāvān artha.upaghātas tāvān eka.uttaro
            daṇḍaḥ" iti mānavāḥ | 11 |

yac ca-agrād āyasya-antara.parṇe nīvyāṃ vardheta vyayasya vā
            yat parihāpayet, tad aṣṭa.guṇam adhyakṣaṃ dāpayet | 19 |

yathā.kālam anāgatānām apustaka.bhāṇḍa.nīvīkānāṃ vā
            deya.daśa.bandho daṇḍaḥ | 21 |

pṛthag.bhūto mithyā.vādī ca-eṣām uttamaṃ daṇḍaṃ dadyāt | 25
            |

tataḥ paraṃ kośa.pūrvam aho.rūpa.haraṃ
            dharma.vyavahāra.caritra.saṃsthāna.saṅkalana.nirvartana.anumāna.- cāra.prayogair
            avekṣeta | 29 |

rāja.arthe kāraṇikasya-apratibadhnataḥ pratiṣedhayato
            vā-ājñāṃ nibandhād āya.vyayam anyathā nīvīm avalikhato dvi.guṇaḥ | 34 |

krama.avahīnam utkramam avijñātaṃ punar.uktaṃ vā vastukam
            avalikhato dvādaśa.paṇo daṇḍaḥ | 35 |

Chapter 8 (Section 26): Misappropriation of Revenue by Officers and
            Its Recovery

pracāra.samṛddhiś caritra.anugrahaś cora.nigraho
            yukta.pratiṣedhaḥ sasya.sampat paṇya.bāhulyam upasarga.pramokṣaḥ parihāra.kṣayo
            hiraṇya.upāyanam iti kośa.vṛddhiḥ | 3 |

pratibandhaḥ prayogo vyavahāro 'vastāraḥ parihāpaṇam
            upabhogaḥ parivartanam apahāraś ca-iti kośa.kṣayaḥ | 4 |

siddhīnām asādhanam anavatāraṇam apraveśanaṃ vā pratibandhaḥ
            | 5 |

siddhaṃ kālam aprāptaṃ karoti-aprāptaṃ prāptaṃ vā-ity
            avastāraḥ | 10 |

klṛptam āyaṃ parihāpayati vyayaṃ vā vivardhayati-iti
            parihāpaṇam | 12 |

svayam anyair vā rāja.dravyāṇām upabhojanam upabhogaḥ | 14
            |

tatra ratna.upabhoge ghātaḥ, sāra.upabhoge madhyamaḥ
            sāhasa.daṇḍaḥ, phalgu.kupya.upabhoge tac ca tāvat-ca daṇḍaḥ | 15 |

siddham āyaṃ na praveśayati, nibaddhaṃ vyayaṃ na prayacchati,
            prāptāṃ nīvīṃ vipratijānīta ity apahāraḥ | 18 |

pūrvaṃ siddhaṃ paścād avatāritam, paścāt siddhaṃ pūrvam
            avatāritam, sādhyaṃ na siddham, asādhyaṃ siddham, siddham asiddhaṃ kṛtam, asiddhaṃ
            siddhaṃ kṛtam,

alpa.siddhaṃ bahu kṛtam, bahu.siddham alpaṃ
            kṛtam, anyat siddham anyat kṛtam, anyataḥ siddham anyataḥ kṛtam,-

deyaṃ na dattam, adeyaṃ dattam, kāle na dattam, akāle
            dattam, alpaṃ dattaṃ bahu kṛtam, bahu dattam alpaṃ kṛtam, anyad dattam anyat kṛtam,
            anyato dattam anyataḥ kṛtam,-

praviṣṭam apraviṣṭaṃ kṛtam, apraviṣṭaṃ praviṣṭaṃ kṛtam,
            kupyam adatta.mūlyaṃ praviṣṭam, datta.mūlyaṃ na praviṣṭaṃ -

saṅkṣepo vikṣepaḥ kṛtaḥ, vikṣepaḥ saṅkṣepo vā, mahā.argham
            alpa.argheṇa parivartitam, alpa.arghaṃ mahā.argheṇa vā -

samāropito 'rghaḥ, pratyavaropito vā, saṃvatsaro
            māsa.viṣamaḥ kṛtaḥ, māso divasa.viṣamo vā, samāgama.viṣamaḥ, mukha.viṣamaḥ,
            kārmika.viṣamaḥ -

nirvartana.viṣamaḥ, piṇḍa.viṣamaḥ, varṇa.viṣamaḥ,
            argha.viṣamaḥ, māna.viṣamaḥ, māpana.viṣamaḥ, bhājana.viṣamaḥ - iti haraṇa.upāyāḥ | 21
            |

anekeṣu ca-abhiyogeṣv apavyayamānaḥ sakṛd eva para.uktaḥ
            sarvaṃ bhajeta | 26 |

mahaty artha.apahāre ca-alpena-api siddhaḥ sarvaṃ bhajeta |
            28 |

kṛta.pratighāta.avasthaḥ sūcako niṣpanna.arthaḥ ṣaṣṭham aṃśaṃ
            labheta, dvādaśam aṃśaṃ bhṛtakaḥ | 29 |

aniṣpanne śārīraṃ hairaṇyaṃ vā daṇḍaṃ labheta, na
            ca-anugrāhyaḥ | 31 |

karmasu ca-eṣāṃ nityaṃ parīkṣāṃ kārayet,
            citta.anityatvāt-manuṣyānām | 2 |

aśva.sadharmāṇo hi manuṣyā niyuktāḥ karmasu vikurvate | 3
            |

tasmāt kartāraṃ karaṇaṃ deśaṃ kālaṃ kāryaṃ prakṣepam udayaṃ
            ca-eṣu vidyāt | 4 |

te yathā.sandeśam asaṃhatā avigṛhītāḥ karmāṇi kuryuḥ | 5
            |

na ca-anivedya bhartuḥ kañcid ārambhaṃ kuryuḥ,
            anyatra-āpat.pratīkārebhyaḥ | 7 |

yaś ca-eṣāṃ yathā.ādiṣṭam arthaṃ saviśeṣaṃ vā karoti sa
            sthāna.mānau labheta | 9 |

viparyaye yathā.āyati.vyayaś ca na bhakṣayati" ity ācāryāḥ |
            11 |

yaḥ samudayaṃ parihāpayati sa rāja.arthaṃ bhakṣayati | 13
            |

sa ced ajñāna.ādibhiḥ parihāpayati tad enaṃ yathā.guṇaṃ
            dāpayet | 14 |

yaḥ samudayaṃ dvi.guṇam udbhāvayati sa jana.padaṃ bhakṣayati
            | 15 |

sa ced rāja.artham upanayaty alpa.aparādhe vārayitavyaḥ,
            mahati yathā.aparādhaṃ daṇḍayitavyaḥ | 16 |

yaḥ samudayaṃ vyayam upanayati sa puruṣa.karmāṇi bhakṣayati |
            17 |

tasmād asya yo yasminn adhikaraṇe śāsanasthaḥ sa tasya
            karmaṇo yāthātathyam āya.vyayau ca vyāsa.samāsābhyām ācakṣīta | 19 |

yaḥ pitṛ.paitāmaham artham anyāyena bhakṣayati sa mūla.haraḥ
            | 21 |

yo yad yad utpadyate tat tad bhakṣayati sa tādātvikaḥ | 22
            |

yo bhṛtya.ātma.pīḍābhyām upacinoty arthaṃ sa kadaryaḥ | 23
            |
sa pakṣavāṃś ced anādeyaḥ, viparyaye paryādātavyaḥ | 24 |

yo mahaty artha.samudaye sthitaḥ kadaryaḥ samnidhatte
            'vanidhatte 'vasrāvayati vā - samnidhatte sva.veśmani, avanidhatte paura.jānapadeṣu,
            avasrāvayati para.viṣaye - tasya sattrī mantri.mitra.bhṛtya.bandhu.pakṣam āgatiṃ gatiṃ
            ca dravyāṇām upalabheta | 25 |

yaś ca-asya para.viṣaye sañcāraṃ kuryāt tam anupraviśya
            mantraṃ vidyāt | 26 |

yathā hy anāsvādayituṃ na śakyaṃ jihvā.talasthaṃ madhu7
              vā viṣaṃ vā |

arthas tathā hy artha.careṇa rājñaḥ svalpo 'py
              anāsvādayituṃ na śakyaḥ || 32 ||

matsyā yathā-antaḥ salile caranto jñātuṃ na śakyāḥ
              salilaṃ pibantaḥ |

yuktās tathā kārya.vidhau niyuktā jñātuṃ na śakyā dhanam
              ādadānāḥ || 33 ||
api śakyā gatir jñātuṃ patatāṃ khe patatriṇām |
na tu pracchanna.bhāvānāṃ yuktānāṃ caratāṃ gatiḥ || 34 ||

yathā na bhakṣayanty arthaṃ bhakṣitaṃ nirvamanti vā || 35
              ||
na bhakṣayanti ye tv arthān nyāyato vardhayanti ca |

nitya.adhikārāḥ kāryās te rājñaḥ priya.hite ratāḥ || 36
              ||

tasmād amātya.sampadā-upetaḥ sarva.samayavid āśu.granthaś
            cāru.akṣaro lekhana.vācana.samartho lekhakaḥ syāt | 3 |

so 'vyagra.manā rājñaḥ sandeśaṃ śrutvā niścita.arthaṃ lekhaṃ
            vidadhyāt deśa.aiśvarya.vaṃśa.nāmadheya.upacāram īśvarasya, deśa.nāmadheya.upacāram
            anīśvarasya | 4 |

jātiṃ kulaṃ sthāna.vayaḥ.śrutāni karma.ṛddhi.śīlāny atha
              deśa.kālau |

yauna.anubandhaṃ ca samīkṣya kārye lekhaṃ vidadhyāt
              puruṣa.anurūpam || 5 ||

artha.kramaḥ sambandhaḥ paripūrṇatā mādhuryam audāryaṃ
            spaṣṭatvam iti lekha.sampat | 6 |

tatra yathāvad anupūrva.kriyā pradhānasya-arthasya pūrvam
            abhiniveśa ity artha.kramaḥ | 7 |

prastutasya-arthasya-anuparodhād uttarasya vidhānam
            ā.samāpter iti sambandhaḥ | 8 |
nindā praśaṃsā pṛcchā ca tathā-ākhyānam atha-arthanā |

"yo 'haṃ sa bhavān, yan mama dravyaṃ tad bhavataḥ" ity
            upagrahaḥ sāntvam | 34 |

prāvṛttikaś ca pratilekha eva sarvatragaś ca-iti hi
              śāsanāni || 38 ||

anena vijñāpitam evam āha tad dīyatāṃ ced yadi tattvam
              asti |

rājñaḥ samīpe vara.kāram āha prajñāpanā-eṣā
              vividhā-upadiṣṭā || 39 ||
bhartur ājñā bhaved yatra nigraha.anugrahau prati |
apy ādhau paridāne vā bhavatas tāv upagrahau || 41 ||

jāter viśeṣeṣu pareṣu caiva grāmeṣu deśeṣu ca teṣu teṣu
              |

anugraho yo nṛpter nideśāt taj.jñaḥ parīhāra iti
              vyavasyet || 42 ||
eṣa vācika.lekhaḥ syād bhaven naisṛṣṭiko 'pi vā || 43 ||

dvi.vidhāṃ tāṃ vyavasyanti pravṛttiṃ śāsanaṃ prati || 44
              ||
dṛṣṭvā lekhaṃ yathā.tattvaṃ tataḥ pratyanubhāṣya ca |
pratilekho bhavet kāryo yathā rāja.vacas tathā || 45 ||

yatra-īśvarāṃś ca-adhikṛtāṃś ca rājā rakṣā.upakārau
              pathika.artham āha |

sarvatrago nāma bhavet sa mārge deśe ca sarvatra ca
              veditavyaḥ || 46 ||

tatra sāma pañcavidhaṃ - guṇa.saṅkīrtanam,
            sambandha.upākhyānam, paraspara.upakāra.sandarśanam, āyati.pradarśanam, ātma.upanidhānam
            iti | 48 |

"asminn evaṃ kṛta idam āvayor bhavati" ity āśā.jananam
            āyati.pradarśa-

"yo 'haṃ sa bhavān, yan mama dravyaṃ tad bhavatā sva.kṛtyeṣu
            prayojyatām" ity ātma.upanidhānam | iti | 53 |

akāntir vyāghātaḥ punar.uktam apaśabdaḥ samplava iti
            lekha.doṣaḥ | 57 |

avarge varga.karaṇaṃ ca-avarga.kriyā guṇa.viparyāsaḥ
            samplavaḥ | iti | 62 |

Chapter 11 (Section 29): Examination of Precious Articles Received in
            the Treasury

kośa.adhyakṣaḥ kośa.praveśyaṃ ratnaṃ sāraṃ phalguṃ kupyaṃ vā
            taj.jāta.karaṇa.adhiṣṭhitaḥ pratigṛhṇīyāt | 1 |

tāmra.parṇikaṃ pāṇḍyaka.vāṭakaṃ pāśikyaṃ kauleyaṃ caurṇeyaṃ
            māhendraṃ kārdamikaṃ srautasīyaṃ hrādīyaṃ haimavataṃ ca mauktikam | 2 |

masūrakaṃ tri.puṭakaṃ kūrmakam ardha.candrakaṃ kañcukitaṃ
            yamakaṃ kartakaṃ kharakaṃ siktakaṃ kāmaṇḍalukaṃ śyāvaṃ nīlaṃ durviddhaṃ ca-apraśastam |
            4 |

sthūlaṃ vṛttaṃ nistalaṃ bhrājiṣṇu śvetaṃ guru snigdhaṃ
            deśa.viddhaṃ ca praśastam | 5 |

śīrṣakam upaśīrṣakaṃ prakāṇḍakam avaghāṭakaṃ
            tarala.pratibaddhaṃ ca-iti yaṣṭi.prabhedāḥ | 6 |

vaiḍūryam utpala.varṇaḥ śirīṣa.puṣpaka udaka.varṇo
            vaṃśa.rāgaḥ śuka.pattra.varṇaḥ puṣya.rāgo go.mūtrako go.medakaḥ | 30 |

indra.nīlo nīla.avalīyaḥ kalāya.puṣpako mahā.nīlo jambv.ābho
            jīmūta.prabho nandakaḥ sravan.madhyaḥ | 31 |

śuddha.sphaṭiko mūlāṭa.varṇaḥ śīta.vṛṣṭiḥ sūrya.kāntaś ca |
            iti maṇayaḥ | 32 |

ṣaḍ.aśraś catur.aśro vṛtto vā tīvra.rāgaḥ saṃsthānavān achaḥ
            snigdho gurur arciṣmān antar.gata.prabhaḥ prabhā.anulepī ca-iti maṇi.guṇāḥ | 33 |

manda.rāga.prabhaḥ sa-śarkaraḥ puṣpac.chidraḥ khaṇḍo
            durviddho lekha.ākīrṇa iti doṣāḥ | 34 |

vimalakaḥ sasyako 'ñjana.mūlakaḥ pittakaḥ sulabhako
            lohita.akṣo mṛga.aśmako jyotī.rasako māleyako 'hic.chatrakaḥ kūrpaḥ pratikūrpaḥ
            sugandhi.kūrpaḥ kṣīravakaḥ śśukti.cūrṇakaḥ śilā.pravālakaḥ pulakaḥ śukla.pulaka ity
            antara.jātayaḥ | 35 |

sabhā.rāṣṭrakaṃ tajjamā.rāṣṭrakaṃ kāstīra.rāṣṭrakaṃ
            śrī.kaṭanakaṃ maṇimantakam indra.vānakaṃ ca vajram | 37 |

mārjāra.akṣakaṃ śirīṣa.puṣpakaṃ go.mūtrakaṃ go.medakaṃ
            śuddha.sphaṭikaṃ mūlāṭī.varṇaṃ maṇi.varṇānām anyatama.varṇam iti vajra.varṇāḥ | 39 |

sthūlaṃ guru prahāra.sahaṃ samakoṭikaṃ bhājana.lekhi
            tarku.bhrāmi bhrājiṣṇu ca praśastam | 40 |

pravālakam āla.kandakaṃ vaivarṇikaṃ ca, raktaṃ padma.rāgaṃ
            ca karaṭa.garbhiṇikā.varjam iti | 42 |

joṅgakaṃ raktaṃ rakta.kālaṃ vā snigdham, taurūpaṃ ca | 48
            |

kucandanaṃ rūkṣam aguru.kālaṃ raktaṃ rakta.kālaṃ vā | 50
            |

laghu snigdham aśyānaṃ sarpiḥ.sneha.lepi gandha.sukhaṃ
            tvag.anusāry anulbaṇam avirāgy uṣṇa.sahaṃ dāha.grāhi sukha.sparśanam iti candana.guṇāḥ |
            56 |

aguru joṅgakaṃ kālaṃ kāla.citraṃ maṇḍala.citraṃ vā | 57
            |

pāra.samudrakaṃ citra.rūpam uśīra.gandhi nava.mālikā.gandhi
            vā | iti | 59 |

guru snigdhaṃ peśala.gandhi nirhāry agni.saham
            asampluta.dhūmaṃ vimarda.saham ity aguru.guṇāḥ | 60 |

śyāmikā kālikā kadalī candra.uttarā śākulā ca-ārohajāḥ | 81
            |

kadalī.tri.bhāgā śākulā koṭha.maṇḍala.citrā
            kṛta.karṇikā-ajina.citrā vā | iti | 87 |
carmaṇāṃ mṛdu snigdhaṃ bahula.roma ca śreṣṭham | 96 |

śuddhaṃ śuddha.raktaṃ pakṣa.raktaṃ ca-āvikam, khacitaṃ
            vāna.citraṃ khaṇḍa.saṅghātyaṃ tantu.vicchinnaṃ ca | 97 |

kambalaḥ kaucapakaḥ kulamitikā saumitikā turaga.āstaraṇaṃ
            varṇakaṃ talicchakaṃ vāra.vāṇaḥ paristomaḥ samanta.bhadrakaṃ ca-āvikam | 98 |
picchilam ārdram iva ca sūkṣmaṃ mṛdu ca śreṣṭham | 99 |

aṣṭa.proti.saṅghātyā kṛṣṇā bhiṅgisī varṣa.vāraṇam apasāraka
            iti naipālakam | 100 |

sampuṭikā catur.aśrikā lambarā kaṭavānakaṃ prāvarakaḥ
            sattalikā-iti mṛga.roma | 101 |

sauvarṇa.kuḍyakaṃ sūrya.varṇaṃ maṇi.snigdha.udaka.vānaṃ
            catur.aśra.vānaṃ vyāmiśra.vānaṃ ca | 104 |
tena kāśikaṃ pauṇḍrakaṃ ca kṣaumaṃ vyākhyātam | 106 |
nāga.vṛkṣo likuco bakulo vaṭaś ca yonayaḥ | 108 |

tayā kauśeyaṃ cīna.paṭṭāś ca cīna.bhūmijā vyākhyātāḥ | 114
            |

mādhuram āparāntakaṃ kāliṅgaṃ kāśikaṃ vāṅgakaṃ vātsakaṃ
            māhiṣakaṃ ca kārpāsikaṃ śreṣṭham | iti | 115 |
jātiṃ rūpaṃ ca jānīyān nidhānaṃ nava.karma ca | 117 |
Chapter 12 (Section 30): Starting of Mines and Factories

ākara.adhyakṣaḥ śulba.dhātu.śāstra.rasa.pāka.maṇi.rāgajñas
            tajjña.sakho vā taj.jāta.karma.kara.upakaraṇa.sampannaḥ kiṭṭa.mūṣa.aṅgāra.bhasma.liṅgaṃ
            vā-ākaraṃ bhūta.pūrvam abhuta.pūrvaṃ vā bhūmi.prastara.rasa.dhātum
            atyartha.varṇa.gauravam ugra.gandha.rasaṃ parīkṣeta | 1 |

parvatānām abhijñāta.uddeśānāṃ
            bila.guha.upatyaka.ālayana.gūḍha.khāteṣv antaḥ prasyandino
            jambū.cūta.tāla.phala.pakva.haridrā.bheda.guḍa(gūḍa?).hari.tāla.-
            manaḥ.śilā.kṣaudra.hiṅguluka.puṇḍarīka.śuka.mayūra.pattra.varṇāḥ
            savarṇa.udaka.oṣadhi.paryantāś cikkaṇā viśadā bhārikāś ca rasāḥ kāñcanikāḥ | 2 |

niṣṭhyūtās tailavad.visarpiṇaḥ
            ṣaṅka.mala.grāhiṇaś ca tāmra.rūpyayoḥ śatād upari veddhāraḥ | 3 |

pītakās.tāmrakās tāmra.pītakā vā bhūmi.prastara.dhātavo
            bhinnā nīla.rājīvanto mudga.māṣa.kṛsara.varṇā vā dadhi.bindu.piṇḍa.citrā
            haridrā.harītakī.padma.pattra.śaivala.yakṛt.plīha.anavadya.varṇā bhinnāś
            cuñcu.vāluka.ālekhā.bindu.svastikavantaḥ sugulikā arciṣmantas tāpyamānā na bhidyante
            bahu.phena.dhūmāś ca suvarṇa.dhātavaḥ pratīvāpa.arthās tāmra.rūpya.vedhanāḥ | 5 |

śaṅkha.karpūra.sphaṭika.nava.nīta.kapota.pārāvata.vimalaka.mayūra.- grīvā.varṇāḥ
            sasyaka.gomedaka.guḍa.matsyaṇḍikā.varṇāḥ
            kovidāra.padma.pāṭalīka.lāya.kṣauma.atasī.puṣpa.varṇāḥ sa-sīsāḥ sa.añjanā visrā bhinnāḥ
            śveta.ābhāḥ kṛṣṇāḥ kṛṣṇa.ābhāḥ śvetāḥ sarve vā lekhā.bindu.citrā mṛdavo dhmāyamānā na
            sphuṭanti bahu.phena.dhūmāś ca rūpya.dhātavaḥ | 6 |

teṣām aśuddhā mūḍha.garbhā vā tīkṣṇa.mūtra.kṣara.bhāvitā
            rāja.vṛkṣa.vaṭa.pīlu.go.pitta.rocanā.mahiṣa.khara.karabha.mūtra.leṇḍa.- piṇḍa.baddhās
            tat.pratīvāpās tad.avalepā vā viśuddhāḥ sravanti | 8 |

yad api śata.sahasradhā vibhinnaṃ bhavati mṛdu tribhir
              eva tan.niṣekaiḥ || 10 ||

bhārikaḥ snigdho mṛduś ca prastara.dhātur bhūmi.bhāgo vā
            piṅgalo haritaḥ pāṭalo lohito vā tāmra.dhātuḥ | 12 |

kāka.mocakaḥ kapota.rocanā.varṇaḥ śveta.rāji.naddho vā
            visraḥ sīsa.dhātuḥ | 13 |

acchaḥ snigdhaḥ sa-prabho ghoṣavān śītas tīvras tanu.rāgaś
            ca maṇi.dhātuḥ | 17 |

kṛta.bhāṇḍa.vyavahāram eka.mukham, atyayaṃ ca-anyatra
            kartṛ.kretṛ.vikretṝṇāṃ sthāpayet | 19 |

ākarikam apaharantam aṣṭa.guṇaṃ dāpayed anyatra ratnebhyaḥ |
            20 |

stenam anisṛṣṭa.upajīvinaṃ ca baddhaṃ karma kārayet,
            daṇḍa.upakāriṇaṃ ca | 21 |

vyaya.kriyā.bhārikam āakaraṃ bhāgena prakrayeṇa vā dadyāt,
            lāghavikam ātmanā kārayet | 22 |

lakṣaṇa.adhyakṣaś catur.bhāga.tāmraṃ rūpya.rūpaṃ
            tīkṣṇa.trapu.sīsa.añjanānām anyatama.māṣa.bīja.yuktaṃ kārayet - paṇam ardha.paṇaṃ pādam,
            aṣṭa.bhāgam iti, pāda.ājīvaṃ tāmra.rūpaṃ - māṣakam ardha.māṣakaṃ kākaṇīm ardha.kākaṇīm
            iti | 24 |

rūpa.darśakaḥ paṇa.yātrāṃ vyāvahārikīṃ kośa.praveśyāṃ ca
            sthāpayet | 25 |

rūpikam aṣṭakaṃ śatam, pañcakaṃ śataṃ vyājīm, pārīkṣikam
            aṣṭa.bhāgikam, śatam, pañca.viṃśati.paṇam atyayaṃ ca
            anyatra.kartṛ.kretṛ.vikretṛ.parīkṣitṛbhyaḥ | 26 |

lavaṇa.adhyakṣaḥ pāka.muktaṃ lavaṇa.bhāgaṃ prakrayaṃ ca
            yathā.kālaṃ saṅgṛhṇīyād, vikrayāc ca mūlyaṃ rūpaṃ vyājīṃ ca | 28 |

datta.bhāga.vibhāgasya vikrayaḥ, pañcakaṃ śataṃ vyājīṃ rūpaṃ
            rūpikaṃ ca | 30 |

kretā śulkaṃ rāja.paṇyac.cheda.anurūpaṃ ca vaidharaṇaṃ
            dadyāt, anyatra kretā ṣaṭ.chatam atyayaṃ ca | 31 |

vilavaṇam uttamaṃ daṇḍaṃ dadyād, aniṣṛṣṭa.upajīvī ca-anyatra
            vānaprasthebhyaḥ | 32 |

śrotriyās tapasvino viṣṭayaś ca bhakta.lavaṇaṃ hareyuḥ | 33
            |
evaṃ mūlyaṃ ca bhāgaṃ ca vyājīṃ parigham atyayam |

śulkaṃ vaidharaṇaṃ daṇḍaṃ rūpaṃ rūpikam eva ca || 35
              ||
khanibhyo dvādaśa.vidhaṃ dhātuṃ paṇyaṃ ca saṃharet |

Chapter 13 (Section 31): The Superintendent of Gold in the
            Workshop

suvarṇa.adhyakṣaḥ suvarṇa.rajata.karma.antānām
            asambandha.āveśana.catuḥ.śālām eka.dvārām akṣa.śālāṃ kārayet | 1 |

viśikhā.madhye sauvarṇikaṃ śilpavantam abhijātaṃ prātyayikaṃ
            ca sthāpayet | 2 |

jāmbūnadaṃ śātakumbhaṃ hāṭakaṃ vaiṇavaṃ śṛṅga.śuktijaṃ
            jāta.rūpaṃ rasa.viddham ākara.udgataṃ ca suvarṇam | 3 |

kiñjalka.varṇaṃ mṛdu snigdham anādi bhrājiṣṇu ca śreṣṭham,
            rakta.pītakaṃ madhyamam, raktam avaram | 4 |

tad yena-aprāptakaṃ tac catur.guṇena sīsena śodhayet | 6
            |

ākara.udgataṃ sīsa.anvayena bhidyamānaṃ pāka.pattrāṇi kṛtvā
            gaṇḍikāsu kuṭṭayet, kadalī.vajra.kanda.kalke vā niṣecayet | 9 |

tuttha.udgataṃ gauḍikaṃ kāmbukaṃ cākravālikaṃ ca rūpyam | 10
            |

udgata.cūlikam acchaṃ bhrājiṣṇu dadhi.varṇaṃ ca śuddham | 14

pañca.daśa.muhūrto divaso rātriś ca caitre ca-āśvayuje ca
