tataḥ paraṃ tribhir muhūrtair anyataraḥ ṣaṇ.māsaṃ vardhate
            hrasate ca-iti | 38 |

chāyāyām aṣṭa.pauruṣyām aṣṭādaśa.bhāgaś chedaḥ,
            ṣaṭ.pauruṣyāṃ catur.daśa.bhāgaḥ, tri.pauruṣyām aṣṭa.bhāgaḥ, dvi.pauruṣyāṃ ṣaḍ.bhāgaḥ,
            pauruṣyāṃ catur.bhāgaḥ, aṣṭa.aṅgulāyāṃ trayo daśa.bhāgāḥ, catur.aṅgulāyāṃ trayo
            'ṣṭa.bhāgāḥ, acchāyo madhya.ahna iti | 39 |

ataḥ paraṃ śrāvaṇa.ādīnāṃ ṣaṇ.māsānāṃ dvy.aṅgula.uttarā
            māgha.ādīnāṃ dvy.aṅgula.avarā chāyā iti | 42 |
divasasya haraty arkaḥ ṣaṣṭi.bhāgam ṛtau tataḥ |

karoty ekam ahaś.chedaṃ tathā-eva-ekaṃ ca candramāḥ ||
              65 ||

grīṣme janayataḥ pūrvaṃ pañca.abda.ante ca paścimam ||
              66 ||

śulka.adhyakṣaḥ śulka.śālāṃ dhvajaṃ ca prān.mukham
            udan.mukhaṃ vā mahā.dvāra.abhyāśe niveśayet | 1 |

śulka.ādāyinaś catvāraḥ pañca vā sārtha.upayātān vaṇijo
            likheyuḥ - ke kutastyāḥ kiyat.paṇyāḥ kva ca-abhijñānaṃ mudrā vā kṛtā iti | 2 |

rāja.mudrā.parivartane nāma.kṛte vā sa-pāda.paṇikaṃ vahanaṃ
            dāpayet | 6 |

dhvaja.mūla.upasthitasya pramāṇam arghaṃ ca vaidehikāḥ
            paṇyasya brūyuḥ "etat.pramāṇena-argheṇa paṇyam idaṃ kaḥ kretā" iti | 7 |

śulka.bhayāt paṇya.pramāṇa mūlyaṃ vā hīnaṃ bruvatas tad
            atiriktaṃ rājā haret | 10 |

tad eva niviṣṭa.paṇyasya bhāṇḍasya
            hīna.prativarṇakena-argha.apakarṣaṇe sāra.bhāṇḍasya phalgu.bhāṇḍena praticchādane ca
            kuryāt | 12 |

pratikretṛ.bhayād vā paṇya.mūlyād upari mūlyaṃ vardhayato
            mūlya.vṛddhiṃ rājā haret, dvi.guṇaṃ vā śulkaṃ kuryāt | 13 |

tasmād vikrayaḥ paṇyānāṃ dhṛto mito gaṇito vā kāryaḥ, tarkaḥ
            phalgu.bhāṇḍānām ānugrāhikāṇāṃ ca | 15 |

dhvaja.mūlam atikrāntānāṃ ca-akṛta.śulkānāṃ śulkād aṣṭa.guṇo
            daṇḍaḥ | 16 |

vaivāhikam anvāyanam aupāyikaṃ
            yajña.kṛtya.prasava.naimittikaṃ deva-ijyā.caula.upanayana.go.dāna.vrata.dīkṣā.ādiṣu
            kriyā.viśeṣeṣu bhāṇḍam ucchulkaṃ gacchet | 18 |

kṛta.śulkena-akṛta.śulkaṃ nirvāhayato dvitīyam eka.mudrayā
            bhittvā paṇya.puṭam apaharato vaidehakasya tac-ca tāvac ca daṇḍaḥ | 20 |

śulka.sthānād gomaya.palālaṃ pramāṇaṃ kṛtvā-apaharata
            uttamaḥ sāhasa.daṇḍaḥ | 21 |

śastra.varma.kavaca.loha.ratha.ratna.dhānya.paśūnām
            anyatamam anirvāhyaṃ nirvāhayato yathā-avaghuṣito daṇḍaḥ paṇya.nāśaś-ca | 22 |

anta.pālaḥ sa-pāda.paṇikāṃ vartanīṃ gṛhṇīyāt
            paṇya.vahanasya, paṇikām eka.khurasya, paśūnām ardha.paṇikāṃ kṣudra.paśūnāṃ pādikām,
            aṃsa.bhārasya māṣikām | 24 |

vaideśyaṃ sārthaṃ kṛta.sāra.phalgu.bhāṇḍa.vicayanam
            abhijñānaṃ mudrāṃ ca dattvā preṣayed adhyakṣasya | 26 |

tena pradeśena rājā śulka.adhyakṣasya sārtha.pramāṇam
            upadiśet sarvajña.khyāpana-artham | 28 |

tataḥ sārtham adhyakṣo 'bhigamya brūyāt "idam amuṣyām uṣya
            ca sāra.bhāṇḍaṃ phalgu.bhāṇḍaṃ ca, na nihūhitavyam, eṣa rājñaḥ prabhāvaḥ" iti | 29 |

nihūhataḥ phalgu.bhāṇḍaṃ śulka.aṣṭa.guṇo daṇḍaḥ,
            sāra.bhāṇḍaṃ sarva.apahāraḥ | 30 |

rāṣṭra.pīḍā.karaṃ bhāṇḍam ucchindyād aphalaṃ ca yat
              |

mahā.upakāram ucchulkaṃ kuryād bījaṃ ca durlabham || 31
              ||

kṣauma.dukūla.krimi.tāna.kaṅkaṭa.hari.tāla.manaḥ.śilā.añjana.-
            hiṅguluka.loha.varṇa.dhātūnāṃ candana.aguru.kaṭuka.kiṇva.avarāṇāṃ
            carma.danta.āstaraṇa.prāvaraṇa.krimi.jātānām āja.eḍakasya ca daśa.bhāgaḥ
            pañca.daśa.bhāgo vā | 6 |

vastra.catuṣpada.dvipada.sūtra.kārpāsa.gandha.bhaiṣajya.-
            kāṣṭha.veṇu.valkala.carma.mṛdbha.aṇḍānāṃ dhānya.sneha.kṣāra.lavaṇa.madya.pakvān nādīnāṃ
            ca viṃśati.bhāgaḥ pañca.viṃśati.bhāgo vā | 7 |

dvārādeyaṃ śulkaṃ pañca.bhāgaḥ ānugrāhikaṃ vā
            yathā.deśa.upakāraṃ sthāpaytet | 8 |

ūrṇā.valka.kārpāsa.tūla.śaṇa.kṣaumāṇi ca
            vidhavā.nyaṅgā.kanyā.pravrajitā.daṇḍa.pratikāriṇībhī rūpa.ājīvā.mātṛkābhir
            vṛddha.rāja.dāsībhir vyuparata.upasthāna.deva.dāsībhiś ca kartayet | 2 |

ślakṣṇa.sthūla.madhyatāṃ ca sūtrasya viditvā vetanaṃ
            kalpayet, bahv.alpatāṃ ca | 3 |

kṛta.karma.pramāṇa.kāla.vetana.phala.niṣpattibhiḥ kārubhiś
            ca karma kārayet, pratisaṃsargaṃ ca gacchet | 7 |

kṣauma.dukūla.krimi.tāna.rāṅkava.kārpāsa.sūtra.vāna.karma.antāṃś ca prayuñjāno
            gandha.mālya.dānair anyaiś ca-aupagrāhikair ārādhayet | 8 |

yāś ca-aniṣkāsinyaḥ proṣitā vidhavā nyaṅgāḥ kanyakā
            vā-ātmānaṃ bibhṛyuḥ tāḥ sva.dāsībhir anusārya sa-upagrahaṃ karma kārayitavyāḥ | 11 |

svayam āgacchantīnāṃ vā sūtra.śālāṃ pratyuṣasi
            bhāṇḍa.vetana.vinimayaṃ kārayet | 12 |

striyā mukha.sandarśane 'nya.kārya.sambhāṣāyāṃ vā pūrvaḥ
            sāhasa.daṇḍaḥ, vetana.kāla.atipātane madhyamaḥ, akṛta.karma.vetana.pradāne ca | 14 |

gṛhītvā vetanaṃ karma.akurvatyā aṅguṣṭha.sandaṃśaṃ dāpayet,
            bhakṣita.apahṛta.avaskanditānāṃ ca | 15 |

sītā.adhyakṣaḥ kṛṣi.tantra.śulba.vṛkṣa.āyur.vedajñas
            taj.jña.sakho vā sarva.dhānya.puṣpa.phala.śāka.kanda.mūla.vāllikya.kṣauma.kārpāsa.bījāni
            yathā.kālaṃ gṛhṇīyāt | 1 |

karṣaṇa.yantra.upakaraṇa.balīvardaiś ca-eṣām asaṅgaṃ
            kārayet, kārubhiś ca karmāra.kuṭṭāka.medaka.rajju.vartaka.sarpa.grāha.ādibhiś ca | 3
            |

ṣoḍaśa.droṇaṃ jāṅgalānāṃ varṣa.pramāṇam, adhyardham ānūpānāṃ
            deśa.vāpānām, ardha.trayodaśa-aśmakānām, trayoviṃśatir avantīnām, amitam apara.antānāṃ
            haimanyānāṃ ca, kulyā.āvāpānāṃ ca kālataḥ | 5 |

varṣa.tri.bhāgaḥ pūrva.paścima.māsayoḥ, dvau tri.bhāgau
            madhyamayoḥ - suṣamā.rūpam | 6 |

tasya-upaladhir bṛhaspateḥ sthāna.gamana.garbha.ādhānebhyaḥ
            śukra.udaya.astamaya.cārebhyaḥ sūryasya prakṛti.vaikṛtāc ca | 7 |

sūryād bīja.siddhiḥ, bṛhaspateḥ sasyānāṃ stamba.kāritā,
            śukrād vṛṣṭiḥ | iti | 8 |
ṣaṣṭir ātapa.meghānām eṣā vṛṣṭiḥ samā hitā || 9 ||
vātam ātapa.yogaṃ ca vibhajan yatra varṣati |

trīn karīṣāṃś ca janayaṃs tatra sasya.āgamo dhruvaḥ ||
              10 ||

tataḥ prabhūta.udakam alpa.udakaṃ vā sasyaṃ vāpayet | 11
            |

vāpa.atiriktam ardha.sītikāḥ kuryuḥ, sva.vīrya.upajīvino vā
            catur.tha.pañca.bhāgikāḥ | 16 |

sva.setubhyo hasta.prāvartimam udaka.bhāgaṃ pañcamaṃ dadyuḥ,
            skandha.prāvartimaṃ caturtham, sroto.yantra.prāvartimaṃ ca tṛtīyam, caturthaṃ
            nadī.saras.taṭāka.kūpa.uddhāṭam | 18 |

karma.udaka.pramāṇena kaidāraṃ haimanaṃ graiṣmikaṃ vā sasyaṃ
            sthāpayet | 19 |

śāly.ādi jyeṣṭham, ṣaṇḍo madhyamaḥ, ikṣuḥ pratyavaraḥ | 20
            |

phena.āghāto vallī.phalānām, parīvāha.antāḥ
            pippalī.mṛdvīka.ikṣūṇām, kūpa.paryantāḥ śāka.mūlānām, haraṇī.paryantā haritakānām, pālyo
            lavānāṃ gandha.bhaiṣajya.uśīra.hrībera.piṇḍāluka.ādīnām | 22 |

yathā.svaṃ bhūmiṣu ca sthālyāś ca-ānūpyāś ca-oṣadhīḥ
            sthāpayet | 23 |

tuṣāra.pāyana.muṣṇa.śoṣaṇaṃ ca-ā.sapta.rātrād iti
            dhānya.bījānām, tri.rātraṃ vā pañca.rātraṃ vā kośī.dhānyānām,
            madhu.ghṛta.sūkara.vasābhiḥ śakṛd.yuktābhiḥ kāṇḍa.bījānāṃ cheda.lepo, madhu.ghṛtena
            kandānām, asthi.bījānāṃ śakṛd.ālepaḥ, śākhināṃ garta.dāho go.asthi.śakṛdbhiḥ kāle
            dauhrdaṃ ca | 24 |

na sarpās tatra tiṣṭhanti dhūmo yatra-eṣa tiṣṭhati || 26
              ||

sarva.jījānāṃ tu prathama.vāpe suvarṇa.udaka.samplutāṃ
            pūrva.muṣṭiṃ vāpayed, amuṃ ca mantraṃ

prajāpataye kāśyapāya devāya ca namaḥ
            sadā | sītā me ṛdhyatāṃ devī bījeṣu ca dhaneṣu ca | 27 |

ṣaṇḍa.vāṭa.go.pālaka.dāsa.karma.karebhyo
            yathā.puruṣa.parivāpaṃ bhaktaṃ kuryāt, sa-pāda.paṇikaṃ ca māsaṃ dadyāt | 28 |

praśīrṇaṃ ca puṣpa.phalaṃ deva.kārya.arthaṃ vrīhi.yavam
            āgrayaṇa.arthaṃ śrotriyās tapasvinaś ca-āhareyuḥ, rāśi.mūlam uñcha.vṛttayaḥ | 30 |
yathā.kālaṃ ca sasya.ādi jātaṃ jātaṃ praveśayet |

na kṣetre sthāpayet kiñcit palālam api paṇḍitaḥ || 31
              ||
na saṃhatāni kurvīta na tucchāni śirāṃsi ca || 32 ||

anagnikāḥ sa-udakāś ca khale syuḥ parikarmiṇaḥ || 33
              ||
Chapter 25 (Section 42): The Controller of Spirituous Liquors

surā.adhyakṣaḥ surā.kiṇva.vyavahārān durge jana.pade
            skandha.āvāre vā taj.jāta.surā.kiṇva.vyavahāribhiḥ kārayed, eka.mukham aneka.mukhaṃ vā
            vikraya.kraya.vaśena vā | 1 |

grāmād anirṇayaṇam asampātaṃ ca surāyāḥ, pramāda.bhayāt
            karmasu ñjirdiṣṭānām, maryāda.atikrama.bhayād āryāṇām, utsāha.bhayāc ca tīṣkṇānām | 3
            |

lakṣitam alpaṃ vā catur.bhāgam ardha.kuḍubaṃ kuḍubam
            ardha.prasthaṃ prasthaṃ vā-iti jñāta.śaucā nirhareyuḥ | 4 |

nikṣepa.upanidhi.prayoga.apahṛtānām aniṣṭa.upagatānāṃ ca
            dravyāṇāṃ jñāna.artham asvāmikaṃ kupyaṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca-upalabhya niṣkeptāram anyatra
            vyapadeśena grāhayed, ativyaya.kartāram anāyati.vyayaṃ ca | 6 |

na ca-anargheṇa kālikāṃ vā surāṃ dadyād, anyatra
            duṣṭa.surāyāḥ | 7 |

pāna.agārāṇy.aneka.kakṣyāṇi vibhakta.śayana.āsanavanti
            pāna.uddeśāni gandha.mālya.udakavanti ṛtu.sukhāni kārayet | 11 |

tatrasthāḥ prakṛty.autpattikau vyayau gūḍhā vidyuḥ, āgantūṃś
            ca | 12 |
tan.nāśe vaṇijas tac ca tāvac ca daṇḍaṃ dadyuḥ | 14 |

vaṇijaśs tu saṃvṛteṣu kakṣyā.vibhāgeṣu sva.dāsībhiḥ
            peśala.rūpābhir āgantūnāṃ vāstavyānāṃ ca-ārya.rūpāṇāṃ matta.suptānāṃ bhāvaṃ vidyuḥ | 15
            |

udaka.droṇaṃ taṇḍulānām ardha.āḍhakaṃ trayaḥ prasthāḥ
            kiṇvasya-iti medaka.yogaḥ | 17 |

dvādaśa.āḍhakaṃ piṣṭasya pañca prasthāḥ kiṇvasya
            kramuka.tvak.phala.yukto vā jāti.sambhāraḥ prasannā.yogaḥ | 18 |

kapittha.tulā phāṇitaṃ pañca.taulikaṃ prastho madhuna ity
            āsava.yogaḥ | 19 |

meṣa.śṛṅgī.tvak.kvātha.abhiṣuto guḍa.pratīvāpaḥ
            pippalī.marica.sambhāras tri.phalā.yukto vā maireyaḥ | 22 |

tasya sva.deśo vyākhyānaṃ kāpi.śāyanaṃ hāra.hūrakam iti | 25
            |

māṣakalanīdroṇamāmaṃ siddhaṃ vā tri.bhāga.adhika.taṇḍulaṃ
            moraṭa.ādīnāṃ kārṣika.bhāga.yuktaṃ kiṇva.bandhaḥ | 26 |

pāṭhā.loghra.tejovaty.elā.vāluka.madhuka.madhu.rasā.priyaṅgu.-
            dāru.haridrā.marica.pippalīnāṃ ca pañca.kārṣikaḥ sambhāra.yogo medakasya prasannāyāś ca
            | 27 |

coca.citraka.vilaṅga.gaja.pippalīnāṃ ca kārṣikaḥ
            kramuka.madhuka.mustā.lodhrāṇāṃ dvi.kārṣikaś ca-āsava.sambhāraḥ | 29 |

sahakāra.surā rasa.uttarā bīja.uttarā vā mahā.surā
            sambhārikī vā | 32 |

tāsāṃ
            moraṭā.palāśa.pattūra.meṣa.śṛṅgī.karañja.kṣīra.vṛkṣa.kaṣāya.- bhāvitaṃ
            dagdha.kaṭa.śarkarā.cūrṇaṃ
            loghra.citraka.vilaṅga.pāṭhā.mustā.kaliṅga.yava.dāru.haridra.-
            indīvara.śata.puṣpa.apāmārga.sapta.parṇa.nimba.āsphota.kalka.- ardha.yuktam antar.nakho
            muṣṭiḥ kumbhīṃ rāja.peyāṃ prasādayati | 33 |

kuṭumbinaḥ kṛtyeṣu śveta.surām, auṣadha.arthaṃ vāriṣṭam,
            anyad vā kartuṃ labheran | 35 |

teṣv ananujñātānāṃ prahavana.antaṃ daivasikam atyayaṃ
            gṛhṇīyāt | 37 |

arāja.paṇyāḥ pañcakaṃ śataṃ śulkaṃ dadyuḥ,
            surakā.medaka.ariṣṭa.madhu.phala.āmla.āmla.śīdhūnāṃ ca | 39 |
ahnaś ca vikrayaṃ jñātvā vyājīṃ māna.hiraṇyayoḥ |
Chapter 26 (Section 43): The Supervisor of Animal Slaughter

sūnā.adhyakṣaḥ pradiṣṭa.abhayānām abhaya.vana.vāsināṃ ca
            mṛga.paśu.pakṣi.matsyānāṃ bandha.vadha.hiṃsāyām uttamaṃ daṇḍaṃ kārayet, kuṭumbinām
            abhaya.vana.parigraheṣu madhyamam | 1 |

apravṛtta.vadhānāṃ matsya.pakṣiṇāṃ bandha.vadha.hiṃsāyāṃ
            pāda.ūna.sapta.viṃśati.paṇam atyayaṃ kuryāt, mṛga.paśūnāṃ dvi.guṇam | 2 |

pravṛtta.hiṃsānām aparigṛhītānāṃ ṣaḍ.bhāgaṃ gṛhṇīyāt,
            matsya.pakṣiṇāṃ daśa.bhāgaṃ vā-adhikam, mṛga.paśūnāṃ śulkaṃ vā-adhikam | 3 |

sāmudra.hasty.aśva.puruṣa.vṛṣa.gardabha.ākṛtayo matsyāḥ
            sārasā na-ādeyās taṭāka.kulyā.udbhavā vā
            krauñca.utkrośaka.dātyūha.haṃsa.cakravāka.jīvan.jīvaka.bhṛṅga.-
            rāja.cakora.matta.kokila.mayūra.śuka.madana.śārikā vihāra.pakṣiṇo maṅgalyāś ca-anye 'pi
            prāṇinaḥ pakṣi.mṛgā hiṃsā.bādhebhyo rakṣyāḥ | 5 |

ghnataḥ pañcāśatko daṇḍaḥ, kliṣṭa.ghātaṃ ghātayataś ca | 11
            |

pariśūnam aśiraḥ.pāda.asthi vigandhaṃ svayaṃ.mṛtaṃ ca na
            vikrīṇīran | 12 |

gaṇikā.adhyakṣo gaṇikā.anvayām agaṇikā.anvayāṃ vā
            rūpa.yauvana.śilpa.sampannāṃ sahasreṇa gaṇikāṃ kārayet, kuṭumba.ardhena pratigaṇikām | 1
            |

niṣpatitā.pretayor duhitā bhaginī vā kuṭumbaṃ bhareta, mātā
            vā pratigaṇikāṃ sthāpayet | 2 |

saubhāgya.alaṅkāra.vṛddhyā sahasreṇa vāraṃ kaniṣṭhaṃ
            madhyamam uttamaṃ vā-āropayet chatra.bhṛṅgāra.vyajana.śibikā.pīṭhikā.ratheṣu ca
            viśeṣa.artham | 4 |

gaṇikā.dāsī bhagna.bhogā koṣṭha.agāre mahānase vā karma
            kuryāt | 8 |

bhogaṃ dāyamāyaṃ vyayam āyatiṃ ca gaṇikāyā nibandhayet,
            ati.vyaya.karma ca vārayet | 10 |

svāpateyaṃ vikrayam ādhānaṃ vā nayantyāḥ
            sa.pāda.pañcāśat.paṇaḥ paṇo 'rdha.paṇa.cchedane | 12 |

akāmāyāḥ kumāryā vā sāhase uttamo daṇḍaḥ, sa.kāmāyāḥ pūrvaḥ
            sāhasa.daṇḍaḥ | 13 |

gaṇikām akāmāṃ rundhato niṣpātayato vā vraṇa.vidāraṇena vā
            rūpaṃ.upaghnataḥ sahasraṃ daṇḍaḥ | 14 |

sarvatra prathame 'parādhe prathamaḥ, dvitīye dvi.guṇaḥ,
            tṛtīye tri.guṇaḥ, caturthe yathā.kāmī syāt | 18 |

rāja.ājñayā puruṣam anabhigacchantī gaṇikā śiphā.sahasraṃ
            labheeta, pañca.sahasraṃ vā daṇḍaḥ | 19 |

etena
            naṭa.nartaka.gāyana.vādaka.vāg.jīvana.kuśīlava.plavaka.saubhika.- cāraṇānāṃ
            strī.vyavahāriṇāṃ striyo gūḍha.ājīvāś ca vyākhyātāḥ | 25 |

teṣāṃ tūryam āgantukaṃ pañca.paṇaṃ prekṣā.vetanaṃ dadyāt |

gīta.vādya.pāṭhya.nṛtya.nāṭya.akṣara.citra.vīṇā.veṇu.mṛdaṅga.para.-

gaṇikā.putrān raṅga.upajīvināṃ ca mukhyān niṣpādayeyuḥ,

pattana.anuvṛttaṃ śulka.bhāgaṃ vaṇijo dadyuḥ, yātrā.vetanaṃ
            rāja.naubhiḥ sampatantaḥ | 4 |

śaṅkha.muktā.grāhiṇo nau.bhāṭakaṃ dadyuḥ, sva.naubhir vā

vatsā vatsatarā damyā vahino vṛṣā ukṣāṇaś ca puṅgavāḥ,
            yuga.vāhana.śakaṭa.vahā vṛṣabhāḥ sūnā.mahiṣāḥ pṛṣṭa.skandha.vāhinaś ca mahiṣāḥ, vatsikā
            vatsatarī paṣṭahuhī garbhiṇī dhenuś ca-aprajātā vandhyāś ca gāvo mahiṣyaś ca,

aṅkaṃ cihnaṃ varṇaṃ śṛṅga.antaraṃ ca lakṣaṇam evam upajā

svayaṃ hantā ghātayitā hartā hārayitā ca vadhyaḥ | 16 |

para.paśūnāṃ rāja.aṅkena parivartayitā rūpasya pūrvaṃ
            sāhasa.daṇḍaṃ dadyāt | 17 |

sva.deśīyānāṃ cora.hṛtaṃ pratyānīya paṇitaṃ rūpaṃ haret | 18

lubdhaka.śva.gaṇibhir apāstas tena-avyāla.parābādha.bhayam

sama.vyūḍha.tīrtham akardama.grāham udakam avatārayeyuḥ

stena.vyāla.sarpa.grāha.gṛhītaṃ vyādhi.jarā.avasannaṃ

kāraṇa.mṛtasya-aṅka.carma go.mahiṣasya, karṇa.lakṣaṇam

upaniveśa.dig.vibhāgo go.pracārād bala-anvayato vā gavāṃ

balīvardānāṃ nasya.aśva.bhadra.gati.vāhināṃ
            yava.sasya.ardha.bhāras tṛṇasya dvi.guṇam, tulā ghāṇa.piṇyākasya, daśa.āḍhakaṃ

aśva.vibhavena-āyatām aśvāyām advi.guṇa.vistārāṃ

uttama.aśvasya dvi.droṇaṃ śāli.vrīhi.yava.priyaṅgūṇām

            siṃha.āyataḥ svādhūtaḥ kliṣṭaḥ śliṅgito bṛṃhitaḥ puṣpa.abhikīrṇaś ca-iti nīcair

hasty.āyāma.dvi.guṇa.utsedha.viṣkambha.āyāmāṃ
            hastinī.sthāna.adhikāṃ sapragrīvāṃ kumārī.saṅgrahāṃ prān.mukhīm udan.mukhīṃ vā śālāṃ
            niveśayet | 2 |

sthāna.samāṃ śayyām ardha.apāśrayāṃ durge

sapta.aratni utsedho nava.āyāmo daśa pariṇāhaḥ pramāṇataś
            catvāriṃśad.varṣo bhavaty uttamaḥ, triṃśad.varṣo madhyamaḥ, pañca.viṃśati.varṣo 'varaḥ |
            11 |

aratnau taṇula.droṇaḥ, ardha.āḍhakaṃ tailasya, sarpiṣas
            trayaḥ prasthāḥ, daśa.palaṃ lavaṇasya, māṃsaṃ pañcāśat.palikam, rasasya-āḍhakaṃ
            dvi.guṇaṃ vā dadhnaḥ piṇḍa.kledana.artham, kṣāra.daśa.palikaṃ madyasya-āḍhakaṃ dvi.guṇaṃ
            vā payasaḥ pratipānam, gātra.avasekas taila.prasthaḥ, śiraso 'ṣṭa.bhāgaḥ prādīpikaś ca,
            yavasasya dvau bhārau sa-pādau, śaṣpasya śuṣkasya-ardha.tṛtīyo bhāraḥ,

            |

kriyā.vipanno vyālaḥ śuddhaḥ su.vrato viṣamaḥ
            sarva.doṣa.praduṣṭaś ca | 10 |

cikitsaka.kuṭī.rakṣa.vidhā.pācakāḥ prastha.odanaṃ
            sneha.prasṛtiṃ kṣāra.lavaṇayoś ca dvi.palikaṃ hareyuḥ, daśa.palaṃ māṃsasya, anyatra

            kṛṣṭa.akṛṣṭa.sthala.kedāra.ārāma.ṣaṇḍa.vāṭa.vana.vāstu.caitya.-
            deva.gṛha.setu.bandha.śmaśāna.sattra.prapā.puṇya.sthāna.vivīta.- pathi.saṅkhyānena
            kṣetra.agram, tena sīmnāṃ kṣetrāṇāṃ ca karada.akarada.saṅkhyānena | 3 |

teṣu ca-etāvac-cātur.vārṇyam, etāvantaḥ
            karṣaka.go.rakṣaka.vaidehaka.kāru.karma.kara.dāsāś ca, etāvac ca dvi.pada.catuṣ.padam,
            idaṃ ca-eṣu hiraṇyalviṣṭi.śulka.daṇḍaṃ samuttiṣṭhati-iti | 4 |

gopa.sthānika.sthāneṣu pradeṣṭāraḥ kārya.karaṇaṃ
            bali.pragrahaṃ ca kuryuḥ | 7 |

samāhartṛ.pradiṣṭāś ca gṛha.patika.vyañjanā yeṣu grāmeṣu
            praṇihitās teṣāṃ grāmāṇāṃ kṣetra.gṛha.kula.agraṃ vidyuḥ, māna.sañjātābhyāṃ kṣetrāṇi
            bhoga.parihārābhyāṃ gṛhāṇi varṇa.karmabhyāṃ kulāni ca | 8 |

prasthita.āgatānāṃ ca pravāsa.āvāsa.kāraṇam, anarthyānāṃ ca
            strī.puruṣāṇāṃ cāra.pracāraṃ ca vidyuḥ | 10 |

evaṃ vaidehaka.vyañjanāḥ sva.bhūmijānāṃ rāja.paṇyānāṃ
            khani.setu.vana.karma.anta.kṣetrajānāṃ pramāṇam arghaṃ ca vidyuḥ | 11 |

para.bhūmi.jātānāṃ vāri.sthala.patha.upayātānāṃ
            sāra.phalgu.puṇyānāṃ karmasu ca
            śulka.vartany.ātivāhika.gulma.tara.deya.bhāga.bhakta.paṇya.agāra.- pramāṇaṃ vidyuḥ | 12
            |

evaṃ samāhartṛ.pradiṣṭās tāpasa.vyañjanāḥ
            karṣaka.go.rakṣaka.vaidehakānām adhyakṣāṇāṃ ca śauca.āśaucaṃ vidyuḥ | 13 |

purāṇa cora.vyañjanāś ca-antevāsinaś
            caitya.catuṣpatha.śūnya.pada.uda.pāna.nadī.nipāna.tīrtha.āyatana.-
            āśrama.araṇya.śaila.vana.gahaneṣu stena.amitra.pravīra.puruṣāṇāṃ ca
            praveśana.sthāna.gamana.prayojanāny upalabheran | 14 |

cintayeyuś ca saṃsthās tāḥ saṃsthāś ca-anyāḥ sva.yonayaḥ
              || 15 ||

sa tasyāṃ strī.puruṣāṇāṃ jāti.gotra.nāma.karmabhiḥ
            jaṅgha.agram āya.vyayau ca vidyāt | 3 |

dharma.āvasathinaḥ pāṣaṇḍi.pathikān āvedya vāsayeyuḥ,
            sva.pratyayāś ca tapasvinaḥ śrotriyāṃś ca | 5 |

kāru.śilpinaḥ sva.karma.sthāneṣu sva.janaṃ vāsayeyuḥ,
            vaidehakāś ca-anyonyaṃ sva.karma.sthāneṣu | 6 |

cikitsakaḥ pracchanna.vraṇa.pratīkāra.kārayitāram
            apathya.kāriṇaṃ ca gṛha.svāmī ca nivedya gopa.sthānikayor mucyeta, anyathā tulya.doṣaḥ
            syāt | 10 |

prasthita.āgatau ca nivedayet, anyathā rātri.doṣaṃ bhajeta |
            11 |

pathika.utpathikāś ca bahir.antaś ca nagarasya
            deva.gṛha.puṇya.sthāna.vana.śmaśāneṣu sa-vraṇam aniṣṭa.upakaraṇam udbhāṇḍī.kṛtam āvignam
            atisvapnam adhva.klāntam apūrvaṃ vā gṛhṇīyuḥ | 13 |

rathyāsu kuṭa.vrajāḥ sahasraṃ tiṣṭheyuḥ,
            catuṣpatha.dvāra.rāja.parigraheṣu ca | 22 |

pradīptam anabhidhāvato gṛha.svāmino dvādaśa.paṇo daṇḍaḥ,
            ṣaṭ.paṇo 'vakrayiṇaḥ | 23 |

pāṃsu.nyāse rathyāyām aṣṭa.bhāgo daṇḍaḥ,
            paṅka.udaka.samnirodhe pādaḥ | 26 |

mārjāra.śva.nakula.sarpa.pretānāṃ nagarasya.antar.utsarge
            tri.paṇo daṇḍaḥ, khara.uṣṭra.aśvatara.aśva.pretānāṃ ṣaṭ.paṇaḥ, manuṣya.pretānāṃ
            pañcāśat.paṇaḥ | 30 |

mārga.viparyāse śava.dvārād anyataś ca śava.nirṇayane pūrvaḥ
            sāhasa.daṇḍaḥ | 31 |

śmaśānād anyatra nyāse dahane ca dvādaśa.paṇo daṇḍaḥ | 33
            |

tūrya.śabde rājño gṛha.abhyāśe sa.pāda.paṇaṃ.akṣaṇa.tāḍanaṃ
            prathama.paścima.yāmikam, madhyama.yāmikaṃ dvi.guṇam, antaś.catur.guṇam | 35 |

śaṅkanīye deśe liṅge pūrva.apadāne ca gṛhītam anuyuñjīta |
            36 |

cāra.rātriṣu pracchanna.viparīta.veṣāḥ pravrajitā
            daṇḍa.śastra.hastāś ca manuṣyā doṣato daṇḍyāḥ | 39 |

rakṣiṇām avāryaṃ vārayatāṃ vāryaṃ ca-āvārayatāṃ
            kṣaṇa.dvi.guṇo daṇḍaḥ | 40 |

striyaṃ dāsīm adhimehayatāṃ pūrvaḥ sāhasa.daṇḍaḥ, adāsīṃ
            madhyamaḥ, kṛta.avarodhām uttamaḥ, kula.striyaṃ vadhaḥ | 41 |

cetana.acetanikaṃ rātri.doṣam aśaṃsato nāgarikasya
            doṣa.anurūpo daṇḍaḥ, pramāda.sthāne ca | 42 |

Chapter 1 (Sections 57; 58): Valid and Invalid Transactions; Filing of
            Law-suits

dharmasthās trayas trayo 'mātyā
            jana.pada.sandhi.saṅgrahaṇa.droṇa.mukha.sthānīyeṣu vyāvahārikān arthān kuryuḥ | 1 |

dāya.nikṣepa.upanidhi.vivāha.yuktāḥ strīṇām aniṣkāsinīnāṃ
            vyādhitānāṃ ca-amūḍha.sañjñānām antar.agāra.kṛtāḥ sidhyeyuḥ | 7 |

ato 'nyathā na sidhyeyuḥ, apāśrayavadbhiś ca kṛtāḥ, pitṛmatā
            putreṇa, pitrā putravatā, niṣkulena bhrātrā, kaniṣṭhena-avibhakta.aṃśena, patimatyā
            putravatyā ca striyā, dāsa.āhitakābhyām, aprāpta.atīta.vyavahārābhyām,
            abhiśasta.pravrajita.nyaṅga.vyasanibhiś ca, anyatra niṣṛṣṭa.vyavahārebhyaḥ | 12 |

tatra-api kruddhena-ārtena mattena.unmattena-avagṛhītena vā
            kṛtā vyavahārā na sidhyeyuḥ | 13 |

sve sve tu varge deśe kāle ca sva.karaṇa.kṛtāḥ
            sampūrṇa.ācārāḥ śuddha.deśā dṛṣṭa.rūpa.lakṣaṇa.pramāṇa.guṇāḥ sarva.vyavahārāḥ sidhyeyuḥ
            | 15 |

paścimaṃ ca-eṣāṃ karaṇam ādeśa.ādhivarjaṃ śraddheyam | 16 |
            iti vyavahāra.sthāpanā |

saṃvatsaram ṛtuṃ māsaṃ pakṣaṃ divasaṃ karaṇam adhikaraṇam
            ṛṇaṃ vedaka.āvedakayoḥ kṛta.samartha.avasthayor deśa.grāma.jāti.gotra.nāma.karmāṇi
            ca-abhilikhya vādi.prativādi.praśnān artha.ānupūrvyā niveśayet | 17 |

nibaddhaṃ vādam utsṛjya-anyaṃ vādaṃ saṅkrāmati, pūrva.uktaṃ
            paścimena-arthena na-abhisandhatte, para.vākyam anabhigrāhyam abhigrāhya-avatiṣṭhate,
            pratijñāya deśaṃ nirdiśa-ity ukte na nirdiśati, hīna.deśam adeśaṃ vā nirdiśati,
            nirdiṣṭād deśād anyaṃ deśam upasthāpayati, upasthite deśe 'rtha.vacanaṃ na-evam ity
            apavyayate, sākṣibhir avadhṛtaṃ na-icchati, asambhāṣye deśe sākṣibhir mithaḥ sambhāṣate,
            iti parā.ukta.hetavaḥ | 19 |

abhiyoktā cet pratyuktas tad.ahar eva na pratibrūyāt
            parā.uktaḥ syāt | 27 |

ata ūrdhvaṃ tri.paṇa.avara.ardhyaṃ dvādaśa.paṇa.paraṃ daṇḍaṃ
            kuryāt | 30 |

tri.pakṣād ūrdhvam apratibruvataḥ parā.ukta.daṇḍaṃ kṛtvā yāny
            asya dravyāṇi syus tato 'bhiyoktāraṃ pratipādayed, anyatra vṛtty.upakaraṇebhyaḥ | 31
            |

rakṣoghna.rakṣitaṃ vā karmaṇā pratipādayed, anyatra brāhmaṇāt
            | 37 |
dharmaś ca vyavahāraś ca caritraṃ rāja.śāsanam |
tatra satye sthito dharmo vyavahāras tu sākṣiṣu |

caritraṃ saṅgrahe puṃsāṃ rājñām ājñā tu śāsanam || 40
              ||
rājñaḥ sva.dharmaḥ svargāya prajā dharmeṇa rakṣituḥ |

arakṣitur vā kṣeptur vā mithyā.daṇḍam ato 'nyathā || 41
              ||
daṇḍo hi kevalo lokaṃ paraṃ ca-imaṃ ca rakṣati |

rājñā putre ca śatrau ca yathā.doṣaṃ samaṃ dhṛtaḥ || 42
              ||

nyāyena ca caturthena catur.antāṃ vā mahīṃ jayet || 43
              ||
saṃsthā yā dharma.śāstreṇa śāstraṃ vā vyāvahārikam |

nyāyas tatra pramāṇaṃ syāt tatra pāṭho hi naśyati || 45
              ||

pitṛ.pramāṇāś catvāraḥ pūrve dharmyāḥ, mātā.pitṛ.pramāṇāḥ
            śeṣāḥ | 10 |

tau hi śulka.harau duhituḥ, anyatara.abhāve 'nyataro vā | 11
            |

tad ātma.putra.snuṣā.bharmaṇi pravāsa.apratividhāne ca
            bhāryāyā bhoktum adoṣaḥ, pratirodhaka.vyādhi.durbhikṣa.bhaya.pratīkāre dharma.kārye ca
            patyuḥ, sambhūya vā dampatyor mithunaṃ prajātayoḥ | 16 |

gāndharva.āsura.upabhuktaṃ sa-vṛddhikam ubhayaṃ dāpyeta,
            rākṣasa.paiśāca.upabhuktaṃ steyaṃ dadyāt | 18 |

mṛte bhartari dharma.kāmā tadānīm eva sthāpya-ābharaṇaṃ
            śulka.śeṣaṃ ca labheta | 19 |
labdhvā vā vindamānā sa-vṛddhikam ubhayaṃ dāpyeta | 20 |

kāma.karaṇīyam api strī.dhanaṃ vindamānā putra.saṃsthaṃ
            kuryāt | 32 |

aputrā pati.śayanaṃ pālayantī guru.samīpe strī.dhanam
            āyuḥ.kṣayād bhuñjīta | 33 |

jīvati bhartari mṛtāyāḥ putrā duhitaraś ca strī.dhanaṃ
            vibhajeran, aputrāyā duhitaraḥ, tad.abhāve bhartā | 36 |

śulkam anvādheyam anyad vā bandhubhir dattaṃ bāndhavā hareyuḥ
            | 37 | iti strī.dhana.kalpaḥ |

varṣāṇy aṣṭāv aprajāyamānām aputrāṃ vandhyāṃ ca-ākāṅkṣeta,
            daśa nindum, dvādaśa kanyā.prasavinīm | 38 |

tasya-atikrame śulkaṃ strī.dhanam ardhaṃ ca-ādhivedanikaṃ
            dadyāt, catur.viṃśati.paṇa.paraṃ ca daṇḍam | 40 |

śulkaṃ strī.dhanam aśulka.strī.dhanāyās tat.pramāṇam
            ādhivedanikam anurūpāṃ ca vṛttiṃ dattvā bahvīr api vindeta | 41 |

tīrtha.samavāye ca-āsāṃ yathā.vivāhaṃ pūrva.ūḍhāṃ
            jīvat.putrāṃ vā pūrvaṃ gacchet | 43 |

putravatīṃ dharma.kāmāṃ vandhyāṃ ninduṃ nīrajaskāṃ vā
            na-akāmām upeyāt | 45 |
na ca-akāmaḥ puruṣaḥ kuṣṭhinīm unmattāṃ vā gacchet | 46 |

prāṇa.abhihantā patitas tyājyaḥ klībo 'pi vā patiḥ || 48
              ||

dvādaśa.varṣā strī prāpta.vyavahārā bhavati, ṣoḍaśa.varṣaḥ
            pumān | 1 |

ata ūrdhvam aśuśrūṣāyāṃ dvādaśa.paṇaḥ striyā daṇḍaḥ, puṃso
            dvi.guṇaḥ | 2 | iti śuśrūṣā |

bharmaṇyāyām anirdiṣṭa.kālāyāṃ grāsa.ācchādanaṃ vā-adhikaṃ
            yathā.puruṣa.parivāpaṃ saviśeṣaṃ dadyāt | 3 |

nirdiṣṭa.kālāyāṃ tad eva saṅkhyāya bandhaṃ ca dadyāt | 4
            |

śvaśura.kula.praviṣṭāyāṃ vibhaktāyāṃ vā na-abhiyojyaḥ patiḥ |
            6 | iti bharma |

veṇu.dala.rajju.hastānām anyatamena vā pṛṣṭhe trir āghātaḥ |
            8 |

īrṣyayā bāhya.vihāreṣu dvāreṣv atyayo yathā.nirdiṣṭaḥ | 11 |
            iti pāruṣyam |

bhartāraṃ dviṣatī strī sapta.ārtavāny amaṇḍayamānā tadānīm
            eva sthāpya-ābharaṇaṃ nidhāya bhartāram anyayā saha śayānam anuśayīta | 12 |

bhikṣuky.anvādhi.jñāti.kulānām anyatame vā bhartā dviṣan
            striyam ekām anuśayīta | 13 |

dṛṣṭa.liṅge maithuna.apahāre savarṇa.apasarpa.upagame vā
            mithyā.vādī dvādaśa.paṇaṃ dadyāt | 14 |

amokṣyā bhartur akāmasya dviṣatī bhāryā, bhāryāyāś ca bhartā
            | 15 |

strī.viprakārād vā puruṣaś cen mokṣam icched yathā.gṛhītam
            asyai dadyāt | 17 |

puruṣa.viprakārād vā strī cen mokṣam icchen na-asyai
            yathā.gṛhītaṃ dadyāt | 18 |

pratiṣiddhā strī darpa.madya.krīḍāyāṃ tri.paṇaṃ daṇḍaṃ dadyāt
            | 20 |

divā strī.prekṣā.vihāra.gamane ṣaṭ.paṇo daṇḍaḥ,
            puruṣa.prekṣā.vihāra.gamane dvādaśa.paṇaḥ | 21 |

supta.matta.pravrajane bhartur adāne ca dvārasya
            dvādaśa.paṇaḥ | 23 |

strī.puṃsayor maithuna.arthena-aṅga.viceṣṭāyāṃ raho
            'ślīla.sambhāṣāyāṃ vā catur.viṃśati.paṇaḥ striyā daṇḍaḥ, puṃso dvi.guṇaḥ | 25 |

strīṇāṃ grāma.madhye caṇḍālaḥ pakṣa.antare pañca.śiphā dadyāt
            | 28 |
paṇikaṃ vā prahāraṃ mokṣayet | 29 | ity atīcāraḥ |

pratiṣiddhayoḥ strī.puṃsayor anyonya.upakāre
            kṣudraka.dravyāṇāṃ dvādaśa.paṇo daṇḍaḥ, sthūlaka.dravyāṇāṃ catur.viṃśati.paṇaḥ,
            hiraṇya.suvarṇayoś catuṣ.pañcāśat.paṇaḥ striyā daṇḍaḥ, puṃsor dvi.guṇaḥ | 30 |

ta eva-agamyayor ardha.daṇḍāḥ, tathā
            pratiṣiddha.puruṣa.vyavahāreṣu ca | 31 | iti pratiṣedhaḥ |

pati.kulān niṣpatitāyāḥ striyāḥ ṣaṭ.paṇo daṇḍaḥ, anyatra
            viprakārāt | 1 |

"pati.viprakārāt
            pati.jñāti.sukha.avastha.grāmika.anvādhi.bhikṣukī.jñāti.kulānām anyatamam apuruṣaṃ
            gantum adoṣaḥ" iti ācāryāḥ | 9 |

tatra-api gūhamānā strī.dhanaṃ jīyeta, jñātayo vā chādayantaḥ
            śulka.śeṣam | 15 | iti niṣpatanam |

pati.kulān niṣpatya grāma.antara.gamane dvādaśa.paṇo daṇḍaḥ
            sthāpyā.ābharaṇa.lopaś ca | 16 |

gamyena vā puṃsā saha prasthāne catur.viṃśati.paṇaḥ
            sarva.dharma.lopaś ca, anyatra bharma.dāna.tīrtha.gamanābhyām | 17 |

puṃsaḥ pūrvaḥ sāhasa.daṇḍaḥ tulya.śreyasoḥ, pāpīyaso
            madhyamaḥ | 18 |

pathi vyantare gūḍha.deśa.abhigamane maithuna.arthena
            śaṅkita.pratiṣiddhāyāṃ vā pathy.anusaraṇe saṅgrahaṇaṃ vidyāt | 21 |

pratiṣiddhe vā nayataḥ puṃsaḥ striyo vā gacchantyās ta
            eva-ardha.daṇḍāḥ | 23 | iti pathy.anusaraṇam |

hrasva.pravāsināṃ śūdra.vaiśya.kṣatriya.brāhmaṇānāṃ bhāryāḥ
            saṃvatsara.uttaraṃ kālam ākāṅkṣeran aprajātāḥ, saṃvatsara.adhikaṃ prajātāḥ | 24 |

aprativihitāḥ sukha.avasthā bibhṛyuḥ, paraṃ catvāri varṣāṇy
            aṣṭau vā jñātayaḥ | 26 |

brāhmaṇam adhīyānaṃ daśa.varṣāṇy aprajātā, dvādaśa prajātā,
            rāja.puruṣam āyuḥ.kṣayād ākāṅkṣeta | 28 |

kuṭumba.ṛddhi.lope vā sukha.avasthair vimuktā yathā.iṣṭaṃ
            vindeta, jīvita.artham āpad.gatā vā | 30 |

dharma.vivāhāt kumārī parigrahītāram anākhyāya proṣitam
            aśrūyamāṇaṃ sapta tīrthāny ākāṅkṣeta, saṃvatsaraṃ śrūyamāṇam | 31 |

ākhyāya proṣitam aśrūyamāṇaṃ pañca tīrthāny ākāṅkṣeta, daśa
            śrūyamāṇam | 32 |

eka.deśa.datta.śulkaṃ trīṇi tīrthāny aśrūyamāṇam, śrūyamāṇaṃ
            sapta tīrthāny ākāṅkṣeta | 33 |

datta.śulkaṃ pañca tīrthāny aśrūyamāṇam, daśa śrūyamāṇam | 34
            |

tataḥ paraṃ dharmasthair visṛṣṭā yathā.iṣṭaṃ vindeta | 35
            |

tīrtha.uparodho hi dharma.vadha iti kauṭilyaḥ | 36 | iti
            hrasva.pravāsaḥ |

dīrgha.pravāsinaḥ pravrajitasya pretasya vā bhāryā sapta
            tīrthāny ākāṅkṣeta, saṃvatsaraṃ prajātā | 37 |

bahuṣu pratyāsannaṃ dhārmikaṃ bharma.samarthaṃ kaniṣṭham
            abhāryaṃ vā | 39 |

pitṛ.dravyād avibhakta.upagatānāṃ putrāḥ pautrā vā
            ā.caturthād ity aṃśa.bhājaḥ | 4 |

apitṛ.dravyā vibhakta.pitṛ.dravyā vā saha jīvantaḥ punar
            vibhajeran | 7 |

dravyam aputrasya sodaryā bhrātaraḥ saha.jīvino vā hareyuḥ
            kanyāś ca | 9 |

rikthaṃ putravataḥ putrā duhitaro vā dharmiṣṭheṣu vivāheṣu
            jātāḥ | 10 |

apitṛkā bahavo 'pi ca bhrātaro bhrātṛ.putrāś ca pitur ekam
            aṃśaṃ hareyuḥ | 13 |

pitṛ.bhrātṛ.putrāṇāṃ pūrve vidyamāne na-aparam avalambante,
            jyeṣṭhe ca kaniṣṭham artha.grāhiṇam | 15 |

pitur asaty arthe jyeṣṭhāḥ kaniṣṭhān anugṛhṇīyuḥ, anyatra
            mithyā.vṛttebhyaḥ | 18 |

aprāpta.vyavahārāṇāṃ deya.viśuddhaṃ mātṛ.bandhuṣu
            grāma.vṛddheṣu vā sthāpayeyuḥ ā.vyavahāra.prāpaṇāt, proṣitasya vā | 20 |

samniviṣṭa.samam asamniviṣṭebhyo naiveśanikaṃ dadyuḥ,
            kanyābhyaś ca prādānikam | 21 |

etāvān arthaḥ sāmānyas tasya-etāvān praty.aṃśa ity anubhāṣya
            bruvan sākṣiṣu vibhāgaṃ kārayet | 26 |

durvibhaktam anyonya.apahṛtam antarhitam avijñāta.utpannaṃ vā
            punar vibhajeran | 27 |

adāyādakaṃ rājā haret strī.vṛtti.preta.kārya.varjam, anyatra
            śrotriya.dravyāt | 28 |

patitaḥ patitāj jātaḥ klībaś ca-anaṃśāḥ,
            jaḍa.unmatta.andha.kuṣṭhinaś ca | 30 |

sati bhārya.arthe teṣām apatyam atad.vidhaṃ bhāgaṃ haret | 31
            |
teṣāṃ ca kṛta.dārāṇāṃ lupte prajanane sati |

sṛjeyur bāndhavāḥ putrāṃs teṣām aṃśān prakalpayet || 33
              ||

eka.strī.putrāṇāṃ jyeṣṭha.aṃśaḥ - brāhmaṇānām ajāḥ,
            kṣatriyāṇām aśvāḥ, vaiśyānāṃ gāvaḥ, śūdrāṇām avayaḥ | 1 |

catuṣpada.abhāve ratna.varjānāṃ daśānāṃ bhāgaṃ dravyāṇām ekaṃ
            jyeṣṭho haret | 3 |

pituḥ parivāpād yānam ābharaṇaṃ ca jyeṣṭha.aṃśaḥ,
            śayana.āsanaṃ bhukta.kāṃsyaṃ ca madhyama.aṃśaḥ, kṛṣṇaṃ dhānya.āyasaṃ gṛha.parivāpo
            go.śakaṭaṃ ca kaniṣṭha.aṃśaḥ | 6 |

mānuṣa.hīno jyeṣṭhas tṛtīyam aṃśaṃ jyeṣṭha.aṃśāl labheta,
            caturtham anyāya.vṛttiḥ, nivṛtta.dharma.kāryo vā | 9 |

nānā.strī.putrāṇāṃ tu saṃskṛta.asaṃskṛtayoḥ
            kanyā.kṛta.kṣatayor abhāve ca ekasyāḥ putrayor yamayor vā pūrva.janmanā jyeṣṭha.bhāvaḥ |
            13 |

cāturvarṇya.putrāṇāṃ brāhmaṇī.putraś caturo 'ṃśān haret,
            kṣatriyā.putra.strīn aṃśān, vaiśyā.putro dvāv aṃśau, ekaṃ śūdrā.putraḥ | 17 |

tulya.atulyayor eka.putraḥ sarvaṃ haret, bandhūṃś ca bibhṛyāt
            | 21 |

brāhmaṇānāṃ tu pāraśavas tṛtīyam aṃśaṃ labheta, dvāv aṃśau
            sapiṇḍaḥ kulyo vā-āsannaḥ, svadhā.dāna.hetoḥ | 22 |
kṣetre vā janayed asya niyuktaḥ kṣetrajaṃ sutam |

mātṛ.bandhuḥ sagotro vā tasmai tat pradiśed dhanam || 24
              ||
"mātā bhastrā, yasya retas tasya-apatyam" ity apare | 2 |

sagotreṇa-anya.gotreṇa vā niyuktena kṣetra.jātaḥ kṣetrajaḥ
            putraḥ | 6 |

janayitur asaty anyasmin putre sa eva dvi.pitṛko dvi.gotro vā
            dvayor api svadhā.riktha.bhāg bhavati | 7 |
tat.sadharmā bandhūnāṃ gṛhe gūḍha.jātas tu gūḍhajaḥ | 8 |

aurase tu-utpanne savarṇās tṛtīya.aṃśa.harāḥ, asavarṇā
            grāsa.ācchādana.bhāginaḥ | 19 |

brāhmaṇasya vaiśyāyām ambaṣṭhaḥ, śūdrāyāṃ niṣādaḥ pāraśavo vā
            | 21 |

paurāṇikas tv anyaḥ sūto māgadhaś ca, brahma.kṣatrād viśeṣaḥ
            | 29 |

ta ete pratilomāḥ svadharma.atikramād rājñaḥ sambhavanti | 30
            |

teṣāṃ sva.yonau vivāhaḥ, pūrva.apara.gāmitvaṃ vṛtta.anuvṛttaṃ
            ca | 36 |

kevalam evaṃ vartamānaḥ svargam āpnoti rājā, narakam anyathā
            | 38 |
deśasya jātyāḥ saṅghasya dharmo grāmasya vā-api yaḥ |

gṛhaṃ kṣetram ārāmaḥ setu.bandhas taṭākam ādhāro vā vāstuḥ |
            2 |

abhūtaṃ vā para.kuḍyād apakramya dvāv aratnī tripadīṃ vā
            deśa.bandhaṃ kārayet | 5 |

avaskaraṃ bhramam uda.pānaṃ vā na gṛha.ucitād anyatra,
            anyatra sūtikā.kūpād ā.nirdaśa.ahād iti | 6 |

tripadī.pratikrāntam adhyardham aratniṃ vā gāḍha.prasṛtam
            udaka.mārgaṃ prasravaṇa.prapātaṃ vā kārayet | 9 |

ekapadī.pratikrāntam aratniṃ vā cakri.catuṣpada.sthānam
            agniṣṭham udan.jara.sthānaṃ rocanīṃ kuṭṭanīṃ vā kārayet | 11 |

sarva.vāstukayoḥ prākṣiptakayor vā śālayoḥ kiṣkur antarikā
            tripadī vā | 13 |

kiṣku.mātram āṇi.dvāram antarikāyāṃ khaṇḍa.phulla.artham
            asampātaṃ kārayet | 15 |

sambhūya vā gṛha.svāmino yathā.iṣṭaṃ kārayeyuḥ, aniṣṭaṃ
            vārayeyuḥ | 18 |

vāna.laṭyāś ca-ūrdhvam āvārya.bhāgaṃ kaṭa.pracchannam
            avamarśa.bhittiṃ vā kārayed varṣa.ābādha.bhayāt | 19 |

tasya-atikrame pūrvaḥ sāhasa.daṇḍaḥ,
            pratiloma.dvāra.vāta.ayana.bādhāyāṃ ca, anyatra rāja.mārga.rathyābhyaḥ | 20 |

para.kuḍyam udakena-upaghnato dvādaśa.paṇo daṇḍaḥ,
            mūtra.purīṣa.upaghāte dvi.guṇaḥ | 22 |

pratiṣiddhasya ca vasataḥ, nirasyataś ca-avakrayiṇam anyatra
            pāruṣya.steya.sāhasa.saṅgrahaṇa.mithyā.bhogebhyaḥ | 24 |

sāmānye veśmani sāhāyyam aprayacchataḥ, sāmānyam uparundhato
            bhogaṃ ca gṛhe dvādaśa.paṇo daṇḍaḥ | 26 |
vivṛtānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ sāmānyo bhoga iṣyate || 28 ||

sāmanta.catvāriṃśat.kulyeṣu gṛha.pratimukhe veśma śrāvayeyuḥ,
            sāmanta.grāma.vṛddheṣu kṣetram ārāmaṃ setu.bandhaṃ taṭākam ādhāraṃ vā maryādāsu
            yathā.setu.bhogaṃ "anena-argheṇa kaḥ kretā" iti | 3 |
trir āghuṣitam avyāhataṃ kretā kretuṃ labheta | 4 |

spardhayā vā mūlya.vardhane mūlya.vṛddhiḥ sa-śulkā kośaṃ
            gacchet | 5 |

pratikruṣṭa.atikrame vāstuni dviśato daṇḍaḥ, anyatra
            catur.viṃśati.paṇo daṇḍaḥ | 9 | iti vāstu.vikrayaḥ |

sīma.vivādaṃ grāmayor ubhayoḥ sāmantā pañca.grāmī daśa.grāmī
            vā setubhiḥ sthāvaraiḥ kṛtrimair vā kuryāt | 10 |

karṣaka.go.pālaka.vṛddhāḥ pūrva.bhuktikā vā bāhyāḥ setūnām
            abhijñā bahava eko vā nirdiśya sīma.setūn viparīta.veṣāḥ sīmānaṃ nayeyuḥ | 11 |

tad eva nīte sīma.apahāriṇāṃ setuc.chidāṃ ca kuryāt | 13
            |

pranaṣṭa.setu.bhogaṃ vā sīmānaṃ rājā yathā.upakāraṃ vibhajet
            | 14 | iti sīma.vivādaḥ |

teṣāṃ dvaidhī.bhāve yato bahavaḥ śucayo 'numatā vā tato
            niyaccheyuḥ madhyaṃ vā gṛhṇīyuḥ | 16 |

tad.ubhaya.parā.uktaṃ vāstu rājā haret, pranaṣṭa.svāmikaṃ ca
            | 17 |

kāraṇa.ādāne prayāsam ājīvaṃ ca parisaṅkhyāya bandhaṃ dadyāt
            | 20 | iti kṣetra.vivādaḥ |

upari.niviṣṭaṃ na-adhara.taṭākasya pūra.āsrāvaṃ vārayed,
            anyatra tri.varṣa.uparata.karmaṇaḥ | 30 |

taṭāka.setu.bandhānāṃ nava.pravartane pāñcavarṣikaḥ
            parihāraḥ, bhagna.utsṛṣṭānāṃ cāturvarṣikaḥ, samupārūḍhānāṃ traivarṣikaḥ, sthalasya
            dvaivarṣikaḥ | 33 |

khāta.prāvṛttim
            anadī.nibandha.āyatana.taṭāka.kedāra.ārāma.ṣaṇḍa.vāpānāṃ sasya.varṇa.bhāga.uttarikam
            anyebhyo vā yathā.upakāraṃ dadyuḥ | 35 |
setubhyo muñcatas toyam avāre ṣaṭ.paṇo damaḥ |

Chapter 10 (Sections 61; 62): Concerning Immovable Property (cont.);
            Non-observance of Conventions

karma.udaka.mārgam ucitaṃ rundhataḥ kurvato 'nucitaṃ vā
            pūrvaḥ sāhasa.daṇḍaḥ, setu.kūpa.puṇya.sthāna.caitya.deva.āyatanāni ca para.bhūmau
            niveśayataḥ | 1 |

pūrva.anuvṛttaṃ dharma.setum ādhānaṃ vikrayaṃ vā nayato
            nāyayato vā madhyamaḥ sāhasa.daṇḍaḥ, śrotṝṇām uttamaḥ, anyatra bhagna.utsṛṣṭāt | 2 |
svāmy abhāve grāmāḥ puṇya.śīlā vā pratikuryuḥ | 3 |

kṣudra.paśu.manuṣya.pathaṃ rundhato dvādaśa.paṇo daṇḍaḥ,
            mahā.paśu.pathaṃ catur.viṃśati.paṇaḥ, hasti.kṣetra.pathaṃ catuṣ.pañcāśat.paṇaḥ,
            setu.vana.pathaṃ ṣaṭ.śataḥ, śmaśāna.grāma.pathaṃ dviśataḥ, droṇa.mukha.pathaṃ
            pañca.śataḥ, sthānīya.rāṣṭra.vivīta.pathaṃ sāhasraḥ | 5 |

kṣetrikasya-akṣipataḥ kṣetram upavāsasya vā tyajato
            bīja.kāle dvādaśa.paṇo daṇḍaḥ, anyatra doṣa.upanipāta.aviṣahyebhyaḥ | 8 |

karadāḥ karadeṣv ādhānaṃ vikrayaṃ vā kuryuḥ, brahma.deyikā
            brahma.deyikeṣu | 9 |

karadaṃ tu praviśataḥ sarva.dravyeṣu prākāmyaṃ syāt,
            anyatra-agārāt | 12 |

anādeyam akṛṣato 'nyaḥ pañca.varṣāṇy upabhujya
            prayāsa.niṣkrayeṇa dadyāt | 14 |

grāmikasya grāmād astena.pāradārikaṃ nirasyataś
            catur.viṃśati.paṇo daṇḍaḥ, grāmasya-uttamaḥ | 18 |

stambhaiḥ samantato grāmād dhanuḥ.śata.apakṛṣṭam upasālaṃ
            kārayet | 20 |

vivītaṃ bhakṣayitvā-apasṛtānām uṣṭra.mahiṣāṇāṃ pādikaṃ rūpaṃ
            gṛhṇīyuḥ, gava.aśva.kharāṇāṃ ca-ardha.pādikam, kṣudra.paśūnāṃ ṣoḍaśa.bhāgikam | 22 |

bhakṣayitvā niṣaṇṇānām eta eva dvi.guṇā daṇḍāḥ, parivasatāṃ
            catur.guṇāḥ | 23 |

grāma.deva.vṛṣā vā-anirdaśa.ahā vā dhenur ukṣāṇo go.vṛṣāś
            ca-adaṇḍyāḥ | 24 |

sasya.bhakṣaṇe sasya.upaghātaṃ niṣpattitaḥ parisaṅkhyāya
            dvi.guṇaṃ dāpayet | 25 |

svāminaś ca-anivedya cārayato dvādaśa.paṇo daṇdaḥ,
            pramuñcataś catur.viṃśati.paṇaḥ | 26 |

vāṭa.bhede dvi.guṇaḥ veśma.khala.valaya.gatānāṃ ca dhānyānāṃ
            bhakṣaṇe | 29 |

abhaya.vana.mṛgāḥ parigṛhītā vā bhakṣayantaḥ svāmino nivedya
            yathā-avadhyās tathā pratiṣeddhavyāḥ | 31 |

prārthayamānā dṛṣṭa.aparādhā vā sarva.upāyair niyantavyāḥ |
            34 | iti kṣetra.patha.hiṃsā |

karṣakasya grāmam abhyupetya-akurvato grāma eva-atyayaṃ
            haret | 35 |

karma.akaraṇe karma.vetana.dvi.guṇam, hiraṇya.adāne
            pratyaṃśa.dvi.guṇam, bhakṣya.peya.adāne ca prahavaṇeṣu dvi.guṇam aṃśaṃ dadyāt | 36 |

pracchanna.śravaṇa.īkṣaṇe ca sarva.hite ca karmaṇi nigraheṇa
            dvi.guṇam aṃśaṃ dadyāt | 38 |

taṃ cet sambhūya vā hanyuḥ pṛthag eṣām aparādha.dvi.guṇo
            daṇḍaḥ | 41 |

prahavaṇeṣu ca-eṣāṃ brāhmaṇā na-akāmāḥ kuryuḥ, aṃśaṃ ca
            labheran | 44 |
rājā deśa.hitān setūn kurvatāṃ pathi saṅkramān |

grāma.śobhāś ca rakṣāś ca teṣāṃ priya.hitaṃ caret || 46
              ||

sapāda.paṇā dharmyā māsa.vṛddhiḥ paṇa.śatasya, pañca.paṇā
            vyāvahārikī, daśa.paṇā kāntāragāṇām, viṃśati.paṇā sāmudrāṇām | 1 |

tataḥ paraṃ kartuḥ kārayituś ca pūrvaḥ sāhasa.daṇḍaḥ,
            śrotṝṇām eka.ekaṃ pratyardha.daṇḍaḥ | 2 |

rājany ayoga.kṣema.āvahe tu dhanika.dhāraṇikayoś caritram
            avekṣeta | 3 |

dhānya.vṛddhiḥ sasya.niṣpattāv upārdhā, paraṃ mūlya.kṛtā
            vardheta | 4 |

prakṣepa.vṛddhir udayād ardhaṃ samnidhāna.sannā vārṣikī deyā
            | 5 |

akṛtvā vṛddhiṃ sādhayato vardhayato vā, mūlyaṃ vā vṛddhim
            āropya śrāvayato bandha.catur.guṇo daṇḍaḥ | 7 |
tasya tri.bhāgam ādātā dadyāt, śeṣaṃ pradātā | 9 |

dīrgha.sattra.vyādhi.guru.kula.uparuddhaṃ bālam asāraṃ vā
            na-ṛṇam anuvardheta | 10 |

pretasya putrāḥ kusīdaṃ dadyuḥ, dāyādā vā riktha.harāḥ,
            saha.grāhiṇaḥ, pratibhuvo vā | 14 |

asaṅkhyāta.deśa.kālaṃ tu putrāḥ pautrā dāyādā vā rikthaṃ
            haramāṇā dadyuḥ | 17 |

jīvita.vivāha.bhūmi.prātibhāvyam asaṅkhyāta.deśa.kālaṃ tu
            putrāḥ pautrā vā vaheyuḥ | 18 |

nānā-ṛṇa.samavāye tu na-ekaṃ dvau yugapad abhivadeyātām,
            anyatra pratiṣṭhamānāt | 19 |

tatra-api gṛhīta.ānupūrvyā rāja.śrotriya.dravyaṃ vā pūrvaṃ
            pratipādayet | 20 |

dampatyoḥ pitā.putrayoḥ bhrātṝṇāṃ ca-avibhaktānāṃ
            paraspara..kṛtam ṛṇam asādhyam | 21 |

strī ca-apratiśrāviṇī pati.kṛtam ṛṇam, anyatra
            go.pālaka.ardha.sītikebhyaḥ | 23 |

patis tu grāhyaḥ strī.kṛtam ṛṇam, aprati.vidhāya proṣita iti
            | 24 |

asmapratipattau tu sākṣiṇaḥ pramāṇaṃ prātyayikāḥ śucayo
            'numatā vā trayo 'vara.ardhyāḥ | 26 |
pakṣa.anumatau vā dvau, ṛṇaṃ prati na tv eva-ekaḥ | 27 |

rahasya.vyavahāreṣv ekā strī puruṣa upaśrotā upadraṣṭā vā
            sākṣī syād rāja.tāpasa.varjam | 31 |

svāmino bhṛtyānām ṛtvig.ācāryāḥ śiṣyāṇāṃ mātā.pitarau
            putrāṇāṃ ca-anigraheṇa sākṣyaṃ kuryuḥ, tesām itare vā | 32 |

paraspara.abhiyoge ca-eṣām uttamāḥ parā.uktā daśa.bandhaṃ
            dadyuḥ, avarāḥ pañca.bandham | 33 | iti sākṣy.adhikāraḥ |

rājanyaṃ vaiśyaṃ vā "mā tava-iṣṭā.pūrta.phalam,
            kapāla.hastaḥ śatru.kulaṃ bhikṣā.arthī gaccheḥ" iti | 36 |

śūdraṃ "janma.maraṇa.antare yad vaḥ puṇya.phalaṃ tad rājānaṃ
            gacched, rājñaś ca kilbiṣaṃ yuṣmān anyathā.vāde, daṇḍaś ca-anubaddhaḥ, paścād api
            jñāyeta yathā.dṛṣṭa.śrutam, eka.mantrāḥ satyam upaharata" iti | 37 |

anupaharatāṃ sapta.rātrād ūrdhvaṃ dvādaśa.paṇo daṇḍaḥ,
            tri.pakṣād ūrdhvam abhiyogaṃ dadyuḥ | 38 |

sākṣi.bhede yato bahavaḥ śucayo 'numatā vā tato niyaccheyuḥ,
            madhyaṃ vā gṛhṇīyuḥ | 39 |

sākṣiṇaś ced abhiyogād ūnaṃ brūyur atiriktasya-abhiyoktā
            bandhaṃ dadyāt | 41 |
atiriktaṃ vā brūyus tad.atiriktaṃ rājā haret | 42 |

bāliśyād abhiyoktur vā duhśrutaṃ durlikhitaṃ
            preta.abhiniveśaṃ vā samīkṣya sākṣi.pratyayam eva syāt | 43 |

"sākṣi.bāliṣyeṣv eva pṛthag.anuyoge deśa.kāla.kāryāṇāṃ
            pūrva.madhyama.uttamā daṇḍāḥ" ity auśanasāḥ | 44 |

"kūṭa.sākṣiṇo yam artham abhūtaṃ kuryur bhūtaṃ vā nāśayeyus
            tad daśa.guṇaṃ daṇḍaṃ dadyuḥ" iti mānavāḥ | 45 |

"bāliśyād vā visaṃvādayatāṃ citro ghātaḥ" iti bārhaspatyāḥ |
            46 |

para.cakra.āṭavikābhyāṃ durga.rāṣṭra.vilope vā,
            pratirodhakair vā grāma.sārtha.vraja.vilope, cakra.yukta.nāśe vā,
            grāma.madhya.agny.udaka.ābādhe jvālā.vega.uparuddhe vā, nāvi nimagnāyāṃ muṣitāyāṃ vā
            svayam uparūḍho na-upanidhim abhyāvahet | 2 |

upanidhi.bhoktā deśa.kāla.anurūpaṃ bhoga.vetanaṃ dadyāt,
            dvādaśa.paṇaṃ ca daṇḍam | 3 |

upabhoga.nimittaṃ naṣṭaṃ vinaṣṭaṃ vā-abhyāvahet,
            catur.viṃśati.paṇaś ca daṇḍaḥ, anyathā vā niṣpatane | 4 |

na-ādhiḥ sa-upakāraḥ sīdet, na ca-asya mūlyaṃ vardheta,
            anyatra nisargāt | 9 |

prayojaka.asamnidhāne vā grāma.vṛddheṣu sthāpayitvā
            niṣkrayam ādhiṃ pratipadyeta | 12 |

nivṛtta.vṛddhiko vā-ādhis tat.kāla.kṛta.mūlyas
            tatra-eva-avatiṣṭheta, anāśa.vināśa.karaṇa.adhiṣṭhito vā | 13 |

dhāraṇika.asamnidhāne vā vināśa.bhayād udgata.arghaṃ
            dharmastha.anujñāto vikrīṇīta, ādhi.pāla.pratyayo vā | 14 |

sthāvaras tu prayāsa.bhogyaḥ phala.bhogyo vā
            prakṣepa.vṛddhi.mūlya.śuddham ājīvam amūlya.kṣayeṇa-upanayet | 15 |

anisṛṣṭa.upabhoktā mūlya.śuddham ājīvaṃ bandhaṃ ca dadyāt |
            16 |

sārthena-anvādhi.hasto vā pradiṣṭāṃ bhūmim aprāptaś corair
            bhagna.utsṛṣṭo vā na-anvādhim abhyāvahet | 19 |

yācitakam avakrītakaṃ vā yathā.vidhaṃ gṛhṇīyus tathā.vidham
            eva-arpayeyuḥ | 22 |

bhreṣa.upanipātābhyāṃ deśa.kāla.uparodhi dattaṃ naṣṭaṃ
            vinaṣṭaṃ vā na-abhyāvaheyuḥ | 23 |

vaiyāvṛtya.vikrayas tu - vaiyāvṛtya.karā yathā.deśa.kālaṃ
            vikrīṇānāḥ paṇyaṃ yathā.jātaṃ mūlyam udayaṃ ca dadyuḥ | 25 |

deśa.kāla.atipātane vā parihīṇaṃ sampradāna.kālikena-argheṇa
            mūlyam udayaṃ ca dadyuḥ | 26 |

yathā.sambhāṣitaṃ vā vikrīṇānā na-udayam adhigaccheyuḥ,
            mūlyam eva dadyuḥ | 27 |

argha.patane vā parihīṇaṃ yathā.parihīṇaṃ mūlyam ūnaṃ dadyuḥ
            | 28 |

sāṃvyavahārikeṣu vā prātyayikeṣv arāja.vācyeṣu
            bhreṣa.upanipātābhyāṃ naṣṭaṃ vinaṣṭaṃ vā mūlyam api na dadyuḥ | 29 |

deśa.kāla.antaritānāṃ tu paṇyānāṃ kṣaya.vyaya.viśuddhaṃ
            mūlyam udayaṃ ca dadyuḥ, paṇya.samavāyānāṃ ca pratyaṃśam | 30 |

karaṇa.hīnaṃ nikṣepam apavyayamānaṃ gūḍha.bhitti.nyastān
            sākṣiṇo nikṣeptā rahasi praṇipātena prajñāpayet, vana.ante vā madya.prahavaṇa.viśvāsena
            | 38 |

rahasi vṛddho vyādhito vā vaidehakaḥ kaścit kṛta.lakṣaṇaṃ
            dravyam asya haste nikṣipya-apagacchet | 39 |

tasya pratideśena putro bhrātā vā-abhigamya nikṣepaṃ yāceta
            | 40 |

dāne śuciḥ, anyathā nikṣepaṃ steya.daṇḍaṃ ca dadyāt | 41
            |

pravrajyā.abhimukho vā śraddheyaḥ kaścit kṛta.lakṣaṇaṃ
            dravyam asya haste nikṣipya pratiṣṭheta | 42 |

dāne śuciḥ, anyathā nikṣepaṃ steya.daṇḍaṃ ca dadyāt | 44
            |

bāliśa.jātīyo vā rātrau rāja.dāyikā.kṣaṇa.bhītaḥ sāram asya
            haste nikṣipya-apagacchet | 46 |

dāne śuciḥ, anyathā nikṣepaṃ steya.daṇḍaṃ ca dadyāt | 48
            |
abhijñānena ca-asya gṛhe janam ubhayaṃ yāceta | 49 |

dravya.bhogānām āgamaṃ ca-asya-anuyuñjīta, tasya ca-arthasya
            vyavahāra.upaliṅganam, abhiyoktuś ca-artha.sāmarthyam | 51 |

sve pare vā jane kāryaṃ deśa.kāla.agra.varṇataḥ || 53
              ||
Chapter 13 (Section 65): Law Concerning Slaves and Labourers

udara.dāsa.varjam ārya.prāṇam aprāpta.vyavahāraṃ śūdraṃ
            vikraya.ādhānaṃ nayataḥ sva.janasya dvādaśa.paṇo daṇḍaḥ, vaiśyaṃ dvi.guṇaḥ, kṣatriyaṃ
            tri.guṇaḥ, brāhmaṇaṃ catur.guṇaḥ | 1 |
mlecchānām adoṣaḥ prajāṃ vikretum ādhātuṃ vā | 3 |

athavā-āryam ādhāya kula.bandhana āryāṇām āpadi, niṣkrayaṃ
            ca-adhigamya bālaṃ sāhāyya.dātāraṃ vā pūrvaṃ niṣkrīṇīran | 5 |

sakṛd.ātma.ādhātā niṣpatitaḥ sīdet, dvir anyena-āhitakaḥ,
            sakṛd ubhau para.viṣaya.abhimukhau | 6 |

preta.viṇ.mūtra.ucchiṣṭa.grāhaṇam āhitasya nagna.snāpanaṃ
            daṇḍa.preṣaṇam atikramaṇaṃ ca strīṇāṃ mūlya.nāśa.karaṃ,
            dhātrī.paricārika.ardha.sītika.upacārikāṇāṃ ca mokṣa.karam | 9 |

dhātrīm āhitikāṃ vā-akāmāṃ sva.vaśāṃ gacchataḥ pūrvaḥ
            sāhasa.daṇḍaḥ, para.vaśāṃ madhyamaḥ | 11 |

kanyām āhitikāṃ vā svayam anyena vā duṣayato mūlya.nāśaḥ
            śulkaṃ tad.dvu.guṇaś ca daṇḍaḥ | 12 |

ārya.prāṇo dhvaja.āhṛtaḥ karma.kāla.anurūpeṇa mūlya.ardhena
            vā vimucyeta | 19 |

gṛhe.jāta.dāya.āgata.labdha.krītānām anyatamaṃ dāsam
            ūna.aṣṭa.varṣaṃ vibandhum akāmaṃ nīce karmaṇi videśe dāsīṃ vā sagarbhām
            aprativihita.garbha.bharmaṇyāṃ vikraya.ādhānaṃ nayataḥ pūrvaḥ sāhasa.daṇḍaḥ,
            kretṛ.śrotṝṇāṃ ca | 20 |

dāsam anurūpeṇa niṣkrayeṇa-āryam akurvato dvādaśa.paṇo
            daṇḍaḥ, saṃrodhaś ca-ā.karaṇāt | 21 |

dāsa.dravyasya jñātayo dāyādāḥ, teṣām abhāve svāmī | 22
            |

svāminaḥ svasyāṃ dāsyāṃ jātaṃ samātṛkam adāsaṃ vidyāt | 23
            |

gṛhyā cet kuṭumba.artha.cintanī mātā bhrātā bhaginī ca-asyā
            adāsāḥ syuḥ | 24 |

dāsaṃ dāsīṃ vā niṣkrīya punar vikraya.ādhānaṃ nayato
            dvādaśa.paṇo daṇḍaḥ, anyatra svayaṃ.vādibhyaḥ | 25 | iti dāsa.kalpaḥ |

karṣakaḥ sasyānāṃ go.pālakaḥ sarpiṣāṃ vaidehakaḥ paṇyānām
            ātmanā vyavahṛtānāṃ daśa.bhāgam asambhāṣita.vetano labheta | 28 |

kāru.śilpi.kuśīlava.cikitsaka.vāg.jīvana.paricāraka.ādir
            āśā.kārika.vargas tu yathā-anyas tad.vidhaḥ kuryād yathā vā kuśalāḥ kalpayeyus tathā
            vetanaṃ labheta | 30 |

nadī.vega.jvālā.stena.vyāla.uparuddhaḥ
            sarva.sva.putra.dāra.ātma.dānena-ārtas trātāram āhūya niṣtīrṇaḥ kuśala.pradiṣṭaṃ vetanaṃ
            dadyāt | 35 |

Chapter 14 (Sections 65; 66): Law Concerning Slaves and Labourers
            (cont.); Undertakings in Partnership

gṛhītvā vetanaṃ karma-akurvato bhṛtakasya dvādaśa.paṇo
            daṇḍaḥ, saṃrodhaś ca-ā.karaṇāt | 1 |

aśaktaḥ kutsite karmaṇi vyādhau vyasane vā-anuśayaṃ labheta,
            pareṇa vā kārayitum | 2 |

"na-anyas tvayā kārayitavyo, mayā vā na-anyasya kartavyam"
            ity avarodhe bhartur akārayato bhṛtakasya-akurvato vā dvādaśa.paṇo daṇḍaḥ | 4 |

karma.niṣṭhāpane bhartur anyatra gṛhīta.vetano na-asakāmaḥ
            kuryāt | 5 |

"upasthitam akārayataḥ kṛtam eva vidyād" ity ācāryāḥ | 6
            |

sa ced alpam api kārayitvā na kārayet kṛtam eva-asya vidyāt
            | 9 |

deśa.kāla.atipātanena karmaṇām anyathā.karaṇe vā na-asakāmaḥ
            kṛtam anumanyeta | 10 |

sambhāṣitād adhika.kriyāyāṃ prayāsaṃ na moghaṃ kuryāt | 11
            |

na ca-anivedya bhartuḥ saṅghaḥ kañcit parihared upanayed vā
            | 15 |

saṅgha.bhṛtāḥ sambhūya.samutthātāro vā yathā.sambhāṣitaṃ
            vetanaṃ samaṃ vā vibhajeran | 18 |

karṣaṇa.vaidehakā vā sasya.paṇya.ārambha.paryavasāna.antare
            sannasya yathā.kṛtasya karmaṇaḥ pratyaṃśaṃ dadyuḥ | 19 |

saṃsiddhe tu-uddhṛta.paṇye sannasya tadānīm eva pratyaṃśaṃ
            dadyuḥ | 21 |

prakrānte tu karmaṇi svasthasya-apakrāmato dvādaśa.paṇo
            daṇḍaḥ | 23 |

coraṃ tv abhaya.pūrvaṃ karmaṇaḥ pratyaṃśena grāhayed, dadyāt
            pratyaṃśam abhayaṃ ca | 25 |

yājakāḥ svā.pracāra.dravya.varjaṃ yathā.sambhāṣitaṃ vetanaṃ
            samaṃ vā vibhajeran | 28 |

agniṣṭoma.ādiṣu ca kratuṣu dīkṣaṇād ūrdhvaṃ tṛtīyam aṃśaṃ,
            madhyama.upasada ūrdhvam ardham aṃśaṃ, sutye prātaḥ.savanād ūrdhvaṃ pāda.ūnam aṃśam | 29
            |

mādhyandināt savanād ūrdhvaṃ samagram aṃśaṃ labheta | 30
            |

sanānām ā.daśa.aho.rātrāt-śeṣa.bhṛtāḥ karma kuryuḥ, anye vā
            sva.pratyayāḥ | 34 |

karmaṇy asamāpte tu yajamānaḥ sīded, ṛtvijaḥ karma samāpayya
            dakṣiṇāṃ hareyuḥ | 35 |

asamāpte tu karmaṇi yājyaṃ yājakaṃ vā tyajataḥ pūrvaḥ
            sāhasa.daṇḍaḥ | 36 |
Chapter 15 (Section 67): Rescission of Sale and Purchase

vikrīya paṇyam aprayacchato dvādaśa.paṇo daṇḍaḥ, anyatra
            doṣa.upanipāta.aviṣahyebhyaḥ | 1 |

vaidehakānām eka.rātram anuśayaḥ, karṣakāṇāṃ tri.rātraṃ,
            go.rakṣakāṇāṃ pañca.rātram | 5 |

vyāmiśrāṇām uttamānāṃ ca varṇānāṃ vṛtti.vikraye sapta.rātram
            | 6 |

            doṣa.upanipāta.aviṣahyebhyaḥ | 9 |

vivāhānāṃ tu trayāṇāṃ pūrveṣāṃ varṇānāṃ pāṇi.grahaṇāt
            siddham upāvartanaṃ, śūdrāṇāṃ ca prakarmaṇaḥ | 11 |

vṛtta.pāṇi.grahaṇayor api doṣam aupaśāyikaṃ dṛṣṭvā siddham
            upāvartanam | 12 |

kanyā.doṣam aupaśāyikam anākhyāya prayacchataḥ kanyāṃ

varayitur vā vara.doṣam anākhyāya vindato dvi.guṇaḥ,
            śulka.strī.dhana.nāśaś ca | 15 |

dvipada.catuṣpadānāṃ tu kuṇṭha.vyādhita.aśucīnām
            utsāha.svāsthya.śucīnām ākhyāne dvādaśa.paṇo daṇḍaḥ | 16 |

ā.tri.pakṣād iti catuṣpadānām upāvartanam, ā.saṃvatsarād iti
            manuṣyāṇām | 17 |
tāvatā hi kālena śakyaṃ śauca.āśauce jñātum | 18 |
dātā pratigrahītā ca syātāṃ na-upahatau yathā |

dāne kraye vā-anuśayaṃ tathā kuryuḥ sabhāsadaḥ || 19
              ||

Chapter 16 (Section 68; 69; 70): Non-conveyance of Gifts; Sale without
            Ownership; The Relation of Ownership

sarva.svaṃ putra.dāram ātmānaṃ vā pradāya-anuśayinaḥ
            prayacchet | 3 |

dharma.dānam asādhuṣu karmasu ca-aupaghātikeṣu vā,
            artha.dānam anupakāriṣv apakāriṣu vā, kāma.dānam anarheṣu ca | 4 |

yathā ca dātā pratigrahītā ca na-upahatau syātāṃ
            tathā-anuśayaṃ kuśalāḥ kalpayeyuḥ | 5 |

daṇḍa.bhayād ākrośa.bhayād anartha.bhayād vā bhaya.dānaṃ
            pratigṛhṇataḥ steya.daṇḍaḥ, prayacchataś ca | 6 |

roṣa.dānaṃ para.hiṃsāyāṃ, rājñām upari darpa.dānaṃ ca | 7
            |

prātibhāvyaṃ daṇḍa.śulka.śeṣam ākṣikaṃ saurikaṃ ca na-akāmaḥ
            putro dāyādo vā riktha.haro dadyāt | 9 | iti dattasya-anapākarma |

asvāmi.vikrayas tu - naṣṭa.apahṛtam āsādya svāmī
            dharmasthena grāhayet | 10 |

dharmasthaś ca svāminam anuyuñjīta "kutas te labdham" iti |
            12 |

sa ced ācāra.kramaṃ darśayeta, na vikretāraṃ, tasya
            dravyasya-atisargeṇa mucyeta | 13 |

vikretā ced dṛśyeta, mūlyaṃ steya.daṇḍaṃ ca dadyāt | 14
            |

sa ced apasāram adhigacched apasared ā.apasāra.kṣayāt | 15
            |

nāṣṭikaś ca sva.karaṇaṃ kṛtvā naṣṭa.pratyāhṛtaṃ labheta | 17
            |

tri.pakṣād ūrdhvam anabhisāraṃ rājā haret, svāmī vā
            sva.karaṇena | 22 |

pañca.paṇikaṃ dvipada.rūpasya niṣkrayaṃ dadyāt, catuṣpaṇikam
            eka.khurasya, dvipaṇikaṃ gomahiṣasya, pādikaṃ kṣudra.paśūnām | 23 |

para.cakra.aṭavī.hṛtaṃ tu pratyānīya rājā yathā.svaṃ
            prayacchet | 25 |

cora.hṛtam avidyamānaṃ sva.dravyebhyaḥ prayacchet,
            pratyānetum aśakto vā | 26 |

para.viṣayād vā vikrameṇa-ānītaṃ yathā.pradiṣṭaṃ rājñā
            bhuñjīta, anyatra-ārya.prāṇebhyo deva.brāhmaṇa.tapasvi.dravyebhyaś ca | 28 | ity
            asvāmi.vikrayaḥ |

sva.svāmi.sambandhas tu - bhoga.anuvṛttir ucchinna.deśānāṃ
            yathā.svaṃ dravyāṇām | 29 |

yat svaṃ dravyam anyair bhujyamānaṃ daśa varṣāṇy upekṣeta,
            hīyeta-asya, anyatra bāla.vṛddha.vyādhita.vyasani.proṣita.deśa.tyāga.rājya.vibhramebhyaḥ
            | 30 |

jñātayaḥ śrotriyāḥ pāṣaṇḍā vā rājñām asannidhau para.vāstuṣu
            vivasanto na bhogena hareyuḥ, upanidhim ādhiṃ nidhiṃ nikṣepaṃ striyaṃ sīmānaṃ
            rāja.śrotriya.dravyāṇi ca | 32 |

āśramiṇaḥ pāṣaṇḍā vā mahaty avakāśe parasparam abādhamānā
            vaseyuḥ | 33 |

vivāda.padeṣu ca-eṣāṃ yāvantaḥ paṇā daṇḍās tāvatī rātrīḥ
            kṣapaṇa.abhiṣeka.agni.kārya.mahā.kaccha.vardhanāni rājñaś careyuḥ | 38 |

te yathā.svam upavāsa.vratair ārādhayeyuḥ, anyatra
            pāruṣya.steya.sāhasa.saṅgrahaṇebhyaḥ | 40 |

dharmo hy adharma.upahataḥ śāstāraṃ hanty upekṣitaḥ ||
              42 ||

striyaṃ puruṣaṃ vā-abhiṣahya badhnato bandhayato bandhaṃ vā
            mokṣayataḥ pañca.śata.avaraḥ sahasra.para uttamaḥ sāhasa.daṇḍaḥ |" ity ācāryāḥ | 10
            |

"yaḥ sāhasaṃ "pratipattā" iti kārayati sa dvi.guṇaṃ dadyāt |
            11 |

"yāvadd hiraṇyam upayokṣyate tāvad dāsyāmi" iti sa
            catur.guṇaṃ daṇḍaṃ dadyāt | 12 |

yaḥ "etāvadd hiraṇyaṃ dāsyāmi" iti pramāṇam uddiśya kārayati
            sa yathā.uktaṃ hiraṇyaṃ daṇḍaṃ ca dadyāt

sa cet kopaṃ madaṃ mohaṃ vā-apadiśed yathā.uktavad daṇḍam
            enaṃ kuryād iti kauṭilyaḥ | 14 |

śatāt pareṣu vyājīṃ ca vidyāt pañca.paṇaṃ śatam || 15
              ||

rūpa.vyājyāv adharmiṣṭhe dharmyā tu prakṛtiḥ smṛtā || 16
              ||

śarīra.prakṛti.śruta.vṛtti.jana.padānāṃ śarīra.upavāde
            kāṇa.khañja.ādibhiḥ satye tri.paṇo daṇḍaḥ, mithyā.upavāde ṣaṭ.paṇo daṇḍaḥ | 2 |

kuṣṭha.unmāda.klaibya.ādibhiḥ kutsāyāṃ ca
            satya.mithyā.stuti.nindāsu dvādaśa.paṇa.uttarā daṇḍās tulyeṣu | 4 |

viśiṣṭeṣu dvi.guṇāḥ, hīneṣv ardha.daṇḍāḥ, para.strīṣu
            dvi.guṇāḥ, pramāda.mada.moha.ādibhir ardha.daṇḍāḥ | 5 |

kuṣṭha.unmādayoś cikitsakāḥ sannikṛṣṭā pumāṃsaś ca pramāṇaṃ,
            klība.bhāve striyo mūtra.pheno 'psu viṣṭhā.nimajjanaṃ ca | 6 |

prakṛty.upavāde
            brāhmaṇa.kṣatriya.vaiśya.śūdra.anta.avasāyinām apareṇa pūrvasya tri.paṇa.uttarā daṇḍāḥ,
            pūrveṇa-aparasya dvi.paṇa.adharāḥ, kubrāhmaṇa.ādibhiś ca kutsāyām | 7 |

tena śruta.upavādo vāg.jīvanānāṃ, kāru.kuśīlavānāṃ
            vṛtty.upavādaḥ, prājjūṇaka.gāndhāra.ādīnāṃ ca jana.pada.upavādā vyākhyātāḥ | 8 |

yaḥ paraṃ "evaṃ tvāṃ kariṣyāmi" iti karaṇena-abhibhartsayed,
            akaraṇe yas tasya karaṇe daṇḍas tato 'rdha.daṇḍaṃ dadyāt | 9 |

aśaktaḥ kopaṃ madaṃ mohaṃ vā-apadiśed dvādaśa.paṇaṃ daṇḍaṃ
            dadyāt | 10 |

nābher adhaḥ.kāyaṃ hasta.paṅka.bhasma.pāṃsubhir iti spṛśatas
            tri.paṇo daṇḍaḥ, tair eva-amedhyaiḥ pāda.ṣṭhīvikābhyāṃ ca ṣaṭ.paṇaḥ,
            chardi.mūtra.purīṣa.ādibhir dvādaśa.paṇaḥ | 2 |
nābher upari dvi.guṇāḥ, śirasi catur.guṇāḥ sameṣu | 3 |

viśiṣṭeṣu dvi.guṇāḥ, hīneṣv ardha.daṇḍāḥ, para.strīṣu
            dvi.guṇāḥ, pramāda.mada.moha.ādibhir ardha.daṇḍāḥ | 4 |

śūdro yena-aṅgena brāhmaṇam abhihanyāt tad asyac-chedayet |
            8 |

hastena-avagūrṇe tri.paṇa.avaro dvādaśa.paṇa.paro daṇḍaḥ,
            pādena dvi.guṇaḥ, duḥkha.utpādanena dravyeṇa pūrvaḥ sāhasa.daṇḍaḥ, prāṇa.ābādhikena
            madhyamaḥ | 11 |

kāṣṭha.loṣṭa.pāṣāṇa.loha.daṇḍa.rajju.dravyāṇām anyatamena
            duḥkham aśoṇitam utpādayataś caturviṃśati.paṇo daṇḍaḥ, śoṇita.utpādane dvi.guṇaḥ,
            anyatra duṣṭa.śoṇitāt | 12 |

mṛta.kalpam aśoṇitaṃ ghnato hasta.pāda.pārañcikaṃ vā
            kurvataḥ pūrvaḥ sāhasa.daṇḍaḥ, pāṇi.pāda.danta.bhaṅge karṇa.nāsa.ācchedane
            vraṇa.vidāraṇe cca, anyatra duṣṭa.vraṇebhyaḥ | 13 |

vā vākya.ceṣṭā.bhojana.uparodheṣu ca madhyamaḥ sāhasa.daṇḍaḥ samutthāna.vyayaś ca |
            14 |

"kalahe pūrva.āgato jayati, akṣamamāṇo hi pradhāvati" ity
            ācāryāḥ | 19 |

pūrvaṃ paścād vā-abhigatasya sākṣiṇaḥ pramāṇam, asākṣike
            ghātaḥ kalaha.upaliṅganaṃ vā | 21 |

ghāta.abhiyogam apratibruvatas tad ahar eva paścāt.kāraḥ |
            22 |

kalahe dravyam apaharato daśa.paṇo daṇḍaḥ,
            kṣudraka.dravya.hiṃsāyāṃ tac ca tāvac ca daṇḍaḥ, sthūlaka.dravya.hiṃsāyāṃ tac ca

para.kuḍyam abhighātena kṣobhayatas tri.paṇo daṇḍaḥ,

te grāmāṇām adhyakṣāṇāṃ ca śauca.āśaucaṃ vidyuḥ | 4 |

            5 |

dharmasthaṃ viśvāsa.upagataṃ sattrī brūyāt - "asau me bandhur

            |
sa cet tathā kuryād upadā.grāhaka iti pravāsyeta | 7 |

            saṃvadana.karakaṃ manyeta taṃ sattrī brūyāt - "amuṣya bhāryāṃ snuṣāṃ duhitaraṃ vā
            kāmaye, sā māṃ pratikāmayatām, ayaṃ ca-arthaḥ pratigṛhyatām" iti | 14 |

yaṃ vā nānā.loha.kṣārāṇām
            aṅgāra.bhasma.asandaṃśa.muṣṭika.adhikaraṇī.bimba.ṭaṅka.mūṣāṇām abhīkṣṇa.kretāraṃ

sattri.prayogād ūrdhvaṃ siddha.vyañjanā māṇavān
            māṇava.vidyābhiḥ pralobhayeyuḥ, prasvāpana.antar.dhāna.dvāra.apoha.mantreṇa
            pratirodhakān, saṃvadana.mantreṇa pāratalpikān | 1 |

teṣāṃ kṛta.utsāhānāṃ mahāntaṃ saṅgham ādāya rātrāv anyaṃ
            grāmam uddiśya-anyaṃ grāmaṃ kṛtaka.strī.puruṣaṃ gatvā brūyuḥ - "iha-eva vidyā.prabhāvo
            dṛśyatāṃ, kṛcchraḥ para.grāmo gantum" iti | 2 |

tato dvāra.apoha.mantreṇa dvārāṇy apohya "praviśyatām" iti
            brūyuḥ | 3 |

antar.dhāna.mantreṇa jāgratām ārakṣiṇāṃ madhyena māṇavān
            atikrāmayeyuḥ | 4 |

prasvāpana.mantreṇa prasvāpayitvā rakṣiṇaḥ śayābhir māṇavaiḥ
            sañcārayeyuḥ | 5 |

purāṇa.cora.vyañjanā vā corān anupraviṣṭās tathā-eva karma
            kārayeyur grāhayeyuś ca | 12 |

gṛhītān samāhartā paura.jānapadānāṃ darśayet - "cora.grahaṇīṃ
            vidyām adhīte rājā, tasya-upadeśād ime corā gṛhītāḥ, bhūyaś ca grahīṣyāmi, vārayitavyo
            vaḥ sva.janaḥ pāpa.ācārah-" iti | 13 |

yaṃ ca-atra-apasarpa.upadeśena śamyā.pratoda.ādīnām
            apahartāraṃ jānīyāt tam eṣāṃ pratyādiśet "eṣa rājñaḥ prabhāvaḥ" iti | 14 |

purāṇa.cora.go.pālaka.vyādha.śva.gaṇinaś ca
            vana.cora.āṭavikān anupraviṣṭāḥ prabhūta.kūṭa.hiraṇya.kupya.bhāṇḍeṣu
            sārtha.vraja.grāmeṣv enān abhiyojayeyuḥ | 15 |

abhiyoge gūḍha.balair ghātayeyuḥ, madana.rasa.yuktena vā
            pathy.adanena | 16 |

gṛhīta.loptra.bhārān āyata.gata.pariśrāntān prasvapataḥ
            prahavaṇeṣu yoga.surā.mattān vā grāhayeyuḥ | 17 |

abhīkṣṇa.pravāsinam, avijñāta.sthāna.gamanam,
            ekānta.araṇya.niṣkuṭa.vikāla.cāriṇaṃ, pracchanne sa.āmiṣe vā deśe

virātre channa.kuḍyac.chāyā.sañcāriṇaṃ, virūpa.dravyāṇām
            adeśa.kāla.vikretāraṃ, jāta.vairaśayaṃ, hīna.karma.jātiṃ,-

            bhinna.ācāraṃ, pūrva.kṛta.apadānaṃ, sva.karmabhir apadiṣṭaṃ,-

            anucchvāsa.upaveśinam āvignaṃ śuṣka.bhinna.svara.mukha.varṇaṃ,-

rūpa.abhigrahas tu - naṣṭa.apahṛtam avidyamānaṃ
            taj.jāta.vyavahāriṣu nivedayet | 3 |

na ca-anivedya saṃsthā.adhyakṣasya purāṇa.bhāṇḍānām ādhānaṃ
            vikrayaṃ vā kuryuḥ | 6 |
