            "kutas te labdham" iti | 7 |

sa cet brūyāt "dāyādyād avāptam, amuṣmāl labdhaṃ krītaṃ
            kāritam ādhi.pracchannam, ayam asya deśaḥ kālaś ca-upasamprāpteḥ, ayam asya-arghaḥ
            pramāṇaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ mūlyaṃ ca" iti, tasya-āgama.samādhau mucyeta | 8 |

nāṣṭikaś cet tad eva pratisandadhyāt, yasyā pūrvo dīrghaś ca
            paribhogaḥ śucir vā deśas tasya dravyam iti vidyāt | 9 |

catuṣpada.dvipadānām api hi rūpa.liṅga.sāmānyaṃ bhavati, kim
            aṅga punar eka.yoni.dravya.kartṛ.prasūtānāṃ kupya.ābharaṇa.bhāṇḍānām iti | 10 |

sa ced brūyāt "yācitakam avakrītakam āhitakaṃ nikṣepam
            upanidhiṃ vaiyāvṛtya.karma vā-amuṣya" iti, tasya-apasāra.pratisandhānena mucyeta | 11
            |

rūpa.abhigṛhītaḥ parasya dāna.kāraṇam ātmanaḥ pratigraha.kāraṇam upaliṅganaṃ vā
            dāyaka.dāpaka.nibandhaka.pratigrāhaka.upadraṣṭṛbhir upaśrotṛbhir vā pratisamānayet | 12
            |
aśuddhas tac ca tāvac ca daṇḍaṃ dadyāt | 14 |

karma.abhigrahas tu - muṣita.veśmanaḥ praveśa.niṣkasanam
            advāreṇa, dvārasya sandhinā bījena vā vedham, uttama.agārasya
            jāla.vāta.ayana.nīpra.vedham, ārohaṇa.avataraṇe ca kuḍyasya vedham, upakhananaṃ vā
            gūḍha.dravya.nikṣepaṇa.grahaṇa.upāyam, upadeśa.upalabhyam
            abhyantarac.cheda.utkara.parimarda.upakaraṇam abhyantara.kṛtaṃ vidyāt | 16 |

abhyantara.kṛte puruṣam āsannaṃ vyasaninaṃ krūra.sahāyaṃ
            taskara.upakaraṇa.saṃsargaṃ, striyaṃ vā daridra.kulām anya.prasaktāṃ vā,-

paricāraka.janaṃ vā tad.vidha.ācāram, atisvapnaṃ,
            nidrā.klāntam, āvignaṃ. śuṣka.bhinna.svara.mukha.varṇam, anavasthitam,-

pāṃsu.pūrṇa.keśa.nakhaṃ vilūna.bhugna.keśa.nakhaṃ vā,
            samyak.snāta.anuliptaṃ taila.pramṛṣṭa.gātraṃ sadyo.dauta.hasta.pādaṃ vā,-

niṣkīrṇa.mūtra.purīṣaṃ vāta.pūrṇa.koṣṭha.tvakkaṃ
            śūna.pāda.pāṇimān mīlita.akṣaṃ savyañjana.kaṇṭhaṃ pīṭana.niruddha.ucchvāsa.hataṃ vidyāt
            | 2 |

śoṇita.anusiktaṃ bhagna.bhinna.gātraṃ kāṣṭhair aśmabhir vā
            hataṃ vidyāt | 6 |

ato 'nyatamena kāraṇena hataṃ hatvā vā daṇḍa.bhayād
            udbaddha.nikṛtta.kaṇṭhaṃ vidyāt | 11 |

hṛdayād uddhṛtya-agnau prakṣiptaṃ
            ciṭiciṭāyad.indra.dhanur.varṇaṃ vā viṣa.yuktaṃ vidyāt, dagdhasya hṛdayam adagdhaṃ dṛṣṭvā
            vā | 13 |

tasya paricāraka.janaṃ vāg.daṇḍa.pāruṣya.atilabdhaṃ mārgeta,
            duḥkha.upahatam anya.prasaktaṃ vā strī.janaṃ, dāya.vṛtti.strī.jana.abhimantāraṃ vā
            bandhum | 14 |
svayam udbaddhasya vā viprakāram ayuktaṃ mārgeta | 16 |

sarveṣāṃ vā strī.dāyādya.doṣaḥ karma.spardhā
            pratipakṣa.dveṣaḥ paṇya.saṃsthā.samavāyo vā vivāda.padānām anyatamad vā roṣa.sthānam |
            17 |

svayaṃ.ādiṣṭa.puruṣair vā, corair artha.nimittaṃ, sādṛśyād
            anya.vairibhir vā hatasya ghātam āsannebhyaḥ parīkṣeta | 19 |

yena-āhūtaḥ saha sthitaḥ prasthito hata.bhūmim ānīto vā tam
            anuyuñjīta | 20 |

ye ca-asya hata.bhūmāv āsanna.carās tān eka.ekaśaḥ pṛcchet
            "kena-ayam iha-ānīto hato vā, kaḥ sa.śastraḥ saṅgūhamāna udvigno vā yuṣmābhir dṛṣṭaḥ"
            iti | 21 |

vastraṃ veṣaṃ vibhūṣāṃ vā dṛṣṭvā tad.vyavahāriṇaḥ || 23
              ||
karma ca vyavahāraṃ ca tato mārgaṇam ācaret || 24 ||

ghātayet svayam ātmānaṃ strī vā pāpena mohitā || 25
              ||

na śmaśāna.vidhis teṣāṃ na sambandhi.kriyās tathā || 26
              ||

bandhus teṣāṃ tu yaḥ kuryāt preta.kārya.kriyā.vidhim
              |

tad.gatiṃ sa caret paścāt sva.janād vā pramucyate || 27
              ||

Chapter 8 (Section 83): Investigation through Interrogation and
            through Torture

muṣita.sannidhau bāhyānām abhyantarāṇāṃ ca sākṣiṇām
            abhiśastasya deśa.jāti.gotra.nāma.karma.sāra.sahāya.nivāsān anuyuñjīta | 1 |

tataḥ pūrvasya-ahnaḥ pracāraṃ rātrau nivāsaṃ cā grahaṇād ity
            anuyuñjīta | 3 |

tri.rātrād ūrdhvam agrāhyaḥ śaṅkitakaḥ pṛcchā.abhāvād
            anyatra-upakaraṇa.darśanāt | 5 |

acoraṃ cora ity abhivyāharataś cora.samo daṇḍaḥ, coraṃ
            pracchādayataś ca | 6 |

eteṣāṃ kāraṇānām anabhisandhāne vipralapantam acoraṃ vidyāt |
            11 |

dṛśyate hy acoro 'pi cora.mārge yadṛcchayā sannipāte
            cora.veṣa.śastra.bhāṇḍa.sāmānyena gṛhyamāṇaś cora.bhāṇḍasya-upavāsena vā,
            yathā-aṇi.māṇḍavyaḥ karma.kleśa.bhayād acoraḥ "coro 'smi" iti bruvāṇaḥ | 12 |

manda.aparādhaṃ bālaṃ vṛddhaṃ vyādhitaṃ mattam unmattaṃ
            kṣut.pipāsā.adhva.klāntam atyāśitam āmaka.aśitaṃ durbalaṃ vā na karma kārayet | 14 |

evam atisandadhyāt, yathā vā nikṣepa.apahāre vyākhyātam | 16
            |

āpta.doṣaṃ karma kārayet, na tv eva striyaṃ garbhiṇīṃ sūtikāṃ
            vā māsa.avara.prajātām | 17 |

tasya-atikrama uttamo daṇḍaḥ kartuḥ kārayituś ca, karmaṇā
            vyāpādanena ca | 20 |

vyāvahārikaṃ karma.catuṣkaṃ - ṣaḍ daṇḍāḥ, sapta kaśāḥ, dvāv
            upari.nibandhau, udaka.nālikā ca | 21 |

paraṃ pāpa.karmaṇāṃ nava vetra.latāḥ, dvādaśa kaśāḥ, dvāv
            ūru.veṣṭau, viṃśatir nakta.māla.latāḥ, dvātriṃśat.talāḥ, dvau vṛścika.bandhau, ullambane
            ca dve, sūcī hastasya, yavāgū.pītasya eka.parva.dahanam aṅgulyāḥ, sneha.pītasya
            pratāpanam ekam ahaḥ, śiśira.rātrau balbaja.agra.śayyā ca | 22 |

tasya.upakaraṇaṃ pramāṇaṃ praharaṇaṃ pradharaṇam avadhāraṇaṃ
            ca khara.paṭṭād āgamayet | 24 |

pūrva.kṛta.apadānaṃ pratijñāya-apaharantam
            eka.deśa.dṛṣṭa.dravyaṃ karmaṇā rūpeṇa vā gṛhītaṃ rāja.kośam avastṛṇantaṃ karma.vadhyaṃ
            vā rāja.vacanāt samastaṃ vyastam abhyastaṃ vā karma kārayet | 26 |

tasya-abhiśasta.aṅko lalāṭe syād vyavahāra.patanāya, steyo
            śvā, manuṣya.vadhe kabandhaḥ, guru.talpe bhagam, surā.pāne madya.dhvajaḥ | 28 |
kuryān nirviṣayaṃ rājā vāsayed ākareṣu vā || 29 ||
Chapter 9 (Section 84): Keeping a Watch over Departments

samāhartṛ.pradeṣṭāraḥ pūrvam adhyakṣāṇām adhyakṣa.puruṣāṇāṃ
            ca niyamanaṃ kuryuḥ | 1 |

phalgu.dravya.karma.antebhyaḥ phalgu dravyam upaskaraṃ vā
            pūrvaḥ sāhasa.daṇḍaḥ | 3 |

paṇya.bhūmibhyo vā rāja.paṇyaṃ māṣa.mūlyād ūrdhvam
            āpāda.mūlyād ity apaharato dvādaśa.paṇo daṇḍaḥ, ā.dvi.pāda.mūlyād iti
            catur.viṃśati.paṇaḥ, ā.tri.pāda.mūlyād iti ṣaṭ.triṃśat.paṇaḥ, ā.paṇa.mūlyād ity
            aṣṭa.catvāriṃśat.paṇaḥ, ā.dvi.paṇa.mūlyād iti pūrvaḥ sāhasa.daṇḍaḥ, ā.catuṣpaṇa.mūlyād
            iti madhyamaḥ, ā.aṣṭa.paṇa.mūlyād ity uttamaḥ, ā.daśa.paṇa.mūlyād iti vadhaḥ | 4 |

koṣṭha.paṇya.kupya.āyudha.agārebhyaḥ
            kupya.bhāṇḍa.upaskara.apahāreṣv ardha.mūlyeṣu eta eva daṇḍāḥ | 5 |

kośa.bhāṇḍa.agāra.akṣa.śālābhyaś catur.bhāga.mūlyeṣu eta eva
            dvi.guṇā daṇḍāḥ | 6 |

bāhyeṣu tu - pracchannam ahani kṣetra.khala.veśma.āpaṇebhyaḥ
            kupya.bhāṇḍam upaskaraṃ vā māṣa.mūlyād ūrdhvam ā.pāda.mūlyād ity apaharatas tri.paṇo
            daṇḍaḥ, gomaya.pradehena vā pralipya-avaghoṣaṇam-ā.dvi.pāda.mūlyād iti ṣaṭ.paṇaḥ,
            gomaya.bhasmanā vā pralipya-avaghoṣaṇam, ā.tri.pāda.mūlyād iti nava.paṇaḥ,
            gomaya.bhasmanā vā pralipya-avaghoṣaṇam, śarāva.mekhalayā vā-ā.paṇa.mūlyād iti
            dvādaśa.paṇaḥ, muṇḍanaṃ pravrājanaṃ vā-ā.dvi.paṇa.mūlyād iti catur.viṃśati.paṇaḥ,
            muṇḍasya-iṣṭakā.śakalena pravrājanaṃ vā- ā.catuṣ.paṇa.mūlyād iti
            ṣaṭ.triṃśat.paṇah-ā.pañca.paṇa.mūlyād ity aṣṭa.catvāriṃśat.paṇaḥ, ā.daśa.paṇa.mūlyād iti
            pūrvaḥ sāhasa.daṇḍah- ā.viṃśati.paṇa.mūlyād it dviśatah-ā.triṃśat.paṇa.mūlyād iti
            pañca.śatah-ā.catvāriṃśat.paṇa.mūlyād iti sāhasrah- ā.pañcāśat.paṇa.mūlyād iti vadhaḥ |
            9 |

prasahya divā rātrau vā-āntaryāmikam apaharato 'rdha.mūlyeṣu
            eta eva daṇḍāḥ | 10 |

prasahya divā rātrau vā sa-śastrasya-apaharataś
            catur.bhāga.mūlyeṣu eta eva dvi.guṇā daṇḍāḥ | 11 |

kuṭumbika.adhyakṣa.mukhya.svāmināṃ kūṭa.śāsana.mudrā.karmasu
            pūrva.madhya.uttama.vadhā daṇḍāḥ, yathā.aparādhaṃ vā | 12 |

dharmasthaś ced vivadamānaṃ puruṣaṃ tarjayati bhartsayaty
            apasārayaty abhigrasate vā pūrvam asmai sāhasa.daṇḍaṃ kuryāt, vāk.pāruṣye dvi.guṇam | 13
            |

pṛcchyaṃ na pṛcchati, apṛcchyaṃ pṛcchati, pṛṣṭvā vā visṛjati,
            śikṣayati, smārayati, pūrvaṃ dadāti vā, iti madhyamam asmai sāhasa.daṇḍaṃ kuryāt | 14
            |

deyaṃ deśaṃ na pṛcchati, adeyaṃ deśaṃ pṛcchati, kāryam
            adeśena-ativāhayati, chalena-atiharati, kāla.haraṇena śrāntam apavāhayati, mārga.āpannaṃ
            vākyam utkramayati, mati.sāhāyyaṃ sākṣibhyo dadāti, tārita.anuśiṣṭaṃ kāryaṃ punar api
            gṛhṇāti, uttamam asmai sāhasa.daṇḍaṃ kuryāt | 15 |

lekhakaś ced uktaṃ na likhati, anuktaṃ likhati, duruktam
            upalikhati, sūktam ullikhati, artha.utpattiṃ vā vikalpayati, iti pūrvam asmai
            sāhasa.daṇḍaṃ kuryād, yathā.aparādhaṃ vā | 17 |

dharmasthaḥ pradeṣṭā vā hairaṇya.daṇḍam adaṇḍye kṣipati
            kṣepa.dvi.guṇam asmai daṇḍaṃ kuryāt, hīna.atirikta.aṣṭa.guṇaṃ vā | 18 |

śarīra.daṇḍaṃ kṣipati śārīram eva daṇḍaṃ bhajeta,
            niṣkraya.dvi.guṇaṃ vā | 19 |

yaṃ vā bhūtam arthaṃ nāśayati abhūtam arthaṃ karoti
            tad.aṣṭa.guṇaṃ daṇḍaṃ dadyāt | 20 |

dharmasthīye cārake bandhana.agāre vā
            śayyā.āsana.bhojana.uccāra.sañcāra.rodha.bandhaneṣu tri.paṇa.uttarā daṇḍāḥ kartuḥ
            kārayituś ca | 21 |

cārakād abhiyuktaṃ muñcato niṣpātayato vā madhyamaḥ
            sāhasa.daṇḍaḥ, abhiyoga.dānaṃ ca, bandhana.agārāt sarva.svaṃ vadhaś ca | 22 |

bandhana.agāra.adhyakṣasya saṃruddhakam anākhyāya cārayataś
            catur.viṃśati.paṇo daṇḍaḥ, karma kārayato dvi.guṇaḥ, sthāna.anyatvaṃ gamayato 'nna.pānaṃ
            vā rundhataḥ ṣaṇ.ṇavatir daṇḍaḥ, parikleśayata utkoṭayato vā madhyamaḥ sāhasa.daṇḍaḥ,
            ghnataḥ sāhasraḥ | 23 |

parigṛhītāṃ dāsīm āhitikāṃ vā saṃruddhikām adhicarataḥ pūrvaḥ
            sāhasa.daṇḍaḥ, cora.ḍāmarika.bhāryāṃ madhyamaḥ, saṃruddhikām āryām uttamaḥ | 24 |

tad eva-akṣaṇa.gṛhītāyām āryāyāṃ vidyāt, dāsyāṃ pūrvaḥ
            sāhasa.daṇḍaḥ | 26 |

cārakam abhittvā niṣpātayato madhyamaḥ, bhittvā vadhaḥ,
            bandhana.agārāt sarva.svaṃ vadhaś ca | 27 |
evam artha.carān pūrvaṃ rājā daṇḍena śodhayet |

śodhayeyuś ca śuddhās te paura.jānapadān damaiḥ || 28
              ||

tīrtha.ghāta.granthi.bheda.ūrdhva.karāṇāṃ prathame 'parādhe
            sandeśac.chedanaṃ catuṣ.pañcāśat.paṇo vā daṇḍaḥ, dvitīye chedanaṃ paṇasya śatyo vā
            daṇḍaḥ, tṛtīye dakṣiṇa.hasta.vadhaś catuḥ.śato vā daṇḍaḥ, caturthe yathā.kāmī vadhaḥ | 1
            |

pañca.viṃśati.paṇa.avareṣu
            kukkuṭa.nakula.mārjāra.śva.sūkara.steyeṣu hiṃsāyāṃ vā catuṣ.pañcāśat.paṇo daṇḍaḥ,
            nāsa.agrac.chedanaṃ vā- caṇḍāla.araṇya.carāṇām ardha.daṇḍāḥ | 2 |

pāśa.jāla.kūṭa.avapāteṣu baddhānāṃ
            mṛga.paśu.pakṣi.vyāla.matsyānām ādāne tac ca tāvac ca daṇḍaḥ | 3 |

kāru.śilpi.kuśīlava.tapasvināṃ kṣudraka.dravya.apahāre śatyo
            daṇḍaḥ, sthūlaka.dravya.apahāre dvi.śataḥ, kṛṣi.dravya.apahāre ca | 6 |

durgam akṛta.praveśasya praviśataḥ prākārac.chidrād vā
            nikṣepaṃ gṛhītvā-apasarataḥ kāṇḍarā.vadho, dvi.śāto vā daṇḍaḥ | 7 |

cakra.yuktaṃ nāvaṃ kṣudra.paśuṃ vā-apaharata
            eka.pāda.vadhaḥ, tri.śato vā daṇḍaḥ | 8 |

stena.pāradārikayoḥ sācivya.karmaṇi striyāḥ saṅgṛhītāyāś ca
            karṇa.nāsāc.chedanam, pañca.śato vā daṇḍaḥ, puṃṣo dvi.guṇaḥ | 10 |

mahā.paśum ekaṃ dāsaṃ dāsīṃ vā-apaharataḥ preta.bhāṇḍaṃ vā
            vikrīṇānasya dvi.pāda.vadhaḥ, ṣaṭ.chato vā daṇḍaḥ | 11 |

varṇa.uttamānāṃ gurūṇāṃ ca hasta.pāda.laṅghane
            rāja.yāna.vāhana.ādy.ārohaṇe ca-eka.hasta.pāda.vadhaḥ, sapta.śato vā daṇḍaḥ | 12 |

śūdrasya brāhmaṇa.vādino deva.dravyam avastṛṇato
            rāja.dviṣṭam ādiśato dvi.netra.bhedinaś ca yoga.añjanena-andhatvam, aṣṭa.śato vā daṇḍaḥ
            | 13 |

coraṃ pāradārikaṃ vā mokṣayato rāja.śāsanam ūnam atiriktaṃ
            vā likhataḥ kanyāṃ dāsīṃ vā sa-hiraṇyam aparahataḥ kūṭa.vyavahāriṇo vimāṃsa.vikrayiṇaś
            ca vāma.hasta.dvi.pāda.vadho, nava.śato vā daṇḍaḥ | 14 |

anubandhaṃ tadātvaṃ ca deśa.kālau samīkṣya ca || 17
              ||

rājñaś ca prakṛtīnāṃ ca kalpayed antarā sthitaḥ || 18
              ||

sapta.rātrasya-antar.mṛte śuddha.vadhaḥ, pakṣasya-antar
            uttamaḥ, māsasya-antaḥ pañca.śataḥ samutthāna.vyayaś ca | 2 |

prahāreṇa garbhaṃ pātayata uttamo daṇḍaḥ, bhaiṣajyena
            madhyamaḥ, parikleśena pūrvaḥ sāhasa.daṇḍaḥ | 6 |

prasabha.strī.puruṣa.ghātaka.abhisāraka.nigrāhaka.avaghoṣaka.-
            avaskandaka.upavedhakān pathi.veśma.pratirodhakān rāja.hasty.aśva.rathānāṃ hiṃsakān
            stenān vā śūlān ārohayeyuḥ | 7 |

yaś ca-enān dahed apanayed vā sa tam eva daṇḍaṃ labheta,
            sāhasam uttamaṃ vā | 8 |

hiṃsra.stenānāṃ putra.dāram asamantraṃ visṛjet, samantram
            ādadīta | 10 |

rājya.kāmukam antaḥpura.pradharṣakam aṭavy.amitra.utsāhakaṃ
            durga.rāṣṭra.daṇḍa.kopakaṃ vā śiro.hasta.pradīpikaṃ ghātayet | 11 |

teṣām ākrośe jihvāc.chedaḥ, aṅga.abhiradane tad.aṅgān mocyaḥ
            | 14 |

udaka.dhāraṇaṃ setuṃ bhindatas tatra-eva-apsu nimajjanam,
            anudakam uttamaḥ sāhasa.daṇḍaḥ, bhagna.utsṛṣṭakaṃ madhyamaḥ | 17 |

viṣa.dāyakaṃ puruṣaṃ striyaṃ ca puruṣaghnīm apaḥ praveśayed
            agarbhiṇīm, garbhiṇīṃ māsa.avara.prajātām | 18 |

pati.guru.prajā.ghātikām agni.viṣadāṃ sandhic.chedikāṃ vā
            gobhiḥ pāṭayet | 19 |

rāja.ākrośaka.mantra.bhedakayor aniṣṭa.pravṛttikasya
            brāhmaṇa.mahānasa.avalehinaś ca jihvām utpāṭayet | 21 |

akliṣṭānāṃ tu pāpānāṃ dharmyaḥ śuddha.vadhaḥ smṛtaḥ ||
              26 ||

savarṇām aprāpta.phalāṃ prakurvato hasta.vadhaḥ, catuḥ.śato
            vā daṇḍaḥ | 1 |

prāpta.phalāṃ prakurvato madhyamā.pradeśinī.vadho, dvi.śato
            vā daṇḍaḥ | 3 |

sakāmāyāṃ catuṣ.pañcāśat.paṇo daṇḍaḥ, striyās tv
            ardha.daṇḍaḥ | 6 |

para.śulka.avaruddhāyāṃ hasta.vadhaḥ, catuḥ.śato vā daṇḍaḥ,
            śulka.dānaṃ ca | 7 |

sapta.ārtava.prajātāṃ varaṇād ūrdhvam alabhamānaḥ prakṛtya
            prākāmī syāt, na ca pitur avahīnaṃ dadyāt | 8 |

tri.varṣa.prajāta.ārtavāyās tulyo gantum adoṣaḥ, tataḥ param
            atulyo 'py analaṅkṛtāyāḥ | 10 |

kanyām anyāṃ darśayitvā-anyāṃ prayacchataḥ śatyo daṇḍas
            tulyāyām, hīnāyāṃ dvi.guṇaḥ | 14 |

prakarmaṇy akumāryāś catuṣ.pañcāśat.paṇo daṇḍaḥ,
            śulka.vyaya.karmaṇī ca pratidadyāt | 15 |

anya.śoṇita.upadhāne dviśato daṇḍaḥ, mithyā.abhiśaṃsinaś ca
            puṃsaḥ | 17 |

strī.prakṛtā sakāmā samānā dvādaśa.paṇaṃ daṇḍaṃ dadyāt,
            prakartrī dvi.guṇam | 20 |

akāmāyāḥ śatyo daṇḍa ātma.rāga.artham, śulka.dānaṃ ca | 21
            |

bahir.grāmasya prakṛtāyāṃ mithyā.abhiśaṃsane ca dvi.guṇo
            daṇḍaḥ | 23 |

prasahya kanyām apaharato dvi.śataḥ, sa-suvarṇām uttamaḥ |
            24 |

gaṇikā.duhitaraṃ prakurvataś catuṣ.pañcāśat.paṇo daṇḍaḥ,
            śulkaṃ mātur bhogaḥ ṣoḍaśa.guṇaḥ | 26 |

dāsasya dāsyā vā duhitaram adāsīṃ prakurvataś
            catur.viṃśati.paṇo daṇḍaḥ śulka.ābandhya.dānaṃ ca | 27 |

niṣkraya.anurūpāṃ dāsīṃ prakurvato dvādaśa.paṇo daṇḍo
            vastra.ābandhya.dānaṃ ca | 28 |

proṣita.patikām apacarantīṃ pati.bandhus tat.puruṣo vā
            saṅgṛhṇīyāt | 30 |

akṣamāyāṃ striyāḥ karṇa.nāsa.ācchedanam, vadhaṃ jāraś ca
            prāpnuyāt | 33 |

jāraṃ cora ity abhiharataḥ pañca.śato daṇḍaḥ, hiraṇyena
            muñcatas tad.aṣṭa.guṇaḥ | 34 |

keśākeśikaṃ saṅgrahaṇam, upaliṅganād vā śarīra.upabhogānām,
            taj.jātebhyaḥ (taj.jñātebhyaḥ? cf. N12.60), strī.vacanād vā | 35 |

para.cakra.aṭavī.hṛtām ogha.pravyūḍhām araṇyeṣu durbhikṣe vā
            tyaktāṃ preta.bhāva.utsṛṣṭāṃ vā para.striyaṃ nistārayitvā yathā.sambhāṣitaṃ
            samupabhuñjīta | 36 |

nistārayitvā kāntārān naṣṭāṃ tyaktāṃ mṛtā-iti vā || 38
              ||
na tu rāja.pratāpena pramuktāṃ svajanena vā || 39 ||
na ca-uttamāṃ na ca-akāmāṃ pūrva.apatyavatīṃ na ca |

brāhmaṇam apeyam abhakṣyaṃ vā grāsayata uttamo daṇḍaḥ,
            kṣatriyaṃ madhyamaḥ, vaiśyaṃ pūrvaḥ sāhasa.daṇḍaḥ, śūdraṃ catuṣ.pañcāśat.paṇo daṇḍaḥ | 1
            |

para.gṛha.abhigamane divā pūrvaḥ sāhasa.daṇḍaḥ, rātrau
            madhyamaḥ | 3 |
divā rātrau vā saśastrasya praviśata uttamo daṇḍaḥ | 4 |

bhikṣuka.vaidehakau matta.unmattau balād āpadi
            ca-atisannikṛṣṭāḥ pravṛtta.praveśāś ca-adaṇḍyāḥ, anyatra pratiṣedhāt | 5 |

sva.veśmano virātrād ūrdhvaṃ parivāram ārohataḥ pūrvaḥ
            sāhasa.daṇḍaḥ, para.veśmano madhyamaḥ, grāma.ārāma.vāṭa.bhedinaś ca | 6 |

muṣitaṃ pravāsitaṃ ca-eṣām anirgataṃ rātrau grāma.svāmī
            dadyāt | 8 |

grāma.antareṣu vā muṣitaṃ pravāsitaṃ vivīta.adhyakṣo dadyāt
            | 9 |

durbalaṃ veśma śakaṭam anuttabdham ūrdha.stambhaṃ śastram
            anapāśrayam apraticchannaṃ śvabhraṃ kūpaṃ kūṭa.avapātaṃ vā kṛtvā hiṃsāyāṃ daṇḍa.pāruṣyaṃ
            vidyāt | 13 |

vṛkṣac.chedane daṃya.raśmi.haraṇe catuṣpadānām adānta.sevane
            vāhane vā kāṣṭha.loṣṭa.pāṣāṇa.daṇḍa.bāṇa.bāhu.vikṣepaṇeṣu yāne hastinā ca smaghaṭṭane
            "apehi" iti prakośann adaṇḍyaḥ | 14 |

hastinā roṣitena hato droṇa.annaṃ madya.kumbhaṃ
            mālya.anulepanaṃ danta.pramārjanaṃ ca paṭaṃ dadyāt | 15 |

aśva.medha.avabhṛtha.snānena tulyo hastinā vadha iti
            pāda.prakṣālanam | 16 |

śṛṅgiṇā daṃṣṭriṇā vā hiṃsyamānam amokṣayataḥ svāminaḥ pūrvaḥ
            sāhasa.daṇḍaḥ, pratikruṣṭasya dvi.guṇaḥ | 18 |

śṛṅgi.daṃṣṭribhyām anyonyaṃ ghātayatas tac ca tāvac ca
            daṇḍaḥ | 19 |

deva.paśum ṛṣabham ukṣāṇaṃ go.kumārīṃ vā vāhayataḥ
            pañca.śato daṇḍaḥ, pravāsayata uttamaḥ | 20 |

loma.doha.vāhana.prajanana.upakāriṇāṃ kṣudra.paśūnām adāne
            tac ca tāvac ca daṇḍaḥ, pravāsane ca, anyatra deva.pitṛ.kāryebhyaḥ | 21 |

chinna.nasyaṃ bhagna.yugaṃ tiryak.pratimukha.āgataṃ
            pratyāsarad vā cakra.yuktaṃ yātā paśu.manuṣya.sambādhe vā hiṃsāyām adaṇḍyaḥ | 22 |

bāle yātari yānasthaḥ svāmī daṇḍyaḥ, asvāmini yānasthaḥ,
            prāpta.vyavahāro vā yātā | 25 |
bāla.adhiṣṭhitam apuruṣaṃ vā yānaṃ rājā haret | 26 |

kāmaṃ bhāryāyām anicchantyāṃ kanyāyāṃ vā dāra.arthino
            bhartari bhāryāyā vā saṃvadana.karaṇam | 28 |

mātā.pitror bhaginīṃ mātulānīm ācāryāṇīṃ snuṣāṃ duhitaraṃ
            bhaginīṃ vā-adhicaratas tri.liṅgac.chedanaṃ vadhaś ca | 30 |

sakāmā tad eva labheta, dāsa.paricāraka.āhitaka.bhuktā ca |
            31 |

brāhmaṇyām aguptāyāṃ kṣatriyasya-uttamaḥ, sarva.svaṃ
            vaiśyasya, śūdraḥ kaṭa.agninā dahyeta | 32 |

śva.pākī.gamane kṛta.kabandha.aṅkaḥ para.viṣayaṃ gacchet,
            śva.pākatvaṃ vā śūdraḥ | 34 |

bahūnām ekām adhicaratāṃ pṛthak catur.viṃśati.paṇo daṇḍaḥ |
            39 |

striyam ayonau gacchataḥ pūrvaḥ sāhasa.daṇḍaḥ, puruṣam
            adhimehataś ca | 40 |
tena tat pūyate pāpaṃ rājño daṇḍa.apacārajam |

śāstā hi varuṇo rājñāṃ mithyā vyācaratāṃ nṛṣu || 43
              ||

rājānam avagṛhya-upajīvinaḥ śatru.sādhāraṇā vā ye mukhyās
            teṣu gūḍha.puruṣa.praṇidhiḥ kṛtya.pakṣa.upagraho vā siddhiḥ yathā.uktaṃ purastād,
            upajāpo 'pasarpo vā yathā pāragrāmike vakṣyāmaḥ | 3 |

rājya.upaghātinas tu vallabhāḥ saṃhatā vā ye mukhyāḥ prakāśam
            aśakyāḥ pratiṣeddhuṃ dūṣyāḥ teṣu dharma.rucir upāṃśu.daṇḍaṃ prayuñjīta | 4 |

dūṣya.mahā.mātra.bhrātaram asat.kṛtaṃ sattrī protsāhya
            rājānaṃ darśayet | 5 |

śastreṇa rasena vā vikrāntaṃ tatra-eva ghātayed
            "bhrātṛ.ghātako 'yam" iti | 7 |

dūṣyaṃ.mahāmātraṃ vā sattri.protsāhito bhrātā dāyaṃ yāceta |
            9 |

taṃ dūṣya.gṛha.pratidvāri rātrāv upaśayānam anyatra vā
            vasantaṃ tīkṣṇo hantā brūyād "hato 'yaṃ dāya.kāmukaḥ" iti | 10 |

dūṣya.samīpasthā vā sattriṇo bhrātaraṃ dāyaṃ yācamānaṃ
            ghātena paribhartsayeyuḥ | 12 |

dūṣya.mahā.mātrayor vā yaḥ putraḥ pituḥ pitā vā putrasya
            dārān adhicarati, bhrātā vā bhrātuḥ, tayoḥ kāpaṭika.mukhaḥ kalahaḥ pūrveṇa vyākhyātaḥ |
            14 |

dūṣya.mahā.mātra.putram ātma.sambhāvitaṃ vā sattrī
            "rāja.putras tvam, śatru.bhayād iha nyasto 'si" ity upajapet | 15 |

pratipannaṃ rājā rahasi pūjayet "prāpta.yauvarājya.kālaṃ tvāṃ
            mahā.mātra.bhayān na-abhiṣiñcāmi" iti | 16 |

bhikṣukī vā dūṣya.bhāryāṃ sāṃvadanikībhir auṣadhībhiḥ
            saṃvāsya rasena-atisandadhyāt | 19 |

dūṣya.mahā.mātram aṭavīṃ para.grāmaṃ vā hantuṃ
            kāntāra.vyavahite vā deśe rāṣṭra.pālam anta.pālaṃ vā sthāpayituṃ nāgara.sthānaṃ vā
            kupitam avagrāhituṃ sārtha.ativāhyaṃ pratyante vā sa-pratyādeyam ādātuṃ phalgu.balaṃ
            tīkṣṇa.yuktaṃ preṣayet | 21 |

rātrau divā vā yuddhe pravṛtte tīkṣṇāḥ pratirodhaka.vyañjanā
            vā hanyuḥ "abhiyoge hataḥ" iti | 22 |

te gūḍha.śastrais tīkṣṇaiḥ saha praviṣṭā madhyama.kakṣyāyām
            ātma.vicayam antaḥ.praveśana.arthaṃ dadyuḥ | 24 |

tato dauvārika.abhigṛhītās tīkṣṇāḥ "dūṣya.prayuktāḥ sma" iti
            brūyuḥ | 25 |

teṣāṃ devī.vyañjanā vā duḥstrī rātrāv āvāseṣu gṛhyeta-iti
            samānaṃ pūrveṇa | 29 |

dūṣya.mahā.mātraṃ vā "sūdo bhakṣa.kāro vā te śobhanaḥ" iti
            stavena bhakṣya.bhojyaṃ yāceta, bahir vā kvacid adhva.gataḥ pānīyam | 30 |

tad.ubhayaṃ rasena yojayitvā pratisvādane tāv eva-upayojayet
            | 31 |

abhicāra.śīlaṃ vā siddha.vyañjano
            "godhā.kūrma.karkaṭaka.kūṭānāṃ lakṣaṇyānām anyatama.prāśanena manorathān avāpsyasi" iti
            grāhayet | 33 |

pratipannaṃ karmaṇi rasena loha.musalair vā ghātayet
            "karma.vyāpadā hataḥ" iti | 34 |

cikitsaka.vyañjano vā daurātmikam asādhyaṃ vā vyādhiṃ
            dūṣyasya sthāpayitvā bhaiṣajya.āhāra.yogeṣu rasena-atisandadhyāt | 35 |

yatra dūṣyaḥ pratiṣeddhavyas tatra dūṣyam eva
            phalgu.bala.tīkṣṇa.yuktaṃ preṣayet, gaccha, amuṣmin durge rāṣṭre vā sainyam utthāpaya
            hiraṇyaṃ vā, vallabhād vā hiraṇyam āhāraya, vallabha.kanyāṃ vā prasahya-ānaya,
            durga.setu.vaṇik.patha.śūnya.niveśa.khani.dravya.hasti.vana.karmaṇām anyatamad vā kāraya
            rāṣṭra.pālyam anta.pālyaṃ vā-yaś ca tvā pratiṣedhayen na vā te sāhāyyaṃ dadyāt sa
            bandhavyaḥ syāt

tam eteṣu kalaha.sthāneṣu karma.pratighāteṣu vā vivadamānaṃ
            tīkṣṇāḥ śastraṃ pātayitvā pracchannaṃ hanyuḥ | 41 |

purāṇāṃ grāmāṇāṃ kulānāṃ vā dūṣyāṇāṃ
            sīmā.kṣetra.khala.veśma.maryādāsu dravya.upakaraṇa.sasya.vāhana.hiṃsāsu
            prekṣā.kṛtya-utsaveṣu vā samutpanne kalahe tīkṣṇair utpādite vā tīkṣṇāḥ śastraṃ
            pātayitvā brūyuḥ "evaṃ kriyante ye 'munā kalahāyante: iti | 43 |

yeṣāṃ vā dūṣyāṇāṃ jāta.mūlāḥ kalahās teṣāṃ
            kṣetra.khala.veśmāny ādīpayitvā bandhu.sambandhiṣu vāhaneṣu vā tīkṣṇāḥ śastraṃ pātayitvā
            tathaiva brūyuḥ "amunā prayuktāḥ smaḥ" iti | 45 |

bhikṣukī vā dūṣya.rāṣṭra.mukhyaṃ "dūṣya.rāṣṭra.mukhyasya
            bhāryā snuṣā duhitā vā kāmayate" ity upajapet | 50 |

pratipannasya-ābharaṇam ādāya svāmine darśayet "asau te
            mukhyo yauvana.utsikto bhāryāṃ snuṣāṃ duhitaraṃ vā-abhimanyate" iti | 51 |

dūṣya.daṇḍa.upanateṣu tu - yuva.rājaḥ senā.patir vā kiñcid
            apakṛtya-apakrānto vikrameta | 53 |

tato rājā dūṣya.daṇḍa.upanatān eva preṣayet
            phalgu.bala.tīkṣṇa.yuktān iti samānāḥ sarva eva yogāḥ | 54 |

teṣāṃ ca putreṣv anukṣiyatsu yo nirvikāraḥ sa pitṛ.dāyaṃ
            labheta | 55 |

evam asya putra.pautrān anuvartate rājyam apāsta.puruṣa.doṣam
            | 56 |
sva.pakṣe para.pakṣe vā tūṣṇīṃ daṇḍaṃ prayojayet |
āyatyāṃ ca tadātve ca kṣamāvān aviśaṅkitaḥ || 57 ||

jana.padaṃ mahāntam alpa.pramāṇaṃ vā-adeva.mātṛkaṃ
            prabhūta.dhānyaṃ dhānyasya-aṃśaṃ tṛtīyaṃ caturthaṃ vā yāceta, yathā.sāraṃ madhyam avaraṃ
            vā | 2 |

durga.setu.karma.vaṇik.patha.śūnya.niveśa.khani.dravya.hasti.vana.karma.-
            upakāriṇaṃ pratyantam alpa.pramāṇaṃ vā na yāceta | 3 |

caturtham aṃśaṃ dhānyānāṃ bīja.bhakta.śuddhaṃ ca hiraṇyena
            krīṇīyāt | 5 |

tasya-akaraṇe vā samāhartṛ.puruṣā grīṣme karṣakāṇām udvāpaṃ
            kārayeyuḥ | 8 |

pramāda.avaskannasya-atyayaṃ dvi.guṇam udāharanto bīja.kāle
            bīja.lekhyaṃ kuryuḥ | 9 |

niṣpanne harita.pakva.ādānaṃ vārayeyuḥ, anyatra
            śāka.kaṭa.bhaṅga.muṣṭibhyāṃ deva.pitṛ.pūjā.dāna.arthaṃ gava.arthaṃ vā | 10 |

para.sasya.apahāriṇaḥ pañcāśad.guṇaḥ sītā.atyayaḥ,
            sva.vargasya, bāhyasya tu vadhaḥ | 13 |

caturtham aṃśaṃ dhānyānāṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ vanyānāṃ
            tūla.lākṣā.kṣauma.valka.kārpāsa.rauma.kauśeya.kauṣadha.gandha.-
            puṣpa.phala.śāka.paṇyānāṃ kāṣṭha.veṇu.māṃsa.vallūrāṇāṃ ca gṛhṇīyuḥ,
            danta.ajinasya-ardham | 14 |

hiraṇya.karaṃ karmaṇyān āhārayeyuḥ, na ca-eṣāṃ kañcid
            aparādhaṃ parihareyuḥ | 24 |

kukkuṭa.sūkaram ardhaṃ dadyāt, kṣudra.paśavaḥ ṣaḍ.bhāgam,
            go.mahiṣa.aśvatara.khara.uṣṭrāś ca daśa.bhāgam | 27 |

tasya-akaraṇe vā samāhartā kāryam apadiśya paura.jānapadān
            bhikṣeta | 31 |

sārato vā hiraṇyam āḍhyān yāceta, yathā.upakāraṃ vā, sva.vaśā
            vā yad upahareyuḥ | 35 |

pāṣaṇḍa.saṅgha.dravyam aśrotriya.upabhogyaṃ deva.dravyaṃ vā
            kṛtya.karāḥ pretasya dagdha.gṛhasya vā haste nyastam ity upahareyuḥ | 37 |

devatā.adhyakṣo durga.rāṣṭra.devatānāṃ yathā.svam ekasthaṃ
            kośaṃ kuryāt, tathaiva ca-upaharet | 38 |

daivata.caityaṃ siddha.puṇya.sthānam aupapādikaṃ vā rātrāv
            utthāpya yātrā.samājābhyām ājīvet | 39 |

manuṣya.karaṃ vā vṛkṣe rakṣo.bhayaṃ prarūpayitvā
            siddha.vyañjanāḥ paura.jānapadānāṃ hiraṇyena pratikuryuḥ | 41 |

suruṅgā.yukte vā kūpe nāgam aniyata.śiraskaṃ
            hiraṇya.upahāreṇa darśayet | 42 |

nāga.pratimāyām antaś.channāyāṃ caityac.chidre
            valmīkac.chidre vā sarpa.darśanam āhāreṇa pratibaddha.sañjñaṃ kṛtvā śraddadhānānāṃ
            darśayet | 43 |

aśraddadhānānām ācamana.prokṣaṇeṣu rasam upacārya
            devatā.abhiśāpaṃ brūyāt, abhityaktaṃ vā daṃśayitvā | 44 |

sa yadā paṇya.mūlye nikṣepa.prayogair upacitaḥ syāt tadā-enaṃ
            rātrau moṣayet | 47 |

vaidehaka.vyañjano vā prakhyāta.vyavahāraḥ prahavaṇa.nimittaṃ
            yācitakam avakrītakaṃ vā rūpya.suvarṇa.bhāṇḍam anekaṃ gṛhṇīyāt | 49 |

samāje vā sarva.paṇya.sandohena prabhūtaṃ hiraṇya.suvarṇam
            ṛṇaṃ gṛhṇīyāt, pratibhāṇḍa.mūlyaṃ ca | 50 |

sādhvī.vyañjanābhiḥ strībhir dūṣyān unmādayitvā tāsām eva
            veśmasv abhigṛhya sarva.svāny āhareyuḥ | 52 |

dūṣya.kulyānāṃ vā vivāde pratyutpanne rasadāḥ praṇihitā rasaṃ
            dadyuḥ | 53 |

dūṣyam abhityakto vā śraddheya.apadeśaṃ paṇyaṃ
            hiraṇya.nikṣepam ṛṇa.prayogaṃ dāyaṃ vā yāceta | 55 |

dāsa.śabdena vā dūṣyam ālambeta, bhāryām asya snuṣāṃ
            duhitaraṃ vā dāsī.śabdena bhāryā.śabdena vā | 56 |

taṃ dūṣya.gṛha.pratidvāri rātrāv upaśayānam anyatra vā
            vasantaṃ tīkṣṇo hatvā brūyāt "hato 'yam artha.kāmukaḥ" iti | 57 |

siddha.vyañjano vā dūṣyaṃ jambhaka.vidyābhiḥ pralobhayitvā
            brūyāt "akṣaya.hiraṇyaṃ rāja.dvārikaṃ strī.hṛdayam ari.vyādhi.karam āyuṣyaṃ putrīyaṃ vā
            karma jānāmi" iti | 59 |

pratipannaṃ caitya.sthāne rātrau prabhūta.surā.māṃsa.gandham
            upahāraṃ kārayet | 60 |

eka.rūpaṃ ca-atra hiraṇyaṃ pūrva.nikhātaṃ preta.aṅgaṃ
            preta.śiśur vā yatra nihitaḥ syāt, tato hiraṇyam asya darśayed "atyalpam" iti ca brūyāt
            | 61 |

"prabhūta.hiraṇya.hetoḥ punar upahāraḥ kartavya iti svayam
            eva-etena hiraṇyena śvo.bhūte prabhūtam aupahārikaṃ krīṇīhi" iti | 62 |

mātṛ.vyañjanayā vā "putro me tvayā hataḥ" ity avakupitā syāt
            | 64 |

saṃsiddham eva-asya rātri.yāge vana.yāge vana.krīḍāyāṃ vā
            pravṛttāyāṃ tīkṣṇā viśasya-abhityaktam atinayeyuḥ | 65 |

dūṣyasya vā bhṛtaka.vyañjano vetana.hiraṇye kūṭa.rūpaṃ
            prakṣipya prarūpayet | 66 |

karma.kara.vyañjano vā gṛhe karma kurvāṇaḥ
            stena.kūṭa.rūpa.kāraka.upakaraṇam upanidadhyāt, cikitsaka.vyañjano vā garam
            agada.apadeśena | 67 |

pratyāsanno vā dūṣyasya sattrī praṇihitam abhiṣeka.bhāṇḍam
            amitra.śāsanaṃ ca kāpaṭika.mukhena-ācakṣīta, kāraṇaṃ ca brūyāt | 68 |
evaṃ dūṣyeṣv adhārmikeṣu ca varteta, na-itareṣu | 69 |
pakvaṃ pakvam iva-ārāmāt phalaṃ rājyād avāpnuyāt |
Chapter 3 (Section 91): The Salaries of State Servants

durga.jana.pada.śaktyā bhṛtya.karma samudaya.pādena
            sthāpayet, kārya.sādhana.sahena vā bhṛtya.lābhena | 1 |

kuśīlavās tv ardha.tṛtīya.śatāḥ, dvi.guṇa.vetanāś ca-eṣāṃ
            tūrya.karāḥ | 15 |

ācāryā vidyāvantaś ca pūjā.vetanāni yathā.arhaṃ labheran
            pañca.śata.avaraṃ sahasra.param | 18 |

daśa.paṇiko yojane dūto madhyamaḥ, daśa.uttare
            dvi.guṇa.vetana ā.yojana.śatād iti | 19 |

śata.varga.sahasra.vargāṇām adhyakṣā bhakta.vetana.lābham
            ādeśaṃ vikṣepaṃ ca kuryuḥ | 25 |

alpa.kośaḥ kupya.paśu.kṣetrāṇi dadyāt, alpaṃ ca hiraṇyam | 31
            |

śūnyaṃ vā niveśayitum abhyutthito hiraṇyam eva dadyāt, na
            grāmaṃ grāma.sañjāta.vyavahāra.sthāpana.artham | 32 |

etena bhṛtānām abhṛtānāṃ ca vidyā.karmabhyāṃ
            bhakta.vetana.viśeṣaṃ ca kuryāt | 33 |

patty.aśva.ratha.dvipāḥ sūrya.udaye bahiḥ
            sandhi.divasa.varjaṃ śilpa.yogyāḥ kuryuḥ | 35 |

teṣu rājā nitya.yuktaḥ syāt, abhīkṣṇaṃ ca-eṣāṃ śilpa.darśanaṃ
            kuryāt | 36 |

sārthikānāṃ śastra.āvaraṇam anta.pālā gṛhṇīyuḥ, samudram
            avacārayeyur vā | 41 |

tato vaidehaka.vyañjanāḥ sarva.paṇyāny āyudhīyebhyo
            yātrā.kāle dvi.guṇa.pratyādeyāni dadyuḥ | 43 |
Chapter 4 (Section 92): Conduct Proper for a Dependant

yaṃ vā manyeta "yathā-aham āśraya.īpsur evam asau
            vinaya.īpsur ābhigāmika.guṇa.yuktaḥ" iti, dravya.prakṛti.hīnam apy enam āśrayeta, na tv
            eva-anātma.sampannam | 2 |

anātmavā hi nīti.śāstra.dveṣād anarthya.saṃyogād vā
            prāpya-api mahad aiśvaryaṃ na bhavati | 3 |

mati.karmasu pṛṣṭhas tadātve ca-āyatyāṃ ca
            dharma.artha.saṃyuktaṃ samarthaṃ pravīṇavad apariṣad.bhīruḥ kathayet | 6 |

īpsitaḥ paṇeta "dharma.artha.anuyogam aviśiṣṭeṣu
            balavat.saṃyukteṣu daṇḍa.dhāraṇaṃ mat.saṃyoge tadātve ca daṇḍa.dhāraṇam iti na kuryāḥ,
            pakṣaṃ vṛttiṃ guhyaṃ ca me na-upahanyāḥ, sañjñayā ca tvāṃ kāma.krodha.daṇḍaneṣu
            vārayeyam" iti | 7 |

ādiṣṭaḥ pradiṣṭāyāṃ bhūmāv anujñātaḥ praviśet, upaviśec ca
            pārśvataḥ sannikṛṣṭa.viprakṛṣṭaḥ para.āsanam | 8 |

vigṛhya kathanam asabhyam apratyakṣam aśraddheyam anṛtaṃ ca
            vākyam uccair anarmaṇi hāsaṃ vāta.ṣṭhīvane ca śabdavatī na kuryāt | 9 |

mithaḥ kathanam anyena, jana.vāde dvandva.kathanam, rājño
            veṣam uddhata.kuhakānāṃ ca, ratna.atiśaya.prakāśa.abhyarthanam, eka.akṣy.oṣṭha.nirbhogaṃ
            bhrukuṭī.karma vākya.avakṣepaṇaṃ ca bruvati, balavat saṃyukta.virodham, strībhiḥ
            strī.darśibhiḥ sāmanta.dūtair dveṣya.pakṣa.avakṣiptān arthyaiś ca pratisaṃsargam
            eka.artha.caryāṃ saṅghātaṃ ca varjayet | 10 |
pṛṣṭaḥ priya.hitaṃ brūyān na brūyād ahitaṃ priyam |

tūṣṇīṃ vā prativākye syād veṣya.ādīṃś ca na varṇayet
              |

apriyā api dakṣāḥ syus tad.bhāvād ye bahiṣ.kṛtāḥ || 13
              ||
parāt saṅkrāmayed ghoraṃ na ca ghoraṃ pare vadet |
ātma.rakṣā hi satataṃ pūrvaṃ kāryā vijānatā |
agnāv iva hi samproktā vṛttī rājā-upajīvinām || 16 ||
eka.deśaṃ dahed agniḥ śarīraṃ vā paraṃ gataḥ |
sa-putra.dāraṃ rājā tu ghātayed ardhayeta vā || 17 ||
Chapter 5 (Section 93): Proper Behaviour of a Courtier

ābhyantaraṃ bāhyaṃ guhyaṃ prakāśyam ātyayikam upekṣitavyaṃ vā
            kāryaṃ "idam evam" iti viśeṣayec ca | 2 |

āsannaś ca-asya vyasana.upaghāte prayateta,
            para.upajāpa.atisandhāna.upadhibhyaś ca rakṣet | 4 |

darśane prasīdati, vākyaṃ pratigṛhṇāti, āsanaṃ dadāti,
            vivikto darśayate, śaṅkā.sthāne na-atiśaṅkate, kathāyāṃ ramate, parijñāpyeṣv avekṣate,
            pathyam uktaṃ sahate, smayamāno niyuṅkte, hastena spṛśati, ślāghye na-upahasati,
            parokṣaṃ guṇaṃ bravīti, bhakṣyeṣu smarati, saha vihāraṃ yāti, vyasane 'bhyupapadyate,
            tad.bhaktīn pūjayati, guhyam ācaṣṭe, mānaṃ vardhayati, arthaṃ karoti, anarthaṃ
            pratihanti - iti tuṣṭa.jñānam | 7 |
etad eva viparītam atuṣṭasya, bhūyaś ca vakṣyāmaḥ | 8 |

sandarśane kopaḥ, vākyasya-aśravaṇa.pratiṣedhau,
            āsana.cakṣuṣor adānam, varṇa.svara.bhedaḥ, eka.akṣi.bhrukuṭy.oṣṭha.nirbhogaḥ,
            sveda.śvāsa.smitānām asthāna.utpattiḥ, para.mantraṇam, akasmād.vrajanam, vardhanam
            anyasya, bhūmi.gātra.vilekhanam, anyasya-upatodanam, vidyā.varṇa.deśa.kutsā,
            sama.doṣa.nindā, pratidoṣa.nindā, pratiloma.stavaḥ, sukṛta.anavekṣaṇam,
            duṣkṛta.anukīrtanam, pṛṣṭha.avadhānam, atityāgaḥ, mithyā.abhibhāṣaṇam, rāja.darśināṃ ca
            tad.vṛtta.anyatvam | 9 |

"ayam uccaiḥ siñcati" iti kātyāyanaḥ pravavrāja, "krauñco
            'pasavyam" iti kaṇiṅko bhāradvājaḥ, "tṛṇam" iti dīrghaś cārāyaṇaḥ, "śītā śāṭī" iti
            ghoṭa.mukhaḥ, "hastī pratyaukṣīt" iti kiñjalkaḥ, "ratha.aśvaṃ prāśaṃsīt" iti piśunaḥ,
            prati.ravaṇe śunaḥ piśuna.putraḥ | 11 |

svāmi.śīlam ātmanaś ca kilbiṣam upalabhya vā pratikurvīta |
            13 |
tato bhartari jīve vā mṛte vā punar āvrajet || 15 ||

Chapter 6 (Sections 94; 95): Continuance of the Kingdom; Continuous
            Sovereignty

prāg eva maraṇa.ābādha.bhayād rājñaḥ priya.hita.upagraheṇa
            māsa.dvi.māsa.antaraṃ darśanaṃ sthāpayed "deśa.pīḍā.apaham amitra.apaham āyuṣyaṃ
            putrīyaṃ vā karma rājā sādhayati" ity apadeśena | 2 |

rāja.vyañjanam arūpa.velāyāṃ prakṛtīnāṃ darśayet,
            mitra.amitra.dūtānāṃ ca | 3 |
taiś ca yathā.ucitāṃ sambhāṣām amātya.mukho gacchet | 4 |

apakāriṣu ca heḍaṃ prasādaṃ vā prakṛti.kāntaṃ darśayet,
            prasādam eva-upakāriṣu | 6 |

āpta.puruṣa.adhiṣṭhitau durga.pratyantasthau vā kośa.daṇḍāv
            ekasthau kārayet, kulya.kumāra.mukhyāṃś ca-anya.apadeśena | 7 |

yaś ca mukhyaḥ pakṣavān durga.aṭavīstho vā vaiguṇyaṃ bhajeta
            tam upagrāhayet | 8 |
bahv.ābādhaṃ vā yātrāṃ preṣayet, mitra.kulaṃ vā | 9 |

yasmāc ca sāmantād ābādhaṃ paśyet tam
            utsava.vivāha.hasti.bandhana.aśva.paṇya.bhūmi.pradāna.- apadeśena-avagrāhayet,
            sva.mitreṇa vā | 10 |

kulya.kumāra.mukhya.upagrahaṃ kṛtvā vā kumāram abhiṣiktam eva
            darśayet | 14 |

dāṇḍa.karmikavad vā rājya.kaṇṭakān uddhṛtya rājyaṃ kārayet |
            15 |

yadi vā kaścin mukhyaḥ sāmanta.ādīnām anyatamaḥ kopaṃ bhajeta
            taṃ "ehi, rājānaṃ tvā kariṣyāmi" ity āvāhayitvā ghātayet | 16 |

yuva.rāje vā krameṇa rājya.bhāram āropya rāja.vyasanaṃ
            khyāpayet | 18 |

para.bhūmau rāja.vyasane mitreṇa-amitra.vyañjanena śatroḥ
            sandhim avasthāpya-apagacchet | 19 |
evam eka.aiśvaryam amātyaḥ kārayed iti kauṭilyaḥ | 23 |

"pramriyamāṇe vā rājany amātyaḥ kulya.kumāra.mukhyān
            parasparaṃ mukhyeṣu vā vikramayet | 25 |

kulya.kumāra.mukhyān upāṃśu.daṇḍena vā sādhayitvā svayaṃ
            rājyaṃ gṛhṇīyāt | 27 |

rājya.kāraṇādd hi pitā putrān putrāś ca pitaram
            abhidruhyanti, kim aṅga punar amātya.prakṛtir hy eka.pragraho rājyasya | 28 |

"svayam ārūḍhā hi strī tyajyamānā-abhiśapati" iti
            loka.pravādaḥ | 30 |
kālaś ca sakṛd abhyeti yaṃ naraṃ kāla.kāṅkṣiṇam |

durlabhaḥ sa punas tasya kālaḥ karma cikīrṣataḥ || 31
              ||

prakṛti.kopakam adharmiṣṭham anaikāntikaṃ ca-etad iti
            kauṭilyaḥ | 32 |

sampanna.abhāve 'vyasaninaṃ kumāraṃ rāja.kanyāṃ garbhiṇīṃ
            devīṃ vā puras.kṛtya mahā.mātrān sannipātya brūyāt "ayaṃ vo nikṣepaḥ, pitaram
            asya-avekṣadhvaṃ sattva.abhijanam ātmanaś ca, dhvaja.mātro 'yaṃ bhavanta eva svāminaḥ,
            kathaṃ vā kriyatām" iti | 34 |

tathā bruvāṇaṃ yoga.puruṣā brūyuḥ "ko 'nyo bhavat.purogād
            asmād rājñaś cāturvarṇyam arhati pālayitum" iti | 35 |

"tathā" ity amātyaḥ kumāraṃ rāja.kanyāṃ garbhiṇīṃ devīṃ
            vā-adhikurvīta, bandhu.sambandhināṃ mitra.amitra.dūtānāṃ ca darśayet | 36 |

bhakta.vetana.viśeṣam amātyānām āyudhīyānāṃ ca kārayet,
            "bhūyaś ca-ayaṃ vṛddhaḥ kariṣyati" iti brūyāt | 37 |

evaṃ durga.rāṣṭra.mukhyān ābhāṣeta, yathā.arhaṃ ca
            mitra.amitra.pakṣam | 38 |

mātuś citta.kṣobha.bhayāt kulyam alpa.sattvaṃ chātraṃ ca
            lakṣaṇyam upanidadhyāt | 41 |

na ca-ātma.arthaṃ kañcid utkṛṣṭam upabhogaṃ kārayet | 43
            |
Book 6: The Circle of Kings as the Basis

mahā.kulīno daiva.buddhi.sattva.sampanno vṛddha.darśī
            dhārmikaḥ satya.vāg avisaṃvādakaḥ kṛtajñaḥ sthūla.lakṣo mahā.utsāho 'dīrgha.sūtraḥ
            śakya.sāmanto dṛḍha.buddhir akṣudra.pariṣatko vinaya.kāma ity ābhigāmikā guṇāḥ | 3 |

vāgmī pragalbhaḥ smṛti.mati.balavān udagraḥ sv.avagrahaḥ
            kṛta.śilpo 'vyasano daṇḍa.nāyy upakāra.apakārayor dṛṣṭa.pratīkārī hrīmān āpat.prakṛtyor
            viniyoktā dīrgha.dūra.darśī deśa.kāla.puruṣa.kāra.kārya.pradhānaḥ
            sandhi.vikrama.tyāga.samyama.paṇa.parac.chidra.vibhāgī saṃvṛto
            'dīna.abhihāsya.jihma.bhrukuṭī.kṣaṇaḥ
            kāma.krodha.lobha.stambha.cāpala.upatāpa.paiśunya.hīnaḥ śaklaḥ smita.udagra.abhibhāṣī
            vṛddha.upadeśa.ācāra ity ātma.sampat | 6 |

madhye ca-ante ca sthānavān ātma.dhāraṇaḥ para.dhāraṇaś
            ca-āpadi sva.ārakṣaḥ sva.ājīvaḥ śatru.dveṣī śakya.sāmantaḥ
            paṅka.pāṣāṇa.uṣara.viṣama.kaṇṭaka.śreṇī.vyāla.mṛga.aṭavī.hīnaḥ kāntaḥ
            sītā.khani.dravya.hasti.vanavān gavyaḥ pauruṣeyo gupta.gocaraḥ paśumān adeva.mātṛko
            vāri.sthala.pathābhyām upetaḥ sāra.citra.bahu.paṇyo daṇḍa.kara.sahaḥ karma.śīla.karṣako
            'bāliśa.svāmy.avara.varṇa.prāyo bhakta.śuci.manuṣya iti jana.pada.sampat | 8 |

dharma.adhigataḥ pūrvaiḥ svayaṃ vā hema.rūpya.prāyaś
            citra.sthūla.ratna.hiraṇyo dīrghām apy āpadam anāyatiṃ saheta-iti kośa.sampat | 10 |

pitṛ.paitāmaho nityo vaśyas tuṣṭa.bhṛta.putra.dāraḥ pravāseṣv
            avisaṃvāditaḥ sarvatra-apratihato duḥkha.saho bahu.yuddhaḥ
            sarva.yuddha.praharaṇa.vidyā.viśāradaḥ saha.vṛddhi.kṣayikatvād advaidhyaḥ kṣatra.prāya
            iti daṇḍa.sampat | 11 |

pitṛ.paitāmahaṃ nityaṃ vaśyam advaidhyaṃ
            mahal.laghu.samuttham iti mitra.sampat | 12 |

arāja.bījī lubdhaḥ kṣudra.pariṣatko virakta.prakṛtir
            anyāya.vṛttir ayukto vyasanī nirutsāho daiva.pramāṇo yat.kiñcana.kārya.gatir
            ananubandhaḥ klībo nitya.apakārī ca-ity amitra.sampat | 13 |
evaṃ.bhūto hi śatruḥ sukhaḥ samucchettuṃ bhavati | 14 |

vivṛddhāś ca-anuraktāś ca prakṛtīr hanty anātmavān || 16
              ||

hanyate vā prakṛtibhir yāti vā dviṣatāṃ vaśam || 17
              ||

nayajñaḥ pṛthivīṃ kṛtsnāṃ jayaty eva na hīyate || 18
              ||
kṣayaḥ sthānaṃ vṛddhir ity udayās tasya | 5 |

ari.sampad.yuktaḥ sāmantaḥ śatruḥ, vyasanī yātavyaḥ,
            anapāśrayo durbala.āśrayo vā-ucchedanīyaḥ, viparyaye pīḍanīyaḥ karśanīyo vā | 16 |

tasmān mitram ari.mitraṃ mitra.mitram ari.mitra.mitraṃ
            ca-ānantaryeṇa bhūmīnāṃ prasajyante purastāt, paścāt pārṣṇi.grāha ākrandaḥ
            pārṣṇi.grāha.āsāra ākranda.āsāraḥ | 18 |

bhūmy.anantaraḥ prakṛti.mitraḥ, tulya.abhijanaḥ sahajaḥ,
            viruddho virodhayitā vā kṛtrimaḥ | 19 |

bhūmy.eka.antaraṃ prakṛti.mitram, mātā.pitṛ.sambaddhaṃ
            sahajam, dhana.jīvita.hetor āśritaṃ kṛtrimam | 20 |

ari.vijigīṣvor bhūmy.anantaraḥ saṃhata.asaṃhatayor
            anugraha.samartho nigrahe ca-asaṃhatayor madhyamaḥ | 21 |

ari.vijigīṣu.madhyānāṃ bahiḥ prakṛtibhyo balavattaraḥ
            saṃhata.asaṃhatānām ari.vijigīṣu.madhyamānām anugraha.samartho nigrahe ca-asaṃhatānām
            udāsīnaḥ | 22 |

vijigīṣur mitraṃ mitra.mitraṃ vā-asya prakṛtayas tisraḥ | 24
            |

tāḥ pañcabhir amātya.jana.pada.durga.kośa.daṇḍa.prakṛtibhir
            eka.ekaśaḥ samyuktā maṇḍalam aṣṭādaśakaṃ bhavati | 25 |

dvādaśa rāja.prakṛtayaḥ ṣaṣṭir dravya.prakṛtayaḥ, saṅkṣepeṇa
            dvi.saptatiḥ | 28 |

śaktis trividhā - jñāna.balaṃ mantra.śaktiḥ, kośa.daṇḍa.balaṃ
            prabhu.śaktiḥ, vikrama.balam utsāha.śaktiḥ | 33 |

evaṃ siddhis trividhā-eva - mantra.śakti.sādhyā
            mantra.siddhiḥ, prabhu.śakti.sādhyā prabhu.siddhiḥ, utsāha.śakti.sādhyā utsāha.siddhiḥ |
            34 |

tābhir abhyuccito jyāyān bhavati, apacito hīnaḥ, tulya.śaktiḥ
            samaḥ | 35 |

tasmāt-śaktiṃ siddhiṃ ca ghaṭeta-ātmany āveśayitum, sādhāraṇo
            vā dravya.prakṛtiṣv ānantaryeṇa śauca.vaśena vā | 36 |

yadi vā paśyet "amitro me śakti.yukto
            vāg.daṇḍa.pāruṣya.artha.dūṣaṇaiḥ prakṛtīr upahaniṣyati, siddhi.yukto vā
            mṛgayā.dyūta.madya.strībhiḥ pramādaṃ gamiṣyati, sa virakta.prakṛtir upakṣīṇaḥ pramatto
            vā sādhyo me bhaviṣyati, vigraha.abhiyukto vā sarva.sandohena-ekastho 'durgastho vā
            sthāsyati, sa saṃhata.sainyo mitra.durga.viyuktaḥ sādhyo me bhaviṣyati, "balavān vā rājā
            parataḥ śatrum ucchettu.kāmaḥ tam ucchidya mām ucchindyād" iti balavatā prārthitasya me
            vipanna.karma.ārambhasya vā sāhāyyaṃ dāsyati", madhyama.lipsāyāṃ ca, ity evaṃ.ādiṣu
            kāraṇeṣv amitrasya-api śaktiṃ siddhiṃ ca-icchet | 38 |
nemim eka.antarān rājñaḥ kṛtvā ca-anantarān arān |
madhye hy upahitaḥ śatrur netur mitrasya ca-ubhayoḥ |
ucchedyaḥ pīḍanīyo vā balavān api jāyate || 40 ||
Book 7: The Six Measures of Foreign Policy

Chapter 1 (Sections 98; 99): Enumeration of the Six Measures; Use of
            Measures in Decline, Stable Condition and Advancement

"na māṃ paro na-ahaṃ param upahantuṃ śaktaḥ" ity āsīta | 15
            |

teṣāṃ yasmin vā guṇe sthitaḥ paśyet "iha.sthaḥ śakṣyāmi
            durga.setu.karma.vaṇik.patha.śūnya.niveśa.khani.dravya.hasti.vana.karmāṇy ātmanaḥ
            pravartayitum, parasya ca-etāni karmāṇy upahantum" iti tam ātiṣṭhet | 20 |

"āśutarā me vṛddhir bhūyastarā vṛddhy.udayatarā vā
            bhaviṣyati, viparītā parasya" iti jñātvā para.vṛddhim upekṣeta | 22 |

yasmin vā guṇe sthitaḥ sva.karmaṇām upaghātaṃ paśyen
            na-itarasya tasmin na tiṣṭhet | 24 |

"ciratareṇa-alpataraṃ vṛddhy.udayataraṃ vā kṣeṣye, viparītaṃ
            paraḥ" iti jñātvā kṣayam upekṣeta | 26 |

yasmin vā guṇe sthitaḥ sva.karma.vṛddhiṃ kṣayaṃ vā
            na-abhipaśyed etat.sthānam | 28 |

"hrasvataraṃ vṛddhy.udayataraṃ vā sthāsyāmi, viparītaṃ paraḥ"
            iti jñātvā sthānam upekṣeta | 29 |

"tulya.kāla.phala.udaye vā sthāne sandhim upeyād" ity ācāryāḥ
            | 30 |

yadi vā paśyet "sandhau sthito mahā.phalaiḥ sva.karmabhiḥ
            para.karmāṇy upahaniṣyāmi, mahā.phalāni vā sva.karmāṇy upabhokṣye, para.karmāṇi vā,
            sandhi.viśvāsena vā yoga.upaniṣat.praṇidhibhiḥ para.karmāṇy upahaniṣyāmi, sukhaṃ vā
            sa.anugraha.parihāra.saukaryaṃ phala.lābha.bhūyastvena sva.karmaṇāṃ
            para.karma.yoga.āvahaṃ janam āsrāvayiṣyāmi -

balinā-atimātreṇa vā saṃhitaḥ paraḥ sva.karma.upaghātaṃ
            prāpsyati, yena vā vigṛhīto mayā.sandhatte tena-asya vigrahaṃ dīrghaṃ kariṣyāmi, mayā vā
            saṃhitasya mad.dveṣiṇo jana.padaṃ pīḍayiṣyati -

para.upahato vā-asya jana.pado mām āgamiṣyati, tataḥ karmasu
            vṛddhiṃ prāpsyāmi, vipanna.karma.ārambho vā viṣamasthaḥ paraḥ karmasu na me vikrameta
            -

parataḥ pravṛtta.karma.ārambho vā tābhyāṃ saṃhitaḥ karmasu
            vṛddhiṃ prāpsyāmi, śatru.pratibaddhaṃ vā śatruṇā sandhiṃ kṛtvā maṇḍalaṃ bhetsyāmi -

bhinnam avāpsyāmi, daṇḍa.anugraheṇa vā śatrum upagṛhya
            maṇḍala.lipsāyāṃ vidveṣaṃ grāhayiṣyāmi, vidviṣṭaṃ tena-eva ghātayiṣyāmi" iti sandhinā
            vṛddhim ātiṣṭhet | 32 |

yadi vā paśyet "āyudhīya.prāyaḥ śreṇī.prāyo vā me jana.padaḥ
            śaila.vana.nadī.durga.eka.dvāra.ārakṣo vā śakṣyati para.abhiyogaṃ pratihantum,
            viṣaya.ante durgam aviṣahyam apāśrito vā śakṣyāmi para.karmāṇy upahantuṃ -

vyasana.pīḍa.upahata.utsāho vā paraḥ
            samprāpta.karma.upaghāta.kālaḥ, vigṛhītasya-anyato vā śakṣyāmi jana.padam apavāhayitum"
            iti vigrahe sthito vṛddhim ātiṣṭhet | 33 |

yadi vā manyeta "na me śaktaḥ paraḥ karmāṇy upahantuṃ na-ahaṃ
            tasya karma.upaghātī vā, vyasanam asya, śva.varāhayor iva kalahe vā,
            sva.karma.anuṣṭhāna.paro vā vardhiṣye" ity āsanena vṛddhim ātiṣṭhet | 34 |

yadi vā manyeta "yāna.sādhyaḥ karma.upaghātaḥ śatroḥ,
            prativihita.sva.karma.ārakṣaś ca-asmi" iti yānena vṛddhim ātiṣṭhet | 35 |

yadi vā manyeta "na-asmi śaktaḥ para.karmāṇy upahantum,
            sva.karma.upaghātaṃ vā trātum" iti, balavantam āśritaḥ sva.karma.anuṣṭhānena kṣayāt
            sthānaṃ sthānād vṛddhiṃ ca-ākāṅkṣeta | 36 |

yadi vā manyeta "sandhinā-ekataḥ sva.karmāṇi pravartayiṣyāmi,
            vigraheṇa-ekataḥ para.karmāṇy upahaniṣyāmi" iti dvaidhī.bhāvena vṛddhim ātiṣṭhet | 37
            |
evaṃ ṣaḍbhir guṇair etaiḥ sthitaḥ prakṛti.maṇḍale |

paryeṣeta kṣayāt sthānaṃ sthānād vṛddhiṃ ca karmasu || 38
              ||

dvaidhī.bhūto hi sva.karma.pradhāna ātmana eva-upakaroti,
            saṃśritas tu parasya-upakaroti, na-ātmanaḥ | 5 |

tad.viśiṣṭa.bala.abhāve tam eva-āśritaḥ kośa.daṇḍa.bhūmīnām
            anyatamena-asya-upakartum adṛṣṭaḥ prayateta | 7 |

yadā ca-asya prāṇa.haraṃ vyādhim antaḥ.kopaṃ śatru.vṛddhiṃ
            mitra.vyasanam upasthitaṃ vā tan.nimittām ātmanaś ca vṛddhiṃ paśyet tadā
            sambhāvya.vyādhi.dharma.kārya.apadeśena-apayāyāt | 10 |

balīyasor vā madhya.gatas trāṇa.samartham āśrayeta, yasya
            vā-antardhiḥ syāt, ubhau vā | 13 |

bhedam ubhayor vā paraspara.apadeśaṃ prayuñjīta, bhinnayor
            upāṃśu.daṇḍam | 15 |

etayor anyataraṃ gacchaṃs tair eva-anyatarasya vyasane
            praharet | 20 |

dvābhyām upahato vā maṇḍala.apāśrayas tiṣṭhet, madhyamam
            udāsīnaṃ vā saṃśrayeta | 21 |

tena saha-ekam upagṛhya-itaram ucchindyād, ubhau vā | 22
            |

dvābhyām ucchinno vā madhyama.udāsīnayos tat.pakṣīyāṇāṃ vā
            rājñāṃ nyāya.vṛttim āśrayeta | 23 |

tulyānāṃ vā yasya prakṛtayaḥ sukhyeyur enam, yatrastho vā
            śaknuyād ātmānam uddhartum, yatra vā pūrva.puruṣa.ucitā gatir āsannaḥ sambandho vā,
            mitrāṇi bhūyāṃsy atiśaktimanti vā bhaveyuḥ | 24 |
priyo yasya bhaved yo vā priyo 'sya kataras tayoḥ |

priyo yasya sa taṃ gacched ity āśraya.gatiḥ parā || 25

vigṛhīto hi jyāyasā hastinā pāda.yuddham iva-abhyupaiti | 3
            |

samena ca-āmaṃ pātram āmena-ahatam iva-ubhayataḥ kṣayaṃ
            karoti | 4 |

jyāyāṃś cen na sandhim icched daṇḍa.upanata.vṛttam ābalīyasaṃ
            vā yogam ātiṣṭhet | 6 |

samaś cen na sandhim icched yāvan.mātram apakuryāt
            tāvan.mātram asya pratyapakuryāt | 7 |

hīnaś cet sarvatra-anupraṇatas tiṣṭhet sandhim upeyāt | 10
            |

āraṇyo 'gnir iva hi duḥkha.amarṣajaṃ tejo vikramayati | 11
            |

saṃhitaś cet "para.prakṛtayo lubdha.kṣīṇa.apacaritāḥ
            pratyādāna.bhayād vā na-upagacchanti" iti paśyedd hīno 'pi vigṛhṇīyāt | 13 |

vigṛhītaś cet "para.prakṛtayo lubdha.kṣīṇa.apacaritā
            vigraha.udvignā vā māṃ na-upagacchanti" iti paśyej jyāyān api sandhīyeta,

vyasana.yaugapadye 'pi "guru.vyasano 'smi, laghu.vyasanaḥ

            15 |

sandhi.vigrahayoś cet para.karśanam ātma.upacayaṃ vā

para.vyasanam apratikāryaṃ cet paśyedd hīno 'py abhiyāyāt |
            17 |

sandhinā-ekato vigraheṇa-ekataś cet kārya.siddhiṃ paśyej

              ||
ekena-anyatra yātavyaṃ svayaṃ daṇḍena vā-ity ayam |

mukhya.strī.bandhanaṃ kuryāt pūrvayoḥ paścime tv arim
              |

parikrayo bhavet sandhiḥ sa eva ca yathā.sukham || 27
              ||

              30 ||

sva.kāryāṇāṃ vaśena-ete deśe kāle ca bhāṣitāḥ |

viśeṣas tu - guṇa.ekadeśe sthānam, sva.vṛddhi.prāpty.artham
            āsanam, upāyānām aprayoga upekṣaṇam | 3 |

atisandhāna.kāmayor ari.vijigīṣvor upahantum aśaktayor
            vigṛhya-āsanaṃ sandhāya vā | 4 |

yadā vā paśyet "sva.daṇḍair mitra.aṭavī.daṇḍair vā samaṃ
            jyāyāṃsaṃ vā karśayitum utsahe" iti tadā kṛta.bāhya.abhyantara.kṛtyo vigṛhya-āsīta | 5
            |

yadā vā paśyet "utsāha.yuktā me prakṛtayaḥ saṃhatā vivṛddhāḥ
            sva.karmāṇy avyāhatāś cariṣyanti parasya vā karmāṇy upahaniṣyanti" iti tadā
            vigṛhya-āsīta | 6 |

yadā vā paśyet "parasya-apacaritāḥ kṣīṇā lubdhāḥ
            sva.cakra.stena.aṭavī.vyathitā vā prakṛtayaḥ svayam upajāpena vā mām eṣyanti, sampannā
            me vārttā, vipannā parasya, tasya prakṛtayo durbhikṣa.upahatā mām eṣyanti; vipannā me
            vārttā, sampannā parasya, -

taṃ me prakṛtayo na gamiṣyanti, vigṛhya ca-asya
            dhānya.paśu.hiraṇyāny āhariṣyāmi, sva.paṇya.upaghātīni vā para.paṇyāni nivartayiṣyāmi,
            -

para.vaṇik.pathād vā saravanti mām eṣyanti vigṛhīte,
            na-itaram, dūṣya.amitra.aṭavī.nigrahaṃ vā vigṛhīto na kariṣyati, tair eva vā vigrahaṃ
            prāpsyati, -

mitraṃ me mitra.bhāvy abhiprayāto bahv.alpa.kālaṃ
            tanu.kṣaya.vyayam arthaṃ prāpsyati, guṇavatīm ādeyāṃ vā bhūmim, -

sarva.sandohena vā mām anādṛtya prayātu.kāmaḥ kathaṃ na
            yāyād" iti para.vṛddhi.pratighāta.arthaṃ pratāpa.arthaṃ ca vigṛhya-āsīta | 7 |
"tam eva hi pratyāvṛtto grasate" ity ācāryāḥ | 8 |

karśana.mātram asya kuryād avyasaninaḥ, para.vṛddhyā tu
            vṛddhaḥ samucchedanam | 10 |

evaṃ parasya yātavyo 'smai sāhāyyam avinaṣṭaḥ prayacchet | 11
            |

yadā vā paśyet "vyasanī paraḥ, prakṛti.vyasanaṃ vā-asya
            śeeṣa.prakṛtibhir apratikāryam, sva.cakra.pīḍitā viraktā vā-asya prakṛtayaḥ karśitā
            nirutsāhāḥ parasparād vā bhinnāḥ śakyā lobhayitum,
            agny.udaka.vyādhi.maraka.durbhikṣa.nimittaṃ kṣīṇa.yugya.puruṣa.nicaya.rakṣā.vidhānaḥ
            paraḥ" iti tadā vigṛhya yāyāt | 15 |

yadā vā paśyet "mitram ākrandaś ca me
            śūra.vṛddha.anurakta.prakṛtiḥ, viparīta.prakṛtiḥ paraḥ pārṣṇi.grāhaś ca-āsāraś ca,
            śakṣyāmi mitreṇa-āsāram ākrandena pārṣṇi.grāhaṃ vā vigṛhya yātum" iti tadā vigṛhya yāyāt
            | 16 |

yadā vā phalam eka.hāryam alpa.kālaṃ paśyet tadā
            pārṣṇi.grāha.āsārābhyāṃ vigṛhya yāyāt | 17 |

yadā vā paśyet "na śakyam ekena yātum avaśyaṃ ca yātavyam"
            iti tadā sama.hīna.jyāyobhiḥ sāmavāyikaiḥ sambhūya yāyād, ekatra nirdiṣṭena-aṃśena,
            anekatra-anirdiṣṭena-aṃśena | 19 |

teṣām asamavāye daṇḍam anyatamasmān niviṣṭa.aṃśena yāceta |
            20 |

sambhūya.abhigamanena vā nirviśyeta, dhruve lābhe
            nirdiṣṭena-aṃśena, adhruve lābha.aṃśena | 21 |
vilopo vā yathā.lābhaṃ prakṣepa.sama eva vā || 22 ||

tulya.sāmanta.vyasane yātavyam amitraṃ vā-ity amitram
            abhiyāyāt, tat.siddhau yātavyam | 1 |

amitra.siddhau hi yātavyaḥ sāhāyyaṃ dadyān na-amitro
            yātavya.siddhau | 2 |

guru.vyasanaṃ yātavyaṃ laghu.vyasanam amitraṃ vā-iti
            "guru.vyasanaṃ saukaryato yāyād" ity ācāryāḥ | 3 |
laghv api hi vyasanam abhiyuktasya kṛcchraṃ bhavati | 6 |

anabhiyuktas tu laghu.vyasanaḥ sukhena vyasanaṃ
            pratikṛtya-amitro yātavyam abhisaret, pārṣṇiṃ vā gṛhṇīyāt | 8 |

yātavya.yaugapadye guru.vyasanaṃ nyāya.vṛttiṃ laghu.vyasanam
            anyāya.vṛttiṃ virakta.prakṛtiṃ vā-iti virakta.prakṛtiṃ yāyāt | 9 |

guru.vyasanaṃ nyāya.vṛttim abhiyuktaṃ prakṛtayo 'nugṛhṇanti,
            laghu.vyasanam anyāya.vṛttim upekṣante, viraktā balavantam apy ucchindanti | 10 |

kṣīṇa.lubdha.prakṛtim apacarita.prakṛtiṃ vā-iti
            kṣīṇa.lubdha.prakṛtiṃ yāyāt, kṣīṇa.lubdhā hi prakṛtayaḥ sukhena-upajāpaṃ pīḍāṃ
            vā-upagacchanti, na-apacaritāḥ pradhāna.avagraha.sādhyāḥ" ity ācāryāḥ | 12 |

kṣīṇa.lubdhā hi prakṛtayo bhartari snigdhā bhartṛ.hite
            tiṣṭhanti, upajāpaṃ vā visaṃvādayanti, anurāge sārvaguṇyam iti | 14 |

balavantam anyāya.vṛttiṃ durbalaṃ vā nyāya.vṛttim iti
            balavantam anyāya.vṛttiṃ yāyāt | 16 |

balavantam anyāya.vṛttim abhiyuktaṃ prakṛtayo na-anugṛhṇanti,
            niṣpātayanti, amitraṃ vā-asya bhajante | 17 |

durbalaṃ tu nyāya.vṛttim abhiyuktaṃ prakṛtayaḥ parigṛhṇanti,
            anuniṣpatanti vā | 18 |
avakṣepeṇa hi satām asatāṃ pragraheṇa ca |
akāryāṇāṃ ca karaṇaiḥ kāryāṇāṃ ca praṇāśanaiḥ |
apradānaiś ca deyānām adeyānāṃ ca sādhanaiḥ || 21 ||
adaṇḍanaiś ca daṇḍyānām adaṇḍyānāṃ ca daṇḍanaiḥ |
anarthyānāṃ ca karaṇair arthyānāṃ ca vighātanaiḥ |

arakṣaṇaiś ca corebhyaḥ svayaṃ ca parimoṣaṇaiḥ || 23
              ||
kṣīṇāḥ prakṛtayo lobhaṃ lubdhā yānti virāgatām |

viraktā yānty amitraṃ vā bhartāraṃ ghnanti vā svayam ||
              27 ||

tasmāt prakṛtīnāṃ kṣaya.lobha.virāga.kāraṇāni na-utpādayet,
            utpannāni vā sadyaḥ pratikurvīta | 28 |
kṣīṇā lubdhā viraktā vā prakṛtaya iti | 29 |

kṣīṇāḥ pīḍana.ucchedana.bhayāt sadyaḥ sandhiṃ yuddhaṃ
            niṣpatanaṃ vā rocayante | 30 |

tāsāṃ hiraṇya.dhānya.kṣayaḥ sarva.upaghātī kṛcchra.pratīkāraś
            ca, yugya.puruṣa.kṣayo hiraṇya.dhānya.sādhyaḥ | 33 |

lobha aikadeśiko mukhya.āyattaḥ para.artheṣu śakyaḥ
            pratihantum ādātuṃ vā | 34 |

niṣpradhānā hi prakṛtayo bhogyā bhavanty anupajāpyāś
            ca-anyeṣām, anāpat.sahās tu | 36 |

prakṛti.mukhya.pragrahais tu bahudhā bhinnā guptā bhavanty
            āpat.sahāś ca | 37 |

sāmavāyikānām api sandhi.vigraha.kāraṇāny avekṣya
            śakti.śauca.yuktaiḥ sambhūya yāyāt | 38 |

śaktimān hi pārṣṇi.grahaṇe yātrā.sāhāyya.dāne vā śaktaḥ,
            śuciḥ siddhau ca-asiddhau ca yathā.sthita.kārī-iti | 39 |

teṣāṃ jyāyasā-ekena dvābhyāṃ samābhyāṃ vā sambhūya yātavyam
            iti dvābhyāṃ samābhyāṃ śreyaḥ | 40 |

jyāyasā hy avagṛhītaś carati, samābhyām atisandhāna.ādhikye
            vā | 41 |

tau hi sukhau bhedayitum, duṣṭaś ca-eko dvābhyāṃ niyantuṃ
            bheda.upagrahaṃ ca-upagantum iti | 42 |

samena-ekena dvābhyāṃ hīnābhyāṃ vā-iti dvābhyāṃ hīnābhyāṃ
            śreyaḥ | 43 |
tau hi dvi.kārya.sādhakau vaśyau ca bhavataḥ | 44 |

kārya.siddhau tu - kṛta.arthāj jyāyaso gūḍhaḥ sa.apadeśam
              apasravet |
sattrād apasared yattaḥ kalatram apanīya vā |

samād api hi labdha.arthād viśvas tasya bhayaṃ bhavet ||
              46 ||
viśiṣṭād alpam apy aṃśaṃ labdhvā tuṣṭa.mukho vrajet |

anaṃśo vā tato 'sya-aṅke prahṛtya dvi.guṇaṃ haret || 48
              ||
kṛta.arthas tu svayaṃ netā visṛjet sāmavāyikān |

api jīyeta na jayen maṇḍala.iṣṭas tathā bhavet || 49
              ||
