            aham" ity etasmin viśeṣe paripaṇita.deśaṃ sandhim upeyāt | 8 |

yadi vā manyeta "pravarṣa.uṣṇa.śītam ativyādhi.prāyam
            upakṣīṇa.āhāra.upabhogaṃ sainya.vyāyāmānāṃ ca-auparodhikaṃ kārya.sādhanānām ūnam
            atiriktaṃ vā kālaṃ paraś ceṣṭiṣyate, viparītam aham" ity etasmin viśeṣe paripaṇita.kālaṃ
            sandhim upeyāt | 9 |

yadi vā manyeta "pratyādeyaṃ prakṛti.kopakaṃ dīrgha.kālaṃ
            mahā.kṣaya.vyayam alpam anartha.anubandham akalyam adharmyaṃ madhyama.udāsīna.viruddhaṃ
            mitra.upaghātakaṃ vā kāryaṃ paraḥ sādhayiṣyati, viparītam aham" ity etasmin viśeṣe
            paripaṇita.arthaṃ sandhim upeyāt | 10 |

evaṃ deśa.kālayoḥ kāla.kāryayor deśa.kāryayor
            deśa.kāla.kāryāṇāṃ ca-avasthāpanāt sapta.vidhaḥ paripaṇitaḥ | 11 |

tasmin prāg eva-ārabhya pratiṣṭhāpya ca sva.karmāṇi
            para.karmasu vikrameta | 12 |

vyasana.tvara.avamāna.ālasya.yuktam ajñaṃ vā śatrum
            atisandhātu.kāmo deśa.kāla.kāryāṇām anavasthāpanāt "saṃhitau svaḥ" iti sandhi.viśvāsena
            parac.chidram āsādya prahared ity aparipaṇitaḥ | 13 |

tato 'nyasya hared bhūmiṃ chittvā pakṣaṃ samantataḥ || 15
              ||

sandher akṛta.cikīrṣā kṛta.śleṣaṇaṃ kṛta.vidūṣaṇam
            avaśīrṇa.kriyā ca | 16 |

apūrvasya sandheḥ sa.anubandhaiḥ sāma.ādibhiḥ paryeṣaṇaṃ
            sama.hīna.jyāyasāṃ ca yathā.balam avasthāpanam akṛta.cikīrṣā | 19 |

kṛtasya priya.hitābhyām ubhayataḥ paripālanaṃ
            yathā.sambhāṣitasya ca nibandhanasya-anuvartanaṃ rakṣaṇaṃ ca "kathaṃ parasmān na
            bhidyeta" iti kṛta.śleṣaṇam | 20 |

bhṛtyena mitreṇa vā doṣa.apasṛtena pratisandhānam
            avaśīrṇa.kriyā | 22 |

tasyāṃ gata.āgataś catur.vidhaḥ - kāraṇād gata.āgato,
            viparītaḥ, kāraṇād gato 'kāraṇād āgato, viparītaś ca-iti | 23 |

svāmino doṣeṇa gato guṇena-āgataḥ parasya guṇena gato
            doṣeṇa-āgata iti kāraṇād gata.āgataḥ sandheyaḥ | 24 |

sva.doṣeṇa gata.āgato guṇam ubhayoḥ parityajya akāraṇād
            gata.āgataḥ cala.buddhir asandheyaḥ | 25 |

svāmino doṣeṇa gataḥ parasmāt sva.doṣeṇa-āgata iti kāraṇād
            gato 'kāraṇād āgataḥ tarkayitavyaḥ "para.prayuktaḥ svena vā doṣeṇa-apakartu.kāmaḥ,
            parasya-ucchettāram amitraṃ me jñātvā pratighāta.bhayād āgataḥ, paraṃ vā mām
            ucchettu.kāmaṃ parityajya-ānṛśaṃsyād āgataḥ" iti | 26 |

jñātvā kalyāṇa.buddhiṃ pūjayed, anyathā.buddhim apakṛṣṭaṃ
            vāsayet | 27 |

sva.doṣeṇa gataḥ para.doṣeṇa-āgata ity akāraṇād gataḥ kāraṇād
            āgataḥ tarkayitavyaḥ " chidraṃ me pūrayiṣyati, ucito 'yam asya vāsaḥ, paratra-asya jano
            na ramate, mitrair me saṃhitaḥ, śatrubhir vigṛhītaḥ, lubdha.krūrād āvignaḥ
            śatru.saṃhitād vā parasmāt" iti | 28 |

"kṛta.praṇāśaḥ śakti.hānir vidyā.paṇyatvam āśā.nirvedo
            deśa.laulyam aviśvāso balavad.vigraho vā parityāga.sthānam" ity ācāryāḥ | 30 |

iha-apakārī tyājyaḥ, para.apakārī sandheyaḥ, ubhaya.apakārī
            tarkayitavya iti samānam | 32 |

asandheyena tv avaśyaṃ sandhātavye yataḥ prabhāvas tataḥ
            pratividadhyāt | 33 |
vikramayed bhartari vā siddhaṃ vā daṇḍa.cāriṇam |
paṇyaṃ kuryād asiddhaṃ vā siddhaṃ vā tena saṃvṛtam |
atha vā śamayed enam āyaty.artham upāṃśunā |

āyatyāṃ ca vadha.prepsuṃ dṛṣṭvā hanyād gata.āgatam || 37
              ||
prakāśa.yuddhaṃ nirdiṣṭe deśe kāle ca vikramaḥ |

Chapter 7 (Section 113): Peace and War Connected with Dual
            Policy

sāmantaṃ sāmantena sambhūya yāyāt, yadi vā manyeta "pārṣṇiṃ
            me na grahīṣyati, pārṣṇi.grāhaṃ vārayiṣyati, yātavyaṃ na-abhisariṣyati, bala.dvaiguṇyaṃ
            me bhaviṣyati, vīvadha.āsārau me pravartayiṣyati, parasya vārayiṣyati, bahv.ābādhe me
            pathi kaṇṭakān mardayiṣyati, durga.aṭavy.apasāreṣu daṇḍena cariṣyati, yātavyam aviṣahye
            doṣe sandhau vā sthāpayiṣyati, labdha.lābha.aṃśo vā śatrūn anyān me viśvāsayiṣyati" iti
            | 2 |

dvaidhī.bhūto vā kośena daṇḍaṃ daṇḍena kośaṃ sāmantānām
            anyatamāl lipseta | 3 |

teṣāṃ jyāyaso 'dhikena-aṃśena samāt samena hīnādd hīnena-iti
            sama.sandhiḥ | 4 |

vyasaninam apāya.sthāne saktam anarthinaṃ vā jyāyāṃsaṃ hīno
            bala.samena lābhena paṇeta | 7 |

evaṃ.bhūto vā hīna.śakti.pratāpa.pūraṇa.arthaṃ
            sambhāvya.artha.abhisārī mūla.pārṣṇi.trāṇa.arthaṃ vā jyāyāṃsaṃ hīno bala.samād viśiṣṭena
            lābhena paṇeta | 9 |

jāta.vyasana.prakṛti.randhram upasthita.anarthaṃ vā jyāyāṃsaṃ
            hīno durga.mitra.pratiṣṭabdho vā hrasvam adhvānaṃ yātu.kāmaḥ śatrum ayuddham
            eka.anta.siddhiṃ vā lābham ādātu.kāmo bala.samādd hīnena lābhena paṇeta | 11 |

arandhra.vyasano vā jyāyān dur.ārabdha.karmāṇaṃ bhūyaḥ
            kṣaya.vyayābhyāṃ yoktu.kāmo dūṣya.daṇḍaṃ pravāsayitu.kāmo dūṣya.daṇḍam āvāhayitu.kāmo vā
            pīḍanīyam ucchedanīyaṃ vā hīnena vyathayitu.kāmaḥ sandhi.pradhāno vā kalyāṇa.buddhir
            hīnaṃ lābhaṃ pratigṛhṇīyāt | 13 |
evaṃ samaḥ samam atisandadhyād anugṛhṇīyād vā | 15 |

para.anīkasya pratyanīkaṃ mitra.aṭavīnāṃ vā, śatror
            vibhūmīnāṃ deśikaṃ mūla.pārṣṇi.trāṇa.arthaṃ vā samo bala.samena lābhena paṇeta | 16
            |

jāta.vyasana.prakṛti.randhram aneka.viruddham anyato
            labhamāno vā samo bala.samādd hīnena lābhena paṇeta | 18 |

evaṃ.bhūto vā samaḥ sāmanta.āyatta.kāryaḥ kartavya.balo vā
            bala.samād viśiṣṭena lābhena paṇeta | 20 |

jāta.vyasana.prakṛti.randhram abhihantu.kāmaḥ sv.ārabdham
            eka.anta.siddhiṃ vā-asya karma.upahantu.kāmo mūle yātrāyāṃ vā prahartu.kāmo
            yātavyād.bhūyo labhamāno vā jyāyāṃsaṃ hīnaṃ samaṃ vā bhūyo yāceta | 22 |

bhūyo vā yācitaḥ sva.bala.rakṣā.arthaṃ durdharṣam anya.durgam
            āsāram aṭavīṃ vā para.daṇḍena marditu.kāmaḥ prakṛṣṭe 'dhvani kāle vā para.daṇḍaṃ
            kṣaya.vyayābhyāṃ yoktu.kāmaḥ para.daṇḍena vā vivṛddhas tam eva-ucchettu.kāmaḥ
            para.daṇḍam ādātu.kāmo vā bhūyo dadyāt | 23 |

jyāyān vā hīnaṃ yātavya.apadeśena haste kartu.kāmaḥ param
            ucchidya vā tam eva-ucchettu.kāmaḥ, tyāgaṃ vā kṛtvā pratyādātu.kāmo bala.samād viśiṣṭena
            lābhena paṇeta | 24 |

yātavya.saṃhito vā tiṣṭhet, dūṣya.amitra.aṭavī.daṇḍaṃ
            vā-asmai dadyāt | 26 |

jāta.vyasana.prakṛti.randhro vā jyāyān hīnaṃ bala.samena
            lābhena paṇeta | 27 |

evaṃ.bhūtaṃ hīnaṃ jyāyān bala.samādd hīnena lābhena paṇeta |
            29 |
ādau budhyeta paṇitaḥ paṇamānaś ca kāraṇam |

tato vitarkya.ubhayato yataḥ śreyaś tato vrajet || 31
              ||

Chapter 8 (Sections 114; 115): Conduct of the King about to be
            Attacked; Allies Fit to be Helped

yātavyo 'bhiyāsyamānaḥ sandhi.kāraṇam ādātu.kāmo vihantu.kāmo
            vā sāmavāyikānām anyatamaṃ lābha.dvaiguṇyena paṇeta | 1 |

durārabdha.karmāṇaṃ bhūyaḥ kṣaya.vyayābhyāṃ yoktu.kāmaḥ
            sv.ārabdhāṃ vā yātrā.siddhiṃ vighātayitu.kāmo mūle yātrāyāṃ vā prahartu.kāmo
            yātavya.saṃhitaḥ punar yācitu.kāmaḥ pratyutpanna.artha.kṛcchras tasminn aviśvasto vā
            tadātve lābham alpam icchet, āyatyāṃ prabhūtam | 5 |

mitra.upakāram amitra.upaghātam artha.anubandham avekṣamāṇaḥ
            pūrva.upakārakaṃ kārayitu.kāmo bhūyas tadātve mahāntaṃ lābham utsṛjya-āyatyām alpam
            icchet | 6 |

dūṣya.amitrābhyāṃ mūla.hareṇa vā jyāyasā vigṛhītaṃ
            trātu.kāmas tathā.vidham upakāraṃ kārayitu.kāmaḥ sambandha.avekṣī vā tadātve ca-āyatyāṃ
            ca lābhaṃ na pratigṛhṇīyāt | 7 |

kṛta.sandhir atikramitu.kāmaḥ parasya prakṛti.karśanaṃ
            mitra.amitra.sandhi.viśleṣaṇaṃ vā kartu.kāmaḥ para.abhiyogāt-śaṅkamāno lābham aprāptam
            adhikaṃ vā yāceta | 8 |
tam itaras tadātve ca-āyatyāṃ ca kramam avekṣeta | 9 |

ari.vijigīṣvos tu svaṃ svaṃ mitram anugṛhṇatoḥ
            śakya.kalya.bhavya.ārambhi.sthira.karma.anurakta.prakṛtibhyo viśeṣaḥ | 11 |

śakya.ārambhī viṣahyaṃ karma-ārabhate, kalya.ārambhī
            nirdoṣam, bhavya.ārambhī kalyāṇa.udayam | 12 |

anurakta.prakṛtiḥ susahāyatvād alpena-apy anugraheṇa kāryaṃ
            sādhayati | 14 |

ta ete kṛta.arthāḥ sukhena prabhūtaṃ ca-upakurvanti | 15
            |

tayor eka.puruṣa.anugrahe yo mitraṃ mitra.taraṃ vā-anugṛhṇāti
            so 'tisandhatte | 17 |

mitrād ātma.vṛddhiṃ hi prāpnoti,
            kṣaya.vyaya.pravāsa.para.upakārān itaraḥ | 18 |

madhyamaṃ tv anugṛhṇator yo madhyamaṃ mitraṃ mitrataraṃ
            vā-anugṛhṇāti so 'tisandhatte | 20 |

mitrād ātma.vṛddhiṃ hi prāpnoti,
            kṣaya.vyaya.pravāsa.para.upakārān itaraḥ | 21 |

madhyamaś ced anugṛhīto viguṇaḥ syād amitro 'tisandhatte | 22
            |

kṛta.prayāsaṃ hi madhyama.amitram apasṛtam eka.artha.upagataṃ
            prāpnoti | 23 |

madhyama.udāsīnayor bala.aṃśa.dāne yaḥ śūraṃ kṛta.astraṃ
            duḥkha.saham anuraktaṃ vā daṇḍaṃ dadāti so 'tisandhīyate | 25 |

yatra tu daṇḍaḥ prahitas taṃ vā ca-artham anyāṃś ca sādhayati
            tatra maula.bhṛta.śreṇī.mitra.aṭavī.balānām anyatamam upalabdha.deśa.kālaṃ daṇḍaṃ
            dadyāt, amitra.aṭavī.balaṃ vā vyavahita.deśa.kālam | 27 |

yaṃ tu manyeta "kṛta.artho me daṇḍaṃ gṛhṇīyād,
            amitra.aṭavy.abhūmy.anṛtuṣu vā vāsayed, aphalaṃ vā kuryād" iti, daṇḍa.vyāsaṅga.apadeśena
            na-enam anugṛhṇīyāt | 28 |

evam avaśyaṃ tv anugrahītavye tat.kāla.saham asmai daṇḍaṃ
            dadyāt | 29 |

ā.samāpteś ca-enaṃ vāsayed yodhayec ca bala.vyasanebhyaś ca
            rakṣet | 30 |
same hi lābhe sandhiḥ syād viṣame vikramo mataḥ |

Chapter 9 (Section 116): Pacts for Securing an Ally, Money, Land and
            an Undertaking

mitra.hiraṇye hi bhūmi.lābhād bhavataḥ, mitraṃ hiraṇya.lābhāt
            | 2 |
yo vā lābhaḥ siddhaḥ śeṣayor anyataraṃ sādhayati | 3 |

"tvaṃ ca-ahaṃ ca mitraṃ labhāvahe" ity evaṃ.ādidh
            sama.sandhiḥ | 4 |

sama.sandhau tu yaḥ sampannaṃ mitraṃ mitra.kṛcchre vā mitram
            avāpnoti so 'tisandhatte | 7 |

mitra.kṛcchre 'pi nityam avaśyam anityaṃ vaśyaṃ vā-iti
            "nityam avaśyaṃ śreyaḥ, tadd hi anupakurvad api na-apakaroti" ity ācāryāḥ | 9 |

yāvad upakaroti tāvan mitraṃ bhavati, upakāra.lakṣaṇaṃ mitram
            iti | 12 |

vaśyayor api mahā.bhogam anityam alpa.bhogaṃ vā nityam iti
            "mahā.bhogam anityaṃ śreyaḥ, mahā.bhogam anityam alpa.kālena mahad.upakurvan mahānti
            vyaya.sthānāni pratikaroti" ity ācāryāḥ | 13 |

mahā.bhogam anityam upakāra.bhayād apakrāmati, upakṛtya vā
            pratyādātum īhate | 16 |

nityam alpa.bhogaṃ sātatyād alpam upakurvan mahatā kālena
            mahad upakaroti | 17 |

guru.samutthaṃ mahan mitraṃ laghu.samuttham alpaṃ vā-iti
            "guru.samutthaṃ mahan mitraṃ pratāpa.karaṃ bhavati, yadā ca-uttiṣṭhate tadā kāryaṃ
            sādhayati" ity ācāryāḥ | 18 |

lagu.samuttham alpaṃ mitraṃ kārya.kālaṃ na-atipātayati
            daurbalyāc ca yathā.iṣṭa.bhogyaṃ bhavati, na-itarat prakṛṣṭa.bhaumam | 21 |

vikṣipta.sainyam avaśya.sainyaṃ vā-iti "vikṣiptaṃ sainyaṃ
            śakyaṃ pratisaṃhartuṃ vaśyatvād" ity ācāryāḥ | 22 |

avaśyaṃ hi śakyaṃ sāma.ādibhir vaśyaṃ kartum, na-itarat
            kārya.vyāsaktaṃ pratisaṃhartum | 25 |

puruṣa.bhogaṃ hiraṇya.bhogaṃ vā mitram iti "puruṣa.bhogaṃ
            mitraṃ śreyaḥ, pruṣa.bhogaṃ mitraṃ pratāpa.karaṃ bhavati, yadā ca-uttiṣṭhate tadā kāryaṃ
            sādhayati" ity ācāryāḥ | 26 |
nityo hi hiraṇyena yogaḥ kadācid daṇḍena | 29 |
daṇḍaś ca hiraṇyena-anye ca kāmāḥ prāpyanta iti | 30 |

hiraṇya.bhogaṃ bhūmi.bhogaṃ vā mitram iti "hiraṇya.bhogaṃ
            gatimattvāt sarva.vyaya.pratīkāra.karam" ity ācāryāḥ | 31 |

mitra.hiraṇye hi bhūmi.lābhād bhavata ity uktaṃ purastād | 33
            |

tulye puruṣa.bhoge vikramaḥ kleśa.sahatvam anurāgaḥ
            sarva.bala.lābho vā mitra.kulād viśeṣaḥ | 35 |

tulye hiraṇya.bhoge prārthita.arthatā prābhūtyam
            alpa.prayasatā sātatyaṃ ca viśeṣaḥ | 36 |

advaidhyaṃ ca-iti sampannaṃ mitraṃ ṣaḍ.guṇam ucyate || 38
              ||
ṛte yad arthaṃ praṇayād rakṣyate yac ca rakṣati |
ādātṛ vā dātr.api vā jīvaty ariṣu hiṃsayā |
anyato vigṛhītaṃ yal laghu.vyasanam eva vā |

sandhatte ca-upakārāya tan mitraṃ vaśyam adhruvam || 42
              ||

mitra.bhāvi bhavaty etan mitram advaidhyam āpadi || 43
              ||
na kasyacid udāsīnaṃ dvayor ubhaya.bhāvi tat || 44 ||
vijigīṣor amitraṃ yan mitram antardhitāṃ gatam |
priyaṃ parasya vā rakṣyaṃ pūjyaṃ sambaddham eva vā |

anugṛhṇāti yan mitraṃ śatru.sādhāraṇaṃ hi tat || 46
              ||
prakṛṣṭa.bhaumaṃ santuṣṭaṃ balavac ca-ālasaṃ ca yat |
arer netuś ca yad vṛddhiṃ daurbalyād anuvartate |
yo mitraṃ samupekṣeta sa mṛtyum upagūhati || 49 ||

kṣipram alpo lābhaś cirān mahān iti vā "kṣipram alpo lābhaḥ
            kārya.deśa.kāla.saṃvādakaḥ śreyān" ity ācāryāḥ | 50 |

cirād avinipātī bīja.sadharmā mahāml lābhaḥ śreyān, viparyaye
            pūrvaḥ | 52 |
evaṃ dṛṣṭvā dhruve lābhe lābha.aṃśe ca guṇa.udayam |

Chapter 10 (Section 116): Pacts for Securing an Ally, Money, Land and
            an Undertaking (cont.)

"tvaṃ ca-ahaṃ ca bhūmiṃ labhāvahe" iti bhūmi.sandhiḥ | 1
            |

tayor yaḥ pratyupasthita.arthaḥ sampannāṃ bhūmim avāpnoti so
            'tisandhatte | 2 |

tulye sampanna.alābhe yo balavantam ākramya bhūmim avāpnoti
            so 'tisandhatte | 3 |

bhūmi.lābhaṃ śatru.karśanaṃ pratāpaṃ ca hi prāpnoti | 4
            |

durbala eva ca bhūmi.lābhaḥ, tat.sāmantaś ca mitram
            amitra.bhāvaṃ gacchati | 6 |

tulye balīyastve yaḥ sthita.śatrum utpāṭya bhūmim avāpnoti
            so 'tisandhatte | 7 |

durga.avāptir hi sva.bhūmi.rakṣaṇam amitra.aṭavī.pratiṣedhaṃ
            ca karoti | 8 |

viparītā balavat sāmantā kośa.daṇḍa.avacchedanī ca bhūmir
            bhavati | 11 |

sampannā nitya.amitrā manda.guṇā vā bhūmir anitya.amitrā-iti
            "sampannā nitya.amitrā śreyasī bhūmiḥ sampannā hi kośa.daṇḍau sampādayati, tau
            ca-amitra.pratighātakau ity ācāryāḥ | 12 |

nityaś ca śatrur upakṛte ca-apakṛte ca śatrur eva bhavati,
            anityas tu śatrur upakārād anapakārād vā śāmyati | 15 |

yasyā hi bhūmer bahu.durgāś cora.gaṇair mleccha.aṭavībhir vā
            nitya.avirahitāḥ pratyantāḥ sā nitya.amitrā, viparyaye tv anitya.amitrā | 16 |

alpā pratyāsannā mahatī vyavahitā vā bhūmir iti alpā
            pratyāsannā śreyasī | 17 |

sukhā hi prāptuṃ pālayitum abhisārayituṃ ca bhavati | 18
            |

vyavahitayor api daṇḍa.dhāraṇā-ātma.dhāraṇā vā bhūmir iti
            ātma.dhāraṇā śreyasī | 20 |

bāliśāt prājñād vā bhūmi.lābha iti bāliśād.bhūmi.lābhaḥ
            śreyān | 23 |

ucchedanīyo hy anapāśrayo durbala.apāśrayo vā-abhiyuktaḥ
            kośa.daṇḍāv ādāya-apasartu.kāmaḥ prakṛtibhis tyajyate, na pīḍanīyo
            durga.mitra.pratiṣṭabdhaḥ | 27 |

durga.pratiṣṭabdhayor api sthala.nadī.durgīyābhyāṃ
            sthala.durgīyād bhūmi.lābhaḥ śreyān | 28 |

nadī.durgaṃ tu dvi.guṇa.kleśa.karam, udakaṃ ca pātavyaṃ
            vṛtti.karaṃ ca-amitrasya | 30 |

nadī.durgaṃ hi hasti.stambha.saṅkrama.setu.bandha.naubhiḥ
            sādhyam anitya.gāmbhīryam avasrāvy udakaṃ ca | 32 |

pārvataṃ tu sv.ārakṣaṃ duruparodhi kṛcchra.ārohaṇam, bhagne
            ca-ekasmin na sarva.vadhaḥ, śilā.vṛkṣa.pramokṣaś ca mahā.apakāriṇām | 33 |

nimna.yodhino hy uparuddha.deśa.kālāḥ, sthala.yodhinas tu
            sarva.deśa.kāla.yodhinaḥ | 35 |

khanakā hi khātena śastreṇa ca-ubhayathā yudhyante,
            śastreṇa-eva-ākāśa.yodhinaḥ | 37 |

Chapter 11 (Section 116): Pacts for Securing an Ally, Money, Land and
            an Undertaking (cont.)

"tvaṃ ca-ahaṃ ca śūnyaṃ niveśayāvahe" ity anavasita.sandhiḥ
            | 1 |

tayor yaḥ pratyupasthita.artho yathā.ukta.guṇāṃ bhūmiṃ
            niveśayati so 'tisandhatte | 2 |

tatra-api sthalam audakaṃ vā-iti mahataḥ sthalād alpam
            audakaṃ śreyaḥ, sātatyād avasthitatvāc ca phalānām | 3 |

sthalayor api prabhūta.pūrva.apara.sasyam alpa.varṣa.pākam
            asakta.ārambhaṃ śreyaḥ | 4 |

tayor alpa.bahutve dhānya.kāntād alpān mahad adhānya.kāntaṃ
            śreyaḥ | 6 |

mahaty avakāśe hi sthālyāś ca-anūpyāś ca-oṣadhayo bhavanti |
            7 |

"dravya.hasti.vana.bhogayor dravya.vana.bhogaḥ
            sarva.karmaṇāṃ yoniḥ prabhūta.nidhāna.kṣamaś ca, viparīto hasti.vana.bhogaḥ" ity ācāryāḥ
            | 13 |

śakyaṃ dravya.vanam anekam anekasyāṃ bhūmau vāpayitum, na
            hasti.vanam | 15 |

bhinna.manuṣyā śreṇī.manuṣyā vā bhūmir iti bhinna.manuṣyā
            śreyasī | 18 |

bhinna.manuṣyā bhogyā bhavati, anupajāpyā ca-anyeṣām,
            anāpat.sahā tu | 19 |

tasyāṃ cāturvarṇya.niveśe sarva.bhoga.sahatvād
            avara.varṇa.prāyā śreyasī, bāhulyād dhruvatvāc ca kṛṣyāḥ karṣakavatī, kṛṣyāś ca-anyeṣāṃ
            ca-ārambhāṇāṃ prayojakatvāt go.rakṣakavatī, paṇya.nicaya.ṛṇa.anugrahād āḍhya.vaṇigvatī |
            21 |

durga.apāśrayā puruṣa.apāśrayā vā bhūmir iti puruṣa.apāśrayā
            śreyasī | 23 |
apuruṣā gaur vandhy eva kiṃ duhīta | 25 |

mahā.kṣaya.vyaya.niveśāṃ tu bhūmim avāptu.kāmaḥ pūrvam eva
            kretāraṃ paṇeta durbalam arāja.bījinaṃ nirutsāham apakṣam anyāya.vṛttiṃ vyasaninaṃ
            daiva.pramāṇaṃ yat.kiñcana.kāriṇaṃ vā | 26 |

mahā.kṣaya.vyaya.niveśāyāṃ hi bhūmau durbalo rāja.bījī
            niviṣṭaḥ sagandhābhiḥ prakṛtibhiḥ saha kṣaya.vyayena-avasīdati | 27 |

balavān arāja.bījī kṣaya.vyaya.bhayād asagandhābhiḥ
            prakṛtibhis tyajyate | 28 |

nirutsāhas tu daṇḍavān api daṇḍasya-apraṇetā sadaṇḍaḥ
            kṣaya.vyayena-avabhajyate | 29 |

kośavān apy apakṣaḥ kṣaya.vyaya.anugraha.hīnatvān na
            kutaścit prāpnoti | 30 |

"yat.kiñcid.ārabhamāṇo hi vijigīṣoḥ kadācic chidram
            āsādayed" ity ācāryāḥ | 37 |

yathā chidraṃ tathā vināśam apy āsādayed iti kauṭilyaḥ | 38
            |

teṣām alābhe yathā pārṣṇi.grāha.upagrahe vakṣyāmas tathā
            bhūmim avasthāpayet | 39 |

guṇavatīm ādeyāṃ vā bhūmiṃ balavatā krayeṇa yācitaḥ sandhim
            avasthāpya dadyāt | 41 |

samena vā yācitaḥ kāraṇam avekṣya dadyāt "pratyādeyā me
            bhūmir vaśyā vā, anayā pratibaddhaḥ paro me vaśyo bhaviṣyati- bhūmi.vikrayād vā
            mitra.hiraṇya.lābhaḥ kārya.sāmarthya.karo me bhaviṣyati" iti | 43 |
evaṃ mitraṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca sajanām ajanāṃ ca gām |

Chapter 12 (Section 116): Pacts for Securing an Ally, Money, Land and
            an Undertaking (cont.)

"tvaṃ ca-ahaṃ ca durgaṃ kārayāvahe" iti karma.sandhiḥ | 1
            |

tayor yo daiva.kṛtam aviṣahyam alpa.vyaya.ārambhaṃ durgaṃ
            kārayati so 'tisandhatte | 2 |

dravya.vanayor api yo mahat.sāravad.dravya.aṭavīkaṃ
            viṣaya.ante nadī.mātṛkaṃ dravya.vanaṃ chedayati so 'tisandhatte | 6 |

nadī.mātṛkaṃ hi sv.ājīvam apāśrayaś ca-āpadi bhavati | 7
            |

hasti.vanayor api yo bahu.śūra.mṛgaṃ
            durbala.prativeśaṃ.ananta.avakleśi viṣaya.ante hasti.vanaṃ badhnāti so 'tisandhatte | 8
            |

tatra-api "bahu.kuṇṭha.alpa.śūrayoḥ alpa.śūraṃ śreyaḥ,
            śūreṣu hi yuddham, alpāḥ śūrā bahūn aśūrān bhañjanti, te bhagnāḥ sva.sainya.avaghātino
            bhavanti" ity ācāryāḥ | 9 |

kuṇṭhā bahavaḥ śreyāṃsaḥ, skandha.viniyogād anekaṃ karma
            kurvāṇāḥ sveṣām apāśrayo yuddhe, pareṣāṃ durdharṣā vibhīṣaṇāś ca | 11 |

bahuṣu hi kuṇṭheṣu vinaya.karmaṇā śakyaṃ śauryam ādhātum, na
            tv eva-alpeṣu śūreṣu bahutvam iti | 12 |

khanyor api yaḥ prabhūta.sārām adurga.mārgām
            alpa.vyaya.ārambhāṃ khaniṃ khānayati, so 'tisandhatte | 13 |

tatra-api mahā.sāram alpam alpa.sāraṃ vā prabhūtam iti
            "mahā.sāram alpaṃ śreyaḥ, vajra.maṇi.muktā.pravāla.hema.rūpya.dhātur hi prabhūtam
            alpa.sāram atyargheṇa grasate" ity ācāryāḥ | 14 |

cirād alpo mahā.sārasya kretā vidyate, prabhūtaḥ sātatyād
            alpa.sārasya | 16 |

tatra-api "vāri.sthala.pathayor vāri.pathaḥ śreyān,
            alpa.vyaya.vyāyāmaḥ prabhūta.paṇya.udayaś ca" ity ācāryāḥ | 18 |

samruddha.gatir asārvakālikaḥ prakṛṣṭa.bhaya.yonir
            niṣpratīkāraś ca vāri.pathaḥ, viparītaḥ sthala.pathaḥ | 20 |

vāri.pathe tu kūla.samyāna.pathayoḥ kūla.pathaḥ
            paṇya.pattana.bāhulyāt-śreyān, nadī.patho vā, sātatyād viṣahya.ābādhatvāc ca | 21 |

dakṣiṇā.pathe 'pi bahu.khaniḥ sāra.paṇyaḥ prasiddha.gatir
            alpa.vyaya.vyāyāmo vā vaṇik.pathaḥ śreyān, prabhūta.viṣayo vā phalgu.puṇyaḥ | 25 |
tena pūrvaḥ paścimaś ca vaṇik.patho vyākhyātaḥ | 26 |

tatra-api cakra.pāda.pathayoś cakra.patho
            vipula.ārambhatvāt-śreyān, deśa.kāla.sambhāvano vā khara.uṣṭra.pathaḥ | 27 |
tulye karma.pathe sthānaṃ jñeyaṃ svaṃ vijigīṣuṇā | 30 |

karma labdhvā viśiṣṭaḥ syād ity uktāḥ karma.sandhayaḥ | 34
            |

Chapter 13 (Section 117): Considerations about the King Attacking in
            the Rear

saṃhatya-ari.vijigīṣvor amitrayoḥ para.abhiyoginoḥ pārṣṇiṃ
            gṛhṇator yaḥ śakti.sampannasya pārṣṇiṃ gṛhṇāti so 'tisandhatte | 1 |

śakti.sampanno hy amitram ucchidya pārṣṇi.grāham ucchindyāt,
            na hīna.śaktir alabdha.lābhaḥ | 2 |

śakti.sāmye yo vipula.ārambhasya pārṣṇiṃ gṛhṇāti so
            'tisandhatte | 3 |

vipula.ārambho hy amitram ucchidya pārṣṇi.grāham ucchindyāt,
            na-alpa.ārambhaḥ sakta.cakraḥ | 4 |

ārambha.sāmye yaḥ sarva.sandohena prayātasya pārṣṇiṃ gṛhṇāti
            so 'tisandhatte | 5 |

śūnya.mūlo hy asya sukaro bhavati, naika.deśa.bala.prayātaḥ
            kṛta.pārṣṇi.pratividhānaḥ | 6 |

bala.upādāna.sāmye yaś cala.amitraṃ prayātasya pārṣṇiṃ
            gṛhṇāti so 'tisandhatte | 7 |

cala.amitraṃ prayāto hi sukhena-avāpta.siddhiḥ pārṣṇi.grāham
            ucchindyāt, na sthita.amitraṃ prayātaḥ | 8 |

asau hi durga.pratihataḥ pārṣṇi.grāhe ca pratinivṛttaḥ
            sthitena-amitreṇa-avagṛhyate | 9 |

śatru.sāmye yo dhārmika.abhiyoginaḥ pārṣṇiṃ gṛhṇāti so
            'tisandhatte | 11 |

dhārmika.abhiyogī hi sveṣāṃ pareṣāṃ ca dveṣyo bhavati,
            adhārmika.abhiyogī sampriyaḥ | 12 |

mitram amitraṃ ca-abhiyuñjānayor yo mitra.abhiyoginaḥ
            pārṣṇiṃ gṛhṇāti so 'tisandhatte | 15 |

mitram amitraṃ ca-uddharator yo 'mitra.uddhāriṇaḥ pārṣṇiṃ
            gṛhṇāti so 'tisandhatte | 18 |

vṛddha.mitro hy amitra.uddhārī pārṣṇi.grāham ucchindyāt,
            na-itaraḥ sva.pakṣa.upaghātī | 19 |

tayor alabdha.lābha.apagamane yasya.amitro mahato lābhād
            viyuktaḥ kṣaya.vyaya.adhiko vā sa pārṣṇi.grāho 'tisandhatte | 20 |

labdha.lābha.apagamane yasya-amitro lābhena śaktyā hīnaḥ sa
            pārṣṇi.grāho 'tisandhatte, yasya vā yātavyaḥ śatror vigraha.apakāra.samarthaḥ syāt | 21
            |

pārṣṇi.grāhayor api yaḥ śakya.ārambha.bala.upādāna.adhikaḥ
            sthita.śatruḥ pārśva.sthāyī vā so 'tisandhatte | 22 |

pārśva.sthāyī hi yātavya.abhisāro mūla.ābādhakaś ca bhavati,
            mūla.ābādhaka eva paścāt.sthāyī | 23 |

sāmantaḥ pṛṣṭhato vargaḥ prativeśau ca pārśvayoḥ || 24
              ||
arer netuś ca madhyastho durbalo 'ntardhir ucyate |

madhyamaṃ tvari.vijigīṣvor lipsamānayor madhyamasya pārṣṇiṃ
            gṛhṇator labdha.lābha.apagamane yo madhyamaṃ mitrād viyojayaty amitraṃ ca mitram āpnoti
            so 'tisandhatte | 26 |

sandheyaś ca śatrur upakurvāṇo, na mitraṃ mitra.bhāvād
            utkrāntam | 27 |

jitvā-api hi kṣiṇa.daṇḍa.kośaḥ parājito bhavati" ity ācāryāḥ
            | 31 |

tulye kṣaya.vyaye yaḥ purastād dūṣya.balaṃ ghātayitvā
            nihśalyaḥ paścād vaśya.balo yudhyeta so 'tisandhatte | 34 |

dvayor api purastād dūṣya.bala.ghātinor yo bahulataraṃ
            śaktimattaram atyanta.dūṣyaṃ ca ghātayet so 'tisandhatte | 35 |
pārṣṇi.grāho 'bhiyoktā vā yātavyo vā yadā bhavet |
vijigīṣus tadā tatra netram etat samācaret || 37 ||
kṛtsne ca maṇḍale nityaṃ dūtān gūḍhāṃś ca vāsayet |

mitra.bhūtaḥ sapatnānāṃ hatvā hatvā ca saṃvṛtaḥ || 43
              ||
Chapter 14 (Section 118): Recoupment of Powers Become Weak

sāmavāyikair evam abhiyukto vijigīṣur yas teṣāṃ pradhānas
            taṃ brūyāt "tvayā me sandhiḥ,

idaṃ hiraṇyam, ahaṃ ca mitram,
            dvi.guṇā te vṛddhiḥ, na-arhasy ātma.kṣayeṇa mitra.mukhān amitrān vardhayitum, ete hi
            vṛddhās tvām eva paribhaviṣyanti" iti | 1 |

bhedaṃ vā brūyāt "anapakāro yathā-aham etaiḥ
            sambhūya-abhiyuktas tathā tvām apy ete saṃhita.balāḥ svasthā vyasane vā-abhiyokṣyante,
            balaṃ hi cittaṃ vikaroti, tad eṣāṃ vighātaya" iti | 2 |

bhinneṣu pradhānam upagṛhya hīneṣu vikramayet, hīnān
            anugrāhya vā pradhāne, yathā vā śreyo 'bhimanyeta tathā | 3 |

phala.bhūyastvena vā pradhānam upajāpya sandhiṃ kārayet | 5
            |

atha-ubhaya.vetanāḥ phala.bhūyastvaṃ darśayantaḥ sāmavāyikān
            "atisaṃhitāḥ stha" ity udddūṣayeyuḥ | 6 |

atha-ubhaya.vetanā bhūyo bhedam eṣāṃ kuryuḥ "evaṃ tad yad
            asmābhir darśitam" iti | 8 |

pradhāna.abhāve sāmavāyikānām utsāhayitāraṃ sthira.karmāṇam
            anurakta.prakṛktiṃ lobhād bhayād vā saṅghātam upāgataṃ vijigīṣor bhītaṃ
            rājya.pratisambaddhaṃ mitraṃ cala.amitraṃ vā pūrvān uttara.abhāve sādhayet -
            utsāhayitāram ātma.nisargeṇa, sthira.karmāṇaṃ sāntva.praṇipātena, anurakta.prakṛtiṃ
            kanyā.dāna.yāpanābhyām, lubdham aṃśa.dvaiguṇyena, bhītam ebhyaḥ kośa.daṇḍa.anugraheṇa,
            svato bhītaṃ viśvāsya pratibhū.pradānena, rājya.pratisambaddham ekī.bhāva.upagamanena,
            mitram ubhayataḥ priya.hitābhyām, upakāra.tyāgena vā, cala.amitram avadhṛtam
            anapakāra.upakārābhyām | 10 |

yo vā yathā-ayogaṃ bhajeta taṃ tathā sādhayet,
            sāma.dāna.bheda.daṇḍair vā yathā-āpatsu vyākhyāsyāmaḥ | 11 |

vyasana.upaghāta.tvarito vā kośa.daṇḍābhyāṃ deśe kāle kārye
            vā-avadhṛtaṃ sandhim upeyāt | 12 |

pakṣe hīno bandhu.mitra.pakṣaṃ kurvīta, durgam aviṣahyaṃ vā
            | 14 |

durga.mitra.pratiṣṭabdho hi sveṣāṃ pareṣāṃ ca pūjyo bhavati
            | 15 |

vaṇik.pathena hi daṇḍa.gūḍha.puruṣa.atinayanaṃ
            śastra.āvaraṇa.yāna.vāhana.krayaś ca kriyate, praveśo nirṇayanaṃ ca | 24 |

khaniḥ saṅgrāma.upakaraṇānāṃ yoniḥ, dravya.vanaṃ
            durga.karmaṇāṃ yāna.rathayoś ca, hasti.vanaṃ hastinām, gava.aśva.khara.uṣṭrāṇāṃ ca
            vrajaḥ | 25 |

utsāha.hīnaḥ śreṇī.pravīra.puruṣāṇāṃ
            cora.gaṇa.āṭavika.mleccha.jātīnāṃ para.apakāriṇāṃ gūḍha.puruṣāṇāṃ ca yathā.lābbham
            upacayaṃ kurvīta | 27 |
evaṃ pakṣeṇa mantreṇa dravyeṇa ca balena ca |

Chapter 15 (Sections 119; 120): Entrenching Oneself in a Fort in War
            with a Stronger King; Conduct of the King Surrendering with Troops

durbalo rājā balavatā-abhiyuktas tad.viśiṣṭa.balam āśrayeta
            yam itaro mantra.śaktyā na-atisandadhyāt | 1 |

viśiṣṭa.bala.abhāve sama.balais tulya.bala.saṅghair vā
            balavataḥ sambhūya tiṣṭhed yān na mantra.prabhāva.śaktibhyām atisandadhyāt | 3 |

sama.bala.abhāve hīna.balaiḥ śucibhir utsāhibhiḥ
            pratyanīka.bhūtair balavataḥ sambhūya tiṣṭhed yān na mantra.prabhāva.utsāha.śaktibhir
            atisandadhyāt | 5 |

sahāya.abhāve durgam āśrayeta yatra-amitraḥ prabhūta.sainyo
            'pi bhakta.yavasa.indhana.udaka.uparodhaṃ na kuryāt svayaṃ ca kṣaya.vyayābhyāṃ yujyeta |
            9 |

nicaya.apasāra.sampannaṃ hi manuṣya.durgam icched iti
            kauṭilyaḥ | 11 |

tad ebhiḥ kārṇair āśrayeta - "pārṣṇi.grāham āsāraṃ
            madhyamam udāsīnaṃ vā pratipādayiṣyāmi, sāmanta.āṭavika.tat.kulīna.aparuddhānām
            anyatamena-asya rājyaṃ hārayiṣyāmi ghātayiṣyāmi vā -

kṛtya.pakṣa.upagraheṇa vā-asya durge rāṣṭre skandha.āvāre
            vā kopaṃ samutthāpayiṣyāmi, śastra.agni.rasa.praṇidhānair aupaniṣadikair vā yathā.iṣṭam
            āsannaṃ haniṣyāmi -

svayaṃ.adhiṣṭhitena vā yoga.praṇidhānena kṣaya.vyayam enam
            upaneṣyāmi, kṣaya.vyaya.pravāsa.upatapte vā-asya mitra.varge sainye vā krameṇa-upajāpaṃ
            prāpsyāmi -

vīvadha.āsāra.prasāra.vadhena vā-asya
            skandha.āvāra.avagrahaṃ kariṣyāmi, daṇḍa.upanayena vā-asya randhram utthāpya
            sarva.sandohena prahariṣyāmi, pratihata.utsāhena vā yathā.iṣṭaṃ sandhim avāpsyāmi, mayi
            pratibaddhasya vā sarvataḥ kopāḥ samutthāsyanti -

nirāsāraṃ vā-asya mūlaṃ mitra.aṭavī.daṇḍair uddhātayiṣyāmi,
            mahato vā deśasya yoga.kṣemam ihasthaḥ pālayiṣyāmi, sva.vikṣiptaṃ mitra.vikṣiptaṃ vā me
            sainyam ihasthasya-ekastham aviṣahyaṃ bhaviṣyati, nimna.khāta.rātri.yuddha.viśāradaṃ vā
            me sainyaṃ pathya.ābādha.muktam āsanne karma kariṣyati -

viruddha.deśa.kālam iha.āgato vā svayam eva
            kṣaya.vyayābhyāṃ na bhaviṣyati, mahā.kṣaya.vyaya.abhigamyo 'yaṃ deśo
            durga.aṭavy.apasāra.bāhulyāt -

pareṣāṃ vyādhi.prāyaḥ sainya.vyāyāmānām alabdha.bhaumaś ca,
            tam āpad.gataḥ pravekṣyati, praviṣṭo vā na nirgamiṣyati" iti | 12 |

anyatara.siddhir hi tyakta.ātmano bhavati" ity ācāryāḥ | 15
            |
viparyaye vikrameṇa sandhim apasāraṃ vā lipseta | 18 |

tena vā preṣitam artha.mānābhyāṃ satkṛtya brūyāt "idaṃ
            rājñaḥ paṇya.agāram, idaṃ devī.kumārāṇām, devī.kumāra.vacanāt, idaṃ rājyam ahaṃ ca
            tvad.arpaṇaḥ" iti | 20 |

durga.ādīni ca karmāṇi
            āvāha.vivāha.putra.abhiṣeka.aśva.paṇya.hasti.grahaṇa.sattra.yātrā.- vihāra.gamanāni
            ca-anujñātaḥ kurvīta | 22 |

sva.bhūmy.avasthita.prakṛti.sandhim upaghātam apasṛteṣu vā
            sarvam anujñātaḥ kurvīta | 23 |

duṣṭa.paura.jānapado vā nyāya.vṛttir anyāṃ bhūmiṃ yāceta |
            24 |

ucitāṃ vā mitrād bhūmiṃ dīyamānāṃ na pratigṛhṇīyāt | 26
            |

mantri.purohita.senā.pati.yuva.rājānām anyatamam adṛśyamāne
            bhartari paśyet, yathā.śakti ca-upakuryāt | 27 |

Chapter 16 (Section 121): Conduct of the King Subjugating by

anujñāta.sandhi.paṇa.udvega.karaṃ balavān vijigīṣamāṇo yataḥ
            sva.bhūmiḥ sva.ṛtu.vṛttiś ca sva.sainyānām, adurga.apasāraḥ śatrur.apārṣṇir anāsāraś ca,
            tato yāyāt | 1 |

sāmanta.āṭavika.tat.kulīna.aparuddhānām anyatama.upagraheṇa
            kośa.daṇḍa.bhūmi.dāya.yācanam iti bhedam ācaret | 7 |

evam utsāhavato daṇḍa.upakāriṇaḥ sthāpayet,
            sva.prabhāvavataḥ kośa.upakāriṇaḥ, prajñāvato bhūmy.upakāriṇaḥ | 9 |

teṣāṃ paṇya.pattana.grāma.khani.sañjātena
            ratna.sāra.phalgu.kupyena dravya.hasti.vana.vraja.samutthena yāna.vāhanena vā yad bahuśa
            upakaroti tac citra.bhogam | 10 |

yad daṇḍena kośena vā mahad upakaroti tan mahā.bhogam | 11
            |
yad amitram ekataḥ pratikaroti tad ekato.bhogi | 13 |

yad amitram āsāraṃ ca-ubhayataḥ pratikaroti tad
            ubhayato.bhogi | 14 |

yad amitra.āsāra.prativeśa.āṭavikān sarvataḥ pratikaroti tat
            sarvato.bhogi | 15 |

pārṣṇi.grāhaś ca-āṭavikaḥ śatru.mukhyaḥ śatrur vā
            bhūmi.dāna.sādhyaḥ kaścid āsādyeta, nirguṇayā bhūmyā-enam upagrāhayet, apratisambaddhayā
            durgastham, nirupajīvyayā-āṭavikaṃ -

pratyādeyayā tat.kulīnaṃ śatroḥ, apacchinnayā śatror
            aparuddhaṃ nitya.amitrayā śreṇī.balam, balavat.sāmantayā saṃhata.balam, ubhābhyāṃ yuddhe
            pratilomam, -

alabdha.vyāyāmayā-utsāhinam, śūyayā-ari.pakṣīyam,
            karśitayā-apavāhitam, mahā.kṣaya.vyaya.niveśayā gata.pratyāgatam, anapāśrayayā
            pratyapasṛtam, pareṇa-anadhivāsyayā svayam eva bhartāram upagrāhayet | 16 |

yaś ca-asya-apakuryāt tad doṣam abhivikhyāpya prakāśam enaṃ
            ghātayet | 24 |
kulyān apy asya sveṣu pātreṣu sthāpayet | 27 |

yas tu-upanatān hatvā baddhvā vā bhūmi.dravya.putra.dārān
            abhimanyeta tasya-udvignaṃ maṇḍalam abhāvāya-uttiṣṭhate | 30 |

ye ca-asya-amātyāḥ sva.bhūmiṣv āyattās te ca-asya-udvignā
            maṇḍalam āśrayante | 31 |

rājñāṃ viśvāsa.upagamaḥ śamaḥ sandhiḥ samādhir iti | 2 |

"satyaṃ śapatho vā calaḥ sandhiḥ, pratibhūḥ pratigraho vā
            sthāvaraḥ" ity ācāryāḥ | 3 |

satyaṃ śapatho vā paratra-iha ca sthāvaraḥ sandhiḥ,
            iha.artha eva pratibhūḥ pratigraho vā bala.apekṣaḥ | 5 |

"saṃhitāḥ smaḥ" iti satya.sandhāḥ pūrve rājānaḥ satyena
            sandadhire | 6 |

tasya-atikrame śapathena
            agny.udaka.sītā.prākāra.loṣṭa.hasti.skandha.aśva.pṛṣṭa.ratha.upastha.-
            śastra.ratna.bīja.gandha.rasa.suvarṇa.hiraṇyāny ālebhire "hanyur etāni tyajeyuś ca-enaṃ
            yaḥ śapatham atikrāmet" iti | 7 |

śapatha.atikrame mahatāṃ tapasvināṃ mukhyānāṃ vā
            prātibhāvya.bandhaḥ pratibhūḥ | 8 |

tasmin yaḥ para.avagraha.samarthān pratibhuvo gṛhṇāti, so
            'tisandhatte | 9 |

tasmin yo dūṣya.amātyaṃ dūṣya.apatyaṃ vā dadāti, so
            'tisandhatte | 12 |

pratigraha.grahaṇa.viśvastasya hi paraś chidreṣu nirapekṣaḥ
            praharati | 14 |

apatya.samādhau tu kanyā.putra.dāne dadat tu kanyām
            atisandhatte | 15 |

kanyā hy adāyādā pareṣām eva-arthāya-ākleśyā (?) ca | 16
            |

putrayor api yo jātyaṃ prājñaṃ śūraṃ kṛta.astram eka.putraṃ
            vā dadāti so 'tisandhīyate | 18 |

jātyād ajātyo hi lupta.dāyāda.santānatvād ādhātuṃ śreyān,
            prājñād aprājño mantra.śakti.lopāt, śūrād aśūra utsāha.śakti.lopāt, kṛta.astrād
            akṛta.astraḥ prahartavya.sampal.lopāt, eka.putrād aneka.putro nirapekṣatvāt | 20 |

jātya.prājñayor jātyam aprājñam aiśvarya.prakṛtir
            anuvartate, prājñam ajātyaṃ mantra.adhikāraḥ | 21 |

prājña.śūrayoḥ prājñam aśūraṃ mati.karmaṇāṃ yogo 'nuvartate,
            śūram aprājñaṃ vikrama.adhikāraḥ | 23 |

vikrama.adhikāre 'pi hastinam iva lubdhakaḥ prājñaḥ śūram
            atisandhatteś | 24 |

śūra.kṛta.astrayoḥ śūram akṛta.astraṃ vikrama.vyavasāyo
            'nuvartate, kṛta.astram aśūraṃ lakṣya.lambha.adhikāraḥ | 25 |

bahv.eka.putrayor bahu.putra ekaṃ dattvā śeṣa.pratiṣṭabdhaḥ
            sandhim atikrāmati, na-itaraḥ | 27 |

śaktimaty eka.putre tu lupta.putra.utpattir ātmānam
            ādadhyāt, na ca-eka.putram iti | 31 |

kumāra.āsannāḥ sattriṇaḥ kāru.śilpi.vyañjanāḥ karmāṇi
            kurvāṇāḥ suruṅgayā rātrāv upakhānayitvā kumāram apahareyuḥ | 33 |

paricārakac.chadmanā vā kiñcid arūpa.velāyām ādāya
            nirgacchet, suruṅgā.mukhena vā niśā.upahāreṇa | 41 |

daivata.upahāra.śrāddha.prahavaṇa.nimittam ārakṣiṣu
            madana.yoga.yuktam anna.pānaṃ rasaṃ vā prayujya-apagacchet, ārakṣaka.protsāhanena vā |
            44 |

nāgaraka.kuśīlava.cikitsaka.āpūpika.vyañjanā vā rātrau
            samṛddha.gṛhāṇy ādīpayeyuḥ ārakṣiṇāṃ vā | 45 |

anyad vā śarīraṃ nikṣipya sva.gṛham ādīpayed anupāta.bhayāt
            | 47 |

muṇḍa.jaṭilānāṃ pravāsanāny anupraviṣṭo vā rātrau
            tad.vyañjanaḥ pratiṣṭheta, virūpa.vyādhi.karaṇa.araṇya.carac.chadmanām anyatamena vā |
            50 |

sattra.abhāve hiraṇyaṃ rasa.viddhaṃ vā bhakṣya.jātam
            ubhayataḥ.panthānam utsṛjet | 57 |

gṛhīto vā sāma.ādibhir anupātam atisandadhyāt, rasa.viddhena

vāruṇa.yoga.agni.dāheṣu vā śarīram anyad ādhāya śatrum
            abhiyuñjīta "putro me tvayā hataḥ" iti | 60 |

madhyamasya-ātmā tṛtīyā pañcamī ca prakṛtī prakṛtayaḥ | 1
            |

tac ced ubhayaṃ madhyamo 'nugṛhṇīyāt, vijigīṣur
            madhyama.anulomaḥ syāt | 3 |

madyamaś ced vijigīṣor mitraṃ mitra.bhāvi lipseta,
            mitrasya-ātmanaś ca mitrāṇy utthāpya madhyamāc ca mitrāṇi bhedayitvā mitraṃ trāyeta | 5
            |

maṇḍalaṃ vā protsāhayet "atipravṛddho 'yaṃ madhyamaḥ
            sarveṣāṃ no vināśāya-abhyutthitaḥ, sambhūya-asya yātrāṃ vihanāma" iti | 6 |

tac cen maṇḍalam anugṛhṇīyāt, madhyama.avagraheṇa-ātmānam
            upabṛṃhayet | 7 |

na ced anugṛhṇīyāt, kośa.daṇḍābhyāṃ mitram anugṛhya ye
            madhyama.dveṣiṇo rājānaḥ paraspara.anugṛhītā vā bahavas tiṣṭheyuḥ,

eka.siddhau vā bahavaḥ sidhyeyuḥ, parasparād vā śaṅkitā na-uttiṣṭheran,
            teṣāṃ pradhānam ekam āsannaṃ vā sāma.dānābhyāṃ labheta | 8 |

deśa.kāla.atipattau vā sandhāya madhyamena mitrasya sācivyaṃ
            kuryāt, dūṣyeṣu vā karma.sandhim | 11 |

karśanīyaṃ vā-asya mitraṃ madhyamo lipseta, pratistambhayed
            enaṃ "ahaṃ tvā trāyeya" iti ā karśanāt | 12 |

ucchedanīyaṃ vā-asya mitraṃ madhyamo lipseta, karśitam enaṃ
            trāyeta madhyama.vṛddhi.bhayāt | 14 |

ucchinnaṃ vā bhūmy.anugraheṇa haste kuryād
            anyatra-apasāra.bhayāt | 15 |

karśanīya.ucchedanīyayoś cen mitrāṇi madhyamasya
            sācivya.karāṇi syuḥ, puruṣa.antareṇa sandhīyeta | 16 |

vijigīṣor vā tayor mitrāṇy avagraha.samarthāni syuḥ, sandhim
            upeyāt | 17 |
amitraṃ vā-asya madhyamo lipseta, sandhim upeyāt | 18 |

evaṃ sva.arthaś ca kṛto bhavati madhyamasya priyaṃ ca | 19
            |

madhyamaś cet sva.mitraṃ mitra.bhāvi lipseta,
            puruṣa.antareṇa sandadhyāt | 20 |

sa.apekṣaṃ vā "na-arhasi mitram ucchettum" iti vārayet | 21
            |

upekṣeta vā "maṇḍalam asya kupyatu sva.pakṣa.vadhāt" iti |
            22 |

amitram ātmano vā madhyamo lipseta, kośa.daṇḍābhyām enam
            adṛśyamāno 'nugṛhṇīyāt | 23 |

udāsīnaṃ vā madhyamo lipseta, asmai sāhāyyaṃ dadyād
            "udāsīnād bhidyatām" iti | 24 |

udāsīnaś cen madhyamaṃ lipseta, yataḥ śatrum atisandadhyān
            mitrasya-upakāraṃ kuryād udāsīnaṃ vā daṇḍa.upakāriṇaṃ labheta tataḥ pariṇameta | 27
            |

evam upabṛhya-ātmānam ari.prakṛtiṃ karśayen mitra.prakṛtiṃ
            ca-upagṛhṇīyāt | 28 |

saty apy amitra.bhāve tasya-anātmavān nitya.apakārī śatruḥ
            śatru.saṃhitaḥ pārṣṇi.grāho vā vyasanī yātavyo vyasane vā netur abhiyoktā ity
            ari.bhāvinaḥ, eka.artha.abhiprayātaḥ pṛthag.artha.abhiprayātaḥ sambhūya.yātrikaḥ
            saṃhita.prayāṇikaḥ sva.artha.abhiprayātaḥ sāmutthāyikaḥ kośa.daṇḍayor anyatarasya kretā
            vikretā vā dvaidhī.bhāvika iti mitra.bhāvinaḥ, -

pratighāto
            'ntardhiḥ prativeśo vā balavataḥ pārṣṇi.grāho vā svayam upanataḥ pratāpa.upanato vā
            daṇḍa.upanata iti bhṛtya.bhāvinaḥ sāmantāḥ | 29 |
teṣāṃ śatru.virodhe yan mitram eka.arthatāṃ vrajet |

prasādhya śatruṃ yan mitraṃ vṛddhaṃ gacched avaśyatām
              |

yathā vā-anugraha.apekṣaṃ vaśyaṃ tiṣṭhet tathā caret ||
              33 ||
na-upakuryād amitraṃ vā gacched yad atikarśitam |

tad ahīnam avṛddhaṃ ca sthāpayen mitram arthavit || 34
              ||
artha.yuktyā calaṃ mitraṃ sandhiṃ yad upagacchati |

tasya-apagamane hetuṃ vihanyān na caled yathā || 35
              ||
ari.sādhāraṇaṃ yad vā tiṣṭhet tad aritaḥ śaṭham |

bhedayed bhinnam ucchindyāt tataḥ śatrum anantaram || 36
              ||
udāsīnaṃ ca yat tiṣṭhet sāmantais tad virodhayet |
amitraṃ vijigīṣuṃ ca yat sañcarati durbalam |

tad balena-anugṛhṇīyād yathā syān na parān.mukham || 38
              ||
apakuryāt samarthaṃ vā na-upakuryād yad āpadi |

vṛddhiṃ kṣayaṃ ca sthānaṃ ca karśana.ucchedanaṃ tathā
              |

sa buddhi.nigalair baddhair iṣṭaṃ krīḍati pārthivaiḥ ||
              44 ||

vyasana.yaugapadye saukaryato yātavyaṃ rakṣitavyaṃ vā-iti
            vyasana.cintā | 1 |

daivaṃ mānuṣaṃ vā prakṛti.vyasanam anaya.apanayābhyāṃ
            sambhavati | 2 |

guṇa.prātilomyam abhāvaḥ pradoṣaḥ prasaṅgaḥ pīḍā vā vyasanam
            | 3 |

mantro mantra.phala.avāptiḥ karma.anuṣṭhānam āya.vyaya.karma
            daṇḍa.praṇayanam amitra.aṭavī.pratiṣedho rājya.rakṣaṇaṃ vyasana.pratīkāraḥ
            kumāra.rakṣaṇam abhiṣekaś ca kumārāṇām āyattam amātyeṣu | 8 |

teṣām abhāve tad.abhāvaḥ, chinna.pakṣasya-iva rājñaś
            ceṣṭā.nāśaś ca | 9 |

vaiguṇye ca prāṇa.ābādhaḥ prāṇa.antika.caratvād rājñaḥ" iti |
            11 |

mantri.purohita.ādi.bhṛtya.vargam adhyakṣa.pracāraṃ
            puruṣa.dravya.prakṛti.vyasana.pratīkāram edhanaṃ ca rājā-eva karoti | 13 |

svāmī ca sampannaḥ sva.sampadbhiḥ prakṛtīḥ sampādayati | 16
            |

sa yat.śīlas tat.śīlāḥ prakṛtayo bhavanti, utthāne pramāde ca
            tad.āyattatvāt | 17 |

"kośo daṇḍaḥ kupyaṃ viṣṭir vāhanaṃ nicayāś ca jana.padād
            uttiṣṭhante | 20 |

teṣām abhāvo jana.pada.abhāve, svāmy.amātyayoś ca-anantaraḥ"
            iti | 21 |

amātya.mūlāḥ sarva.ārambhāḥ - jana.padasya karma.siddhayaḥ
            svataḥ parataś ca yoga.kṣema.sādhanaṃ vyasana.pratīkāraḥ śūnya.niveśa.upacayau
            daṇḍa.kara.anugrahaś ca-iti | 23 |

śaktimattarāś ca paurā jānapadebhyo nityāś ca-āpadi sahāyā
            rājñaḥ | 26 |
śauryaṃ sthairyaṃ dākṣyaṃ bāhulyaṃ ca jānapadeṣu | 30 |

karṣaka.prāye tu durga.vyasanam, āyudhīya.prāye tu jana.pade
            jana.pada.vyasanam iti | 32 |

"kośa.mūlo hi durga.saṃskāro durga.rakṣaṇaṃ
            jana.pada.mitra.amitra.nigraho deśa.antaritānām utsāhanaṃ daṇḍa.bala.vyavahāraś ca | 34
            |

kośam ādāya ca vyasane śakyam apayātum, na durgam" iti | 36
            |

durga.arpaṇaḥ kośo daṇḍas tūṣṇīṃ.yuddhaṃ sva.pakṣa.nigraho
            daṇḍa.bala.vyavahāra āsāra.pratigrahaḥ para.cakra.aṭavī.pratiṣedhaś ca | 38 |

kośa.abhāve ca śakyaḥ kupyena bhūmyā
            para.bhūmi.svayaṃ.grāheṇa vā daṇḍaḥ piṇḍayitum, daṇḍavatā ca kośaḥ | 44 |

kośa.abhāve daṇḍaḥ paraṃ gacchati, svāminaṃ vā hanti | 48
            |

lambha.pālano hi daṇḍaḥ kośasya, kośaḥ kośasya daṇḍasya ca
            bhavati | 51 |

"mitram abhṛtaṃ vyavahitaṃ ca karma karoti, pārṣṇi.grāham
            āsāram amitram āṭavikaṃ ca pratikaroti, kośa.daṇḍa.bhūmibhiś ca-upakaroti
            vyasana.avasthā.yogam" iti | 54 |

daṇḍavato mitraṃ mitra.bhāve tiṣṭhati, amitro vā mitra.bhāve
            | 56 |

daṇḍa.mitrayos tu sādhāraṇe kārye sārataḥ
            sva.yuddha.deśa.kāla.lābhād viśeṣaḥ | 57 |

śīghra.abhiyāne tv amitra.āṭavika.anabhyantara.kope ca na
            mitraṃ vidyate | 58 |

vyasana.yaugapadye para.vṛddhau ca mitram artha.yuktau
            tiṣṭhati | 59 |
dvayos tu vyasane tulye viśeṣo guṇataḥ kṣayāt |

vyasanaṃ tad garīyaḥ syāt pradhānasya-itarasya vā || 63
              ||

ahi.bhayād abhyantaraḥ kopo bāhya.kopāt pāpīyān,
            antar.amātya.kopaś ca-antaḥ.kopāt | 3 |

"dvairājya.vairājyayor dvairājyam
            anyonya.pakṣa.dveṣa.anurāgābhyāṃ paraspara.saṅgharṣeṇa vā vinaśyati, vairājyaṃ tu
            prakṛti.citta.grahaṇa.apekṣi yathā.sthitam anyair bhujyate" ity ācāryāḥ | 5 |

pitā.putrayor bhrātror vā dvairājyaṃ tulya.yoga.kṣemam
            amātya.avagrahaṃ vartayati | 7 |

vairājyaṃ tu jīvataḥ parasya-ācchidya "na-etan mama" iti
            manyamānaḥ karśayati, apavāhayati, paṇyaṃ vā karoti, viraktaṃ vā
            parityajya-apagacchati-iti | 8 |

andhaś calita.śāstro vā rājā-iti "aśāstra.cakṣur andho
            yat.kiñcana.kārī dṛḍha.abhiniveśī para.praṇeyo vā rājyam anyāyena-upahanti,
            calita.śāstras tu yatra śāstrāc calita.matir bhavati śakya.anunayo bhavati" ity ācāryāḥ
            | 9 |

andho rājā śakyate sahāya.sampadā yatra tatra vā
            paryavasthāpayitum | 11 |

calita.śāstras tu śāstrād anyathā.abhiniviṣṭa.buddhir

            sva.dharma.anugraha.parihāra.dāna.māna.karmabhiḥ prakṛti.rañjana.upakāraiś carati" ity
            ācāryāḥ | 13 |

navas tu rājā bala.āvarjitaṃ "mama-idaṃ rājyam" iti
            yathā.iṣṭam anavagrahaś carati | 16 |

durbalo 'bhijāto balavān anabhijāto rājā-iti
            "durbalasya-abhijātasya-upajāpaṃ daurbalya.apekṣāḥ prakṛtayaḥ kṛcchreṇa-upagacchanti,
            balavataś ca-anabhijātasya bala.apekṣāḥ sukhena" ity ācāryāḥ | 21 |

durbalam abhijātaṃ prakṛtayaḥ svayam upanamanti, jātyam
            aiśvarya.prakṛtir anuvartata iti | 23 |

balavataś ca-anabhijātasya-upajāpaṃ visaṃvādayanti, anurāge
            sārvaguṇyam iti | 24 |

prayāsa.vadhāt sasya.vadho muṣṭi.vadhāt pāpīyān, nirājīvatvād

prāyaśaś ca kopa.vaśā rājānaḥ prakṛti.kopair hatāḥ śrūyante,

tuṣāra.durdinam agādha.nimna.prāyaṃ gahana.tṛṇa.vṛkṣaṃ vā
            deśaṃ grīṣme yāyāt | 38 |

mārgaśīrṣīṃ taiṣīṃ ca-antareṇa dīrgha.kālāṃ yātrāṃ yāyāt,
            caitrīṃ vaiśākhīṃ ca-antareṇa madhyama.kālām, jyeṣṭhāmūlīyām āṣāḍhīṃ ca-antareṇa
            hrasva.kālām, upoṣiṣyan vyasane caturthīm | 40 |

śakty.udaye yātavyam anaikānntikatvād vyasanānām iti
            kauṭilyaḥ | 43 |

yadā vā prayātaḥ karśayitum ucchetuṃ vā śaknuyād amitraṃ tadā
            yāyāt | 44 |

tasmāt prabhūta.udake deśe varṣati ca hasti.bala.prāyo yāyāt
            | 48 |
sarvā vā hrasva.kālāḥ syur yātavyāḥ kārya.lāghavāt |

dīrghāḥ kārya.gurutvād vā varṣā.vāsaḥ paratra ca || 52
              ||

Chapter 2 (Sections 137; 138; 139): Employment of Different Troops;

mūla.rakṣaṇād atiriktaṃ maula.balam, atyāvāpa.yuktā vā maulā
            mūle vikurvīran, bahula.anurakta.maula.balaḥ sāra.balo vā pratiyoddhā, vyāyāmena
            yoddhavyam, prakṛṣṭe 'dhvani kāle vā kṣaya.vyaya.sahatvān maulānām,
            bahula.anurakta.sampāte ca yātavyasya-upajāpa.bhayād anya.sainyānāṃ bhṛta.ādīnām
            aviśvāse, bala.kṣaye vā sarva.sainyānām - iti maula.bala.kālaḥ | 2 |

"prabhūtaṃ me bhṛta.balam alpaṃ ca maula.balamṇ"
            "parasya-alpaṃ viraktaṃ vā maula.balam, phalgu.prāyam asāraṃ vā bhṛta.sainyamṇ"
            "mantreṇa yoddhavyam alpa.vyāyāmenaṇ" "hrasvo deśaḥ kālo vā tanu.kṣaya.vyayahṇ"
            "alpa.āvāpaṃ śānta.upajāpaṃ viśvastaṃ vā me sainyamṇ" "parasya-alpaḥ prasāro hantavyahṇ"
            - iti bhṛta.bala.kālaḥ | 3 |

"prabhūtaṃ me śreṇī.balam, śakyaṃ mūle yātrāyāṃ ca-ādhātumṇ"
            hrasvaḥ pravāsaḥ, śreṇī.bala.prāyaḥ pratiyoddhā mantra.vyāyāmābhyāṃ pratiyoddhu.kāmaḥ,
            daṇḍa.bala.vyavahāraḥ - iti śreṇī.bala.kālaḥ | 4 |

"prabhūtaṃ me mitra.balaṃ śakyaṃ mūle yātrāyāṃ ca-ādhātumṇ"
            "alpaḥ pravāso mantra.yuddhāc ca bhūyo vyāyāma.yuddhamṇ" "mitra.balena vā pūrvam aṭavīṃ
            nagara.sthānam āsāraṃ vā yodhayitvā paścāt sva.balena yoddhayiṣyāmiṇ" "mitra.sādhāraṇaṃ
            vā me kāryamṇ" "mitra.āyattā vā me kārya.siddhihṇ" "āsannam anugrāhyaṃ vā me mitramṇ"
            "atyāvāpaṃ vā-asya sādayiṣyāmi" - iti mitra.bala.kālaḥ | 5 |

"prabhūtaṃ me śatru.balam, śatru.balena yodhayiṣyāmi
            nagara.sthānam aṭavīṃ vā, tatra me śva.varāhayoḥ kalahe caṇḍālasya-iva-anyatara.siddhir
            bhaviṣyatiṇ" "āsārāṇām aṭavīnāṃ vā kaṇṭaka.mardanam etat kariṣyāmiṇ" - atyupacitaṃ vā
            kopa.bhayān nityam āsannam ari.balaṃ vāsayed, anyatra.abhyantara.kopa.śaṅkāyāḥ -
            śatru.yuddha.avara.yuddha.kālaś ca - ity amitra.bala.kālaḥ | 6 |

mārga.ādeśikam, para.bhūmi.yogyam, ari.yuddha.pratilomam,
            aṭavī.bala.prāyaḥ śatrur vā, "bilvaṃ bilvena hanyatāmṇ" alpaḥ prasāro hantavyaḥ - ity
            aṭavī.bala.kālaḥ | 8 |

sainyam anekam anekastham uktam anuktaṃ vā vilopa.arthaṃ yad
            uttiṣṭhati tad autsāhikaṃ - abhakta.vetanaṃ vilopa.viṣṭi.pratāpa.karaṃ bhedyaṃ pareṣām,
            abhedyaṃ tulya.deśa.jāti.śilpa.prāyaṃ saṃhataṃ mahat | 9 | iti bala.upādāna.kālāh

teṣāṃ kupya.bhṛtam amitra.aṭavī.balaṃ vilopa.bhṛtaṃ vā kuryāt
            | 10 |

amitrasya vā bala.kāle pratyutpanne śatru.balam avagṛhṇīyāt,
            anyatra vā preṣayet, aphalaṃ vā kuryāt, vikṣiptaṃ vā vāsayet, kāle vā-atikrānte visṛjet
            | 11 |

parasya ca-etad bala.samuddānaṃ vighātayet, ātmanaḥ
            sampādayet | 12 |

nitya.anantaraṃ kṣipra.utthāyi vaśyaṃ va bhṛta.balaṃ
            śreṇī.balāt-śreyaḥ | 15 |

jānapadam eka.artha.upagataṃ
            tulya.saṅgharṣa.amarṣa.siddhi.lābhaṃ ca śreṇī.balaṃ mitra.balāt-śreyaḥ | 16 |
avilope vyasane ca tābhyām ahi.bhayaṃ syāt | 20 |

"brāhmaṇa.kṣatriya.vaiśya.śūdra.sainyānāṃ tejaḥ.prādhānyāt
            pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ śreyaḥ samnāhayitum" ity ācāryāḥ | 21 |

praharaṇa.vidyā.vinītaṃ tu kṣatriya.balaṃ śreyaḥ,
            bahula.sāraṃ vā vaiśya.śūdra.balam iti | 24 |

tasmād evaṃ.balaḥ paraḥ, tasya-etat pratibalam iti
            bala.samuddānaṃ kuryāt | 25 |

tad eva-aśvānāṃ pratibalam, varmiṇo vā hastino 'śvā vā
            varmiṇaḥ | 28 |

kavacino rathā āvaraṇinaḥ pattayaś ca catur.aṅga.balasya
            pratibalam | 29 |

alpaḥ paścāt.kopo mahān purastāl.lābha iti alpaḥ paścāt.kopo
            garīyān | 1 |

alpaṃ paścāt.kopaṃ prayātassya dūṣya.amitra.āṭavikā hi
            sarvataḥ samedhayanti, prakṛti.kopo vā | 2 |

labdham api ca mahāntaṃ purastāl.lāham evaṃ.bhūte
            bhṛtya.mitra.kṣaya.vyayā grasante | 3 |

tasmāt sahasra.ekīyaḥ purastāl.lābhasya-ayogaḥ śata.ekīyo vā
            paścāt.kopa iti na yāyāt | 4 |

purastāl.lābhe senā.patiṃ kumāraṃ vā daṇḍa.cāriṇaṃ kurvīta |
            7 |

balavān vā rājā paścāt.kopa.avagraha.samarthaḥ
            purastāl.lābham ādātuṃ yāyāt | 8 |

abhyantara.kopa.śaṅkāyāṃ śaṅkitān ādāya yāyāt,

abhyantara.avagrahaṃ kṛtvā śūnya.pālam aneka.bala.vargam
            aneka.mukhyaṃ ca sthāpayitvā yāyāt, na vā yāyāt | 10 |

abhyantara.kopo bāhya.kopāt pāpīyān ity uktaṃ purastāt | 11
            |

mahā.aparādhe 'pi purohite samrodhanam avasrāvaṇaṃ vā
            siddhiḥ, yuva.rāje samrodhanaṃ nigraho vā guṇavaty anyasmin sati putre | 14 |

putraṃ bhrātaram anyaṃ vā kulyaṃ rāja.grāhiṇam utsāhena
            sādhayet, utsāha.abbhāve gṛhīta.anuvartana.sandhi.karmabhyām ari.sandhāna.bhayāt | 15
            |

anyebhyas tad.vidhebhyo vā bhūmi.dānair viśvāsayed enam | 16
            |

tad.viśiṣṭaṃ svayaṃ.grāhaṃ daṇḍaṃ vā preṣayet,
            sāmanta.āṭavikān vā, tair vigṛhītam atisandadhyāt | 17 |

amitrād vā sattrī bhedayed enaṃ - "ayaṃ tvā yoga.puruṣaṃ
            manyamāno bhartary eva vikramayiṣyati, avāpta.artho daṇḍa.cāriṇam amitra.āṭavikeṣu
            kṛcchre vā prayāse yokṣyati, viputra.dāram ante vā vāsayiṣyati | 26 |

pratihata.vikramaṃ tvāṃ bhartary paṇyaṃ kariṣyati, tvayā vā
            sandhiṃ kṛtvā bhartāram eva prasādayiṣyati | 27 |

apratipannasya saṃśrayaṃ bhedayed "asau te yoga.puruṣaḥ
            praṇihitaḥ" iti | 30 |

sattrī ca-enam abhityakta.śāsanair ghātayet, gūḍha.puruṣair
            vā | 31 |

parasya ca-enān kopān utthāpayet, ātmanaś ca śamayet | 35
            |

yaḥ kopaṃ kartuṃ śamayituṃ vā śaktas tatra-upajāpaḥ kāryaḥ |
            36 |

yaḥ satya.sandhaḥ śaktaḥ karmaṇi phala.avāptau ca-anugrahītuṃ
            vinipāte ca trātuṃ tatra pratijāpaḥ kāryaḥ, tarkayitavyaś ca kalyāṇa.buddhir uta-aho
            śaṭha iti | 37 |

śaṭho hi bāhyo 'bhyantaram evam upajapati - "bhartāraṃ cedd
            hatvā māṃ pratipādayiṣyati śatru.vadho bhūmi.lābhaś ca me dvividho lābho bhaviṣyati,
            atha vā śatrur enam āhaniṣyati-iti hata.bandhu.pakṣas tulya.doṣa.daṇḍena-udvignaś ca me
            bhūyān akṛtya.pakṣo bhaviṣyati, tad.vidhe vā-anyasminn api śaṅkito bhaviṣyati, anyam
            anyaṃ ca-asya mukhyam abhityakta.śāsanena ghātayiṣyāmi" iti | 38 |

abhyantaro vā śaṭho bāhyam evam upajapati - "kośam asya
            hariṣyāmi, daṇḍaṃ vā-asya haniṣyāmi, duṣṭaṃ vā bhartāram anena ghātayiṣyāmi, pratipannaṃ
            bāhyam amitra.āṭavikeṣu vikramayiṣyāmi "cakram asya sajyatām, vairam asya prasajyatām,
            tataḥ sva.adhīno me bhaviṣyati, tato bhartāram eva prasādayiṣyāmi, svayaṃ vā rājyaṃ
            grahīṣyāmiṇ" baddhvā vā bāhya.bhūmiṃ bhartṛ.bhūmiṃ ca-ubhayam avāpsyāmi, viruddhaṃ
            vā-āvāhayitvā bāhyaṃ viśvastaṃ ghātayiṣyāmi, śūnyaṃ vā-asya mūlaṃ hariṣyāmi" iti | 39
            |

kalyāṇa.buddhinā sandadhīta, śaṭhaṃ "tathā" iti
            pratigṛhya-atisandadhyāt | iti | 41 |

evam upalabhya - pare parebhyaḥ sve svebhyaḥ sve

rakṣyāḥ svebhyaḥ parebhyaś ca nityam ātmā vipaścitā || 42

ādeyaḥ pratyādeyaḥ prasādakaḥ prakopako hrasva.kālas
            tanu.kṣayo 'lpa.vyayo mahān vṛddhy.udayaḥ kalyo dharmyaḥ purogaś ca-iti lābha.sampat | 4
            |
tam ādadānas tatrastho vā vināśaṃ prāpnoti | 7 |

yadi vā paśyet "pratyādeyam ādāya
            kośa.daṇḍa.nicaya.rakṣā.vidhānāny avasrāvayiṣyāmi,
            khani.dravya.hasti.vana.setu.bandha.vaṇik.pathān uddhṛta.sārān kariṣyāmi, prakṛtīr asya
            karśayiṣyāmi, apavāhayiṣyāmi, āyogena-ārādhayiṣyāmi vā, tāḥ paraṃ pratiyogena
            kopayiṣyati, pratipakṣe vā-asya paṇyam enaṃ kariṣyāmi, mitram aparuddhaṃ vā-asya
            pratipādayiṣyāmi, mitrasya svasya vā deśasya pīḍām atrasthas taskarebhyaḥ parebhyaś ca
            pratikariṣyāmi, mitram āśrayaṃ vā-asya vaiguṇyaṃ grāhayiṣyāmi, tad amitra.viraktaṃ
            tat.kulīnaṃ pratipatsyate, satkṛtya vā-asmai bhūmiṃ dāsyāmi iti saṃhita.samutthitaṃ
            mitraṃ me cirāya bhaviṣyati" iti pratyādeyam api lābham ādadīta | 8 |

adhārmikād dhārmikasya lābho labhyamānaḥ sveṣāṃ pareṣāṃ ca
            prasādako bhavati | 10 |

mantriṇām upadeśāl lābho 'labhyamānaḥ kopako bhavati "ayam
            asmābhiḥ kṣaya.vyayau grāhitaḥ" iti | 12 |

dūṣya.mantriṇām anādarāl lābho labhyamānaḥ kopako bhavati
            "siddha.artho 'yam asmān vināśayiṣyati" iti | 13 |

tulye lābhe deśa.kālau śakty.upāyau priya.apriyau java.ajavau
            sāmīpya.viprakarṣau tadātva.anubandhau sāratva.sātatye bāhulya.bāhu.guṇye ca vimṛśya
            bahu.guṇa.yuktaṃ lābham ādadīta | 24 |

lābha.vighnāḥ - kāmaḥ kopaḥ sādhvasaṃ kāruṇyaṃ hrīr
            anārya.bhāvo mānaḥ sānukrośatā para.loka.apekṣā dhārmikatvam atyāgitvaṃ dainyam asūyā
            hasta.gata.avamāno daurātmyam aviśvāso bhayam apratīkāraḥ śīta.uṣṇa.varṣāṇām ākṣamyaṃ

na-adhanāḥ prāpnuvanty arthān narā yatna.śatair api |

              ||

bāhya.utpattir abhyantara.pratijāpā, abhyantara.utpattir
            bāhya.pratijāpā, bāhya.utpattir bāhya.pratijāpā, abhyantara.utpattir
            abhyantara.pratijāpā - ity āpadaḥ | 3 |

yatra bāhyā abhyantara.anupajapanti, abhyantarā vā bāhyān,

kṛcchra.upajāpā hi bāhyānām abhyantarās teṣām itare vā | 7
            |

mahataś ca prayatnasya vadhaḥ pareṣām, artha.anubandhaś

sattriṇo mitra.vyañjanā vā bāhyānāṃ cāram eṣāṃ brūyuḥ "ayaṃ
            vo rājā dūṣya.vyañjanair atisandhātu.kāmaḥ, budhyadhvam" iti | 13 |

dūṣyeṣu vā dūṣya.vyañjanāḥ praṇihitā dūṣyān bāhyair
            bhedayeyuḥ, bāhyān vā dūṣyaiḥ | 14 |

dūṣyān anupraviṣṭā vā tīkṣṇāḥ śastra.rasābhyāṃ hanyuḥ | 15
            |

yatra bāhyā bāhyān upajapanti, abhyantarān abhyantarā vā,
            tatra-ekānta.yoga upajapituḥ siddhir viśeṣavatī | 17 |
dūṣya.śuddhau hi doṣaḥ punar anyān dūṣayati | 19 |

sattriṇo mitra.vyañjanā vā brūyuḥ "ayaṃ vo rājā svayam

pratijapitur vā dūta.daṇḍān anupraviṣṭās tīkṣṇāḥ

tuṣṭa.liṅgam atuṣṭaṃ viparītaṃ vā sāma prayuñjīta | 25 |

śauca.sāmarthya.apadeśena vyasana.abhyudaya.avekṣaṇena vā
            pratipūjanam iti dānam | 26 |

citta.jñāna.artham upadhāsyati vo rājā,
            tad asya-ākhyātavyam iti | 27 |

parasparād vā bhedayed enān "asau ca-asau ca vo rājany evam

etāsāṃ catasṛṇām āpadām abhyantarām eva pūrvaṃ sādhayet | 30
            |

ahi.bhayād abhyantara.kopo bāhya.kopāt pāpīyān ity uktaṃ

pūrvāṃ pūrvāṃ vijānīyāl laghvīm āpadam āpadām |

              ||

dūṣya.śuddhāyāṃ paureṣu jānapadeṣu vā daṇḍa.varjān upāyān
            prayuñjīta | 2 |

kṣipto vā taṃ ca-arthaṃ na kuryāt, anyaṃ ca-anartham
            utpādayet | 4 |

śatru.śuddhāyāṃ yataḥ śatruḥ pradhānaḥ kāryo vā tataḥ
            sāma.ādibhiḥ siddhiṃ lipseta | 6 |

svāminy āyattā pradhāna.siddhiḥ, mantriṣv
            āyattā-āyatta.siddhiḥ, ubhaya.āyattā pradhāna.āyatta.siddhiḥ | 7 |
mitraṃ cen na sandhim icched abhīkṣṇam upajapet | 14 |
tataḥ sattribhir amitrād bhedayitvā mitraṃ labheta | 15 |
yathā ca-eṣām āśraya.bhedas tān upāyān prayuñjīta | 20 |

dhārmikaṃ jāti.kula.śruta.vṛtta.stavena sambandhena pūrveṣāṃ

nivṛtta.utsāhaṃ vigraha.śrāntaṃ pratihata.upāyaṃ
            kṣaya.vyayābhyāṃ pravāsena ca-upataptaṃ śaucena-anyaṃ lipsamānam anyasmād vā śaṅkamānaṃ
            maitrī.pradhānaṃ vā kalyāṇa.buddhiṃ sāmnā sādhayet | 22 |

lubdhaṃ kṣīṇaṃ vā tapasvi.mukhya.avasthāpanā.pūrvaṃ dānena

tat pañca.vidhaṃ - deya.visargo gṛhīta.anuvartanam

            |

bahulī.bhūte śāsanam abhityaktena preṣayet "etat te paṇyaṃ

            paṇa.śeṣam avāpsyasi" iti | 29 |

tataḥ sattriṇaḥ pareṣu grāhayeyuḥ "etad ari.pradattam" iti |
            30 |

śatru.prakhyātaṃ vā paṇyam avijñātaṃ vijigīṣuṃ gacchet | 31
            |

tataḥ sattriṇaḥ pareṣu grāhayeyuḥ "etat paṇyam ari.pradattam"
            iti | 33 |

mahā.aparādhān artha.mānābhyām upagṛhya vā
            śastra.rasa.agnibhir amitre praṇidadhyāt | 34 |

tasya putra.dāram upagṛhya rātrau hatam iti khyāpayet | 36
            |
te ced yathā.uktaṃ kuryur na ca-enān grāhayet | 38 |

utsāha.śaktimato vā preṣayet "amuṣya rājyaṃ gṛhāṇa,

ekasya skandha.āvāraṃ vīvadham āsāraṃ vā ghātayeyuḥ | 44
            |

itareṣu maitrīṃ bruvāṇāḥ "tvam eteṣāṃ ghātayitavyaḥ" ity

yasya vā pravīra.puruṣo hastī hayo vā mriyeta gūḍha.puruṣair

para.āvāpāt pratyāvāpāc ca catur.guṇād ā.aṣṭa.guṇād iti vā

vyāmiśro vā hasti.ratha.aśvānāṃ - cakra.anteṣu hastinaḥ
            pārśvayor aśvā rathā urasye | 31 |

hastinām urasyaṃ rathānāṃ kakṣāv aśvānāṃ pakṣāv iti
            madhya.bhedī | 32 |

hastinām eva tu śuddhaḥ - sāmnāhyānām urasyam aupavāhyānāṃ
            jaghanaṃ vyālānāṃ koṭyāv iti | 34 |

aśva.vyūho - varmiṇām urasyaṃ śuddhānāṃ kakṣa.pakṣāv iti | 35
            |

pattayaḥ pakṣayor aśvāḥ pārśvayoḥ hastinaḥ pṛṣṭhato rathāḥ
            purastāt, para.vyūha.vaśena vā viparyāsaḥ | 38 |

hasty.aśvayor viśeṣaḥ kulaṃ jātiḥ sattvaṃ vayaḥ.sthatā prāṇo
            varṣma javas tejaḥ śilpaṃ stairyam udagratā vidheyatvaṃ suvyañjana.ācāratā-iti | 42
            |

patty.aśva.ratha.dvipānāṃ sāra.tri.bhāgam urasyaṃ sthāpayet,
            dvau tri.bhāgau kakṣaṃ pakṣaṃ ca-ubhayataḥ, anulomam anusāram, pratilomaṃ tṛtīya.sāram,
            phalgu pratilomam | 43 |

sāra.balam agrataḥ kṛtvā koṭīṣv anusāraṃ kuryāt, jaghane
            tṛtiyiya.sāram, madhye phalgu.balam | 46 |

vyūhaṃ tu sthāpayitvā pakṣa.kakṣa.urasyānām ekena dvābhyāṃ vā
            praharet, śeṣaiḥ pratigṛhṇīyāt | 48 |

yat parasya durbalaṃ vīta.hasty.aśvaṃ dūṣya.amātyaṃ
            kṛta.upajāpaṃ vā tat.prabhūta.sāreṇa-abhihanyāt | 49 |
yad aṅgam alpa.sāram ātmanas tad bahunā-upacinuyāt | 51 |

yataḥ parasya-apacayas tato 'bhyāśe vyūheta, yatot vā bhayaṃ
            syāt | 52 |

abhisṛtaṃ parisṛtam atisṛtam apasṛtam unmathya.avadhānaṃ
            valayo go.mūtrikā maṇḍalaṃ prakīrṇikā vyāvṛtta.pṛṣṭham anuvaṃśam agrataḥ pārśvābhyāṃ
            pṛṣṭhato bhagna.rakṣā bhagna.anupāta ity aśva.yuddhāni | 53 |

prakīrṇika.āvarjāny etāny eva caturṇām aṅgānāṃ
            vyasta.samastānāṃ vā ghātaḥ, pakṣa.kakṣa.urasyānāṃ ca prabhañjanam avaskandaḥ sauptikaṃ
            ca-iti hasit.yuddhāni | 54 |

unmathya.avadhāna.varjāny etāny eva sva.bhūmāv
            abhiyāna.apayāna.sthita.yuddhāni-iti ratha.yuddhāni | 55 |
etena vidhinā vyūhān ojān yugmāṃś ca kārayet |
vibhavo yāvad aṅgānāṃ caturṇāṃ sadṛśo bhavet || 57 ||
dve śate dhanuṣāṃ gatvā rājā tiṣṭhet pratigrahe |

pakṣāv urasyaṃ pratigraha ity auśanaso vyūha.vibhāgaḥ | 1

durgaṃ dagdhaṃ hṛtaṃ vā te kopaḥ kulyaḥ samutthitaḥ |

tān anuguṇān bhuñjīta sāma.dānābhyām, viguṇān
            bheda.daṇḍābhyām | 3 |

sarveṣām āsannāḥ sattriṇaḥ saṅghānāṃ
            paraspara.nyaṅga.dveṣa.vaira.kalaha.sthānāny upalabhya krama.abhinītaṃ bhedam
            upacārayeyuḥ "asau tvā vijalpati" iti | 6 |

evam ubhayato.baddha.roṣāṇāṃ vidyā.śilpa.dyūta.vaihārikeṣv
            ācārya.vyañjanā bāla.kalahān utpādayeyuḥ | 7 |

veśa.śauṇḍikeṣu vā pratiloma.praśaṃsābhiḥ
            saṅgha.mukhya.manuṣyāṇāṃ tīkṣṇāḥ kalahān utpādayeyuḥ, kṛtya.pakṣa.upagraheṇa vā | 8
            |

viśiṣṭānāṃ ca-eka.pātraṃ vivāhaṃ vā hīnebhyo vārayeyuḥ | 10

avahīnān vā tulya.bhāva.upagamane kulataḥ pauruṣataḥ

rāja.śabdibhir avaruddham avakṣiptaṃ vā kulyam abhijātaṃ

n
            upajapet "sva.dharmam amuṣya rājñaḥ putre bhrātari vā pratipadyadhvam" iti | 22 |

pratipanneṣu kṛtya.pakṣa.upagraha.artham arthaṃ daṇḍaṃ ca

vikrama.kāle śauṇḍika.vyañjanāḥ putra.dāra.preta.apadeśena

caitya.daivata.dvāra.rakṣā.sthāneṣu ca sattriṇaḥ
            samaya.karma.nikṣepaṃ sahiraṇya.abhijñāna.mudrāṇi hiraṇya.bhājanāni ca prarūpayeyuḥ | 25
            |

saṅghānāṃ vā vāhana.hiraṇye kālike gṛhītvā saṅgha.mukhyāya

tad eṣāṃ yācite "dattam amuṣmai mukhyāya" iti brūyāt | 29
            |

saṅgha.mukhya.putram ātma.sambhāvitaṃ vā sattrī grāhayet

pratipannaṃ rājā kośa.daṇḍābhyām upagṛhya saṅgheṣu vikramayet
            | 32 |

bandhakī.poṣakāḥ plavaka.naṭa.nartaka.saubhikā vā praṇihitāḥ

visaṃvāditaṃ vā marṣayamāṇam abhisṛtya strī brūyāt "asau māṃ

tataḥ prakāśayet "amunā me priyo hataḥ" iti | 39 |

jāta.kāmaṃ vā siddha.vyañjanaḥ sāṃvadanikībhir auṣadhībhiḥ

āḍhya.vidhavā gūḍha.ājīvā yoga.striyo vā dāya.nikṣepa.arthaṃ

            |

pratipannān gūḍha.veśmasu rātri.samāgama.praviṣṭāṃs tīkṣṇā

sattrī vā strī.lolupaṃ saṅgha.mukhyaṃ prarūpayet "amuṣmin

gṛhītāyām ardha.māsa.anantaraṃ siddha.vyañjano

taṃ cet saṅgho nigṛhṇīyāt, rājā-enam upagṛhya viguṇeṣu

tatas tad.vyañjanāḥ prakrośeyuḥ "asau brahmahā brāhmaṇī.jāraś
            ca" iti | 48 |

            gṛhītvā-āgatā-asmi, nirdoṣā te bhāryā, gūḍham asmin pratikartavyam, aham api tāvat
            pratipatsyāmi" iti | 52 |

evaṃ.ādiṣu kalaha.sthāneṣu svayam utpanne vā kalahe tīkṣṇair
