Chapter 2 (Sections 163; 164): Fight with the Weapon of Diplomacy;
            Assassination of Army Chiefs
sa cet sandhau na-avatiṣṭheta, brūyād enaṃ -

ime śatru.ṣaḍ.varga.vaśagā rājāno
            vinaṣṭāḥ, teṣām anātmavatāṃ na-arhasi mārgam anugantum | 1 |

mitra.mukhā hy amitrās te ye tvā sāhasam adharmam
            artha.atikramaṃ ca grāhayanti | 3 |

śūrais tyakta.ātmabhiḥ saha yoddhuṃ sāhasam, jana.kṣayam
            ubhayataḥ kartum adharmaḥ, dṛṣṭam arthaṃ mitram aduṣṭaṃ ca tyaktum artha.atikramaḥ | 4
            |

mitravāṃś ca sa rājā, bhūyaś ca-etena-arthena mitrāṇy
            udyojayiṣyati yāni tvā sarvato 'bhiyāsyanti | 5 |

na ca madhyama.udāsīnayor maṇḍalasya vā parityaktaḥ, bhavāṃs
            tu parityaktaḥ yattvā samudyuktam upaprekṣante "bhūyaḥ kṣaya.vyayābhyāṃ yujyatām, mitrāc
            ca bhidyatām, atha-enaṃ parityakta.mūlaṃ sukhena-ucchetsyāmaḥ" iti | 6 |

sa bhavān na-arhati mitra.mukhānām amitrāṇāṃ śrotum, mitrāṇy
            udvejayitum amitrāṃś ca śreyasā yoktum, prāṇa.saṃśayam anarthaṃ ca-upagantum" iti
            yacchet | 7 |

tathā-api pratiṣṭhamānasya prakṛti.kopam asya kārayed yathā
            saṅgha.vṛtte vyākhyātaṃ yoga.vāmane ca | 8 |

yad uktam ātma.rakṣitake rakṣyaṃ tatra tīkṣṇān rasadāṃś ca
            prayuñjīta | 10 |

bahūnām ekasyāṃ dvayor vā mukhyayoḥ kāme jāte tīkṣṇāḥ kalahān
            utpādayeyuḥ | 12 |

kalahe parājita.pakṣaṃ paratra.apagamane yātrā.sāhāyya.dāne
            vā bhartur yojayeyuḥ | 13 |

kāma.vaśān vā siddha.vyañjanāḥ sāṃvadanikībhir oṣadhībhir
            atisandhānāya mukhyeṣu rasaṃ dāpayeyuḥ | 14 |

vaidehaka.vyañjane vā rāja.mahiṣyāḥ subhagāyāḥ preṣyām
            āsannāṃ kāma.nimittam arthena-abhivṛṣya parityajet | 15 |

tasya-eva paricāraka.vyañjana.upadiṣṭaḥ siddha.vyañjanaḥ
            sāṃvadanikīm oṣadhīṃ dadyāt "vaidehaka.śarīre 'vaghātavyā" iti | 16 |

siddhe subhagāyā apy enaṃ yogam upadiśet "rāja.śarīre
            'vadhātavyā" iti | 17 |

bhāryām asya bhikṣukī "rāja.patnī rāja.prasavinī vā
            bhaviṣyasi" iti | 20 |

bhāryā.vyañjanā vā mahā.mātraṃ brūyāt "rājā kila mām
            avarodhayiṣyati, tava-antikāya pattra.lekhyam ābharaṇaṃ ca-idaṃ parivrājikayā-āhṛtam"
            iti | 21 |

sūda.ārālika.vyañjano vā rasa.prayoga.arthaṃ rāja.vacanam
            arthaṃ ca-asya lobhanīyam abhinayet | 22 |

tad asya vaidehaka.vyañjanaḥ pratisandadhyāt, kārya.siddhiṃ
            ca brūyāt | 23 |

evam ekena dvābhyāṃ tribhir ity upāyair eka.ekam asya
            mahā.mātraṃ vikramāya-apagamanāya vā yojayet | iti | 24 |

durgeṣu ca-asya śūnya.pāla.āsannāḥ sattriṇaḥ paura.jānapadeṣu
            maitrī.nimittam āvedayeyuḥ -

śūnya.pālena-uktā yodhāś ca-adhikaraṇasthāś ca "kṛcchra.gato rājā jīvann
            āgamiṣyati, na vā, prasahya vittam ārjayadhvam, amitrāṃś ca hata" iti | 25 |

bahulī.bhūte tīkṣṇāḥ paurān niśāsv āhārayeyuḥ, mukhyāṃś
            ca-abhihanyuḥ "evaṃ kriyante ye śūnya.pālasya na śuśrūṣante" iti | 26 |

tataḥ sattriṇaḥ "śūnya.pālo ghātayati vilopayati ca" ity
            āvedayeyuḥ | 28 |

samāhartṛ.puruṣāṃs tu grāma.madhyeṣu rātrau tīkṣṇā hatvā
            brūyuḥ "evaṃ kriyante ye jana.padam adharmeṇa bādhante" iti | 30 |

samutpanne doṣe śūnya.pālaṃ samāhartāraṃ vā prakṛti.kopena
            ghātayeyuḥ | 31 |

daheyus tāṃś ca hanyur vā brūyur asya-ārta.vādinaḥ || 33
              ||

Chapter 3 (Sections 164; 165): Assassination of Army Chiefs (cont.);
            Stirring up the Circle of Kings

rājño rāja.vallabhānāṃ ca-āsannāḥ sattriṇaḥ
            patty.aśva.ratha.dvipa.mukhyānāṃ "rājā kruddhaḥ" iti suhṛd.viśvāsena mitra.sthānīyeṣu
            kathayeyuḥ | 1 |

bahulī.bhūte tīkṣṇāḥ kṛta.rātri.cāra.pratīkārā gṛheṣu
            "svāmi.vacanena-āgamyatām" iti brūyuḥ | 2 |

ye ca-apravāsitās tān sattriṇo brūyuḥ "etat tad yad asmābhiḥ
            kathitam, jīvitu.kāmena-apakrāntavyam" iti | 4 |
yebhyaś ca rājā yācito na dadāti tān sattriṇo brūyuḥ -

uktaḥ śūnya.pālo rājñā "ayācyam
            artham asau ca-asau ca mā yācate, mayā pratyākhyātāḥ śatru.saṃhitāḥ, teṣām uddharaṇe
            prayatasva" iti | 5 |
yebhyaś ca rājā yācito dadāti tān sattriṇo brūyuḥ -

uktaḥ śūnya.pālo rājñā "ayācyam artham
            asau ca-asau ca mā yācate, tebhyo mayā so 'rtho viśvāsa.arthaṃ dattaḥ, śatru.saṃhitāḥ,
            teṣām uddharaṇe prayatasva" iti | 7 |

ye ca-enaṃ yācyam arthaṃ na yācante tān sattriṇo brūyuḥ -
            "uktaḥ śūnya.pālo rājñā "yācyam artham asau ca-asau ca mā na yācate, kim anyat
            sva.doṣa.śaṅkitatvāt, teṣām uddharaṇe prayatasva" iti | 9 |

pratyāsanno vā rājānaṃ sattrī grāhayet "asau ca-asau ca te
            mahā.mātraḥ śatru.puruṣaiḥ sambhāṣate" iti | 12 |

pratipanne dūṣyān asya śāsana.harān darśayet "etat tat" iti |
            13 |

senā.mukhya.prakṛti.puruṣān vā bhūmyā hiraṇyena vā lobhayitvā
            sveṣu vikramayed apavāhayed vā | 14 |

yo 'sya putraḥ samīpe durge vā prativasati taṃ
            sattriṇā-upajāpayet "ātma.sampannataras tvaṃ putraḥ, tathā-apy antar.hitaḥ, tat.kim
            upekṣase vikramya gṛhāṇa, purā tvā yuva.rājo vināśayati" iti | 15 |

tat.kulīnam aparuddhaṃ vā hiraṇyena pratilobhya brūyāt
            "antar.balaṃ pratyanta.skandham antaṃ vā-asya pramṛdnīhi" iti | 16 |

āṭavikān artha.mānābhyām upagṛhya rājyam asya ghātayet | 17
            |

pārṣṇi.grāhaṃ vā-asya brūyāt "eṣa khalu rājā mām ucchidya
            tvām ucchetsyati, pārṣṇim asya gṛhāṇa, tvayi nivṛttasya-ahaṃ pārṣṇiṃ grahīṣyāmi" iti |
            18 |

mitrāṇi vā-asya brūyāt "ahaṃ vaḥ setuḥ, mayi vibhinne sarvān
            eṣa vo rājā plāvayiṣyati, sambhūya vā-asya yātrāṃ vihanāma" iti | 19 |

tat.saṃhatānām asaṃhatānāṃ ca preṣayet "eṣa khalu rājā mām
            utpāṭya bhavatsu karma kariṣyati, budhyadhvam, ahaṃ vaḥ śreyān abhyupapattum" iti | 20
            |

Chapter 4 (Sections 166; 167): Secret Use of Weapons, Fire and Poison;
            Destruction of Supplies, Reinforcements and Raids

ye ca-asya durgeṣu vaidehakavyañjanāḥ, grāmesu
            gṛhapatika.vyañjanāḥ, jana.pada.sandhiṣu go.rakṣaka.tāpasa.vyañjanāḥ, te
            sāmanta.āṭavika.tat.kulīna.aparuddhānāṃ paṇya.āgāra.pūrvaṃ preṣayeyuḥ "ayaṃ deśo hāryaḥ"
            iti | 1 |

āgatāṃś ca-eṣāṃ durge gūḍha.puruṣān artha.mānābhyām
            abhisatkṛtya prakṛtic.chidrāṇi pradarśayeyuḥ | 2 |

skandha.āvāre vā-asya śauṇḍika.vyañjanaḥ putram abhityaktaṃ
            sthāpayitvā-avaskanda.kāle rasena pravāsayitvā "naiṣecanikam" iti madana.rasa.yuktān
            madyakumbhān-śataśaḥ prayacchet | 4 |

śuddhaṃ vā madyaṃ pādyaṃ vā madyaṃ dadyād ekam ahaḥ, uttaraṃ
            ras.siddhaṃ prayacchet | 5 |

śuddhaṃ vā madyaṃ daṇḍa.mukhyebhyaḥ pradāya mada.kāle
            rasa.siddhaṃ prayacchet | 6 |

daṇḍa.mukhya.vyañjano vā putram abhityaktam iti samānam | 7
            |

pākva.māṃsika.audanika.auṇḍika.āpūpika.vyañjanā vā
            paṇya.viśeṣam avaghoṣayitvā paraspara.saṅgharṣeṇa kālikaṃ samarghataram iti vā parān
            āhūya rasena sva.paṇyāny apacārayeyuḥ | 8 |

surā.kṣīra.dadhi.sarpis.tailāni vā tad.vyavahartṛ.hasteṣu
            gṛhītā striyo bālāś ca rasa.yukteṣu sva.bhājaneṣu parikireyuḥ | 9 |

"anena-argheṇa, viśiṣṭaṃ vā bhūyo dīyatām" iti
            tatra-eva-avākireyuḥ | 10 |

karma.kara.vyañjanā vā rasa.aktaṃ yavasam udakaṃ vā
            vikrīṇīran | 13 |

cira.saṃsṛṣṭā vā go.vāṇijakā gavām aja.avīnāṃ vā yūthāny
            avaskanda.kāleṣu pareṣāṃ moha.sthāneṣu pramuñceyuḥ, aśva.khara.uṣṭramahiṣa.ādīnāṃ
            duṣṭāṃś ca | 14 |

lubdhaka.vyañjanā vā vyāla.mṛgān pañjarebhyaḥ pramuñceyuḥ,
            sarpa.grāhā vā sarpān ugra.viṣān, hasti.jīvino vā hastinaḥ | 16 |

gūḍha.puruṣā vā vimukhān patty.aśva.ratha.dvipa.mukhyān
            abhihanyuḥ, ādīpayeyur vā mukhya.āvāsān | 18 |

dūṣya.amitra.āṭavika.vyañjanāḥ praṇihitāḥ pṛṣṭha.abhighātam
            avaskanda.pratigrahaṃ vā kuryuḥ | 19 |

vana.gūḍhā vā pratyanta.skandham upaniṣkṛṣya-abhihanyuḥ,
            eka.ayane vīvadha.āsāra.prasārān vā | 20 |

sasaṅketaṃ vā rātri.yuddhe bhūri.tūryam āhatya brūyuḥ
            "anupraviṣṭāḥ smo, labdhaṃ rājyam" iti | 21 |

rāja.āvāsam anupraviṣṭā vā saṅkuleṣu rājānaṃ hanyuḥ | 22
            |

sarvato vā prayātam enaṃ (eva?) mleccha.āṭavika.daṇṭa.cāriṇaḥ
            sattra.apāśrayāḥ stambha.vāṭa.apāśrayā vā hanyuḥ | 23 |

saṅkaṭa.gatam agninā, dhānvana.gataṃ dhūmena, nidhāna.gataṃ
            rasena, toya.avagāḍhaṃ duṣṭa.grāhair udaka.caraṇair vā tīkṣṇāḥ sādhayeyuḥ, ādīpta.āvāsān
            niṣpatantaṃ vā | 28 |

Chapter 5 (Sections 168; 169; 170): Overreaching the Enemy by
            Trickery; Overreaching by Force; Victory of the Single King

daiva.tejyāyāṃ (devatā.ijyāyāṃ?) yātrāyām amitrasya bahūni
            pūjā.āgama.sthānāni bhaktitaḥ | 1 |

devatā.gṛha.praviṣṭasya-upari yantra.mokṣaṇena gūḍha.bhittiṃ
            śilāṃ vā pātayet | 3 |

śilā.śastra.varṣam uttama.āgārāt, kapāṭam avapātitaṃ vā,
            bhitti.praṇihitam eka.deśa.baddhaṃ vā parighaṃ mokṣayet | 4 |

sthāna.āsana.gamana.bhūmiṣu vā-asya go.maya.pradehena
            gandha.udaka.prasekena vā rasam aticārayet, puṣpa.cūrṇa.upahāreṇa vā | 6 |

śūlakūpam avapātanaṃ vā śayana.āsanasya-adhastād
            yantra.baddha.talam enaṃ kīla.mokṣaṇena praveśayet | 8 |

pratyāsanne vā-amitre jana.padāj janam avarodha.kṣamam
            atinayet | 9 |

durgāc ca-anavarodha.kṣamam apanayet, pratyādeyam ari.viṣayaṃ
            vā preṣayet | 10 |

jana.padaṃ ca-ekasthaṃ śaila.vana.nadī.durgeṣv
            aṭavī.vyavahiteṣu vā putra.bhrātṛ.parigṛhītaṃ sthāpayet | 11 |

suruṅgām amitra.sthāne bahu.mukhīṃ kṛtvā nicaya.mukhyān
            abhihārayet, amitraṃ vā | 16 |

para.prayuktāyāṃ vā suruṅgāyāṃ parikhām udaka.antikīṃ
            khānayet, kūpa.śālām anusālaṃ vā | 17 |

toya.kumbhān kāṃsya.bhāṇḍāni vā śaṅkā.sthāneṣu sthāpayet
            khāta.abhijñāna.artham | 18 |
madhye bhittvā dhūmam udakaṃ vā prayacchet | 20 |

prativihita.durgo vā mūle dāyādaṃ kṛtvā pratilomām asya diśaṃ
            gacchet, yato vā mitrair bandhubhir āṭavikair vā saṃsṛjyeta parasya-amitrair dūṣyair vā
            mahadbhiḥ, yato vā gato 'sya mitrair viyogaṃ kuryāt pārṣṇiṃ vā gṛhṇīyāt rājyaṃ vā-asya
            hārayet vīvadha.āsāra.prasārān vā vārayet, yato vā śaknuyād ākṣikavad apakṣepeṇa-asya
            prahartum, yato vā svaṃ rājyaṃ trāyeta mūlasya-upacayaṃ vā kuryāt | 21 |
yataḥ sandhim abhipretaṃ labheta tato vā gacchet | 22 |

saha.prasthāyino vā-asya preṣayeyuḥ "ayaṃ te śatrur asmākaṃ
            hasta.gataḥ, paṇyaṃ viprakāraṃ vā-apadiśya hiraṇyam antaḥ.sāra.balaṃ ca preṣaya
            yasya-enam arpayema baddhaṃ pravāsitaṃ vā" iti | 23 |

anta.pālo vā durga.sampradāne bala.eka.deśam atinīya
            viśvastaṃ ghātayet | 25 |

jana.padam ekasthaṃ vā ghātayitum amitra.anīkam āvāhayet | 26
            |

mitra.vyañjano vā bāhyasya preṣayet "kṣīṇam asmin durge
            dhānyaṃ snehāḥ kṣāro lavaṇaṃ vā, tad amuṣmin deśe kāle ca pravekṣyati, tad upagṛhāṇa"
            iti | 28 |

tato rasa.viddhaṃ dhānyaṃ snehaṃ kṣāraṃ lavaṇaṃ vā
            dūṣya.amitra.āṭavikāḥ praveśayeyuḥ, anye vā-abhityaktāḥ | 29 |

sandhiṃ vā kṛtvā hiraṇya.eka.deśam asmai dadyāt, vilambamānaḥ
            śeṣam | 31 |

rātrāv avaskandaṃ dattvā siddhas tiṣṭhet, asiddhaḥ
            pārśvena-apagacchet | 37 |

evaṃ gṛhīta.durgo vā prāśya.prāśaṃ caityam upasthāpya
            daivata.pratimāc.chidraṃ praviśya-āsīta, gūḍha.bhittiṃ vā, daivata.pratimā.yuktaṃ vā
            bhūmi.gṛham | 43 |

vismṛte suruṅgayā rātrau rāja.āvāsam anupraviśya suptam
            amitraṃ hanyāt | 44 |

rasa.agni.yogena-avaliptaṃ gṛhaṃ jatu.gṛhaṃ vā-adhiśayānam
            amitram ādīpayet | 46 |

pramada.vana.vihārāṇām anyatame vā vihāra.sthāne pramattaṃ
            bhūmi.gṛha.suruṅgā.gūḍha.bhitti.praviṣṭās tīkṣṇā hanyuḥ, gūḍha.praṇihitā vā rasena | 47
            |

svapato vā niruddhe deśe gūḍhāḥ striyaḥ
            sarpa.rasa.agni.dhūmān upari muñceyuḥ | 48 |

pratyutpanne vā kāraṇe yad yad upapadyeta tat tad amitre
            'ntaḥ.pura.gate gūḍha.sañcāraḥ prayuñjīta | 49 |

tato gūḍham eva-apagacchet, svajana.sañjñāṃ ca prarūpayet |
            50 |
Book 13: Means of Taking a Fort

vijigīṣuḥ para.grāmam avāptu.kāmaḥ
            sarvajña.daivata.samyoga.khyāpanābhyāṃ sva.pakṣam uddharṣayet, para.pakṣaṃ ca-udvejayet
            | 1 |

sarvajña.khyāpanaṃ tu - gṛha.guhya.pravṛtti.jñānena
            pratyādeśo mukhyānām, kaṇṭaka.śodhana.apasarpa.avagamena prakāśanaṃ rāja.dviṣṭa.kāriṇām,
            vijñāpya.upāyana.khyāpanam adṛṣṭa.saṃsarga.vidyā.sañjñā.ādibhiḥ, videśa.pravṛtti.jñānaṃ
            tad ahar eva gṛha.kapotena mudrā.samyuktena | 2 |

daivata.samyoga.khyāpanaṃ tu -
            suruṅgā.mukhena-agni.caitya.daivata.pratimāc.chidrān anupraviṣṭair
            agni.caitya.daivata.vyañjanaiḥ sambhāṣaṇaṃ pūjanaṃ ca, udakād utthitair vā
            nāga.varuṇa.vyañjanaiḥ sambhāṣaṇaṃ pūjanaṃ ca, rātrāv antar.udake samudra.vālukā.kośaṃ
            praṇidhāya-agni.mālā.darśanam, śilā.śikya.avagṛhīte plavake sthānam, udaka.bastinā
            jarāyuṇā vā śiro 'vagūḍha.nāsaḥ pṛṣata.antra.kulīra.nakra.śiṃśumāra.udravasābhir vā
            śata.pākyaṃ tailaṃ nastaḥ prayogaḥ | 3 |

tair varuṇa.nāga.kanyā.vākya.kriyā sambhāṣaṇaṃ ca,
            kopa.sthāneṣu mukhād agni.dhūma.utsargaḥ | 6 |

tad asya sva.viṣaye
            kārtāntika.naimittika.mauhūrtika.paurāṇika.ikṣaṇika.gūḍha.puruṣāḥ sācivya.karās
            tad.darśinaś ca prakāśayeyuḥ | 7 |

parasya viṣaye daivata.darśanaṃ divya.kośa.daṇḍa.utpattiṃ
            ca-asya brūyuḥ | 8 |
sadundubhim ulkāṃ ca parasya nakṣatre darśayeyuḥ | 10 |

parasya mukhyān mitratvena-upadiśanto dūta.vyañjanāḥ
            svāmi.satkāraṃ brūyuḥ, sva.pakṣa.bala.ādhānaṃ para.pakṣa.pratighātaṃ ca | 11 |

sādhāraṇa.gardabhena dakṣān, lakuṭa.śākhā.hananābhyāṃ
            daṇḍa.cāriṇaḥ, kula.eḍakena ca-udvignān, aśani.varṣeṇa vimānitān, vidulena-avakeśinā
            vāyasa.piṇḍena kaitavaja.meghena-iti vihata.āśān durbhaga.alaṅkāreṇa dveṣiṇā-iti
            pūjā.phalān, vyāghra.carmaṇā mṛtyu.kūṭena ca-upahitān, pīlu.vikhādanena karaka.yoṣṭrayā
            gardabhī.kṣīrā.abhimanthanena-iti dhruva.upakāriṇa iti | 16 |

durbhikṣa.stena.aṭavy.upaghāteṣu ca paura.jānapadān
            utsāhayantaḥ sattriṇo brūyuḥ "rājānam anugrahaṃ yācāmahe- niranugrahāḥ paratra
            gacchāmaḥ" iti | 20 |

sācivyaṃ kāryam ity etad upajāpād bhūtaṃ mahat || 21
              ||

Chapter 2 (Section 172): Drawing the Enemy out by Means of
            Stratagems

muṇḍo jaṭilo vā parvata.guha.āvāsī catur.varṣa.śata.āyur
            bruvāṇaḥ prabhūta.jaṭila.ante.vāsī nagara.abhyāśe tiṣṭhet | 1 |

śiṣyāś ca-asya mūla.phala.upagamanair amātyān rājānaṃ ca
            bhagavad.darśanāya yojayeyuḥ | 2 |

samāgatāś ca rājñā pūrva.rāja.deśa.abhijñānāni kathayet,
            "śate śate ca varṣāṇāṃ pūrṇe 'ham agniṃ praviśya punar bālo bhavāmi, tad iha bhavat
            samīpe caturtham agniṃ pravekṣyāmi, avaśyaṃ me bhavān mānayitavyaḥ, trīn varān vṛṇīṣva
            (vṛṣīṣva?)" iti | 3 |

pratipannaṃ brūyāt "sapta.rātram iha saputra.dāreṇa
            prekṣā.prahavaṇa.pūrvaṃ vastavyam" iti | 4 |

muṇḍo vā jaṭilo vā sthānika.vyañjanaḥ
            prabhūta.jaṭila.ante.vāsī vasta.śoṇita.digdhāṃ veṇu.śalākāṃ suvarṇa.cūrṇena-avalipya
            valmīke nidadhyād upajihvika.anusaraṇa.artham, svarṇa.nālikāṃ vā | 6 |

tataḥ sattrī rājñaḥ kathayet "asau siddhaḥ puṣpitaṃ nidhiṃ
            jānāti"

sa rājñā pṛṣṭhaḥ "tathā" iti brūyāt, tac ca-abhijñānaṃ
            darśayet, bhūyo vā hiraṇyam antar.ādhāya | 8 |

sthānika.vyañjanaṃ vā rātrau tejana.agni.yuktam ekānte
            tiṣṭhantaṃ sattriṇaḥ krama.abhīnītaṃ rājñaḥ kathayeyuḥ "asau siddhaḥ sāmedhikaḥ" iti |
            11 |

taṃ rājā yam arthaṃ yāceta tam asya kariṣyamāṇaḥ
            "sapta.rātram" iti samānam | 12 |

siddha.vyañjano vā deśa.devatām abhyarhitām āśritya
            prahavaṇair abhīkṣṇaṃ prakṛti.mukhyān abhisaṃvāsya krameṇa rājānam atisandadhyāt | 15
            |

jaṭila.vyañjanam antar.udaka.vāsinaṃ vā sarva.śvetaṃ
            taṭa.suruṅgā.bhūmi.gṛha.apasaraṇaṃ varuṇaṃ nāga.rājaṃ vā sattriṇaḥ krama.abhinītaṃ
            rājñaḥ kathayeyuḥ | 16 |

jana.pada.ante.vāsī siddha.vyañjano vā rājānaṃ
            śatru.darśanāya yojayet | 18 |

pratipannaṃ bimbaṃ kṛtvā śatrum āvāhayitvā niruddhe deśe
            ghātayet | 19 |

aśva.paṇya.upayātā vaidehaka.vyañjanāḥ paṇya.upāyana.nimittam
            āhūya rājānaṃ paṇya.parīkṣāyām āsaktam aśva.vyatikīrṇaṃ vā hanyuḥ, aśvaiś ca prahareyuḥ
            | 20 |

nagara.abhyāśe vā caityam āruhya rātrau tīkṣṇāḥ kumbheṣu
            nālīn vā vidulāni dhamantaḥ "svāmino mukhyānāṃ vā māṃsāni bhakṣayiṣyāmaḥ, pūjā no
            vartatām" ity avyaktaṃ brūyuḥ | 21 |

maṅgalye vā hrade taṭāka.madhye vā rātrau
            tejana.taila.abhyaktā nāga.rūpiṇaḥ śakti.musalāny ayomayāni niṣpeṣayantas tathaiva
            brūyuḥ | 23 |

ṛkṣa.carma.kañcukino vā-agni.dhūma.utsarga.yuktā rakṣo.rūpaṃ
            vahantas trir apasavyaṃ nagaraṃ kurvāṇāḥ śva.sṛgāla.vāśita.antareṣu tathaiva brūyuḥ | 24
            |

caitya.daivata.pratimāṃ vā
            tejana.tailena-abhra.paṭalac.channena-agninā vā rātrau prajvālya tathaiva brūyuḥ | 25
            |

daivata.pratimānām abhyarhitānāṃ vā śoṇitena prasrāvam
            atimātraṃ kuryuḥ | 27 |

tad anye deva.rudhira.saṃsrāve saṅgrāme parājayaṃ brūyuḥ | 28
            |

sandhi.rātriṣu śmaśāna.pramukhe vā caityam ūrdhva.bhakṣitair
            manuṣyaiḥ prarūpayeyuḥ | 29 |

yaś ca-atra śūra.vādiko 'nyatamo vā draṣṭum āgacchet tam anye
            loha.musalair hanyuḥ, yathā rakṣobhir hata iti jñāyeta | 31 |

tad adbhutaṃ rājñas tad.darśinaḥ sattriṇaś ca kathayeyuḥ | 32
            |

tato naimititka.mauhūrtika.vyañjanāḥ śāntiṃ prāyaś.cittaṃ
            brūyuḥ "anyathā mahad akuśalaṃ rājño deśasya ca" iti | 33 |

pratipannaṃ "eteṣu sapta.rātram eka.eka.mantra.bali.homaṃ
            svayaṃ rājñā kartavyam" iti brūyuḥ | 34 |

etān vā yogān ātmani darśayitvā pratikurvīta pareṣām
            upadeśa.artham | 36 |

hasti.kāmaṃ vā nāga.vana.pālā hastinā lakṣaṇyena
            pralobhayeyuḥ | 39 |

pratipannaṃ gahanam eka.ayanaṃ vā-atinīya ghātayeyuḥ, baddhvā
            vā-apahareyuḥ | 40 |

dravya.strī.lolupam āḍhya.vidhavābhir vā
            parama.rūpa.yauvanābhiḥ strībhir dāya.nikṣepa.artham upanītābhiḥ sattriṇaḥ pralobhayeyuḥ
            | 42 |

pratipannaṃ rātrau sattrac.channāḥ samāgame śastra.rasābhyāṃ
            ghātayeyuḥ | 43 |
yeṣu deśeṣu yāḥ prekṣāḥ prekṣate pārthivaḥ svayam |
pramādaṃ yāti yasmin vā viśvāsāt sva.jana.utsave |
vipra.sthāne pradīpte vā praviṣṭe nirjane 'pi vā |

sa param āśrtya pakṣa.apadeśena sva.viṣayāt
            sācivya.kara.sahāya.upādānaṃ kurvīta | 2 |

kṛta.apasarpa.upacayo vā param anumānya svāmino dūṣya.grāmaṃ
            vīta.hasty.aśvaṃ dūṣya.amātyaṃ daṇḍam ākrandaṃ vā hatvā parasya preṣayet | 3 |

jana.pada.eka.deśaṃ śreṇīm aṭavīṃ vā sahāya.upādāna.arthaṃ
            saṃśrayeta | 4 |

tataḥ svāmī hasti.bandhanam aṭavī.ghātaṃ vā-apadiśya gūḍham
            eva praharet | 6 |

te tat.śatroḥ preṣayeyuḥ "bhartāraṃ naḥ prasādaya" iti | 9
            |

sa yaṃ dūtaṃ preṣayet, tam upālabheta "bhartā te mām amātyair
            bhedayati, na ca punar iha-āgantavyam" iti | 10 |

sa param āśritya yoga.apasarpa.aparakta.dūṣyān aśaktimataḥ
            stena-āṭavikān ubhaya.upaghātakān vā parasya-upaharet | 12 |

āpta.bhāva.upagataḥ pravīra.puruṣa.upaghātam asya-upahared
            anta.pālam āṭavikaṃ daṇḍa.cāriṇaṃ vā "dṛḍham asau ca-asau ca te śatruṇā sandhatte" iti |
            13 |

kṛtya.pakṣa.upagraheṇa vā parasya.amitraṃ rājānam ātmany
            apakārayitvā-abhiyuñjīta | 16 |

tataḥ parasya preṣayet "asau te vairī mama-apakaroti, tam ehi
            sambhūya haniṣyāvaḥ, bhūmau hiraṇye vā te parigrahaḥ" iti | 17 |

pratipannam abhisatkṛtya-āgatam avaskandena prakāśayuddhena
            vā śatruṇā ghātayet | 18 |

svayam
            āgacchet tam asya vairiṇā ghātayet | 21 |

daṇḍena vā prayātum icchen na vijigīṣuṇā tathā-apy enam
            ubhayataḥ.sampīḍanena ghātayet | 22 |

aviśvasto vā pratyekaśo yātum icched rājya.eka.deśaṃ vā
            yātavyasya-ādātu.kāmaḥ, tathā-apy enaṃ vairiṇā sarva.sandohena vā ghātayet | 23 |

vairiṇā vā saktasya daṇḍa.upanayena mūlam anyato hārayet | 24
            |

śatru.bhūmyā vā mitraṃ paṇeta, mitra.bhūmyā vā śatrum | 25
            |

tataḥ śatru.bhūmi.lipsāyāṃ mitreṇa-ātmany
            apakārayitvā-abhiyuñjīta - iti samānāḥ pūrveṇa sarva eva yogāḥ | 26 |

kṛta.pratividhāno vā vyasanam ātmano darśayitvā
            mitreṇa-amitram utsāhayitvā-ātmānam abhiyojayet | 29 |

tataḥ sampīḍanena ghātayet, jīva.grāheṇa vā rājya.vinimayaṃ
            kārayet | 30 |

mitreṇa-āśritaś cet-śatrur agrāhye sthātum icchet
            sāmanta.ādibhir mūlam asya hārayet | 31 |
daṇḍena vā trātum ichet tam asya ghātayet | 32 |

tau cen na bhidyeyātāṃ prakāśam eva-anyonya.bhūmyā paṇeta |
            33 |

tataḥ parasparaṃ mitra.vyañjanā vā ubhaya.vetanā vā dūtān
            preṣayeyuḥ "ayaṃ te rājā bhūmiṃ lipsate śatru.saṃhitaḥ" iti | 34 |

lubdhaka.vyañjanā vā māṃsa.vikrayeṇa dvāhsthā
            dauvārika.apāśrayāś cora.abhyāgamaṃ parasya dvis trir iti nivedya labdha.pratyayā
            bhartur anīkaṃ dvidhā niveśya grāma.vadhe 'vaskande ca dviṣato brūyuḥ "āsannaś
            cora.gaṇaḥ, mahāṃś ca-ākrandaḥ, prabhūtaṃ sainyam āgacchatu" iti | 40 |

tad arpayitvā grāma.ghāta.daṇḍasya sainyam itarad ādāya
            rātrau durga.dvāreṣu brūyuḥ "hataś cora.gaṇaḥ, siddha.yātram idaṃ sainyam āgatam, dvāram
            apāvriyatām" iti | 41 |

teṣāṃ gṛha.patika.vyañjanāḥ kāṣṭha.tṛṇa.dhānya.paṇya.śakaṭaiḥ
            praharaṇa.āvaraṇāny abhihareyuḥ, deva.dhvaja.pratimābhir vā | 45 |

tatas tad.vyañjanāḥ pramatta.vadham avaskanda.pratigraham
            abhipraharaṇaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ śaṅkha.dundubhi.śabdena vā "praviṣṭam" ity āvedayeyuḥ | 46
            |

sārtha.gaṇa.vāsibhir ātivāhikaiḥ kanyā.vāhikair
            aśva.paṇya.vyavahāribhir upakaraṇa.hārakair dhānya.kretṛ.vikretṛbhir vā
            pravrajita.liṅgibhir dūtaiś ca daṇaḍ.atinayanam, sandhi.karma.viśvāsana.artham | 48
            |

vrajam aṭavy.āsannam apasarpāḥ sārthaṃ vā corair ghātayeyuḥ |
            51 |

kṛta.saṅketam anna.pānaṃ ca-atra madana.rasa.viddhaṃ vā
            kṛtvā-apagaccheyuḥ | 52 |

go.pālaka.vaidehakāś ca tataś corān gṛhīta.loptra.bhārān
            madana.rasa.vikāra.kāle 'vaskandayeyuḥ | 53 |

śauṇḍika.vyañjano vā daivata.preta.kārya.utsava.samājeṣv
            āṭavikān surā.vikraya.upāyana.nimittaṃ madana.rasa.yogena-atisandadhyāt | 56 |

Chapter 4 (Sections 174; 175): Laying Siege to a Fort; Storming a
            Fort

saṅgrāmād anyasyāṃ bhūmau niveśayet, ekasyāṃ vā vāsayet | 4
            |

na hy ajano jana.pado rājyam ajana.padaṃ vā bhavati-iti
            kauṭilyaḥ | 5 |

viṣamasthasya muṣṭiṃ sasyaṃ vā hanyād, vīvadha.prasārau ca |
            6 |

"prabhūta.guṇa.vaddha.anya.kupya.yantra.śastra.āvaraṇa.viṣṭir
            aśmi.samagraṃ me sainyam, ṛtuś ca purastāt, apartuḥ parasya,
            vyādhi.durbhikṣa.nicaya.rakṣā.kṣayaḥ krīta.bala.nirvedo mitra.bala.nirvedaś ca" iti
            paryupāsīta | 8 |

kṛtvā skandha.āvārasya rakṣāṃ vīvadha.āsārayoḥ pathaś ca,
            parikṣipya durgaṃ khāta.sālābhyām, dūṣayitvā-udakam, avasrāvya parikhāḥ sampūrayitvā vā,
            suruṅgā.bala.kuṭikābhyāṃ vapra.prākārau hārayet, dāraṃ ca guḍena | 9 |

vikrama.antareṣu ca niyoga.vikalpa.samuccayaiś ca-upāyānāṃ
            siddhiṃ lipseta | 13 |

durga.vāsinaḥ
            śyena.kāka.naptṛ.bhāsa.śuka.sārika.ulūka.kapotān grāhayitvā puccheṣv agni.yoga.yuktān
            para.durge visṛjet | 14 |

apakṛṣṭa.skandha.āvārād ucchrita.dhvaja.dhanva.ārakṣo vā
            mānuṣeṇa-agninā para.durgam ādīpayet | 15 |

gūḍha.purṣāś ca-antar.durga.pālakā nakula.vānara.biḍāla.śunāṃ
            puccheṣv agni.yogam ādhāya kāṇḍa.nicaya.rakṣā.vidhāna.veśmasu visṛjeyuḥ | 16 |

śuṣka.matsyānām udareṣv agnim ādhāya vallūre vā
            vāyasa.upahāreṇa vayobhir hārayeyuḥ | 17 |

priyāla.cūrṇam avalgu.jamaṣī.madhu.ucchiṣṭam
            aśva.khara.uṣṭra.go.leṇḍam ity eṣa kṣepyo 'gni.yogaḥ | 19 |

sarva.loha.cūrṇam agni.varṇaṃ vā kumbhī.sīsa.trapu.cūrṇaṃ vā
            pāribhadraka.palāśa.puṣpa.keśa.maṣī.taila.madhu.ucchiṣṭaka.śrī.- veṣṭaka.yukto 'gni.yogo
            viśvāsa.ghātī vā | 20 |
na tv eva vidyamāne parākrame 'gnim avasṛjet | 22 |

kṣīṇa.nicayaṃ ca-avāptam api rājyaṃ kṣayāya-eva bhavati | 24
            | iti paryupāsana.karma |

"sarva.ārambha.upakaraṇa.viṣṭi.sampanno 'smi, vyādhitaḥ para
            upadhā.viruddha.prakṛtir akṛta.durga.karma.nicayo vā, nirāsāraḥ sāsāro vā purā mitraiḥ
            sandhatte" ity avamarda.kālaḥ | 25 |

svayam agnau jāte samutthāpite vā prahavaṇe
            prekṣā.anīka.darśana.saṅga.saurika.kalaheṣu nitya.yuddha.śrānta.bale
            bahula.yuddha.pratividdha.preta.puruṣe jāgaraṇa.klānta.supta.jane durdine nadī.vege vā
            nīhāra.samplave vā-avamṛdnīyāt | 26 |

skandha.āvāram utsṛjya vā vana.gūḍhaḥ śatruṃ niṣkrāntaṃ
            ghātayet | 27 |

mitra.āsāra.mukhya.vyañjano vā samruddhena maitrīṃ kṛtvā
            dūtam abhityaktaṃ preṣayet - "idaṃ te chidram, ime dūṣyāḥ" "samroddhur vā chidram, ayaṃ
            te kṛtya.pakṣaḥ" iti | 28 |

taṃ pratidūtam ādāya nirgacchantaṃ vijigīṣur gṛhītvā doṣam
            abhivikhyāpya pravāsya apagacchet | 29 |

tato mitra.āsāra.vyañjano vā samruddhaṃ brūyāt "māṃ trātum
            upanirgaccha, mayā vā saha samroddhāraṃ jahi" iti | 30 |

pratipannam ubhayataḥ.sampīḍanena ghātayet, jīva.grāheṇa vā
            rājya.vinimayaṃ kārayet | 31 |

daṇḍa.upanata.āṭavikayor anyataro vā samruddhasya preṣayet -
            "ayaṃ samroddhā vyādhitaḥ, pārṣṇi.grāheṇa-abhiyuktaḥ, chidram anyad utthitam, anyasyāṃ
            bhūmāv apayātu.kāmaḥ" iti | 35 |

āsāra.vyañjano vā samruddhasya dūtaṃ preṣayet - "mayā bāhyam
            abhihatam upanirgaccha-abhihantum" iti | 39 |

mitraṃ bandhuṃ vā-apadiśya yoga.puruṣāḥ śāsana.mudrā.hastāḥ
            praviśya durgaṃ grāhayeyuḥ | 41 |

āsāra.vyañjñano vā samruddhasya preṣayet - "amuṣmin deśe kāle
            ca skandha.āvāram abhihaniṣyāmi, yuṣmābhir api yoddhavyam" iti | 42 |

pratipannaṃ yathā.uktam abhyāghāta.saṅkulaṃ darśayitvā rātrau
            durgān niṣkrāntaṃ ghātayet | 43 |

yad vā mitram āvāhayed āṭavvikaṃ vā, tam utsāhayet "vikramya
            samruddhe bhūmim asya pratipadyasva" iti | 44 |

vikrāntaṃ prakṛtibhir dūṣya.mukhya.upagraheṇa vā ghātayet,
            svayaṃ vā rasena "mitra.ghātako 'yam" ity avāpta.arthaḥ | 45 |
sandhiṃ vā kṛtvā jana.padam enaṃ niveśayet | 48 |

apakārayitvā dūṣya.āṭavikeṣu vā bala.eka.deśam atinīya durgam
            avaskandena hārayet | 50 |

para.durgam avaskandya skandha.āvāraṃ vā
            patita.parān.mukha.abhipannam ukta.keśa.śastra.bhaya.virūpebhyaś ca-abhayam
            ayudhyamānebhyaś ca dadyuḥ | 52 |

para.durgam avāpya viśuddha.śatru.pakṣaṃ
            kṛta.upāṃśu.daṇḍa.pratīkāram antar.bahiś ca praviśet | 53 |

evaṃ vijigīṣur amitra.bhūmiṃ labdhvā madhyamaṃ lipseta,
            tat.siddhāv udāsīnam | 54 |

madhyama.udāsīnayor abhāve guṇa.atiśayena-ari.prakṛtīḥ
            sādhayet, tata uttarāḥ prakṛtīḥ | 56 |

maṇḍalasya-abhāve śatruṇā mitraṃ mitreṇa vā śatrum
            ubhayataḥ.sampīḍanena sādhayet | 58 |

śakyam ekaṃ vā sāmantaṃ sādhayet, tena dvi.guṇo dvitīyam,
            tri.guṇas tṛtīyam | 60 |

jitvā ca pṛthivīṃ vibhakta.varṇa.āśramāṃ sva.dharmeṇa
            bhuñjīta | 62 |

Chapter 5 (Section 176): Pacification of the Conquered
            Territory

dvividhaṃ vijigīṣoḥ samutthānaṃ - aṭavy.ādikam
            eka.grāma.ādikaṃ ca | 1 |

trividhaś ca-asya lambhaḥ - navo, bhūta.pūrvaḥ, pitrya iti |
            2 |

navam avāpya lābhaṃ para.doṣān sva.guṇaiś chādayet, guṇān
            guṇa.dvaiguṇyena | 3 |

yathā.sambhāṣitaṃ ca kṛtya.pakṣam upagrāhayet, bhūyaś ca
            kṛta.prayāsam | 5 |

aviśvāso hi visaṃvādakaḥ sveṣāṃ pareṣāṃ ca bhavati,
            prakṛti.viruddha.ācāraś ca | 6 |

deśa.grāma.jāti.saṅgha.mukhyeṣu ca-abhīkṣṇaṃ sattriṇaḥ
            parasya-apacāraṃ darśayeyuḥ, māhābhāgyaṃ bhaktiṃ ca teṣu svāminaḥ, svāmi.satkāraṃ ca
            vidyamānam | 9 |

sarva.devatā.āśrama.pūjanaṃ ca
            vidyā.vākya.dharma.śūra.puruṣāṇāṃ ca bhūmi.dravya.dāna.parihārān kārayet,
            sarva.bandhana.mokṣaṇam anugrahaṃ dīna.anātha.vyādhitānāṃ ca | 11 |

cāturmāsyeṣv ardha.māsikam aghātam, paurṇamāsīṣu ca
            cātūrātrikaṃ rāja.deśa.nakṣatreṣv aikarātrikam | 12 |

yac ca kośa.daṇḍa.upaghātakam adharmiṣṭhaṃ vā caritraṃ
            manyeta tad apanīya dharmya.vyavahāraṃ sthāpayet | 14 |

cora.prakṛtīnāṃ mleccha.jātīnāṃ ca sthāna.viparyāsam
            anekasthaṃ kārayet, durga.rāṣṭra.daṇḍa.mukhyānāṃ ca | 15 |

parā.upagṛhītānāṃ ca mantri.purohitānāṃ parasya pratyanteṣv
            anekasthaṃ vāsaṃ kārayet | 16 |

apakāra.samarthān anukṣiyato vā bhartṛ.vināśam upāṃśu.daṇḍena
            praśamayet | 17 |

sva.deśīyān vā pareṇa vā-aparuddhān apavāhita.sthāneṣu
            sthāpayet | 18 |

yaś ca tat.kulīnaḥ pratyādeyam ādātuṃ śaktaḥ,
            pratyanta.aṭavīstho vā prabādhitum abhijātaḥ, tasmai viguṇāṃ bhūmiṃ prayacchet,
            guṇavatyāś catur.bhāgaṃ vā kośa.daṇḍa.dānam avasthāpya, yad upakurvāṇaḥ paura.jānapadān
            kopayet | 19 |

prakṛtibhir upakruṣṭam apanayet, aupaghātike vā deśe
            niveśayet | iti | 21 |

bhūta.pūrve yena doṣeṇa-apavṛttas taṃ prakṛti.doṣaṃ chādayet,
            yena ca guṇena-upāvṛttas taṃ tīvrī.kuryāt | iti | 22 |

pitrye pitur doṣāṃś chādayet, guṇāṃś ca prakāśayet | iti | 23
            |

caritram akṛtaṃ dharmyaṃ kṛtaṃ ca-anyaiḥ pravartayet
              |

pravartayen na ca-adharmyaṃ kṛtaṃ ca-anyair nivartayet ||
              24 ||

Chapter 1 (Section 177): Secret Practices for the Destruction of Enemy
            Troops

kāla.kūṭa.ādir viṣa.vargaḥ
            śraddheya.deśa.veṣa.śilpa.bhāṣā.abhijana.apadeśaiḥ
            kubja.vāmana.kirāta.mūka.badhira.jaḍa.andhac.chadmabhir mleccha.jātīyair abhipretaiḥ
            strībhiḥ pumbhiś ca para.śarīra.upabhogeṣv avadhātavyaḥ | 2 |

rāja.krīḍā.bhāṇḍa.nidhāna.dravya.upabbhogeṣu gūḍhāḥ
            śastra.nidhānaṃ kuryuḥ, sattra.ājīvinaś ca rātri.cāriṇo 'gni.jīvinaś ca-agni.nidhānam |
            3 |

kalā.mātraṃ puruṣāṇām, dvi.guṇaṃ khara.aśvānām, catur.guṇaṃ
            hasty.uṣṭrāṇām | 8 |

śata.kardama.uccidiṅga.kara.vīra.kaṭu.tumbī.matsya.dhūmo
            madana.kodrava.palālena hasti.karṇa.palāśa.palālena vā pravāta.anuvāte praṇīto yāvac
            carati tāvan mārayati | 9 |

pārāvata.plavaka.kravya.adānāṃ hasti.nara.varāhāṇāṃ ca
            mūtra.purīṣaṃ kāsīsa.hiṅgu.yava.tuṣa.kaṇa.taṇḍulāḥ kārpāsa.kuṭaja.kośa.atakīnāṃ ca
            bījāni go.mūtrikā.bhāṇḍī.mūlaṃ nimba.śigru.phaṇirja.kākṣīva.pīluka.bhaṅgaḥ
            sarpa.śapharī.carma hasti.nakha.śṛṅga.cūrṇam ity eṣa dhūmo madana.kodrava.palālena
            hasti.karṇa.palāśa.palālena vā praṇītaḥ pratyekaśo yāvac carati tāvan mārayati | 13
            |

kālī.kuṣṭha.naḍa.śatāvalī.mūlaṃ
            sarpa.pracalāka.kṛkaṇa.pañca.kuṣṭha.cūrṇaṃ vā dhūmaḥ pūrva.kalpena-ārdra.śuṣka.palālena
            vā praṇītaḥ saṅgrāma.avataraṇa.avaskandana.saṅkuleṣu kṛta.nejana.udaka.akṣi.pratīkāraiḥ
            praṇītaḥ sarva.prāṇināṃ netraghnaḥ | 14 |

śārikā.kapota.baka.balākā.leṇḍam
            arka.akṣi.pīluka.snuhi.kṣīra.piṣṭam andhī.karaṇam añjanam udaka.dūṣaṇaṃ ca | 15 |

sa eva citram eka.antra.madhu.yuktaḥ prameham āpādayati,
            manuṣya.lohita.yuktaḥ śoṣam | 21 |

bhaṅga.kvātha.upanayanam auṣadhānām, cūrṇaṃ prāṇa.bhṛtām,
            sarveṣāṃ vā kvātha.upanayanam, evaṃ vīryavattaraṃ bhavti | 27 |

śālmalī vidārī.dhānya.siddho mūla.vatsa.nābha.samyuktaś
            cucchundarī.śoṇita.pralepena digdho bāṇo yaṃ vidhyati sa viddho 'nyān daśa.puruṣān
            daśati, te daṣṭā daśa-anyān daśanti puruṣān | 29 |

ballātaka.yātu.dhānāva.anudhā.mārgava.bāṇānāṃ puṣpair
            elaka.akṣi.guggulu.hālāhalānāṃ ca kaṣāyaṃ basta.nara.śoṇita.yuktaṃ daṃśa.yogaḥ | 30
            |

tato 'rdha.dharaṇiko yogaḥ saktu.piṇyākābhyām udake praṇīto
            dhanuḥ.śata.āyāmam udaka.āśayaṃ dūṣayati | 31 |

matsya.paramparā hy etena daṣṭā-abhimṛṣṭā vā viṣī.bhavati,
            yaś ca-etad udakaṃ pibati spṛśati vā | 32 |

rakta.śveta.sarṣapair godhā tri.pakṣam uṣṭrikāyāṃ bhūmau
            nikhātāyāṃ nihitā vadhyena-uddhṛtā yāvat paśyati tāvan mārayati, kṛṣṇa.sarpo vā | 33
            |

vidyut.pradagdho 'ṅgāro jvālo vā vidyut.pradagdhaiḥ kāṣṭhair
            gṛhītaś ca-anuvāsitaḥ kṛttikāsu bharaṇīṣu vā raudreṇa karmaṇā-abhihuto 'gniḥ praṇītaś ca
            nispratīkāro dahati | 34 |
karmārād agnim āhṛtya kṣaudreṇa juhuyāt pṛthak |

surayā śauṇḍikād agniṃ mārgato 'gniṃ ghṛtena ca || 35
              ||

dadhnā ca sūtikāsv agnim āhita.agniṃ ca taṇḍulaiḥ || 36
              ||
caṇḍāla.agniṃ ca māṃsena cita.agniṃ mānuṣeṇa ca |

adite namaste, anumate namaste, sarasvati namaste, deva
            savitar namāste | 39 |

agnaye svāhā, somāya svāhā, bhūḥ svāhā bhuvaḥ svāhā | 40
            |

māṣa.yava.kulattha.darbha.mūla.cūrṇaṃ vā kṣīra.ghṛtābhyām,
            vallī.kṣīra.ghṛtaṃ vā sama.siddham, sāla.pṛśni.parṇī.mūla.kalkaṃ payasā pītvā, payo vā
            tat.siddhaṃ madhu.ghṛtābhyām aśitvā māsam upavasati | 3 |

śveta.basta.mūtre sapta.rātra.uṣitaiḥ siddha.arthakaiḥ
            siddhaṃ tailaṃ kaṭuka.ālābau māsa.ardha.māsa.sthitaṃ catuṣ.pada.dvi.padānāṃ
            virūpa.karaṇam | 4 |

takra.yava.bhakṣasya sapta.rātrād ūrdhvaṃ śveta.gardabhasya
            leṇḍa.yavaiḥ siddhaṃ gaura.sarṣapa.tailaṃ virūpa.karaṇam | 5 |

etayor anyatarasya mūtra.leṇda.rasa.siddhaṃ
            siddha.arthaka.tailam arka.tūla.pataṅga.cūrṇa.pratīvāpaṃ śvetī.karaṇam | 6 |

śveta.basta.mūtre śveta.sarṣapāḥ
            sapta.rātra.uṣita.astakra(?).marka.kṣīra.lavaṇaṃ dhānyaṃ ca pakṣa.sthito yogaḥ
            śvetī.karaṇam | 8 |

kaṭuka.alābau valī.gate gataṃ.ardha.māsa.sthitaṃ
            gaura.sarṣapa.piṣṭaṃ romṇāṃ śvetī.karaṇam | 9 |
alojuneti yaḥ kīṭaḥ śvetā ca gṛha.golikā |

gomayena tinduka.ariṣṭa.kalkena vā mardita.aṅgasya
            bhallātaka.rasa.anuliptasya māsikaḥ kuṣṭha.yogaḥ | 11 |

kṛṣṇa.sarpa.mukhe gṛha.golikā.mukhe vā sapta.rātra.uṣitā
            gujjāḥ kuṣṭha.yogaḥ | 12 |

kha.dyota.gaṇḍū.pada.cūrṇaṃ samudra.jantūnāṃ bhṛṅga.kapālānāṃ
            khadira.karṇikārāṇāṃ puṣpa.cūrṇaṃ vā śakuna.kaṅgu.taila.yuktaṃ tejana.cūrṇam | 19 |

tena pradigdham aṅgaṃ kuśa.āmra.phala.taila.siktaṃ
            samudra.maṇḍūkī.phenaka.sarja.rasa.cūrṇa.yuktaṃ vā jvalati | 24 |

maṇḍūka.kulīra.ādīnāṃ vasayā sama.bhāgaṃ tailaṃ siddham
            abhyaṅgaṃ gātrāṇām agni.prajvālanam | 25 |
sādhayet tailam etena pādāv abhyajya nirmalau |

haṃsa.krauñca.mayūrāṇām anyeṣāṃ vā mahā.śakunīnām
            udaka.plavānāṃ puccheṣu baddhā nala.dīpikā rātrāv ulkā.darśanam | 30 |

strī.puṣpa.pāyitā māṣā vrajakulī.mūlaṃ maṇḍūka.vasā.miśraṃ
            culluyāṃ dīptāyām apācanam | 32 |

pīlumayo maṇir agni.garbhaḥ suvarcalā.mūla.granthiḥ
            sūtra.granthir vā picu.pariveṣṭito mukhyād agni.dhūma.utsargaḥ | 34 |

plavamānānām asthiṣu kalmāṣa.veṇunā nirmathito 'gnir
            na-udakena śāmyati, udakena jvalati | 37 |

śastra.hatasya śūla.protasya vā puruṣasya
            vāma.pārśva.parśuka.asthiṣu kalmāṣa.veṇunā nirmathito 'gniḥ striyāḥ puruṣasya vā-asthiṣu
            manuṣya.parśukayā nirmathito 'gnir yatra trir apasavyaṃ gacchati na ca-atra-anyo 'gnir
            jvalati | 38 |

ulūka.gṛdhra.vasābhyām uṣṭra.carma.upānahāv abhyajya
            vaṭapattraiḥ praticchādya pañcāśad.yojanāny aśrānto gacchati | 42 |

śyena.kaṅka.kāka.gṛdhra.haṃsa.krauñca.vīcī.rallānāṃ majjāno
            retāṃsi vā yojana.śatāya, siṃha.vyāghra.dvīpa.kāka.ulūkānāṃ majjāno retāṃsi vā | 43
            |

sārvavarṇikāni garbha.patanāny uṣṭrikāyām abhiṣūya śmaśāne
            preta.śiśūn vā tat.samutthitaṃ medo yojana.śatāya | 44 |

mārjāra.uṣṭra.vṛka.varāha.śva.avi.dvāgulī.naptṛ.kāka.ulūkānām
            anyeṣāṃ vā niśā.carāṇāṃ sattvānām ekasya dvayor bahūnāṃ vā dakṣiṇāni vāmāni ca-akṣīṇi
            gṛhītvā dvidhā cūrṇaṃ kārayet | 1 |

tato dakṣiṇaṃ vāmena vāmaṃ dakṣiṇena samabhyajya rātrau
            tamasi ca paśyati | 2 |

tri.rātra.upoṣitaḥ puṣyeṇa śastra.hatasya śūla.protasya vā
            puṃsaḥ śiraḥ.kapāle mṛttikāyāṃ yavān āvāsya-avikṣīreṇa secayet | 4 |

tri.ratra.upoṣitaḥ puṣyeṇa śva.mārjāra.ulūka.vāgulīnāṃ
            dakṣiṇāni vāmāni ca-akṣīṇi dvidhā cūrṇaṃ kārayet | 6 |

tri.rātra.upoṣitaḥ puṣyeṇa puruṣa.ghātinaḥ kāṇḍakasya śalākām
            añjanīṃ ca kārayet | 8 |

tri.rātra.upoṣitaḥ puṣyeṇa kālāyasīm añjanīṃ śalākāṃ ca
            kārayet | 10 |

tato niśā.carāṇāṃ sattvānām anyatamasya śiraḥ.kapālam
            añjanena pūrayitvā mṛtāyāḥ striyā yonau praveśya dāhayet | 11 |

tad añjanaṃ puṣyeṇa-uddhṛtya tasyām añjanyāṃ nidadhyāt | 12
            |

yatra brāhmaṇam āhita.agniṃ dagdhaṃ dahyamānaṃ vā paśyet
            tatra tri.rātra.upoṣitaḥ puṣyeṇa svayaṃ.mṛtasya vāsasā prasevaṃ kṛtvā citā.bhasmanā
            pūrayitvā tam ābadhya naṣṭac.chāyā.rūpaś carati | 14 |

brāhmaṇasya preta.kārye yo gaur māryate
            tasya-asthi.majja.cūrṇa.pūrṇā-ahi.bhastrā paśūnām antar.dhānam | 15 |

sarpa.daṣṭasya bhasmanā pūrṇā pracalāka.bhastrā mṛgāṇām
            antar.dhānam | 16 |
baliṃ vairocanaṃ vande śata.māyaṃ ca śambaram |

bhaṇḍīra.pākaṃ narakaṃ nikumbhaṃ kumbham eva ca || 19
              ||
eteṣām anuyogena kṛtaṃ te svāpanaṃ mahat || 20 ||
yathā svapanty ajagarāḥ svapanty api camū.khalāḥ |
tathā svapantu puruṣā ye ca grāme kutūhalāḥ || 21 ||

imaṃ gṛhaṃ pravekṣyāmi tūṣṇīm āsantu bhāṇḍakāḥ || 22
              ||
ye devā deva.lokeṣu mānuṣeṣu ca brāhmaṇāḥ || 23 ||
adhyayana.pāragāḥ siddhā ye ca kaulāsa tāpasāḥ |

etebhyaḥ sarva.siddhebhyaḥ kṛtaṃ te svāpanaṃ mahat || 24
              ||

tri.rātra.upoṣitaḥ kṛṣṇa.catur.daśyāṃ puṣya.yoginyāṃ
            śva.pākī.hastād vilakha.avalekhanaṃ krīṇīyāt | 28 |

tan.māṣaiḥ saha kaṇḍolikāyāṃ kṛtvā-asaṅkīrṇa ādahane
            nikhānayet | 29 |

dvitīyasyāṃ caturdaśyām uddhṛtya kumāryā peṣayitvā gulikāḥ
            kārayet | 30 |

tata ekāṃ gulikām abhimantrayitvā yatra-etana mantreṇa
            kṣipati tat sarvaṃ prasvāpayati | 31 |

etena-eva kalpena śvā.vidhaḥ śalyakaṃ tri.kālaṃ triśvetam
            asaṅkīrṇa ādahane nikhānayet | 32 |

dvitīyasyāṃ caturdaśyām uddhṛtya-ādahana.bhasmanā saha
            yatra.etena mantreṇa kṣipati tat sarvaṃ prasvāpayati | 33 |

sarvāś ca devatā vande vande sarvāṃś ca tāpasān || 34
              ||
vaśaṃ me brāhmaṇā yāntu bhūmi.pālāś ca kṣatriyāḥ |

vaśaṃ vaiśyāś ca śūdrāś ca vaśatāṃ yāntu me sadā || 35
              ||

svāhā - amile kimile vayu.cāre prayoge phakke vayuhve vihāle
            danta.kaṭake svāhā | 36 |
sukhaṃ svapantu śunakā ye ca grāme kutūhalāḥ |
prasuptāḥ sarva.siddhā hi etat te svāpanaṃ kṛtam |

śvā.vidhaḥ śalyakāni tri.śvetāni, sapta.rātra.upoṣitaḥ
            kṛṣṇa.caturdaśyāṃ khādirābhiḥ samidhābhir agnim etena mantreṇa-aṣṭa.śata.sampātaṃ kṛtvā
            madhu.ghṛtābhyām abhijuhuyāt | 41 |

tata ekam etena mantreṇa grāma.dvāri gṛha.dvāri vā yatra
            nikhanyate tat sarvaṃ prasvāpayati | 42 |
baliṃ vairocanaṃ vande śatamāyaṃ ca śambaram |

jayatu jayati ca namaḥ śalaka.bhūtebhyaḥ svāhā || 45
              ||
sukhaṃ svapantu śunakā ye ca grāme kutūhalāḥ |
sukhaṃ svapantu siddha.arthā yam arthaṃ mārgayāmahe |

yāvad astam ayād udayo yāvad arthaṃ phalaṃ mama || 46
              ||

catur.bhakta.upavāsī kṛṣṇa.caturdaśyām asaṅkīrṇa ādahane
            baliṃ kṛtvā-etena mantreṇa śava.śārikāṃ gṛhītvā pautrī.poṭṭalikaṃ badhnīyāt | 49 |

tan.madhye śvā.vidhaḥ śalyakena viddhvā yatra-etena mantreṇa
            nikhanyate tat sarvaṃ prasvāpayati | 50 |
apayāntu ca sarvāṇi vaśatāṃ yāntu me sadā || 51 ||

tri.rātra.uposṣitaḥ puṣyeṇa śarkarā eka.viṃśati.sampātaṃ
            kṛtvā madhu.ghṛtābhyām abhijuhuyāt | 54 |

dvitīyena puṣyeṇa-uddhṛtya-ekāṃ śarkarām abhimantrayitvā
            kapāṭam āhanyāt | 56 |

catur.bhakta.upavāsī kṛṣṇa.caturdaśyāṃ bhagnasya
            puruṣasya-asthnā ṛṣabhaṃ kārayet, abhimantrayec ca-etena | 58 |

tri.rātra.upoṣitaḥ puṣyeṇa śastra.hatasya śūla.protasya vā
            puṃsaḥ śiraḥ.kapāle mṛttikāyāṃ tuvarī.rāvāsya-udakena secayet | 64 |(?)

tataḥ sajyānāṃ dhanuṣāṃ yantrāṇāṃ ca purastāc chedanaṃ
            jyāc.chedanaṃ karoti | 66 |

udaka.ahi.bhastrām ucchvāsa.mṛttikayā striyāḥ puruṣasya vā
            pūrayet, nāsikā.bandhanaṃ mukha.grahaś ca | 67 |

kṛṣṇa.caturdaśyāṃ śastra.hatāyā goḥ kapilāyāḥ pittena
            rāja.vṛkṣamayīm amitra.pratimām añjyāt, andhī.karaṇam | 69 |

catur.bhakta.upavāsī kṛṣṇa.caturdaśyāṃ baliṃ kṛtvā
            śūla.protasya puruṣasya-asthnā kīlakān kārayet | 70 |

eteṣām ekaḥ purīṣe mūtre vā nikhāta ānāhaṃ karoti, pade
            'sya-āsane vā nikhātaḥ śoṣeṇa mārayati, āpaṇe kṣetre gṛhe vā vṛttic.chedaṃ karoti | 71
            |

etena-eva kalpena vidyud.dagdhasya vṛkṣasya kīlakā vyākhyātāḥ
            | 72 |
punar navam avācīnaṃ nimbaḥ kāma.madhuś ca yaḥ |
nikhanyate gṛhe yasya dṛṣṭvā vā yat padaṃ nayet |
punar navam avācīnaṃ nimbaḥ kāma.madhuś ca yaḥ |
dvāre gṛhasya senāyā grāmasya nagarasya vā |

bhavaty apuruṣaḥ sadyo yāvat tan na-apanīyate || 78
              ||

tri.rātra.upoṣitaḥ puṣyeṇa śastra.hatasya śūla.protasya vā
            puṃsaḥ śiraḥ.kapāle mṛttikāyāṃ guñjā āvāsya-udakena secayet | 79 |

jātānām amāvāsyāyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ vā puṣya.yoginyāṃ
            guñja.vallīr grāhayitvā maṇḍalikāni kārayet | 80 |

rātri.prekṣāyāṃ pravṛttāyāṃ pradīpa.agniṣu mṛta.dhenoḥ stanān
            utkṛtya dāhayet | 82 |

taṃ grāmam apasavyaṃ pariṇīya yat tatra nyastaṃ nava.nītam
            eṣāṃ tat sarvam āgacchati | 84 |

kṛṣṇa.caturdaśyāṃ puṣya.yoginyāṃ śuno lagnakasya yonau
            kālāyasīṃ mudrikāṃ preṣayet | 85 |

Chapter 4 (Section 179): Counter-measures against Injuries to One's
            Own Troops

śleṣmātaka.kapittha.danti.danta.śaṭha.goji.śirīṣa.pāṭalī.balāsyonāga.-
            punar.navā.śveta.vāraṇa.kvātha.yuktaṃ(?) candana.sālā.vṛkī.lohita.yuktaṃ nejana.udakaṃ
            rāja.upabhogyānāṃ guhya.prakṣālanaṃ strīṇām, senāyāś ca viṣa.pratīkāraḥ | 2 |

sṛgāla.vinnā.madana.sindu.vārita.varaṇa.vāraṇa.valī.mūla.kaṣāyāṇām anyatamasya
            samastānāṃ vā kṣīra.yuktaṃ pānaṃ madana.doṣa.haram | 4 |

manuṣyāṇām akṣa.mātram, gava.aśvānāṃ dvi.guṇam, catur.guṇaṃ
            hasty.uṣṭrāṇām | 10 |

lipta.dhvajaṃ patākāṃ vā dṛṣṭvā bhavati nirviṣaḥ || 13
              ||
Book 15: The Method of the Science
Chapter 1 (Section 180): Devices Used in the Science

manuṣyāṇāṃ vṛttir arthaḥ, manuṣyavatī bhūmir ity arthaḥ | 1
            |

tasyāḥ pṛthivyā lābha.pālana.upāyaḥ śāstram artha.śāstram iti
            | 2 |

tad.dvātriṃśad yukti.yuktaṃ - adhikaraṇam, vidhānam, yogaḥ,
            pada.arthaḥ, hetv.arthaḥ, uddeśaḥ, nirdeśaḥ, upadeśaḥ, apadeśaḥ, atideśaḥ, pradeśaḥ,
            upamānam, artha.āpattiḥ, saṃśayaḥ, prasaṅgaḥ, viparyayaḥ, vākya.śeṣaḥ, anumatam,
            vyākhyānam, nirvacanam, nidarśanam, apavargaḥ, sva.sañjñā, pūrva.pakṣaḥ, uttara.pakṣaḥ,
            eka.antaḥ, anāgata.avekṣaṇam, atikrānta.avekṣaṇam, niyogaḥ, vikalpaḥ, samuccayaḥ ūhyam
            iti | 3 |

"pṛthivyā lābhe pālane ca yāvanty artha.śāstrāṇi
            pūrva.ācāryaiḥ prasthāpitāni prāyaśas tāni saṃhṛtya-ekam idam artha.śāstraṃ kṛtam" iti |
            5 |

"vidyā.samuddeśaḥ, vṛddha.samyogaḥ, indriya.jayaḥ,
            amātya.utpattiḥ" ity evaṃ.ādikam iti | 7 |

"yaḥ pitṛ.paitāmaham artham anyāyena bhakṣayati sa
            mūla.haraḥ" ity arthaḥ | 12 |

"dharma.artha.virodhena kāmaṃ seveta, na nihsukhaḥ syāt" iti
            | 20 |

"mantri.pariṣadaṃ dvādaśa.amātyān kurvīta-iti mānavāḥ -
            ṣoḍaśa-iti bārhaspatyāḥ - viṃśatim ity auśanasāḥ - yathā.sāmarthyam iti kauṭilyaḥ" iti |
            22 |

"pakṣāv urasyaṃ pratigraha ity auśanaso vyūha.vibhāgaḥ" iti |
            42 |

"viśeṣataś ca saṅghānāṃ saṅgha.dharmiṇāṃ ca rāja.kulānāṃ
            dyūta.nimitto bhedas tan.nimitto vināśa ity asat.pragrahaḥ pāpiṣṭhatamo vyasanānāṃ
            tantra.daurbalyāt" iti | 44 |

"vigṛhīto hi jyāyasā hastinā pāda.yuddham iva.abhyupaiti" iti
            | 48 |

"prathamā prakṛtiḥ, tasya bhūmy.anantarā dvitīyā,
            bhūmy.eka.antarā tṛtīyā" iti | 52 |

"tasmād dharmyam arthyaṃ ca-asya-upadiśet, na-adharmyam
            anarthaym ca" iti | 64 |

"yathā ca dātā pratigrahītā ca na-upahatau syātāṃ
            tathā-anuśayaṃ kuśalāḥ kalpayeyuḥ" iti | 70 |
evaṃ śāstram idaṃ yuktam etābhis tantra.yuktibhiḥ |

avāptau pālane ca-uktaṃ lokasya-asya parasya ca || 71
              ||
dharmam arthaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca pravartayati pāti ca |
yena śāstraṃ ca śastraṃ ca nanda.rāja.gatā ca bhūḥ |

amarṣeṇa-uddhṛtāny āśu tena śāstram idaṃ kṛtam || 73
              ||
